courses.title: From Burnout to Balance
courses.bio: Getting out of burnout and achieving balance can help you reclaim your well-being while attaining sustainable success.
objectives: Understanding Burnout- Signs, Symptoms, Causes and Effects
Getting Knowledge about the Toll of Burnout
The Relationship Between Success and Well-Being
Tips for Self-Awareness and Reflection
Setting Goals to Attain Balance
Ways to Nurture Physical Health
Cultivating Emotional Resilience
Building Supportive Relationships
Helpful Strategies for Managing Burnout
How to Use Self-Care to Move from Burnout to Balance
Benefits of an Emotionally Resilient Person
Redefining Success and Tips for Measuring it

2 MODULE: 1. The Relationship between Success and Well-Being

requirements: No experience needed it. You will learn everything you need to know.
courses.description:
In a world characterized by the relentless pursuit of success, it often comes at a steep cost — our well-being. There are pressures from everywhere and all of these can push a person to the brink of burnout. However, this transformative journey from burnout to balance is an essential one that is capable of entirely changing the narrative. Achieving this can help you reclaim your well-being even while achieving sustainable success.


Our world is quite familiar with burnout and some people even see it as a norm for survival. The essence of this course is to educate you on this all too familiar companion — burnout. It is nice to pursue your goal, but more important to take a pause every now and then. Self-care is one way to change the narrative from burnout to balance so that you can lead a happy and more fulfilled life. Of course, you have it within your power to exchange the suffocating grip of burnout for the liberating and more enjoyable embrace of balance.


As we embark on this journey of self-love and care, the course ahead unfolds various strategies to guide you through the multifaceted path of success and well-being. The emphasis lies in the fact that even though burnout is a common adversary that we must battle all the time, it does not define us. Rather, it is a catalyst for change and a signal that the time has come to realign and harmonize your ambitions with the rhythms of your life rather than at the expense of it.


Indeed, success is undoubtedly something that we all strive for, but it shouldn’t come at the expense of your happiness and health. Throughout the course, we dive into the intricate connection between well-being and success and offer relatable strategies that can help strengthen and help reclaim control over your life.


Many make the mistake of connecting success with burnout. Rather than deal with it properly, they let it go because of the misconception that there is no success story without experiencing burnout. It is important to note that success can only be achieved with a harmonious combination of self-care and accomplishments.
target_audience: The course is for anyone who wants to get out of burnout and move to balance: For beginners who want to learn how to overcome the challenges of the overwhelming exhaustion.
And also it is for employees who want to overcome burnout - reclaiming their well-being while attaining sustainable success.

courses.title: AWS Solutions Architect Associate Full Course & 2 Mock Exams
courses.bio: Learn and Pass AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate Certification (SAA-C03) | Get Certified SAA-C03 Exam!
objectives: This course covers every concepts to Pass AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate Certification
Latest Updated course AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate Certification (SAA-C03)
Learn and Clear AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate Certification exam confidently and Learn the AWS Fundamentals
Have a deeper understanding for each topic and Pass the Exam
requirements: No AWS Cloud experience is necessary, we'll use the AWS Free Tier
courses.description:
Only AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate that you need. This course covers everything to Pass the Exam and Learn AWS concepts. The AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate course is a comprehensive program designed for anyone seeking to build expertise in designing distributed systems and cloud solutions on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform. This course serves as a foundational stepping stone for IT professionals, developers, and aspiring cloud architects who aim to understand how to design scalable, cost-effective, secure, and high-performing architectures using AWS services. The certification validates a your ability to architect and deploy robust applications, making it a highly regarded credential in the cloud computing industry.
Throughout the course, You will gain hands-on experience with key AWS services such as EC2 (Elastic Compute Cloud), S3 (Simple Storage Service), RDS (Relational Database Service), VPC (Virtual Private Cloud), Lambda, CloudFront, and Route 53. You will be introduced to the core principles of AWS architecture, including the Well-Architected Framework, which emphasizes five pillars: operational excellence, security, reliability, performance efficiency, and cost optimization. The course blends theoretical concepts with practical labs and real-world scenarios, enabling learners to apply architectural best practices in designing cloud-based solutions.
By the end of the course, You will be equipped with the skills to design and implement secure, resilient, and scalable solutions on AWS, making them valuable assets to organizations undergoing cloud transformation. Whether pursuing a career in cloud architecture, consulting, or cloud operations, this course provides the essential knowledge and certification required to succeed in the rapidly growing field of cloud computing.
target_audience: This AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate course is for anyone wanting to obtain the knowledge to pass the AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate Certification

courses.description:
->Atenção: Leia abaixo:
- Este curso é para iniciantes
- Este curso não trata de relacionamentos amorosos
Em 2019, a frase "Como fazer as pessoas gostarem de mim" foi uma das mais procuradas no Google. Isso demonstra que devido ao mundo virtual e a outros fatores, pessoas tem buscado formas de terem a atenção dos outros e serem verdadeiramente aceitas.
Ao fazer e aplicar o curso, Como conversar bem,você irá aumentar a sua rede de amigos e também seu networking no trabalho.
Eu, Prof. Danilo Mota serei o seu instrutor. Eu já ensinei sobre Influência, persuasão, carisma e linguagem corporal a mais de 15 mil alunos só aqui na Udemy!
Nesse curso, vou tratar de dois fatores básicos:
- Como conversar; e
- Como manter uma conversa.
Esse material é fruto da minha própria experiência de aprendizado: Até a minha juventude, sempre fui muito tímido e tinha dificuldades de me relacionar. Um dia tomei a decisão de sair dessa situação. Então, comecei a estudar, aplicar e validar técnicas que fazem com que mais amizades e relacionamentos possam ser criados e nutridos.
Então, esse material é voltado a prática com aulas curtas e focadas somente na questão de Como conversar bem.
A grande sacada da comunicação é que você pode aprender a se comunicar. Existem muitas técnicas, que se colocadas em ação diariamente, fazem MUITA diferença em longo prazo.
Fazendo esse curso, você vai ter um ganho de qualidade não somente nas suas amizades, mas nos seus relacionamentos como um todo.

courses.title: Overcoming a decade in Zimbabwe's Prisons
courses.bio: How to keep motivated through insurmountable hardships using forgiveness, gratitude and a positive mindset.
objectives: The Power of Forgiveness - To overcome any setback, it's necessary to forgive those who you feel have wronged you. I'll guide you on the path of forgiveness.
"Gratitude is the healthiest and most fulfilling emotion. Its practice brings immense value and importance to our lives. Let me help you to be grateful."
"Positive thinking impacts 98% of our physical selves. Join me on a life-changing journey towards a positive mindset."
Freedom is more than avoiding imprisonment. It's choosing your path, releasing what you can't control, and escaping negativity's grasp.
"Find your inner strength and release the need to control what you can't. It's within you, but only a few discover what they can truly conquer."
Facing the possibility of death can teach us to appreciate life's small blessings and be grateful for every moment we have.
Hope anchors you in difficult times, keeping you level-headed and optimistic. Let your aspirations guide you, not your struggles. Seek hope from within.
"Health, loved ones & friends cannot be bought. I'll share how I coped with this truth."
No matter where you are, life is what you make of it. Losing everything doesn't define you, but how you respond to it does.
"Your past only lives in your mind; don't let it control you. Seek positivity amidst negativity to find hope."
Losing empathy means losing humanity. I witnessed 2200 prisoners die from malnutrition, a reminder of the consequences of apathy towards others.
Life's value isn't defined by titles, success or material possessions. My experience taught me that I'm just a normal human being.
"From despair's depths, I realized my mind dragged me through there and so it could pull me out. It's a realization that can set anybody free."
Resilience is something we are not born with. We're born with fortitude, but resilience is developed through life experiences and coping strategies.
Motivation is the driving force that inspires and energizes individuals to take action towards achieving their goals and desires. Let's get started...

Freedom of the mind and soul: Freedom of the mind and soul
Freedom of the mind and soul
Freedom of the mind and soul

requirements: No programming experience needed - you will feel the impact.
courses.description:
In this gripping keynote, I will take you on a journey through my life as a self-made businessman in the safari industry in Bulawayo, Zimbabwe. I'll share details of an incident that led to my wrongful imprisonment, the emotional impact of my conviction without a body, against police evidence, and presumptions. I'll describe the horrendous and inconceivable conditions of overcrowding and high death rates in the cells, and how my decade-long nightmare birthed a string of life lessons. Throughout my talk, I'll show you photos and sketches to highlight the details of my experience and how I had to dig deep to find solutions to overcome the unimaginable, physically and mentally.
Following my keynote are 27 short video clips taken from the keynote content, each with a powerful message. From "Breaking free from your prisons" to "Love and happiness," I'll cover a wide range of topics, including facing your fears, the power of forgiveness, and finding true freedom. With each clip, you'll gain a deeper understanding of my journey and the life lessons I learned along the way.
By the end of my keynote, you'll feel inspired to break free from any prisons holding you back and appreciate the value of family, love, support, and gratitude. You'll learn how to face your fears, find inner strength, and overcome even the most challenging circumstances. Join me on this unforgettable journey, and discover the true meaning of freedom.
As a takeaway gift, you will be blessed with my best-seller digital book Beating Chains.

Este breve curso, te va a permitir ganar herramientas para asistir a eventos, conocer los códigos fundamentales y básicos del ceremonial y protocolo en la mesa y los eventos de carácter social.  También te va permitir conocer las pautas para brindar un evento simple en tu hogar. Es una guía con lo más importante sobre el Ceremonial y Protocolo, aplicado a las conductas en la mesa en el ámbito de  los eventos sociales.
Ideal para quienes quieren ganar seguridad a la hora de asistir a eventos, o de brindar hospitalidad en sus hogares. Saber cómo utilizar los utensilios de la mesa, como distribuirlos de forma correcta, cómo acertar en las conversaciones, como presentarse, y entablar buenas relaciones, será parte de lo que veremos en este curso breve y efectivo.
Conocer los códigos de etiqueta nos puede llevar a mejorar nuestros vínculos, a conseguir mejores oportunidades, y sentirnos más confiados. Una herramienta útil para todos los que desean proyectar una mejor imagen personal. Pensada para profesionales, para aquellos que asisten a cenas y eventos formales, como también para aquellos que desean ser los mejores anfitriones. Este curso nos brinda la oportunidad de elevar nuestras habilidades sociales, y relacionarnos de la mejor manera.

Bem-vindo ao meu curso on-line de Motivação no Trabalho!


Ele vai aborda temas introdutórios com sugestões práticas para você conseguir se motivar diante das adversidades encontradas no dia a dia.
Olá, meu nome é Isaac Martins, sou:
Professor com Mestrado pela Universidades de São Paulo com a tese de como motivar equipe da área comercial,
Gestor e empreendedor desde de 1996, quando montei a minha empresa,

Acelerador de resultados, minha missão é transformar suas metas em resultados,
Louco por Televendas & Vendas e sempre focado no Resultado!


E quero convidá-lo a participar desse curso rápido de motivação no trabalho.

Como lidar com Ambientes desmotivadores

Com esse curso você melhorará sua motivação diária. A motivação no trabalho está ligada à vontade de se manter no emprego e melhorar sua perfomance e suas ações no ambiente de trabalho.
Em resumo, vai aumentar seu desejo de cumprir metas e atingir bons resultados, tanto por questões internas, quanto por estímulos externos.
Nem sempre é fácil manter-se motivado diantes de tantos problemas existentes.
Mas nesse curso você verá que a motivação é o fruto da fé em si mesmo. É acreditar no que está sendo feito, se envolver no trabalho e prever os bons frutos que surgirão resultantes de sua própria ação. Que o nosso cansaço não vença as nossas metas. Inicie seu curso agora mesmo!

courses.description:
Do you want to learn how to accomplish more of your goals?
Goal Achievement = Setting Better Goals = Creating Better Habits
That's what this course is all about, and it's the perfect quick crash course if you're feeling stuck, and need some help setting your goals.
Your goals can be personal or business focused. They can be big (buy a home, get a new job) or small (go to the gym today, learn to bake bread). We'll help you create a goal-setting framework that will lead you to successful goal achievement.
What does our goal setting framework look like?
Each goal should contain measurable milestones and goal-oriented activities. Beyond the activities, you'll need to create better habits that help you accomplish those activities. We've simplified this process into a practical system of Monthly, Weekly and Daily planning.
And beyond this, you'll learn how the right motivation and accountability can further help you achieve your goals.
What do you get when you start the course?
Easy & down-to-earth video lessons
Downloadable & printable workbook
Instructor support if you get stuck
Lifetime access to course updates
More importantly, if you take action while watching the course, you'll be well on your way to living the life of your dreams.
We've even included a bonus section on creating a better morning routine, a great way to start achieving your goals each and every day.
Who teaches this course?
We are Phil Ebiner & Diego Davila. We both run successful online businesses with millions in revenue & millions of customers. We're not 'text-book goal setting experts' that will bore you with outdated slideshows and methodologies. We're just like you - normal people with normal lives who have figured out several ways to optimize goal setting & achievement.
Now we're sharing our real world experiences and goal strategies with you.
Enroll now to start living the life you dream of.
See you in class!
Phil & Diego
target_audience: Anyone who wants to achieve goals (personal, career, health, creative, or anything else!)

courses.title: 9 Altı'dan Exit
courses.bio: Finansal Özgürlüğe Nasıl Ulaşırsınız? Enneagram ile Kişilik Analizi Nasıl Yapılır? Kaygılarınızı Nasıl Yönetebilirsiniz?
objectives: Enneagram öğretisi ile gerçekte KİM olduğunuzu
Enerji ve motivasyonlarınızı nasıl ortaya çıkaracağınızı
Kişiliğinizdeki baskın nitelikler ile iyi ve kötü huylarınızı
Finansal özgürlük stratejileri ve önemli alışkanlıkları
Korku ve kaygılarınızla nasıl anlaşma yapacağınızı
Girişim veya Exit yapmak için nelerden korkmamanız gerektiğini

Korku ve Gelecek Kaygılarınızdan Nasıl K: Exit Yapmak için Korkularınızı Yok Edin

requirements: 2021 yılında hayatınızda değişiklikler yapmaya istekli olmak
Potansiyelinizin farkında olmak ve yeteneklerinize inanmak
Yeni yöntemler öğrenmeye açık olmak
courses.description:
Bu eğitim sabah karanlığında işe başlayıp, akşam karanlığında işten dönen herkes için bir çıkış amacıyla hazırlanmıştır.
Sürekli hayalini kurduğunuz özgürlüğü ADIM ADIM ve HEDEF belirleyerek gerçekleştireceksiniz.
21. yy insanının sahip olması gereken EN ÖNEMLİ nitelikleri öğreneceksiniz.
Bu eğitimi tamamladığınızda,


Kişiliğinize özel HEDEF belirlemeyi,
ENNEAGRAM öğretisi ile kişilik tipi analizini,
KÖR NOKTALARINIZDAN nasıl kurtulacağınızı,
Tarihteki hangi ünlü kişilere BENZEDİĞİNİZİ,
İMPOSTER SENDROMUNDAN kurtulma yollarını,
Finansal yatırım için ANALİZ FELCİ probleminden kurtulmayı,
VARLIK OLUŞTURMA yöntemlerini,
tecrübelerle birlikte öğreneceksiniz.


Eğitim Hakkında Özet:
Birinci bölüm olan “Sen Kimsin?” de dünyanın en kadim ve değerli öğretilerinden biri olan Enneagram’ı göreceğiz. Enneagram yöntemiyle kişiliğinizi anlamaya çalışacağız. Enneagram bu yolculuğunuzda kendiniz hakkında bilmediklerinizi keşfetmeye yarayacak bir rehber olacaktır. Aynı zamanda Enneagram ile, “9 Altıdan Exit” in size göre olup olmadığını da görme şansınız olacak.
İkinci bölüm “Finansal Özgürlük”. Sizin için finansal özgürlüğün anlamını ne? Kendinize bunu sorup cevap vermenizi isteyeceğim. Daha sonra ihtiyacınız olan stratejileri ve önemli alışkanlıkları size anlatacağım. Her bir başlık içinde kolaylıkla uygulayabileceğiniz kendi tecrübelerimden de bahsedeceğim.
Üçüncü bölüm “Exit” yapabilmek için en önemli konulardan biri olan korku ve kaygıyla başa çıkmak olacak. Onların aslında ne olduğuna kulak vereceğiz. Çünkü korku ve kaygıyı anlamadan onların üstesinden gelemezsiniz. Bu yüzden korktuğunuzda vücudunuza neler olduğundan başlayıp, işe yarar yöntemleri anlamakla devam edeceğiz.
Eğitim sonunda yorum yazıp, mail ile yardım istemekten çekinmeyin. Tam tersine, her bulduğunuz fırsatta bana yazın. Çünkü ben kendi yolumu ararken maalesef danışacağım biri yoktu. Sizin de en çok zorluk çekeceğiniz noktaları adım gibi biliyorum.
target_audience: Ne istediğini bilmeyen ve öğrenmek isteyenler

courses.title: Motivation für das Studium und darüber hinaus!
courses.bio: Wie lerne ich mich selbst zu motivieren und motiviert zu bleiben?

Einleitung: Einen Sinn finden - die Grundlage deines Handelns
Praktische Übung um deinen Sinn zu finden
Aktion - Jetzt ist die Zeit zu handeln
Den Weg lieben Lernen - Vergesse das Ziel

requirements: Der Kurs hat keine besonderen Anforderungen
courses.description:
Du kannst Dich wieder mal nicht für etwas motivieren? Eigentlich merkwürdig, weil Du doch anfangs noch so begeistert bei der Sache warst. Wenn Wir von dem Thema Motivation reden, dann denken wir oftmals an eine mystische Kraft, die uns antreibt Dinge zu tun. Sie ist mal da - und viel häufiger plötzlich weg.
Dabei lässt sich Motivation aber ganz klar kultivieren und herstellen. Mit den richtigen Tipps und Tricks zeige ich Dir in diesem Kurs, wie du länger am Ball bleiben kannst und motiviert sein kannst. Ob für dein Studium, für die Arbeit, für das Lernen und so weiter.
Denn mal ganz ehrlich: Was trennt Dich von deinen großen Träumen und dem hier und jetzt? Ganz eindeutig: Die Umsetzung! Aber in den meisten Fällen liegt es nicht daran, dass die Umsetzung unklar oder unverständlich wäre: Ganz im Gegenteil. Meistens ist sie glasklar und eindeutig. Das Kernproblem wird dann erst im Tun sichtbar: Die Motivation. Allein die aktive Beschäftigung mit dem Thema Motivation hilft bereits schon zu verstehen, wie man selber tickt und wie Motivation funktioniert. Aber nicht nur die Eigenmotivation spielt in diesem Kurs eine Rolle, sondern auch das Motivieren anderer. Nur wer voll von Motivation sprudelt, kann andere auch dazu motivieren und inspirieren neue Dinge zu wagen.
Motivation kann ein Schlüssel für Dich sein, die Dinge viel einfacher zu erreichen und andere zu begeistern.
Im Kern des Ganzen liegt dabei das Motiv - also der Grund für dein Handeln.
Ich wünsche Dir viel Erfolg und Spaß bei meinem Kurs! :)
target_audience: Studenten, jeder Fachrichtung

courses.title: Manifestar
courses.bio: El arte de hacer realidad tus sueños
objectives: Potenciar tu poder interior para lograr tus metas, objetivos o sueños personales-
Herramientas para el empoderamiento personal.
Identificar y gestionar las emociones a fin de que estás no saboteen los objetivos personalesde cada persona.
Explorar sus capacidades internas para potenciarlas y crear la realidad que desean

Bienvenida: Observaciones de la estructura del curso

requirements: El presente curso no requiere ningún conocimiento previo, ya que se trata de conocerse internamente. Cada sujeto es único e irrepetible por lo tanto nadie sabe más de sí mismo que cada uno de ellos.
Sugiero tomar papel, cuaderno y bolígrafo para realizar los ejercicios propuestos
courses.description:
Este programa te acompaña a hacer realidad aquellos sueños que por una u otra razón postergaste, o renunciaste. Es probable que cómo mujer las obligaciones auto impuestas te hayan hecho olvidar de aquello que soñabas hacer tiempo atrás. Sin embargo esos sueños regresan a tu mente y tu respondes con diferentes frase cómo:
Es demasiado tarde
Ya no tengo edad
Qué dirá mi familia si ahora comienzo con esto
No soy lo suficientemente buena para hacerlo
No cuento con los recursos necesarios
Ese discurso, que te cuentas a menudo, se interpuso entre tu y tus sueños. Es hora de trabajar ello y derribarlos ya que no hacen más que provocar en ti sentimientos de agobio y estrés, de manera inconciente.
Eres creadora de tu realidad aunque aún lo desconoces ya que no te crees capaz de manifestar aquellos sueños que tanto has anhelado. Posees un poder interior inmenso capaz de mover montañas, durante este programa te invito a descubrirlo y a trabajar en él.
Se trata de una guía en dónde de manera didáctica encuentras el camino a tu esencia, realizando así un camino de autoconocimiento que eleva tus posibilidades de manifestar,
El mismo es un programa introductorio el cual te introduce en el mundo de las posibilidades que yacen dentro de tí. Así mismo recuperar los sueños es saberte creador de tu realidad. Lo que algún día te separó de de esos anhelos de irá desvaneciendo para dar paso a una persona diferente. Si, así cómo lo oyes. La garantía de este programa es la persona en la que te convientes durante el proceso.
De esa manera estarás lista para sentirte empoderada y emprender todo aquello que creas conveniente; apoyándote en las herramientas que te proporcionó cada día.
El curso se desarrolla de manera teórico - práctica para que experimentes una transformación interna que te proporcione el cambio de observador que se requiere para ser manifestadora. Finalmente, descubres quien quieres ser, esa información solo puedes develarla tú, al realizar ese viaje interno que estás a punto de comenzar.
Si has llegado hasta aquí es porque sabes que dentro tuyo se oculta ese gran ser, dotado de múltiples e infinitas posibilidades por potenciar. A partir de este proceso de desarrollo personal que estas a punto de iniciar descubrirás, que este viaje interior, se trata de un punto de inflexión en tu vida; ya que transformará para siempre tu vida-
target_audience: El curso está dirigido a mujeres de 35 hasta las 65 años que hayan postergado, abandonado o reununciado a sus sueños
Mujeres que buscan empoderaase, despúes de haber atravesado la mitad de su vida.
Mujeres que quieren aprender los primeros pasos en el camino de manifestación.

courses.description:
This course is a kind of virtual consultation about immigration to Canada.
We at LP Group consult clients every day, and the questions we are asked are often the same:
How can I immigrate to Canada?
What documents will I need?
Where to submit an application?
How to take my family with me to Canada?
What language test will I have to take?
How much will I have to pay for my immigration application to be processed?
What is a provincial immigration program?
And many more... People want to understand the process and have the general idea of how it works - and we explain it, trying to keep it simple.
All questions we receive from people like you form the foundation of this course. We will answer all these questions and explain in simple terms how immigration to Canada works and what you will need to immigrate.
The reference materials include even more information and sources of information to trust.
This is the general course that serves the purpose of explaining the process in a simple and easy to understand manner. If you are looking for something more detailed, please consider taking other courses we have here on Udemy.

courses.bio: Todos os seus sonhos são possíveis
objectives: Saiba Como Usar a Lei da Atração Para Realizar os Seus Sonhos
Desvende os Segredos da Neurociência Para Entender Como e Por Que Funciona
Descubra a Vontade de Deus Para a Sua Vida
Sem Mágica ou Mística: Descubra Por Que Realizar os Seus Sonhos é Totalmente Possível

Introdução: As Duas Mentes: Consciente e Subconsciente
A Lei da Atração Pura e Simples: O Que e Como Você Quer?
Como Funciona - A Neurociência: O Mundo Não é Como Você o Vê - 1
O Mundo Não é Como Você o Vê - 2
O Homem, Assim Como Ele Pensa, Ele É
Os Dois Lobos Dentro de Nós
Como Funciona - A Fé: A Lei da Atração x A Bíblia - 1
A Lei da Atração x A Bíblia - 2
Os Sonhos de Deus São Maiores Que os Seus

requirements: Você Pode SIM Realizar os Seus Sonhos! Você Só Tem que Saber o Que Fazer e Crer Que é Possível!
courses.description:
Seus sonhos mais incríveis são totalmente possíveis e realizáveis. Não de uma forma mística, fantasiosa ou misteriosa. Eu explico de maneira clara como os métodos utilizados pelos livros que ensinam sobre a Lei da Atração têm uma lógica por trás, que eles não explicam e atribuem ao poder do "Universo".
Como coach em neurociência, eu explico como programar o seu cérebro para trilhar seu próprio caminho ao encontro dos seus sonhos e esclareço onde cada técnica tem uma razão.
Como cristão, eu identifico onde esses princípios encontram-se em passagens Bíblicas por uma razão muito simples: Deus é tanto o criador do Universo quanto do seu cérebro, e de todas as técnicas ensinadas nos livros e nesse curso.
Os princípios da fé ou dos livros são os mesmos e FUNCIONAM!
Há, entretanto, um único princípio que não é possível de se explicar pela ciência, e esse eu só posso explicar no Módulo de Fé.
Você vai encontrar nesse curso 3 Módulos:
1) A Lei da Atração Pura e Simples - Como é explicada pelos livros
2) Como Funciona a Neurociência - Aqui eu explico a razão científica
3) Como Funciona a Fé - Aqui eu mostro onde as técnicas foram utilizadas na Bíblia e a razão por que um único princípio só pode ser explicado pela fé.
Prepare-se para viver uma nova vida, onde todos os seus sonhos torna-se-ão em realidade!
target_audience: Para quem acha que a vida é sem graça e vazia
Para quem perdeu a esperança em uma vida melhor, com graça e alegria

courses.bio: Mit diesem Kurs ist es Ihnen möglich, ab sofort strukturiert und täglich neu motiviert an Ihren Zielen zu arbeiten.

courses.description:
Einer der Schlüsselfaktoren für Ihren beruflichen und auch privaten Erfolg: Motivation, Eigenmotivation, Selbstmotivation. Sie werden mit diesem Kurs eine neue Motivation erreichen. Lernen Sie etwas über sich, Ihre Ziele und die Fähigkeit, Hürden und Fallstricke auf dem Weg zum Erfolg zu überwinden. Ein wertvoller Kurs rund um die Eigen- und Selbstmotivation für jeden Angestellten und Unternehmer.


In der heutigen Zeit, in der Ablenkungen allgegenwärtig sind und die Anforderungen ständig steigen, ist es wichtiger denn je, sich auf seine Ziele zu konzentrieren und täglich motiviert zu bleiben. Unser Online-Kurs bietet Ihnen genau das: Ein umfassendes Training, das Ihnen hilft, strukturiert und mit neuer Energie an Ihren Zielen zu arbeiten.
Der Kurs ist in mehrere Module unterteilt, die jeweils spezifische Techniken und Strategien behandeln. Im ersten Modul lernen Sie, wie Sie Ihre Ziele klar definieren und priorisieren können. Ein klares Ziel vor Augen zu haben, ist der erste Schritt, um effektiv darauf hinzuarbeiten.
Im zweiten Modul beschäftigen wir uns mit der Kunst der Selbstmotivation und seinen Grundlagen. Hier werden Sie Techniken kennenlernen, mit denen Sie sich selbst antreiben und Ihre innere Flamme am Brennen halten können, auch wenn Hindernisse auftauchen.
Das dritte Modul konzentriert sich auf die Strukturierung Ihres Alltag und aufkommenden Rückschlägen. Wie halten Sie Ihre Motivation hoch, während es immer wieder Rückschläge gibt, die nun die Motivation abbrechen zu lassen drohen?
Zusätzlich zu den Hauptmodulen bieten wir auch Bonusmaterialien, wie Arbeitsblätter, Checklisten für den Alltag. Mit diesem Kurs wird es jedem Teilnehmer deutlich klarer, was Motivation ist und wie man mit ihr umgeht, um noch effektiver und ehrgeiziger die eigenen Ziele zu verfolgen.

courses.title: 習慣化が苦手で「先延ばし」に悩む人が気合いや根性論ではない知識と対策で自分をコントロールできるようになる方法
courses.bio: 自分という意思を形作っている「脳の仕組み」を理解せずに、先延ばしを防ぐことはできません。先延ばしを防ぐことができなければ、ものごとを継続したり、習慣化したりすることも難しいでしょう。まずはこのコースで、先延ばし癖との付き合いを見直しましょう
objectives: 先延ばしを防止するための「自分の行動を決定する」脳の仕組みの理解
「本当の自分」を決定している脳を効率良く働かせる方法
タイプ別に見る先延ばしのメカニズムとその対策
良い習慣を取り入れるための、悪習慣の絶ち方

はじめに: こんな悩みはありませんか？
先延ばしとは？: なぜ先延ばしは起こるのか？
「怠け」と「延期」と「先延ばし」の違い
意思と行動のギャップが「先延ばし」
「’’衝動’’を司る脳にどう対処するか？」が本質
エネルギーを意識する: 疲労は先延ばしを生む最大の原因
エネルギーは脳にとってお金
早起きと朝活が人生を変える
前もって原始的な欲求を満たしておく
自己コントロールがうまくなる方法: 先延ばしする人の3つのタイプ
締め切りが効果を発揮しないケース
プレコミットメント（事前の自己拘束）を意識して配置する
アメとムチで自分をコントロールする方法: 自己洗脳でケチをつける
ストレスが先延ばしを助長する
自分へのご褒美がもたらす好循環
「楽観的悲観主義」のすすめ: 必ずうまくいくけど、信用しない

requirements: 得になし
courses.description:
あなたは、やらなければいけないことにすぐに取り掛かることができますか？


この質問に「できる」と応えることができる人は、現代では優秀かもしれませんが、古代なら生き残ることはできません。
なぜなら、私たちは「今の瞬間」だけを考えて行動した祖先たちの生き残りだからです。


そんな優秀な遺伝子を持つ私たちですが、進化の途中で生活の仕方が一変しました。
そうです。「理性」が重要な時代になったんです。


理性が乏しい人は村から追い出されて暮らしていけませんから、人間は一生懸命理性を発達させました。
その結果、「今の瞬間が良ければそれでいい」という個体の遺伝子の上に、「今は我慢してでも、先のことを考えなければ」という遺伝子が合わさります。


その結果、バランスの取れた生き残りである、今の私たちがいるのです。
さらに文明の誘惑が先延ばしに拍車をかけます。


つまり、あなたが先延ばしをするのは遺伝子が決めた運命、そして文明病であり、宿命です。


その事実を知らないまま、先延ばしせずに「良い習慣」なるものを手に入れることなどできるでしょうか？


習慣化を勧める人にはこの視点が欠けていることが多いです。
だから根性論や精神論によった方法ばかりになってしまうのです。


このコースでは、その事実を踏まえた上で、実際に私が試して有効だった方法をご紹介しています。
コースの中で、お会いしましょう。
target_audience: 毎日仕事で疲れていて、本当にやりたいことが後回しになってしまう方
将来のために絶対に今やらなければいけないことだと分かっていても、なぜか手が付けられないと悩んでいる方
目標を立てて、習慣化の本を読んで挑戦するけど、何度も挫折して落ち込んでしまう方
先延ばしするたびに自分に意志力がない、根性がない、本当に望んでいることじゃない、など、自分を責めてしまう方

courses.description:
Do you want to learn more about the physician assistant profession, and what it takes to become a physician assistant?

I 100% understand. I am one of THE ONLY people in my immediate family who is in the healthcare industry. Honestly, most don’t understand it- Ha!
I did not even find out about the physician assistant profession until my last year of college. I instantly KNEW I wanted to shift from my medical school path to become a physician assistant. Please subscribe to my YouTube channel to learn more about my path to PA.
I was overwhelmed in where to start, and felt alone. Yes, there are online resources with incredible amounts of information, but that made me feel even more anxious - trying to make sure I read every single detail on every single webpage.

requirements: Курс рассчитан на людей, имеющих медицинское, педагогическое и психологическое образование
Курс будет полезен и людям без профильного образования, так как знания даются доступно и подробно
courses.description:
Образ жизни и поведение людей имеют большое влияние на их здоровье, долголетие и качество жизни, и это особенно важно для пациентов с хроническими заболеваниями. Один впечатляющий пример этого — ожидаемая продолжительность жизни людей, которые бросили курить до 35 лет, в среднем увеличивается на 10 лет.
Часто традиционные способы консультирования не приносят желаемых результатов. Пациенты при всей очевидности необходимости изменений продолжают жить по-старому. Когда проводили опросы людей, которые получали советы в традиционном, директивном стиле о том, что они чувствуют после таких консультаций, большинство отвечало, что они чувствуют дискомфорт, желание защищаться, бессилие, резистентность.
Дополнительная профессиональная программа повышения квалификации основана на применении мотивационного интервью, особого метода беседы об изменениях, являющегося научно обоснованным, признанным во всем мире и у нас в стране стиле консультирования. В процессе обучения изучается концепция Миллера и Роллника, отрабатываются конкретные шаги и техники выполнения с обозначением мишени мотивационного воздействия с учетом особенностей основного заболевания.
Актуальность программы заключается в многовариантных возможностях применения техники консультирования - мотивационного интервью, в результате которого достигаются изменения зависимого поведения.
Цель обучения: Формирование базовых знаний в области мотивационного интервью и развитие профессиональных компетенций слушателей в области мотивационного консультирования пациентов с применением технологии проведения краткосрочных психотерапевтических вмешательств.
В настоящий момент около 1200 рандомизированных контролируемых испытаний показали эффективность мотивационного интервью. Они в основном в области здравоохранения и злоупотребления психоактивными веществами, но в литературе имеются данные и о пересечении этих культуральных границ. Систематический обзор от 2005 года показал, что мотивационное интервью имеет выраженный и клинически значимый эффект в трех из четырех посмотренных, и он представляется лучшим, чем традиционный способ давать совет в 80% исследований. В коротких сессиях, менее 15 минут, мотивационное интервью показало эффективность в 64% исследований.
Более поздний систематический обзор от 2013 обнаружил общее статистически значимое умеренное преимущество мотивационного интервью над сравнимыми методами, в том числе традиционными. Техника была признана эффективной в многочисленных исследованиях рассматривающих приверженность к медицинскому совету, например, о самонаблюдении сахара крови и приема пищи, уменьшения сидячего образа жизни и повышения уровня физической активности. Он так же был связан с повышением приверженности к антиретровирусной терапии и снижением вирусной нагрузки у пациентов с ВИЧ. Однако, он не показал эффективности у пациентов с эпилепсией и с расстройствами пищевого поведения, такими как нервная булимия. (6)
target_audience: Специалисты сферы здравоохранения, психологи, психотерапевты, педагоги, соцработники

courses.description:
"Unleashing Your Power" is a transformative course designed to empower individuals to harness their inner strength, overcome challenges, and unlock their limitless potential. This course provides participants with practical strategies rooted in personal development, emotional intelligence, and creative expansion. Through dynamic activities and introspective exercises, learners will gain the clarity and confidence needed to break free from limitations and take control of their personal and professional journeys. By cultivating resilience, embracing creativity, and developing a growth mindset, students will learn to tap into their unique abilities and unleash the power they possess to shape their futures.
This course equips participants with actionable tools to identify barriers, reframe limiting beliefs, and create pathways for success. Students will engage in activities like vision mapping, goal-setting, and storytelling that encourage self-reflection and alignment with their aspirations. By fostering a deeper understanding of their own strengths, talents, and values, learners will gain insight into what drives their ambitions and how they can thrive in the face of adversity. Whether it's personal mastery or professional growth, "Unleashing Your Power" offers a comprehensive roadmap for realizing dreams and achieving fulfillment.
Through the supportive and interactive learning environment of "Unleashing Your Power," students will leave equipped with skills that go beyond the classroom. The course emphasizes the importance of self-awareness and purposeful action, allowing individuals to make meaningful strides in all areas of life. By the end of this program, learners will not only have a clearer vision of their goals but also the strategies and mindset necessary to reach them. Quiana L. Frazier, M.Ed, MPA, brings over 25 years of expertise to guide participants in this transformative experience, sharing insights from her work in education, corporate training, and media. This course is for anyone ready to unlock their potential, transcend limitations, and embrace their brightest self. With "Unleashing Your Power," the journey to profound transformation begins.

Module 02 - The Director
Module 03 - Limitless

5 Fundamental Rules to Develop More Self: Lesson 8: Set Goals Slightly Above Your Ability
Lesson 9: Break Goals Into Smaller Pieces and Simplify
Lesson 10: Focus on the Big Picture
Lesson 12: Take Control Over Your Life

requirements: You don't need to know anything special before starting this course.
courses.description:
Unsure of Yourself? Learn How to Develop More Confidence in Your Abilities and Achieve Your Goals
Most of us have no problems identifying goals we want to accomplish. It’s putting these plans into action that is difficult.
Sometimes we lack discipline or motivation. However, there’s another reason why you might struggle to make changes in your life – you have low self-efficacy and don’t believe in your abilities.
What is self-efficacy? What are the main four sources of it? How can you become more confident in your skills?
These are some of the questions I’ll answer in this short course. The advice you’re about to watch is based both on scientific research and my personal experience. I will share fundamental knowledge that will help you build more confidence in your abilities and reach your goals.
Here are just a few things you will learn from the course:
- Five characteristics of people with strong self-efficacy and five characteristics of people with weak self-efficacy. These behaviors determine whether you’ll realize your full potential or succumb to mediocrity.
- What you can learn from building a university in space (and what it has to do with the belief in your own abilities). It’s the single most important thing to achieve bigger and bigger goals.
- A simple therapy to teach you how to handle failure the right way. It’s uncomfortable, but you can be sure it will kill your fear of failure once and for all.
- What a strange study about hitting dolls or treating them kindly can teach you about how others affect your beliefs about your competence. It’s the second most effective way to increase the strength of your belief in your abilities.
- What a phenomenon discovered by a German industrial psychologist can teach you about motivation. There’s a simple way to inspire you to put more effort into your goals.
- The #1 key to improving the confidence in your abilities. If you don’t have time to watch the entire course, learn this one tip alone.
- What a study on experts and novices can teach you about how experts approach problems. You too can adapt this behavior to shorten your learning curve and develop a stronger belief in your abilities.
If you don’t actively work on developing a strong sense of self-efficacy, making any kind of changes in your life will be an extremely difficult ordeal. Enroll now to change your life for the better.
target_audience: You should have an open mind and be ready to change your beliefs.
You should be interested in personal development.

requirements: Just jump right in, you'll get simple, and actionable strategies you can begin to deploy in your life instantly!
courses.description:
Success isn’t this big complex thing that other people get to have and you don’t. You can have it too! But in order to achieve it, you have to be motivated.
The reality is, is that you’re never really going to accomplish much in your life if you aren’t motivated
Contrary to what conventional wisdom says, Motivation isn’t just some thing that gets you excited and gets you going in the short term, it’s something that can be sustained, grown, strengthened and developed.
I want to share with you today my best-selling course – UNLIMITED MOTIVATION – at the best price I’ve ever offered.
This course has helped thousands of people achieve life changing results and I want it to do the same for you too.
This course tackles all of the biggest roadblocks that people face, that keep them unmotivated to accomplish what they know deep down they are capable of.
Some of the things I’ve included in this course are:
How to escape the danger of your comfort zone.
How to eliminate fear of failure.
How to get completely free from the limiting beliefs that are holding you back and then to turn on your mind’s action mechanism.
How to find your “why” because there’s no motivation without a motive.
How to develop the ability to “bounce back” and stay resilient and flexible.
I’ll take you through the life changing goal setting exercise that you can replicate at will to accomplish literally anything you want and way faster than you think.
I’ll give you specific strategies to turbocharge your productivity.
And so much more!
This course gives you an exact blueprint that you can apply starting today and create a better life for yourself almost instantly.
You’ll be able to accomplish any thing that you want, and you’ll be able to achieve it much faster than you think.
So if you’ve been struggling to stay motivated, or you’re looking for that next big leap in your life, whether it be a promotion at work, a new project, launching a new business, or just anything that you’d really like to attain in your life but it just feels out of reach or overcomplicated or daunting – check it out.
So again, success isn’t this big complex thing that other people get to have and you don’t. You can have it to. And I’ll show you how right here.
target_audience: This course is designed for people who understand that they have vast untapped potential inside them but haven't been able to fully realize it yet
It is also for people who want to learn how to accomplish any goal, no matter how large, in a much shorter timeframe than they think.

courses.title: Psychologia Relacji - Zmiana nawyków w 20 dni
courses.bio: Jak mieć lepsze relacje z ludźmi. Lepsze i trwałe związki.

20 lekcji na 20 dni - Część 1: Pierwszy dzień - Nie krytykuj, a jeśli już rób to pośrednio
Drugi dzień - Szczery i prawdziwy uśmiech
Trzeci dzień - Bądź dobrym słuchaczem i pokaż innym swoją wizję
Czwarty dzień - Patrz Punktem Widzenia Innych
Piąty dzień - Co dasz ludziom od siebie - jakie korzyści ?
Szósty dzień - Wydobądź z rozmówcy liczne - TAK
Część druga: Ósmy dzień - Jeżeli nie masz racji przyznaj to szybko i bardzo wyraźnie - Błąd
Dziewiąty dzień - Rzuć człowiekowi wyzwanie - gdy wszystko zawiodło
Dziesiąty dzień - Nigdy nie wydawaj rozkazów w formie poleceń
Jedenasty dzień - Wystaw ludziom dobrą opinie
Trzynasty dzień - Twoja idea wyszła od rozmówcy
Czternasty dzień - Zachęcaj innych do zmiany i poprawy
Część trzecia: Piętnasty dzień - Jak sprawić, aby ludzie robili to, co chcesz
Szesnasty dzień - Pozwól ludziom zachować twarz
Siedemnasty dzień - Okaż szacunek do poglądów innych
Osiemnasty dzień - Zacznij od okazania przyjaźni
Dwudziesty dzień - Twój rozmówca jest ważny
Zakończenie: Zasady dotyczące kontaktów z innymi ludźmi według Carnegie

requirements: nie
courses.description:
Witaj w kursie Psychologia Relacji, gdzie odkryjesz głębokie aspekty budowania zdrowych, satysfakcjonujących i trwałych relacji interpersonalnych i nie tylko. Znajdziesz tu nie tylko teoretyczne podstawy psychologii relacji, ale również praktyczne narzędzia, które pozwolą Ci lepiej zrozumieć siebie i innych, poprawić komunikację oraz zacieśnić więzi.


Co zyskasz?




1. Komunikacja Skuteczna: Nauczysz się skutecznego komunikowania się, zarówno słuchania, jak i wyrażania swoich potrzeb. Odkryj techniki skutecznej komunikacji, które poprawią jakość Twoich relacji.
2. Rozwijanie Emocjonalnej Inteligencji: Zajmiemy się rozwijaniem emocjonalnej inteligencji w kontekście relacji. Poznasz narzędzia do zarządzania własnymi emocjami i zrozumiesz motywację innych.
3. Rozwiązywanie Konfliktów: Nauczysz się radzić sobie z konfliktami w pracy/związkach, wykorzystując konstruktywne metody rozwiązywania problemów. Dowiesz się, jak przekształcić trudne sytuacje w szanse na rozwój.
4. Budowanie Trwałej Bliskości: Odkryj, jak budować i utrzymywać trwałą bliskość w związku. Dowiesz się o istotnych elementach, które sprawiają, że relacje są pełne satysfakcji i radości.
Dla kogo jest ten kurs?
Osoby, które pragną lepiej zrozumieć psychologię relacji.
Dla osób, które chcą, by była lepsza atmosfera w pracy.
Osoby samotne, które szukają wskazówek dotyczących budowania trwałych związków.
Rozpocznij podróż ku zdrowszym, bardziej satysfakcjonującym relacjom już dziś! Dołącz do kursu Psychologia Relacji i zacznij budować trwałe więzi, które przynoszą radość i spełnienie.


Buduj trwałe nawyki, które dały wiele wiary i sukcesu wielu ludziom tego świata.
target_audience: Dla ludzi, którzy chcą zmienić nawyki na bardziej korzystne
Osoby, które chcą nawiązać nowe relacje: przyjacielskie oraz romantyczne
Dla szefów i pracowników, którzy chcą podnieść kwalifikacje - lepsza współpraca w zespołach
Dla ludzi, którzy chcą czerpać większą przyjemność z życia

courses.description:
Ngelola motivasi semudah menjentikkan jari?


pernahkah kamu kesulitan ngelola motivasi di kehidupan sehari-hari?
Saat ingin termotivasi, motivasi jarang datang menghampiri.
Saat ingin santai, motivasi datang sendiri
kalau nggak pernah, selamat! kamu hebat!
kalau pernah, kamu ada di video yang tepat.


Bayangin dan rasain ketika :
kamu tau alasan kenapa kamu perlu terus-terusan termotivasi
kamu tau gimana cara kerja motivasi yang kamu punya, kaya :
kapan motivasi kamu muncul dan hilang saat ini
dimana motivasi kamu muncul dan hilang saat ini
dimana motivasi kamu muncul dan hilang saat ini

apa pemincu muncul dan hilangnya motivasi kamu saat ini

Apa Manfaat yang bisa kamu ambil dari informasi yang baru kamu dapet sekarang?
Sejauh mana kamu bisa mengelola motivasi setelah tau cara kerjanya?
Apakah semua pengetahuan itu berharga?


Aku mau tutup deskripsi ini dengan beberapa pertanyaan :
Kapan kamu perlu tau caranya untuk mengelola motivasi di kehidupan sehari-hari?
Keuntungan apa yang akan kamu dapet kalau kamu bisa mengelola motivasi saat ini?
Kesulitan apa yang akan hilang ketika kamu memahami bagaimana cara kerja motivasi yang kamu miliki saat ini?


Kamu mau pilih yang mana :
Kamu yang dikelola motivasi ?
atau kamu yang mengelola motivasi ?
Ambil keputusan sekarang.


semakin cepat kamu ambil keputusan,
semakin cepat kamu bisa memahami cara kerja motivasi di kehidupan sehari-hari.

ingin bisa mengelola motivasi di kehidupan sehari-hari

courses.description:
My name is Dillon Freed. I have spent my entire life studying the “Apex Predators” among us, those who have a killer instinct. I have made programs like Basketball Brain, BoingMIND, No Nervous, Float, GeniusCOMPETITOR, X-Factor, and more. Over half a million people have used some version of my programs. Learn more about me at DillonFreed(dot)com.
Being a killer isn’t always pretty; and perhaps it is not always moral. But we cannot deny that it is effective and many of the greatest achievers among us have this quality.
The program goes through the personality characteristics of these Apex Predators. We also teach you how to develop it within yourself – some are “Natural Born Killers” – others are “Artificially Born Killers” – created by using programs such as this. We explore the similarities between sociopathy and paranoia and the killer instinct mindset along with the spiritual/altruistic consequences of adopting such a mindset. The tension between being a warrior and a decent person. We talk about the “Dark Powers” killers have and use. We will also do breakdowns of great “Apex Predators,” including: Elon Musk, Bill Gates, Michael Jordan, Tiger Woods, Kobe Bryant, Tom Brady, Winston Churchill, and more.
SUMMARY:
This program will help you develop a Killer Instinct mindset.
>Over 7 Hours of Lectures
>Daily, Weekly, and Monthly Drills to Develop the Killer
>Specialized Drills to Fix Up any Weaknesses You May Have
>On-Going Lecture Series (New Content Added Regularly)
>Biographical Lectures on Killers in a variety of Fields
>Suggested Reading list
>Killer Instinct Cheat Sheet (PDF) (A summary of the program content)

requirements: No prerequisites.
courses.description:
We all need MOTIVATION sometimes.
In this free course, you'll laugh (at and with me), you'll cry, and you'll improve your life if you incorporate the lessons you've learned into making a better life. I offer these to you from my heart.
Mini-lessons - one for each day of the month.
No tests - just watch and learn.
Then apply what you have learned into your life.
If you like what you see in this course, subscribe to my youtube channel and get more free content.
Meet James Divine
There once was a little boy named Jimmy whose mom told him he could be anything he wanted…a policeman, a doctor, a lawyer, even the President of the United States. I exceeded all her expectations and became a music teacher!
I’m now a grown man with four kids (I married my high school sweetheart) and nine grandkids. I love eating pizza, mountain biking, spending time with family, and long walks in the mountains holding hands (sorry, I reserve that for only one person, and it’s not you). My shoe size is 9.5 but please don’t send me any shoes…I’ll tell you more about that in a minute.
I teach middle school music at a Title I school, still finding time to speak, write, and podcast.
Now for the boring, adult stuff…
I earned a bachelor’s degree from St. Joseph’s College in Maine and received my music education from the Army School of Music, graduating from the basic, intermediate, and advanced courses over a span of ten years, serving in Virginia, Japan and Colorado. I retired from the Colorado National Guard in 2006. I earned a teaching license from Western State University in Colorado and completed a master’s in music education at Southwestern Oklahoma State University. I believe in the value of life-long learning! I just don’t like standardized testing.
Member of the following:
Colorado Music Educator’s Association
American School Band Directors Association
Order of the Sons and Daughters of Italy.

Frustrado por não ter o nível de disciplina que você precisa atingir para atingir seus objetivos?
Saiba que construir metas e planos não é o suficiente para você criar a vida que deseja.
Falta um elemento nesta equação: autodisciplina.
Como já dizia um grande pensador ... “A disciplina é o caminho êxito”.
Além disso, perceba o seguinte ...
Você pode ter todo o conhecimento e as habilidades para realizar o que deseja na sua vida.
Seja no âmbito pessoal ou profissional.
Contudo, se você não tiver habilidades de autodisciplina, não vai se tornar a pessoa que deseja ser.
Simples assim,
Tenha em mente ...
... “Autodisciplina sempre vence o talento e a inteligência”.
É por este motivo que você precisa fazer este curso.
Descubra nas próximas linhas porque o Método deste curso é o que VOCÊ necessita para definitivamente se tornar uma pessoa disciplinada.
Neste curso revelo as Técnicas, Ferramentas e Estratégias que venho utilizando há mais de 12 anos em Programas Individuais de Mentoria para ajudar as pessoas a conquistarem a Autodisciplina em suas vidas.
São informações que já transformaram a vida de mais de 357 clientes em nossos Programas de Mentoria Individual e mais de 2.843 pessoas em treinamentos presenciais.
Com este curso, você será mais capaz de ... (Imagine ...)
Viver a sua vida tendo mais disciplina

Ser mais focado e determinado
Perseverar e persistir em seus projetos

E muito mais!


Visualize os benefícios que você recebe ao se inscrever neste curso agora ...·
Você vai aprender técnicas de autossugestões e mentalizações e assim deixará para trás a frustração de iniciar projetos ou objetivos e não conclui-los
Você saberá como vencer obstáculos e resistências que o sabotam na execução de tarefas e assim vai ter mais fé na sua capacidade de cumprir as promessas que faz para si mesmo
Você vai descobrir como privilegiar a satisfação em detrimento do prazer de curto prazo (que não lhe leva a lugar nenhum) e assim terá mais autoconfiança para atingir os objetivos que se propõe
Vai receber estratégias de como adiar a gratificação imediata e assim vai conseguir fortalecer seus músculos de perseverança e persistência para alcançar suas metas pessoais e profissionais

courses.bio: 仕事の報酬はお金だけじゃない！経験報酬・情報報酬・技術報酬・信用報酬・人脈報酬・感情報酬など、ちょっとの工夫で多彩な報酬が得られる！自己分析やキャリアデザイン、管理職・マネジメントが仕事の意義を伝える際の視点として活用したい基本知識です。

会社員が知っておくべき「お金」のこと

requirements: 特にありません
courses.description:
人生の大部分を仕事に使っています。「お金を稼ぐために」と割り切って仕事をしている人もいると思いますが、ちょっと意識する・工夫するだけで、仕事や働くことを通して、お金以外のさまざまな報酬を得ることができます！

Do you feel stuck? Do you feel like your life will never change?

requirements: The student does not need anything else apart from what is included in the course.
A desire to understand that every challenge has a solution that can be overcome.
A willingness to engage in self-reflection and apply psychological concepts to personal experiences.
Commitment to participate in interactive exercises designed to challenge and expand your current mindset.
courses.description:
Ignite your drive and achieve peak performance—master self-motivation and see transformative results in your productivity and focus in just 6 weeks.


Welcome to "Unlocking Drive: Master Self-Motivation for Peak Performance," where you will embark on a transformative journey to harness the power of your mind for unmatched personal and professional growth. This course is meticulously designed to help you ignite your intrinsic motivation and build the resilience needed to thrive in challenging environments.
Through a blend of neuroscience, psychology, and practical performance techniques, you will learn how to rewire your mindset for success. Discover the secrets of high achievers and leverage these insights to elevate your own potential. Whether you're an aspiring athlete, entrepreneur, or anyone looking to unlock their full capacity, this course will provide you with the tools to:


Cultivate a resilient and adaptable mindset.
Overcome mental barriers and self-doubt.
Align your passions with your daily actions.
Create a personalised blueprint for sustained motivation and success.
Join us to reignite your inner drive and transform the way you approach your goals!


The REPEAT model is a 6 Step approach towards triggering your challenge state in motivational terms that allows you to face pressure and opportunity with the correct mindset, wired for success that you can start to apply today with simple strategies and actions we have laid out for you to follow.


Upon completing the "Unlocking Drive: Master Self-Motivation for Peak Performance" course, students can anticipate the following benefits and outcomes:


1. Enhanced Goal-Setting Abilities: Students will learn to set effective and achievable goals, aligning their ambitions with actionable steps. This leads to a clearer path toward success in both their career and personal life.


2. Increased Productivity: With mastered self-motivation techniques, students will be able to maintain high levels of productivity, avoiding procrastination and efficiently managing their time.


3. Improved Resilience: The course will equip students with the tools to bounce back from setbacks more quickly, fostering a resilient mindset that helps them stay committed to their objectives despite challenges.


4. Greater Self-Confidence: As students learn to harness their intrinsic motivation, they'll build self-confidence, which is crucial for taking on new opportunities and challenges in their careers.


5. Heightened Emotional Intelligence: Understanding and managing one's emotions is key to personal and professional relationships. Students will learn strategies to enhance emotional intelligence, aiding in better communication and conflict resolution.


6. Better Stress Management: With resilience and motivation strategies, students will be able to manage stress effectively, leading to improved mental health and well-being.


7. Enhanced Creativity and Innovation: A motivated and resilient mindset encourages creative thinking and problem-solving, crucial for advancement and success in many fields.


8. Stronger Leadership Skills: The course will teach students how to inspire and motivate themselves and others, an essential skill for leadership in any career.


9. Improved Decision-Making: Students will learn to make decisions that align with their goals and values, leading to more fulfilling outcomes in their personal and professional lives.


10. Lasting Personal Growth: The transformation includes a lifelong toolkit for self-motivation and resilience, ensuring ongoing personal development and the ability to adapt to future changes or challenges.


The transformation students can expect from this course is multifaceted. In their careers, they'll be positioned to take on leadership roles, tackle complex projects with confidence, and drive innovation within their teams or businesses.
In their personal lives, they'll experience a greater sense of purpose, improved relationships, and a proactive approach to life's hurdles. Overall, students will emerge from the course as more empowered, effective, and fulfilled individuals.
target_audience: This Performance course is meant for anybody who needs a process and structure to follow to help them handle pressure, stress and adversity to achieve their goals.

The "All About Public Speaking" course is a carefully designed program aimed at helping learners build a solid foundation in the art of public speaking. Consisting of **14 lectures**, **12 transcripts**, **8 assignments**, and **2 complimentary ebooks**, the course provides a structured approach to learning the essentials.


Public speaking can be a daunting task for many, and overcoming that fear is the first step toward becoming an effective communicator. This course brings learners into their comfort zone by focusing on the basics, making it approachable for anyone who struggles with speaking in front of an audience. The emphasis on mastering the fundamentals ensures that learners gain the confidence they need to eventually excel in more advanced speaking scenarios.


One common mistake learners make is jumping straight into advanced courses without a proper grounding in the basics, which often results in incomplete understanding. This course promises to make learners fall in love with the foundational elements of public speaking, ensuring that they don’t miss critical steps in their development. By mastering these basics, they can gradually become skilled public speakers through consistent practice.


For those interested in attending public speaking seminars or workshops, this course serves as a valuable entry point, providing them with the knowledge and skills needed to make the most of further training. Trainers in public speaking will also find value in this course, as it can enhance their current training programs and provide new insights into teaching the subject more effectively.

Welcome to How to Conquer Negativity: Welcome to How to Conquer Negativity
Understanding Negativity: Why Do We Need to Manage Negativity?
How to Combat Negativity Using Inspirati: Introduction to How to Manage Negativity

requirements: Before you begin, think about some of the negative moments you've had in the past and how they affected you?
courses.description:
This Course has two objectives:
1: To reduce the impact of negative people and negative situations that pop up in life and cause us to feel upset, angry or depressed
2. To instill unbreakable self confidence in participants by offering simple tips and tricks to manage negativity and continue to help them achieve what they want in life
We Live in Challenging Times Today
When you take a look around at the world today it can seem like humanity has lost it’s mind. There is so much negativity in the world today that it can be hard for someone who strives to be positive to make an impact for themselves and those around them.
The reality is that we are going to encounter negative people and circumstances throughout our lives. Unless we learn how to manage it effectively, we will forever be prisoners in other people’s lives instead of taking control of our own destiny. And that’s what this course is all about.
Why Learn from Me?

You can check out my full bio below, but let me fill you in on the important bits.
As an Entrepreneur and Young Achiever, my life is filled full of crazy adventures in my pursuit of my overall goal to make the world a better place. I know a little bit about dealing with negativity because I grew up in a very negative environment. I had conservative parents who put a lot of pressure on me to be academically brilliant however I was nothing of the sort. At university I failed a subject and got thrown out of my scholarship course. Finally when I thought things were going well in my first proper graduate job, I got a bad boss who wanted to kill my career.
Despite all these things I went out and achieved things that negative people said I couldn’t do, like starting my own IT consulting firm; building my technology training centre; creating Young Entrepreneurz Day for teenagers; and launching a 10-gig international speaking tour without having any contacts. I’ve built a career out of converting negativity into opportunity and that’s why I was named Young Achiever of the Year.
But despite having such a successful career, I still encounter some form of negativity on a daily basis and even today, I constantly have to push past negative people and situations to achieve what I want.
Everything I've learned about managing negativity I've put into this course so that you can have the best possible chance of success in becoming the leader you truly aspire to be.
Why Should You Take This Course?

How to Conquer Negativity will equip you with the skills to deal with negative people and circumstances so that you can effectively think, communicate and deal with situations in a constructive and positive manner.
In other words, you can achieve what you want in a world that constantly says you can’t.
What Will You Learn?
At the end of this course, participants will be able to:
Describe how negativity works, where it comes from and how it affects us
Recognise negative feelings within yourself and stop them from making you have a bad day
Build unbreakable self confidence to protect yourself against negative people who just want to beat you down
Communicate effectively to ensure you don’t create negative feelings in others
Transform negativity into opportunity using  a simple psychological trick
Identify the most common negative mindset traps and how to avoid them.
What Are the Requirements?

An open mind
A willingness to practice what you learn
Patience to adjust to a new way of making decisions
What is the Target Audience?
This course is targeted at anyone who wishes to learn skills to deal with negative people and situations. It doesn’t matter what your geographical location, cultural background, or job/career you’re in right now. If you want to achieve what you want in life, your career or your business, this is the course for you.
Sign up now and start conquering negativity immediately!
target_audience: This course is perfect for professionals at all levels because you will have practical tools you can use every day at work
You will need to practice what you learn to build up your skills for handing negativity
This course isn't for you if you don't have an open mind and aren't willing to work hard to master your new skills

Факторы и события, негативно влияющие на Вашу целеустремленность, ограничивающие рост и развитие.
НЛП - нересурсные внушения, внешние убеждения, якоря из прошлого и социальный “зомби-код”
Практическая техника. Выявление ограничивающих блоков достижения своих целей на примере текущего денежного дохода.
КАК а не ПОЧЕМУ”. Устранение критики. Рекомендации для человека, нацеленного на поиск решений.
Физиология и нейробиология мотивации. Системы мозга, ключевые гормоны, нейромедиаторы достижений и доминирования. Ловушки нашего подсознания, почему мы ходим по кругу.
Мотивация и ценности. Четыре основных нейрологических уровня НЛП, важные критерии целей, методы рычага и поощрения, связь привычек с результатами.
Пять самых коварных причин откладывания дел “на потом”, нейробиологические иллюзии мозга, эффект Даннинга-Крюгера, физическая природа лени, прокрастинации и методы ее преодоления.
Основы тайм-менеджмента MBA, приоритезация и порядок реализации своих планов, секреты выполнения сложных и крупных задач.
Шесть практических инструментов тайм-менеджмента по реализации задач и достижению результатов
Пять основных принципов формирования целей по SMART, исходя из их значимости, достижимости и ограничений по времени.
Таблица MBA PM корректного оформления целей с учетом всех ключевых принципов и факторов внешнего влияния.
Практическая НЛП-техника "Обратное планирование" (дедуктивный метод Шерлока Холмса).
Внимание! Закрытая техника НЛП  "9 ступеней правильно сформированного результата".
Противодействие манипуляторам с помощью блоков НЛП, стрессоустойчивость, защита важных целей и результатов от “серых” критиков и недоброжелателей. Детальные примеры.
Любая цель в пределах реальности!
target_audience: Курс, в первую очередь будет интересен менеджерам, руководителям, предпринимателям, студентам, наемным работникам, которые устали каждый день крутиться "как белка в колесе"

courses.title: Unlocking Self-Awareness & Clarity
courses.bio: A Journey to Understanding Yourself and Navigating Life with Confidence
objectives: Defining Your Core Values
Embracing Your Strengths & Weaknesses
Understanding Emotional Triggers
Crafting Personal Intentions

A Deep Dive into Your Core Values: Why Are Core Values So Important?

How You Can Get the Most Out of This Week
Crafting Personal Intentions: Common Pitfalls and How to Avoid Them

requirements: No experience needed.
An open mind and readiness for introspection.
courses.description:
Are you feeling stuck, uncertain, or disconnected from your true self? Unlocking Self-Awareness & Clarity is a structured yet flexible course designed to help you gain deeper insight into your thoughts, emotions, and personal values. By developing self-awareness, you can make more intentional decisions, improve emotional resilience, and create a life aligned with your true priorities.
This course will guide you through essential aspects of self-discovery, including:
Identifying and understanding your core values
Recognizing and leveraging both strengths and weaknesses
Developing awareness of emotional triggers and learning strategies to manage them
Setting clear and meaningful personal intentions to guide your choices
Through a combination of thought-provoking lessons, practical exercises, and guided reflection, you will gain the tools necessary to navigate challenges with greater confidence and purpose. The course incorporates self-assessment techniques such as SWOT analysis and structured journaling to help you clarify your direction and take meaningful action.
By the end of this journey, you will have a deeper understanding of yourself, a stronger sense of purpose, and the ability to move forward with clarity. Whether you are seeking personal growth, career direction, or emotional balance, this course will empower you to make informed, intentional decisions.
Self-awareness is the foundation of a fulfilling life. If you are ready to gain clarity, strengthen your confidence, and take control of your personal growth, this course is for you. Take the first step toward a more intentional and empowered life today.
target_audience: People wanting to dive into personal development and getting better at achieving their goals

courses.description:
Iluminación
Un viaje hacia la conciencia superior, el despertar interior y la unidad con lo divino
¿Sientes el llamado a una vida más consciente, plena y alineada con tu verdad espiritual?
“Iluminación” es un curso diseñado para guiarte a través de una experiencia transformadora, donde aprenderás a expandir tu conciencia, liberar bloqueos internos y conectarte con la luz que ya habita en ti.
No se trata de alcanzar algo externo, sino de recordar quién eres realmente, más allá del ego, el miedo y la ilusión. Este curso es un faro para aquellos que desean vivir en autenticidad, paz y conexión espiritual profunda.
Lo que aprenderá
Al finalizar este curso, usted será capaz de:
Comprender el proceso de iluminación como despertar interior
Explorarás los fundamentos espirituales del despertar de la conciencia y cómo este transforma tu forma de ver la vida, el yo y el propósito.
Liberarte de patrones mentales y emocionales que nublan tu luz
Identificarás condicionamientos, creencias limitantes y apegos que impiden tu expansión, y comenzarás a soltar desde la aceptación consciente.
Cultivar estados elevados de presencia, amor y gratitud
Aprenderás prácticas para habitar el momento presente, abrir el corazón y elevar tu frecuencia vibratoria en tu día a día.
Conectarte con tu esencia divina y vivir en coherencia espiritual
Activarás una conexión más profunda con tu alma, tu intuición y la fuente universal, para tomar decisiones alineadas con tu verdadero ser.
Este curso es para ti si...
Estás en un camino de autoconocimiento y evolución espiritual.
Buscas herramientas prácticas para vivir con más paz, plenitud y conexión interior.
Sientes que hay “algo más” en la vida y quieres experimentarlo desde lo profundo.
Deseas integrar tu crecimiento espiritual con tu vida cotidiana de forma real y amorosa.
¿Qué incluye el curso?
Módulos temáticos en video
Prácticas guiadas de meditación, respiración y contemplación
Textos sagrados, frases y ejercicios de reflexión espiritual
Cuaderno de trabajo para integrar lo aprendido
Acceso opcional a una comunidad de apoyo y silencio compartido
La iluminación no es el fin del camino. Es el comienzo de vivir desde la verdad.
Este curso te guía paso a paso hacia una vida más consciente, luminosa y auténtica.
Inscríbete ahora y permite que tu luz interior sea la guía de tu camino.
target_audience: Deseas integrar tu crecimiento espiritual con tu vida cotidiana de forma real y amorosa.
Sientes que hay “algo más” en la vida y quieres experimentarlo desde lo profundo.
Buscas herramientas prácticas para vivir con más paz, plenitud y conexión interior
Estás en un camino de autoconocimiento y evolución espiritual.

courses.title: 【三日坊主を卒業したい人向け】科学と心理学で完全理解！やる気が途切れない自分の作り方
courses.bio: 脳科学・モチベーション・心理学・習慣形成・自己理解で実現する、続けられる仕組み作り
objectives: やる気の正体を、脳科学や心理学の視点から理解できるようになる
やる気が自然に湧いてくる「自分専用のスイッチ」を見つけられるようになる
「続けられる仕組み」を自分で設計できるようになる
やる気に頼らずに行動できる「環境と仕組み」の整え方を学べる
目標達成までの「感情の波」との付き合い方がわかるようになる

モチベーションとは何か？科学と心理学の基本理解: やる気が「続かない」理由とは？
モチベーションの定義と種類（内発的／外発的）
脳科学で見る「やる気」の正体（報酬系の働き）
心理学の視点①：自己決定理論とは？
心理学の視点②：欲求の3要素（自律性・有能感・関係性）
誤解しやすいモチベーション神話（根性・才能・タイミング）
【まとめ】モチベーションはコントロール可能な“仕組み”である
あなたの「やる気パターン」を知る自己分析ワーク: 自分のやる気は「どこから来ているのか」分析する
行動が止まる3つのタイミングと原因
【ワーク1】「やる気が出た時」の行動ログを書いてみよう
【ワーク2】「やる気が消えた時」の思考・状況を洗い出す
やる気タイプ診断（目標志向型／快楽追求型など）
自分のスイッチを可視化する「モチベーションマップ」
【まとめ】やる気の源泉を特定することが第一歩
やる気が続く仕組みを科学的に設計する方法: 意志力に頼らない「習慣の科学」
ドーパミンの正しい使い方：期待と報酬の関係
タスクを「脳が喜ぶサイズ」に分解する技術
環境デザイン：行動を引き出す外部トリガーとは？
ご褒美とフィードバックを科学的に使う方法
行動が続く「トリガー → 行動 → 報酬」のループ化
【ワーク】自分用「やる気の自動化システム」を設計する
やる気に頼らない習慣化の科学（全10問）
やる気が「落ちたとき」に立ち直る技術: 「やる気がゼロになる日」は避けられない
科学が明かす：失敗から立ち直る人の脳の違い
自己効力感（セルフ・エフィカシー）を回復させる方法
気分と行動の因果関係：「気分を変えるには行動から」
【ワーク】自分用“やる気リカバリー・ルーティン”を作る
先延ばしを科学的に止める「5分ルール」と「if-thenプラン」
【まとめ】「戻れる安心感」がやる気を持続させる
継続する自分を育てるセルフマネジメント戦略: 「習慣化」と「仕組み化」は違う：長期継続のカギ
小さな成功体験を積み重ねるマイクロゴール設計
振り返りとフィードバック：習慣を強化する方法
サボりを許す？「計画的脱線」がモチベを守る
モチベーションジャーナル：自分の変化を記録する方法
【ワーク】90日間継続プランを設計してみよう
【まとめ】一生使える「やる気の自己管理術」を手に入れる

requirements: 特別なスキルや知識は一切不要です。パソコンまたはスマートフォンがあれば受講可能です。
courses.description:
あなたはこんな悩みを抱えていませんか？
やる気が出ない自分を責めてしまう
何かを始めても、いつの間にかやめてしまう
やりたいことはあるのに、続かない
習慣化に何度も失敗してきた
本コースでは、最新の脳科学と心理学の知見をもとに、「やる気」の正体を明らかにし、
“やる気が途切れない自分”を実践的に育てる方法をお伝えします。単なる理論解説ではありません。

この講座では、自分の内面を見つめながら、
「やる気のスイッチ」を発見し
「やる気に頼らない継続システム」を設計し
目標達成のための行動を無理なく続けられる
そんな“再現性のある自己マネジメント”を習得できます。
target_audience: やる気が続かず、自分を責めてしまう人
習慣化が苦手で、物事を継続できない人
モチベーションの波に振り回されやすい人

courses.description:
Whether you want to bring your productivity to the next level, or build new habits, we can all benefit with a boost in motivation.
For years I've been hyper-productive and kept control of a range of lifestyle choices using techniques from Gamification:
(2011) Finishing university projects well in advance of deadlines
(2012) Going from doing zero exercise to working out 5 days per week
(2018) Training to compete for the UK in Mind Sports
(2019) Creating this video course on Udemy
In this class I'll be showing you the 4 most powerful techniques I've found for applying Gamification elements to real life, and share with you 4 templates that you can use for a real, sustained boost in your productivity.
You'll also learn about the Psychology of Motivation, and explore 5 further advanced techniques, so that by the end of the course you'll have:

The ability to design your own system (in any format) to match your productivity and lifestyle needs (or other people's)
And as with all Udemy courses, you are able to ask questions to me at any time and I'll be here to help!

EXTENDED: Realistic vs Unrealistic Deadline Setting

requirements: No previous knowledge on the main topic needed. The course includes all the necessary information.
An interest in continuous personal development and growth.
courses.description:
Optimized Goal-Setting: Step-By-Step Strategy


You may be great at setting tasks for yourself, but are you really setting goals?
Ever wondered why, even though you take the time to write down your daily, weekly, or monthly goals on a piece of paper or on a digital screen, and often succeed in checking them off on time, you are still not where you want to be in your life?
Why is it that determination, motivation, and discipline do not seem enough to create the personal or professional environment that you want for yourself?
This class will answer these questions and will help you re-design your goal-setting strategy to maximize your productivity and build the personal and professional life that you want.


About This Class
Step-By-Step Strategy to optimize your goal-setting process and boost productivity, with a twist. The method presented in this series of videos will help you not only check things off of your to-do list but will mostly assist you in making sure that all of your goals are connected to your bigger objectives and life purpose.


What You Will Learn:
A new way to approach goal-setting that goes beyond the classic S.M.A.R.T. approach and similar methods.
A 12-steps Strategy to set meaningful goals, boost productivity, and achieve your biggest objectives.
How to think about goal-setting to achieve optimal results.
How to formulate goals effectively.
How to optimize and monitor your goal-setting process.
How to be happier and feel long-term fulfillment through optimized goal-setting.


The course includes:
Self-Reflection Prompts
Illustrative Examples and Scenarios


Learn how to set effective goals and optimize your psychological and physical wellbeing.


Enroll in this course and make optimized goal-setting a powerful tool in your personal development journey.
target_audience: Anyone with an interest in personal development.
