requirements: Students just need to be open to learning
This course is an introduction to understanding how to empower your life with a variety of tools
This course is presented by instructors globally to help inspire and motivate your dreams
courses.description:
This course was originally created as a gift to women around the world and in support of International  Women's Day which is celebrated every year on March 8th.
International Women's Day (March 8) is a global day celebrating the social, economic, cultural and political achievements of women. The day also marks a call to action for accelerating women's equality.
International Women's Day (IWD) has occurred for well over a century, with the first IWD gathering in 1911 supported by over a million people. Today, IWD belongs to all groups collectively everywhere. IWD is not country, group or organization specific.


The theme for #IWD2020 is #EachforEqual
#EachforEqual is about 'Collective Individualism'
The IWD 2020 campaign theme is drawn from a notion of 'Collective Individualism.'
We are all parts of a whole. Our individual actions, conversations, behaviours and mindsets can have an impact on our larger society.
Collectively, we can make change happen. Collectively, we can each help to create a gender equal world.
We can all choose to be #EachforEqual.
We are a group of passionate female instructors from around the world from different backgrounds and cultures. What connects us is teaching and our desire to help others.


This course is as diverse as the instructors with a wide variety of lectures covering topics such as boosting yourself, relaxation, learning something new, business skills and career development.
This course celebrates our commonalities, diversity and strengths, it taps into our areas of expertise and aims to give you a taste of what's possible both as individuals and as a team.
We hope that there is something for everyone and that you can dip in and out of the lectures according to what ignites your interest. If you feel the course would benefit from a particular lecture then let us know and we’ll find a suitable lecture from our bank of instructors.
We hope that some of the lectures if not all of the lectures will inspire you to recognise #EACHFOREQUAL in your own life and be happier, braver, more confident day to day.
We love hearing from our students so we encourage you to contact us with any questions and comments
We look forward to getting to know you – Come on in and make yourself at home.
target_audience: Women who want to be inspired by a variety of inspirational ladies
Women who want to enjoy some bite size learning in a range of topics
Women who wish to consider some new ideas about learning and lifestyles

courses.title: Master your Motivation:How to Succeed in Fitness & Nutrition
courses.bio: Finding your WHY - the real thing that will keep your going.
requirements: You should have a will to improve your health and your life.
You should be able to navigate through a web browser and videos at a beginner level.
courses.description:
In this course, you'll define your reason for wanting a change, weight loss or fitness goal.  You will build a solid and emotional connection to the results to keep you pushing towards your goals, and be able to overcome the inevitable urge to stop.
The percentage of people who quit their gym membership, fitness program or nutrition plan (aka 'diet') is enormously high.  In the last 3 years of helping people reach their health and fitness goals, we've identified what has set the successful clients apart from the ones who fall short of their goals.  We've seen a much higher success rate in our online fitness and health groups and created this course to help everyone succeed in reaching their goals.
If you've ever struggled with weight loss, maintaining a fitness routine or following a meal plan long term, then this course is for you!
target_audience: This course is for anyone who wants to live a healthier, happier life and be able to stick to a healthy lifestyle.
This course will help anyone who has struggled with getting results in a fitness routine or weight loss.

courses.title: Manifesting Masterclass - Two Things You Must Do
courses.bio: Enhancing Your Manifestation Practice
requirements: If you have a current manifestation practice or if not this is a great place to start.
courses.description: In this free workshop, you will learn about two very essential applications that you must have in your practice. I call these Recognize and Rethink Your Doubt and Joy Now Manifest Later. These two techniques will help you improve your success and at the rate of which you receive your manifestations. You will discover how to turn doubt into belief and carry "Joy" as if, before, during and after your manifestation comes to you. Keeping doubt from niggling into your subconscious is important. But let's face it everyone has fears and doubts about what they deserve. We will look at those and talk about how to change that thinking into a place of allowing and receiving. Holding a higher vibration and allowing yourself to receive all that the universe wants to bring to you is necessary for your manifestation to appear. So, if you are currently working on manifesting make sure that you add these two things into your practice. Or if you are just starting to develop your practice, then applying or practicing these two techniques that you will discover when you watch this free workshop is a great place to start. Thank you for watching and Happy Manifesting!
target_audience: Anyone who wants ro enhance their manifestation practice to improve their success.

courses.title: The Complete Guide to College Success and Beyond
courses.bio: Success Strategies for College, Career, and Life
objectives: Master the habits, mindset, and study strategies that improve focus, confidence, motivation, and academic performance.
Learn to manage expectations, overcome setbacks, and stay resilient under pressure with a strong growth mindset.
Set and achieve meaningful goals that align with your interests—and take consistent action to follow through.
Identify your values, strengths, and identity to create a purpose-driven success plan for college, career, and life.
Learn to be proactive and take consistent action toward success in college, career, and life.
Apply proven tools to increase self-awareness, complete your courses efficiently, and thrive beyond the classroom.
requirements: Students should be excited and ready for a transformative learning experience
Students should be open to learning how to think, plan, and take action
Students should be ready to become empowered and take ownership of their success
Students should have access to the internet to stream videos and download resources
courses.description:
You were born to thrive—this course shows you how.

Most students are never taught how to succeed in college or life. They’re overwhelmed, unsure how to manage their time, and struggle with confidence, motivation, and mindset.
This course changes that.
You’ll learn the essential skills and strategies to improve your grades, increase your confidence, and take full control of your education and your future.


What You’ll Learn:


Set powerful goals aligned with your passions and values
Build habits that help you stay focused and follow through
Study smarter not harder
Speak with confidence and clarity
Manage your time and energy like a high performer
Shift from “I can’t” to “I absolutely can” with a growth mindset


My Teaching Style:


Action-Ready – Apply what you learn immediately
Science-Backed – Based on proven research in mindset, learning, and performance
Empowering & Fun – You’ll feel energized, not lectured
Common Challenges We’ll Overcome:


Low confidence
Procrastination and low motivation
Fear of speaking up
Feeling behind or overwhelmed
Time and energy mismanagement
Replace I can't with I CAN - Mindsets of winners
We achieve what WE believe - Believe it and you'll achieve it


What Students Are Saying:
"Taking courses with Val has empowered me to overcome my fears of public speaking. I learned how to set goals, and live my life with purpose and intention... based on my values. It is incredible. Her passion and enthusiasm are contagious. I'm forever grateful to her.
---Fabiola
"I love Val's teaching style - dynamic, empowering and realistic. You'll learn what college is not teaching you  - how to think, plan, and achieve anything. You'll have an opportunity to design your success based on what you want and what makes you happy or someone else will do it for you. Excellent course."
---Nick
"This course should be mandatory in college but it is not. So if you want to save time and money, increase your confidence level, communication skills and think strategically about how you live your life, then this is for you.  You'll be so happy you did. Professor Val is amazing!"
---Luis
target_audience: Students who want to develop the mindset and habits of top performers and high achievers
College students who feel overwhelmed, unmotivated, or unsure how to succeed
Students who have failed in the past or don’t believe they’re “smart enough” to do well
Those returning to school after time off who want to rebuild confidence and clarity
High school students preparing for college who want a strong foundation for success

courses.title: Cancer EQ & IQ - Toolkit for Emotions and Communication
courses.bio: A powerful series to assist you in dealing with the emotions related to a cancer diagnosis and effective communication.
requirements: This course is designed to provide knowledge and understanding to anyone who is wanting to know more about the emotional impact of a cancer diagnosis and the importance of communication.
courses.description:
If you have been diagnosed with cancer, if you are supporting someone with cancer or you are a professional wanting to understand what a patient experiences when they are diagnosed with cancer; then this is the course for you.
I will not only share my personal journey through ovarian cancer, but will share skills and tools that can make the journey a little easier. We will explore the emotional roller coaster of a diagnosis of cancer and also look at communication skills that are vital in creating the support structure to tackle this tough experience.
What will you get from this course?
We have 13 lectures and over 2 hours of video content
We have supporting exercises to help you hone your new skills
target_audience: Anyone touched by cancer, whether as: A patient, a caregiver, a friend, a colleague or a professional such as a doctor, nurse, psychologist, counsellor.

courses.title: Flow State - Effortless Ease for Maximum Productivity
courses.bio: Live life effortlessly, spontaneously, freely, and creatively - get immersed in the moment, all for maximum productivity
objectives: What is Flow State & it's Nature
How to get into a Flow State
An Exercise in Experiencing Flow
Wu Wei - Creating Flow in your daily life

Knowing Flow ( The Concept): Hi there! Let's go on a journey :)
Introduction - What is Flow State & it's Nature (Slide 3-6)
Knowing Flow ( The Experience): A Powerful Flow Tip that will Boost your Flow Experience!

requirements: Open Learning Mindset
Into Self Improvement
courses.description:
Hi My name is Deerav. I'll be your instructor for this Course on Flow State!
We will be covering the following topics below, and take you first through a conceptual understanding of flow  - toward a personal and direct experiential understanding .
Learn to create a flexible and adaptive mindset and tap into the power of FLOW today!
What is flow. The Benefits of Flow. Nature of being in flow. 2 Exercises to understand flow.
Blocks to flow and how to overcome them.
8 powerful gateways to experience flow instantly.
How to balance challenge and skill levels to attain perfect flow.
How to create an ambience of flow.
Wu Wei - The Flow State - A Daoist concept which is the state of flow.
Flow State Benefits:
Attract new experiences, break out from the monotony of life.
Live in alignment with the moment.
Freedom from lower frequency emotions like worry, stress, anxiety, fear, doubt, judgement.
Enter happiness, trust, confidence, self belief, fearlessness, freedom and joyful living.
At the end of this course you will have all the tools necessary to consciously get into FLOW STATE at will.
I am excited to take on you this journey of experiencing true flow.
FLOW STATE is a powerful way of living life, and is very close to my heart :)
See you in the first lecture!

courses.title: Cognitive Resilience: Performance Under Pressure
courses.bio: You will be required every single day for the next 15 days to perform real-life challenges in the outside world.
objectives: Gain practical tools to overcome fear and boost confidence through real-world challenges.
Learn to step outside your comfort zone and care less about others' opinions.
Develop resilience and adaptability through confronting and overcoming daily challenges.
Use the Fear Mastery Journal to understand, track, and overcome personal fear barriers.

Important! Watch This Before Starting Fe: What To Expect From The Course + Guidelines
Part 1: Getting You Uncomfortable: Day 1 Challenge - Look Into My Eyes
Day 1 Explained - Look Into My Eyes
Day 2 Challenge - Ask And You Shall Receive
Day 2 Explained - Ask And You Shall Receive
Day 3 Challenge - The Power Of The Smile
Day 3 Explained - The Power Of The Smile
Part 2: Comfort Zone Destruction: Day 8 Challenge - Getting Out Of Your Head
Day 8 Explained - Getting Out Of Your Head
Day 10 Challenge - Handing Out Your Fear
Day 10 Explained - Handing Out Your Fear
Part 3: Fear Unleashed!: Day 11 Challenge - Becoming A New Self
Day 11 Explained - Becoming A New Self

requirements: A willingness to try something new - this course is all about action and trying things which may be outside your comfort zone.
courses.description:
WARNING: CONSTANT ACTION REQUIRED!

This course is all about taking action! For each of the 15 days you will be outside doing challenges that will push you to become more fearless and less afraid of what people think. You will be challenged every single day for the next 15 days. This course is certainly not for everyone!

If you are tired of being trapped in the fear of what other people think and you truly believe that you can be more then you need to take this course. All of the 15 challenges that I will ask you to do I have personally done myself. So I can tell you from experience that they work. Nobody starts life fearless, we all start afraid and scared about being judged by others. This is the most action oriented course I have ever created and I wholeheartedly believe that it is also one of my most important courses.
I will tell you this right now, this course is not for everyone. Some people might find the course too extreme or too challenging. Others are simply too afraid to step outside their comfort zone. I did not make this course for those people. I made the course for you, the person that knows that they have within themselves the power to become more fearless and just need that extra push! It is for those few daring people who are willing to take a chance to better themselves even if it requires stepping out of their comfort zone.

Guarantee: By the end of this course you will become more fearless and care less about what people think of you.

FREE BONUS INCLUDED WITH THIS COURSE: The Fear Mastery Journal
As an additional bonus for taking this course you will also receive the Fear Mastery Journal which is a 25 page PDF that you can print out or read digitally that will serve as your companion on this journey. The Fear Mastery Journal was specifically created in order to help you destroy your fear!

Zero Risk
There is a 30 day money back guarantee so you literally have no risk in taking this course. Seriously, the 30 refund is even done automatically so there is no hassle on your end. If this course sounds like it is for you then give it a go!
"Thinking will not overcome fear but action will” - W. Clement Stone
I will see you inside if you are ready to conquer your fear!
Ben
target_audience: This course is for people who sick and tired of letting their irrational fears take control of their lives.
If you want to challenge yourself to see whether you truly have control of your fears.
If you are looking to step out and expand your comfort zone so that finally live the life that you desire.
If you want to experience the feeling of truly becoming a more fearless person.

courses.title: Thinking like God
courses.bio: Exploring and accessing God's nature in man for supernatural manifestations
requirements: Strong desire to succeed
courses.description:
Is it possible for a man to think like God?
This is more like questioning the possibility that the puppy of a Doberman Pinscher dog breed will one day become a reliable security dog. To a normal person, that is not much of a debate. But when it comes to the possibility of human beings thinking and acting like God, many people prefer it to be best imagined.
This course is designed to bring you to speed with the possibility that human beings can think and act like God. This is owing to the fact that God created man in His image and likeness.
At the end of this course, you won’t only believe in this possibility, but you will be competent enough to start thinking like God.
Most importantly, this course will deliver to you the power to become an efficient creator or inventor of new and awesome things. Coupled with that, you will be discovering the shortest way to problem solving.
Every human is a stakeholder in the affairs of this world, as no single individual or nation has the sole responsibility to look after the welfare of others. No race, tribe or nationality is superior to the other in creative potential, as everyone was created alike.
There is a problem that you were meant to create or invent a solution to, and it’s out there waiting for you. But to be a creator, you must know how to think like a creator. And the only one, who is the creator of all creations is God and to produce result like Him, you must be thinking like Him.
Every section of this course is packed with deep and insightful knowledge that will upgrade your mind.
target_audience: Anyone tired of a life of struggle
Anyone desiring the supernatural life

courses.title: 集中力が続かない脳をリセット！ イライラ・モヤモヤを手放す5分習慣【初心者OK】
courses.bio: 呼吸・姿勢・所作×禅語で、朝から夜まで集中力と心の余裕を取り戻す｜在宅・仕事・家事の合間にできる簡単マインドケア
objectives: 集中力が切れてしまう脳の仕組みについて学びます
「書かない書道」＝呼吸・姿勢・所作の整え方を学びます
習慣化する書道式セルフケアを学びます
集中のスイッチを入れる「姿勢」と「呼吸」の整え方を学びます
疲労やモヤモヤを流す「動き」と「文字」の書道セラピーを学びます
心のざわつきを鎮める「余白」と「静けさ」の時間を学びます

はじめに: イントロダクション
受講対象者
受講前に設定とお願い
講師自己紹介
このコースの参考資料
認知疲労に効く！書道式マインドリセットで集中力を取り戻す方法: なぜ集中力が続かないのか？ 情報過多で脳が疲れる“認知疲労”の正体とは
“書かない書道”とは何か？ 道具不要で呼吸・姿勢・所作を整える東洋式メンタルケア
習慣化する書道式セルフケア3ステップ：朝・昼・夜で整える習慣法
書かない書道についての小クイズ
レッスン1：朝のセルフリセット 姿勢と呼吸で、集中のスイッチを入れる習慣: このセクションの概容
立ち姿・座り姿勢のリセット法 — 集中力を高め、肩こりも予防する姿勢改善術
朝5分の呼吸整え習慣 — 自律神経を整え、一日のパフォーマンスを最大化する呼吸法
朝に効く禅語：「一日一生」 — 今日の心を整える禅の言葉とその意味
このセクションのまとめ
レッスン2：昼のセルフリセット 動きと文字で、疲労・イライラを流す習慣: このセクションの概容
お昼の所作でパフォーマンス維持 — 美しい立ち方・歩き方で体幹を鍛え集中力キープ
モヤモヤを文字で流す書道セラピー — なぞり書きでストレス解消法
昼に効く禅語：「無事是貴人」 — 今この瞬間を肯定し心を整える言葉
このセクションのまとめ
レッスン3：夜のセルフリセット 余白と静けさで、心のざわつきを鎮める習慣: このセクションの概容
夜のスマホ脳リセット法 — 呼吸＋手の動きで睡眠の質を高める簡単デジタルデトックス
“おつかれさまの一文字”ワーク — 感情整理と心のリラックスを促すセルフケア法
夜に効く禅語：「喫茶去」 — 何もせず、一服で心を落ち着ける禅の教え
このセクションのまとめ
禅語を人生に取り入れた結果: 禅語を取り入れた結果
さいごに: コース全体の小テスト

requirements: インターネット接続とPC
1日5分継続できる時間
courses.description:
『集中力が続かない脳をリセット！ イライラ・モヤモヤを手放す5分習慣【初心者OK】』というテーマでお話していきます。


あなたはこんな悩みを抱えていませんか？
-SNSや情報で頭がいっぱい
-いつも何かに急かされている気がする
-つい焦ったり、イライラしてしまう…
もし、あなたの答えが『はい』であれば、是非最後までコースを受講ください。


このコースを最後まで受講頂くとあなたが手に入れられるもの
-集中力が続かない原因＝認知疲労を理解できるようになります。
-書かない書道式セルフケアで心と体をリセットする方法を身につけられるようになります。
その結果、朝・昼・夜の時間帯に合わせた3つの習慣を通じて、やる気・集中力・自己肯定感を日々の中で自然に高められるようになります。


あなたが集中力が続かない脳をリセットし余白を手に入れて、素敵な未来を手に入れられますように願っています！
それではコースでお会い出来ることを楽しみにしています！
岩﨑綠風（いわさきりょくふう）
target_audience: 仕事中もSNSやメールの通知が気になってしまい、頭がいっぱいになっているビジネスパーソン
家事や育児、職場の業務に追われ、常に「時間が足りない」と感じている主婦・ワーママ
締め切りやタスクに急かされ、気づけば焦りやイライラが日常化しているフリーランスや管理職
会議や人とのやり取りで集中力が切れ、1日が終わる頃にはぐったり疲れているオフィスワーカー
自分の気持ちをうまく言葉にできず、モヤモヤを抱えたまま眠ってしまう学生や社会人
何をしても上手くいかず、自己否定感にとらわれてしまっている挑戦中の起業家や転職活動中の人

courses.title: ASTROLOJİ: SATÜRN SINAVLARI
courses.bio: Yoruldum Allah'ım bu sınavlar ne zaman bitecek?
objectives: Satürn döngülerinin yaşamda nasıl dönüm noktaları yarattığını ve transit dönemlerinde ortaya çıkan yapılandırma süreçlerini nasıl okuyacağınızı öğreneceksiniz.
Satürn’ün burçlar ve evlerdeki yerleşimlerinin ne anlama geldiğini öğreneceksiniz. Hangi temalarda gecikme, sorumluluk alma ve olgunlaşma süreçlerinin yaşandığı
Satürn’ün bireysel haritalarda kişisel gelişim, ruhsal dayanıklılık ve içsel ustalık için nasıl çalıştığını fark edecek, bu gezegenle daha bilinçli bir ilişki k
Bu eğitimde, Satürn’ün mitolojik kökenlerini ve sembolik anlamını öğreneceksiniz. Zaman, sınır, sorumluluk ve iç disiplin gibi kavramlarla olan ilişkisini anlay
requirements: Bu kursa katılmak için astrolojiye dair temel bir merakınız ve biraz ön bilgiye sahip olmanız faydalı olacaktır. Gezegenler, burçlar ve evler hakkında genel bir kavrayışınız varsa, Satürn’ün derin anlamlarını çok daha kolay anlayabilirsiniz. Ancak yeni başlayanlar da motivasyonlarıyla bu konuları öğrenmeye açıksa rahatlıkla katılabilir.
courses.description:
Astrolojide Satürn, zamanın efendisi, yapıların kurucusu ve ruhsal olgunluğun gezegenidir. Sıklıkla zorluklarla, kısıtlamalarla ve sorumluluklarla anılsa da aslında Satürn, gerçek gücümüzü ortaya çıkaran ve bizi içsel olarak büyüten büyük bir öğretmendir. Bu eğitimde Satürn’ü hem mitolojik hem de astrolojik yönleriyle derinlemesine ele alıyor, onu korkulan değil anlaşılan bir arketipe dönüştürüyoruz.
Eğitim, Satürn’ün mitolojik kökenleriyle başlıyor. Kronos’un zamanla ilişkisi, sınır ve düzen kavramlarıyla bağlantısı üzerinden Satürn’ün arketipsel anlamı çözümleniyor. Ardından Satürn’ün astrolojideki temel doğası, burçlar ve evlerdeki yerleşimi inceleniyor. Hangi burçta ne tür bir sınavla karşılaşılır, hangi evde ne tür sorumluluklar alınır gibi sorulara net ve uygulamalı yanıtlar sunuluyor.
Satürn’ün bireysel haritalardaki etkisinin yanı sıra, döngüsel zamanlamaları da bu eğitimin temel taşlarından biri. Özellikle 7, 14, 29 ve 58 yaş civarındaki Satürn döngüleri; yapı kurma, kırılma, yeniden inşa etme ve bilgelik kazanma süreçleri olarak detaylı biçimde ele alınıyor. Bu dönemlerin neden bu kadar belirleyici olduğunu anlamak, katılımcıya zamanla barışık ve bilinçli bir yaşam inşa etme imkânı sunuyor.
Eğitimde özel olarak Satürn retrosu konusuna da yer veriliyor. Natal haritada geri giden Satürn’ün anlamı, içselleştirilmiş sorumluluk duygusu, otoriteyle yaşanan içsel çatışmalar ve kişinin kendi içindeki “yetki figürü”yle yüzleşme süreci üzerine kapsamlı bilgiler aktarılıyor. Transitlerde Satürn retrosu dönemlerinde yaşanan yavaşlamalar, ertelemeler ve yeniden yapılandırma ihtiyaçları da pratik örneklerle açıklanıyor.
Satürn aynı zamanda karmik bir göstergedir. Geçmişten gelen sorumluluklar, ruhsal olgunluk sınavları ve tamamlanması gereken dersler çoğu zaman Satürn aracılığıyla karşımıza çıkar. Bu nedenle eğitim boyunca Satürn’ün yalnızca dünyevi değil, ruhsal boyutuyla da nasıl çalıştığını anlamaya odaklanıyoruz.
Bu eğitim, astrolojiyi sadece teknik bir sistem olarak değil, derin bir yaşam bilgeliği olarak kavramak isteyen herkes için tasarlandı. Hem danışmanlık yapan astrologlara hem de kendi haritasını derinlemesine anlamak isteyen katılımcılara yönelik olarak yapılandırıldı.
Satürn’le kurulan sağlıklı bir ilişki, hayatın en büyük öğretmenlerinden biriyle barış içinde yol almayı sağlar. Bu eğitim, Satürn’ü bir ceza olarak değil, bilinçli yapılandırma süreci olarak görmeyi seçenler için güçlü bir rehber olacaktır.
target_audience: Bu kurs, astrolojiye ilgi duyan herkes için uygundur. Hem temel bilgisi olanlar hem de kendi haritasını daha derinlemesine anlamak isteyenler için tasarlanmıştır. Astrologlar, astroloji öğrencileri, danışmanlar, spiritüel gelişim yolcuları ve kişisel farkındalığını artırmak isteyenler bu eğitimden fayda sağlayacaktır.

Das zweite Grundbedürfnis am Beispiel von Lars
Was passiert wenn die beiden Bedürfnisse nicht erfüllt werden?

requirements: Keine
courses.description:
In diesem Lehrgang geht es um das Thema Motivation und wie man die Erkenntnisse aus der psychologischen Forschung für sich selber nutzen kann
Sich damit  auseinanderzusetzen, ist aus verschiedenen Gründen sinnvoll. Es hilft, das eigene Handeln und den eigenen Antrieb besser nachvollziehen zu können und zu verstehen warum man bei manchen Tätigkeiten engagiert ist und Freude empfindet und bei anderen überhaupt nicht. Es geht beim Thema Motivation aber um deutlich mehr als einfach die eigene Leistungsbereitschaft zu steigern: Motivation ist auch sehr eng mit psychologischem Wohlbefinden verknüpft, weil hinter motiviertem Handeln häufig psychologische Grundbedürfnisse stehen, die erfüllt sein müssen, damit es uns gut geht.
Und diese psychologischen Grundbedürfnisse zu verstehen und vor allem wie man auf sie Einfluss nehmen kann - darum wird es  in diesem Kurs gehen.
Konkret werden wir uns mit der Selbstbestimmungstheorie der Motivation auseinandersetzen. Das ist ein Modell das eine ziemlich präzise Erklärung liefert, was den Menschen im Kern antreibt. Entwickelt wurde es von Edward Deci & Richard Ryan; zwei sehr renommierten Psychologen, die quasi ihr gesamtes Berufsleben damit verbracht haben das Thema Motivation zu erforschen. Das Modell ist einerseits in der Wissenschaft hoch anerkannt und gilt als State of the Art, ist aber gleichzeitig auch ziemlich gut zugänglich und praxisrelevant, weil man daraus direkte Schlussfolgerungen ziehen kann, wie man den eigenen Antrieb und das eigene Wohlbefinden verbessern kann.
target_audience: Jeden, mit Interesse für das Thema Motivation, egal ob Angestellter, Selbstständiger, Unternehmer oder Student.

courses.title: Croché Terapêutico
courses.bio: Tecer para Curar
objectives: Aprender técnicas básicas e intermédias de croché- Dominar pontos essenciais e criar pequenas peças.
Estimular a criatividade e a expressão pessoal- Usar o croché como forma de expressão artística e de reconexão consigo mesmo.
Reduzir o stress e a ansiedade- Através do ritmo repetitivo dos pontos, que acalma a mente e regula a respiração.
Promover a atenção plena (mindfulness)-Desenvolver a capacidade de estar presente no momento, focado no fio, na agulha e no movimento das mãos.
Fortalecer a autoestima e o sentimento de realização- Concluir peças feitas à mão desperta orgulho, confiança e sensação de progresso.
Favorecer a conexão social e comunitária- Criar um espaço de partilha, escuta e apoio entre os participantes.
Aprimorar e desenvolver a criatividade - Permitir-se expandir a criatividade artistica
Integrar o croché como prática terapêutica- conexão e interiorização
Desenvolver o amor e a atenção pela arte do croché- encontrar foco, concentração e leveza no sentir em cada peça realizada.
Perceber como esta arte pode ser usada como uma ferramenta complementar em processos de autocuidado, bem-estar e até cura emocional.
requirements: Vontade de aprender – não é necessário saber croché previamente. O curso serve para ensinar os passos iniciais
courses.description:
Curso de Croché Terapêutico – Tecendo Cura e Bem-Estar
O Croché Terapêutico é muito mais do que aprender a trabalhar fios e agulhas: é uma jornada de autoconhecimento, relaxamento e expressão criativa. Neste curso, cada ponto é pensado como uma oportunidade de conectar corpo, mente e emoções, transformando a prática do croché numa ferramenta de equilíbrio interior.
Ao longo das aulas, os participantes vão explorar técnicas tradicionais e adaptadas de croché, combinadas com exercícios de atenção plena, respiração consciente e pequenas práticas meditativas, criando um espaço seguro e acolhedor para relaxar, libertar tensões e estimular a criatividade. Cada projeto é também um convite a expressar emoções e histórias pessoais, transformando fios em símbolos de cuidado, afeto e significado.
O curso permite que cada aluno descubra o poder terapêutico da habilidade manual, artesã, aprendendo a gerir o stress, a ansiedade e a sensação de sobrecarga do dia a dia. Além disso, é uma excelente oportunidade para desenvolver a paciência, a concentração e a autoestima, ao ver o progresso da própria criação.
O que irá aprender:
Técnicas de croché adaptadas para todos os níveis, desde iniciantes a avançados.
Como usar o croché como prática meditativa e de autocuidado.
Exercícios de respiração e atenção plena para integrar na prática do croché.
Colocar-se em boa postura
Desenvolvimento de pequenos projetos que combinam beleza, funcionalidade e significado emocional.
Aprender pontos e técnicas de croché desde o nível inicial.Explorar o croché como prática de atenção plena (mindfulness).
Descobrir como o ato de tecer pode transformar emoções e trazer clareza mental.
Criar peças significativas, que simbolizam etapas do processo terapêutico.
Partilhar experiências em grupo, num ambiente de acolhimento e troca.
Este curso é para quem procura unir arte e terapia, encontrando no croché uma prática que cuida da mente, do corpo e da alma.
target_audience: Homens e mulheres que procuram reduzir stress, ansiedade e insónia
Pessoas que desejam desenvolver atenção plena (mindfulness) através de uma prática manual.
Quem procura desbloquear a criatividade e expressar emoções de forma saudável.
Todos os que querem transformar o croché numa ferramenta de autocuidado e meditação ativa.
Idosos ou pessoas em reabilitação, que beneficiam da coordenação motora fina.

Introduction to Life Coaching: Definition and Scope of Life Coaching
The Role of a Life Coach

requirements: No prior coaching experience is required, making this course suitable for beginners and those looking to enhance their skills.
Bringing your own personal development experience or passion for helping others is beneficial but not necessary.

Personalized support is available throughout the course to address your questions and enhance your learning experience.
You can access the course on any internet-connected device, allowing you to study at your own pace and convenience.
courses.description:
Life Coaching is a transformative journey aimed at guiding individuals towards achieving their goals and realizing their full potential. In today's fast-paced world, the need for personal development and effective coaching has become essential. Life coaching empowers individuals to overcome challenges and create a roadmap for success, making it a vital skill in both personal and professional settings.
This Life Coaching course covers a comprehensive curriculum that equips learners with the skills to guide clients through personal growth and goal achievement. The course explores key topics like effective communication, stress management, career coaching, and wellness. Learners will gain practical tools such as active listening, goal-setting techniques, and methods to build self-awareness in clients, helping them progress toward their desired outcomes.
By the end of the course, learners will be well-prepared to offer life coaching services and make a meaningful impact on their clients’ lives. Life coaching can be a fulfilling and impactful profession that helps others while advancing your career. Enroll today to transform your passion for personal growth into a rewarding career path.


By the end of this Life Coaching Training Essentials, you'll be equipped to:


Develop and implement effective coaching strategies to help clients achieve their personal and professional goals.
Recognise common obstacles and limiting beliefs in clients, and apply coaching techniques to overcome them.
Lead coaching sessions with confidence, providing clear direction and support to empower clients.
Foster a positive and accountable coaching relationship that motivates clients to take meaningful action.
Address coaching challenges across various settings, including career development, wellness, and personal growth.
Support clients through life transitions, helping them build resilience and navigate change effectively.


Curriculum of Life Coaching Mastery: Transform Lives and Build Success:


Module 1: Introduction to Life Coaching
Definition and Scope of Life Coaching
The Role of a Life Coach
Difference Between Coaching and Therapy
Module 2: Communication Skills for Life Coaches
Active Listening Techniques
Asking Powerful Questions
Managing Client Expectations
Module 3: Goal Setting and Achievement
Identifying Client Objectives
Overcoming Obstacles to Goal Achievement
Tracking Progress and Accountability
Module 4: Building Self-Awareness in Clients
Identifying Core Values and Beliefs
Self-Reflection Exercises
Understanding Personal Strengths and Weaknesses
Module 5: Managing Stress and Time
Stress Management Strategies
Prioritising Tasks Effectively
Work-Life Balance Coaching
Module 6: Coaching for Personal Growth
Facilitating Personal Development
Breaking Limiting Beliefs
Developing Positive Habits
Module 7: Career and Business Coaching
Enhancing Professional Skills
Navigating Career Transitions
Workplace Challenges and Solutions
Module 8: Health and Wellness Coaching
Promoting Healthy Lifestyles
Mental Health Awareness
Coaching for Physical Fitness


FAQs


What is life coaching?
Life coaching is a process that helps individuals identify and achieve personal and professional goals. It involves guidance, support, and accountability for personal growth.
Do I need any prior experience to take this course?
No prior experience is necessary. This course is designed for both beginners and those with some coaching knowledge, providing essential skills to become a life coach.
Is life coaching the same as therapy?
Life coaching focuses on personal development and achieving goals, while therapy deals with mental health and emotional healing. They are distinct but complementary fields.
Can I start a career as a life coach after this course?
Yes, this course prepares you to begin a career as a life coach. It provides practical tools and knowledge to confidently coach clients and help them reach their goals.
How can life coaching improve my career?
Life coaching enhances your communication, leadership, and problem-solving skills. It equips you to guide others effectively, which can be beneficial in various professional roles, including leadership, HR, and personal development.
target_audience: Aspiring life coaches looking to start a career in coaching.
Professionals in healthcare, wellness, and education interested in personal development coaching.
Managers and leaders seeking to enhance their coaching and mentoring skills.
Individuals passionate about helping others achieve their personal and professional goals.
Career coaches and mentors wanting to refine their coaching techniques.

requirements: An Introductory Course in Motivational Interviewing (such as my own Introduction)
courses.description:
Ongoing Professional Development: This course provides the knowledge and skills to improve performance in this area, offering 10 hours of valuable learning and professional development, as evidenced on the certificate issued upon completion.
Live Streamed Availability: This course and a range of other related courses can be delivered to groups of between 6 and 25 people via Live Streaming with Zoom. Contact Kevin O’Doherty for more details on pricing and availability etc.
This course is an advanced continuation of my Introduction to Motivational Interviewing course here on Udemy, designed to deepen and expand the skills and knowledge you’ve already started to develop. While the introductory course provides a solid foundation, this course takes those concepts to a more sophisticated level, providing a detailed exploration of advanced strategies, techniques, and theoretical concepts in Motivational Interviewing.
Through a series of comprehensive video lectures, we examine each new strategy in depth, explaining not only how to implement these techniques effectively but also when and where they are best used. This course goes beyond simple explanations—each strategy is carefully unpacked to help you understand the rationale behind it and the psychological principles that guide its use. You'll gain a deeper insight into the theoretical underpinnings of Motivational Interviewing and how these advanced techniques enhance the therapeutic process. The course includes a variety of practical examples and case studies to help you understand how to apply these strategies in real-world settings, whether you’re working with clients in counseling, health promotion, addiction treatment, or other areas where Motivational Interviewing is beneficial.
This course is ideal for those who already have a basic understanding of Motivational Interviewing and wish to further develop their skills. It’s perfect for individuals who are looking to integrate Motivational Interviewing into their professional practice, expand their counseling toolbox, or enhance their ability to help clients navigate ambivalence and make lasting changes. Whether you're a counselor, therapist, healthcare professional, or someone in a helping profession, this course provides an invaluable resource for your continued professional development (CPD).
Upon successful completion of the course, you will receive a certificate from Udemy that reflects your new level of expertise. If you require an accredited certificate from our company for professional or educational purposes, please don’t hesitate to contact us via the messaging feature on Udemy. We’ll promptly provide your accredited certificate, usually within 24-48 hours of receiving your request.
To ensure you fully benefit from this course, I encourage you to take an active approach to your learning. Turn off or silence your mobile phones and other electronics to minimize distractions. Take thorough notes and reflect on the material after each section. Motivational Interviewing is a skill that requires regular practice, so I highly recommend you take the time to rehearse the techniques you learn throughout the course. Watching the videos multiple times will allow you to internalize the content and deepen your understanding. Feel free to share your personal experiences and insights with the course community, as this exchange of ideas can further enrich your learning.
As always, your feedback is invaluable. If you have any suggestions for improving the course or if there’s anything you’d like to see covered in more detail, please don’t hesitate to reach out to me directly. Your input will help make this course even better for future learners.
In addition to the course materials, I also provide additional resources and videos on my YouTube channel, Forensic Mental Health and CBT. On this channel, you’ll find videos related to Motivational Interviewing, CBT, and other topics in mental health and therapy, offering a broader range of materials to complement your learning. Please consider subscribing and liking the videos—your support means a lot and helps me continue to create valuable content for you and others in the field.
This course is designed to help you refine your skills, gain a deeper understanding of Motivational Interviewing, and ultimately become a more effective practitioner in your field. I look forward to supporting you as you continue to develop your expertise and make a positive impact in the lives of the clients you work with.
target_audience: Anyone who works with individuals and groups who may be looking for change
Anyone who has an introductory level understanding of Motivational Interviewing

Therapists from any school of thought

courses.description:
يعد هذا الكورس فرصة رائعة لأي شخص يريد أن يخطط ويستغل وقته على أكمل وجه

أعظم ما في حياة المرء هو وقته

فبقدر حسن إدارته والتعامل معه = يجد البركة فيه لإنهاء كافة مهامه.
وبقدر الانغماس في الملهيات والفوضى = بقدر ذهاب وقته وشبابه وحياته.

الوقتُ هو زاتك، هو ثروتك، هو رأس مالك وميدان عملك.
وما فلح من فلح إلا بحفظ الأوقات وحسن إدارتها، وما خاب من خاب إلا بعدم جدولة مهامه وضياع أوقاته.

في رحلة جديدة مع كورس إدارة الوقت والتخطيط سوف نتعلم إن شاء الله كيف نحافظ على أوقاتنا ونديرها بشكل صحيح.

من خلال هذا الكورس سنتعلم كل ما يأتي.

- ما هو الوقت؟
- أهمية الوقت في الإسلام
- معنى وأهمية إدارة الوقت
- اعتقادات خاطئة حول إدارة الوقت

- تحديد الأهداف والغايات
- التخطيط
- ترتيب الأولويات
- إدارة الذات + بعض النصائح
- التسويف والسوشيال ميديا
- كتب حول إدارة الوقت وزيادة الإنتاجية

ولقد أهتم الإسلام كثيرًا بالوقت وحث على حسن إدارته في مواضع كثيرة من القرآن الكريم ومن السنة النبوية.
فعن النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم أنه قال: " أنه لا تزولُ قدمَا عبدٍ يومَ القيامةِ حتى يسألَ عن عمُرِه فيمَ أفناه، وعن علمِه فيمَ فعَل فيه، وعن مالِه من أين اكتسَبه وفيمَ أنفقَه، وعن جسمِه فيمَ أبلاه".

courses.title: Brain Chemistry Explained: Boost Motivation, Mood & Focus
courses.bio: Understand your brain. Build better habits.
objectives: Understand how the brain works through a clear and simplified breakdown of neurons, synapses, and brain regions.
Learn the role of key neurotransmitters—dopamine, serotonin, oxytocin, and endorphins—and how they influence mood, focus, motivation, and stress.
Apply science-backed strategies to naturally boost each neurochemical for better energy, productivity, connection, and well-being.
Recognize common behaviors that disrupt your brain’s balance, and develop habits that support long-term mental and emotional health.
requirements: No science background needed. Just curiosity and a desire to understand yourself better. Everything will be explained simply and clearly.
courses.description:
Have you ever wondered why you feel so focused one day and completely scattered the next? Or why you sometimes feel calm and motivated… and other times, nothing seems to move you forward?
The answer lies in your brain chemistry. And the good news? You can actually learn how it works—and how to work with it.
In this course, we’ll break down the complex world of brain science into something clear, accessible, and deeply useful. No academic jargon. No prior science knowledge needed. Just real insights, explained in a way that makes sense.
You’ll learn how your brain communicates through neurotransmitters—tiny chemical messengers that shape your experience of life. We’ll explore the four main ones that affect your day-to-day mood, motivation, energy, and stress levels:
Dopamine – the molecule of motivation, progress, and focus
Oxytocin – the chemical of trust, bonding, and confidence
Serotonin – the key to emotional balance, energy, and stability
Endorphins – your body’s natural painkillers and stress relievers
You’ll also discover the brain’s ability to change through neuroplasticity—the powerful process that lets you reshape thoughts, habits, and emotional patterns over time.
Along the way, we’ll connect each idea to practical, real-world strategies:
How to naturally increase each neurochemical
How modern habits affect your brain (for better or worse)
What to do when you’re feeling low, stuck, or overwhelmed
Simple tools to boost mood, build better focus, and enjoy life more fully
Whether you're into personal growth, mental health, performance, or just self-awareness—this course is for you.
By the end, you’ll walk away with a grounded understanding of how your brain works, and how to take small, intentional steps to feel more focused, connected, and in control.
target_audience: This course is for anyone curious about how the brain works and wants to improve their mood, focus, and motivation—no science background needed. Ideal for learners interested in mental clarity, personal growth, and understanding themselves better.

courses.description:
Selbstmotivation und Willenskraft sind die Schlüssel, um Deine wahren Potentiale freizuschalten. Du möchtest Deine Ziele erreichen und Deine Visionen umsetzen? Fokussiert sein und die Dinge zu Ende bringen? Leichter ins Handeln kommen oder mit Freude Vollgas geben? Kräfte und Potentiale bei Dir entfalten, von denen Du gar nicht wusstest, dass Du sie hast?
Dann kann dieser „Selbstmotivations-/Ziele erreichen“-Online-Kurs genau das Richtige für Dich sein. Lerne ein FINISHER zu werden. Ohne tschakka, tschakka. Mit einem der umfassendsten deutschen Online-Kurse dazu auf Udemy.
Sehr viele Menschen erreichen ihre Ziele nicht. Aber nicht weil sie scheitern, sondern weil sie nicht konsequent anfangen oder zu früh kapitulieren. Weil sie nicht dranbleiben. Weil ihre Motivation und ihre Willenskraft einfach nicht ausreichen.
Mit diesem Kurs lernst Du, es besser zu machen. Denn der Schlüssel auch zu Deinen Zielen, zu mehr Produktivität und Zufriedenheit liegt im Kopf.
Und genau dort setzen wir im Kurs an. Hier bekommst Du Anleitung und Tipps für erfolgreiche Selbstmotivation, starke Willenskraft und das Erreichen von Zielen an einer Stelle. Zünde die nächste Stufe Deiner Persönlichkeitsentwicklung.
Wir fokussieren dafür auf 6 tragende Säulen der Selbstmotivation, Willenskraft und Zielerreichung. Jeder Säule ist ein spezielles, eigenes Modul mit mehreren Lektionen gewidmet.


Diese 6 Säulen (und damit die Kerninhalte und Module des Kurses) sind:


1. Das Fundament – Motivations-Basis und Motivationsfallen
Verstehe, wie Motivation entsteht und welche Arten es gibt
Lerne die 5 Faktoren der Willenskraft kennen und was auf sie Einfluss hat
Erkenne typische Motivationsfallen, damit Du nicht die gleichen Fehler machst, wie viele andere
Und finde Deine persönlichen Motivatoren und Demotivatoren


2. Den „guten inneren Autopiloten“ aktivieren
Jeder von uns hat einen mächtigen Autopiloten, der uns (unterbewusst) steuert. Und dies entscheidet darüber, ob wir Erfolg haben oder nicht
Lerne, diesen „guten Autopiloten“ für Deine Zwecke zu nutzen


3. Stimmung und Mindset managen, Bremsen lösen
Auch Deine Einstellung entscheidet zu großen Teilen darüber, ob Du Deine Ziele erreichst – und die Einstellung kannst Du beeinflussen
Erfahre, wie Du Dein Mindset und Stimmung positiv steuerst
Und lerne, Deine Selbstmotivations-Killer, Deine „Bremsen“ (wie Selbstzweifel oder negative Gedanken) zu eliminieren


4. Richtung bestimmen und Fokus setzen – Ziele finden + setzen
Viele Menschen glauben, sie hätten Ziele, aber in Wahrheit sind es (nur) Wünsche, Träume oder Vorsätze. Doch das merken sie nicht – und kommen deshalb nicht dahin, wo sie hinmöchten
Erfahre, was echte Ziele auszeichnet, wie Du sie findest und worauf es beim Setzen und Formulieren ankommt
Lerne, wie Du sie für Dich operabel machen kannst und richtig priorisierst


5. Vollgas geben – selbstmotiviert ins Handeln kommen
Erfolg entsteht durch TUN – erhalte wichtige Tipps, Ideen und Ansätze, um ins Handeln zu kommen und mit der Umsetzung zu beginnen
Finde heraus, was auch Du ab sofort tun kannst, um Deine Ziele besser zu erreichen
Finde heraus, was Du tun kannst, wenn Du Dinge tun musst, die Dir schwerfallen oder auf die Du keine Lust hast
Nutze einfache Selbstmotivations-Hacks, um leichter zu erreichen, was Du Dir vorgenommen hast


6. Dauerhaft dranbleiben – selbstdiszipliniert sein – Ziele erreichen
Anfangen ist gut, doch nur wer dauerhaft dranbleibt und weiß, wie der seine Motivation, Selbstdisziplin und Willenskraft hochhalten kann, wird seine Ziele erreichen und Erfolg haben
Lerne, ein Finisher zu werden – mit einfachen, wirksamen Praxis-Techniken zur dauerhaften Selbstmotivation, um auch morgen, übermorgen und überübermorgen am Ball zu sein
Diese 6. Säule erhöht in erheblichem Umfang Deine Chancen, das zu erreichen, was Du Dir vorgenommen hast.
Eine Fundgrube von Übungen bzw. Reflexionsfragen helfen Dir dabei, Deinen Weg zu finden und Dich fit zu machen, um Deine Ziele zu erreichen.
Manches ist verblüffend einfach, wenn man weiß, wo man ansetzen kann. Denn egal wie gut die Techniken und Werkzeuge auch sein mögen, anwenden und umsetzen muss jeder selbst. Picke Dir die für Dich besten Tipps und Ideen heraus und starte jetzt Deinen Weg zu mehr Motivation und Willenskraft.
Also: gleich anmelden und Deine Entwicklung selbst in die Hand nehmen.
target_audience: Menschen, die an Persönlichkeitsentwicklung interessiert sind
Alle, die Ziele haben und diese besser erreichen möchten
Alle die mehr vom Leben erwarten – im Job oder im Alltag
Alle, die schon motiviert sind, aber noch mehr Fokus entwickeln möchten
Alle, die mit mehr Motivation, Selbstdisziplin und Willenskraft mehr erreichen wollen, aber bisher keinen „Pack-an“ gefunden haben
Menschen, die die gewisse (eigene) Trägheit überwinden und konkrete Schritte in Richtung ihrer Ziele in Angriff nehmen möchten

courses.description:
Bu kurs, hayallerini gerçeğe dönüştürmek isteyenler için Zafer Polat Koyuncu tarafından hazırlandı.
Zafer Polat Koyuncu, 2001 yılında başlayan danışmanlık yolculuğunda, danışmanı olduğu yüzlerce kurumdan, binlerce danışandan elde ettiği tecrübelerini bu eğitimle sizlerle buluşturdu. MYK lisanslı bir koç ve yönetim danışmanı olarak yapmış olduğu danışmanlıklarını verimlilik ve strateji noktasında harmanlayarak küçük büyük her yaşta bireye destek olan Koyuncu, TRT, SGK, Hazine Müsteşarlığı, Çalışma ve Sosyal Güvenlik Bakanlığı gibi birçok devlet kurumuna, 20'den fazla üniversiteye, 100'den fazla okula, 300'den fazla özel kurum ve kuruluşa, 10.000'den fazla öğretmene, 6000'den fazla veliye eğitim vermiş ve danışmanlık yapmıştır.
Eğitmenimizin; Zafer Polat Koyuncu ve Mind Up YouTube kanallarından ücretsiz videolarını izleyebilirsiniz.
Sen de bu süreçte çok daha verimli olmak ve zaman kaybı yaşamadan sonuca ulaşmak istemez misin?
Doğru hedef belirleme stratejileriyle, boşa kürek çekmekten kurtulacaksın.
Düşüncelerinin farkındalığını geliştirerek daha doğru ve daha gerçekçi hayallere yöneleceksin.
Gerçekçi hayallerini hedeflere, hedeflerini de gerçeğe dönüştürmenin en kısa yolunu öğreneceksin.
Zamanını en verimli şekilde kullanırken, kişisel verimliliğin de gelişecek.
Başarılı olmanın en kolay yolunu keşfettiğinde hayatında her anının kıymetini çok daha iyi bilen bir birey olacaksın.
Hayatının genelinde TAKDİR yeteceğinin gelişmesi ile birlikte büyük bir zenginlik yaşayacağın kesindir. Sen de hayallerini gerçeğe dönüştürmek için kullanacağın bu özel stratejileri içselleştirebilirsin.


Hazırsan başlayalım :)
target_audience: Daha verimli hayaller kurmak ve bu hayallere daha sistemli bir şekilde ulaşmak isteyen herkes.

courses.description:
OVER 2,091 SUCCESSFUL STUDENTS HAVE TAKEN THIS 5-STAR COURSE
I FAILED at going to the gym 3 times per week.
I FAILED at getting out of the bed when the alarm went out.
I FAILED at trying to make changes last.
And I wasn't alone in this. I was one of the many people who failed to keep their commitments, especially the commitments to themselves.
Then I started learning about myself.
I studied hundreds of books and I've done numerous mini projects to test my limits. From leaving a chocolate on my nightstand to publishing my jogging sessions on social media.
I've studied techniques on the internet. Some of them work, some of them don't. Some might work for others but may or may not work for you.
Developing effective habits is a challenge in itself.
This course is here to guide you into implementing effective, down–to-earth strategies to achieve your goals.
This is not a listing of hundreds of techniques.
In this course we talk about practical things, the things that work.
Things like:
- habit linking -> an effective strategy to remember your habit at the exact moment you need to activate it
- the 3 elements of a habit -> the only theory in the course (but we aren't stopping  here, after this lesson you'll be able to better understand your habitual actions and how to rewrite them according to your needs)
- the SBS technique and how you can use it to keep yourself motivated over long periods of time
All of the techniques come from personal experience.
In this course I'll tell you how I lost 22 pounds, how I exercise daily (and how you can too, in only 30 minutes) and you'll get useful bonuses, bonuses that will complement the content of the course.
The Challenge!
After you've internalized the necessary strategies for breeding long-lasting habits and gone through the practical exercises, then you are ready for the secret challenge.
In this challenge you'll have to implement a simple habit starting from the first day. At the end of your first month, if you've implemented the habit daily, you'll win a prize and a place in the Hall of Fame.
Note that this is not a guide for eliminating bad habits (though some principles found here might be useful in doing just that).
This guide offers practical strategies to get your first successes.
And after the first few steps, the others will come easily.
Join this course now and create your own habit in the first lesson.
See you in the private section.

requirements: None at all, except basic high school knowledge and a curiosity to learn !
courses.description:
Motivated and Engaged Employees are everyone's dream come true ! Happier and more productive employees, less absenteeism and turnover, better performance, better cost management, better profitability ... it is almost a panacea for most, if not all, the ills, that Corporations and Institutions face !
And yet, it has never been easy to figure out sustainable ways to improve the motivation and engagement levels of your Employees, Managers, and Leaders.
There are some tenets of ancient wisdom, which have been practiced for centuries, but without really any long term improvement in employee motivation or engagement. We have, explicitly, or implicitly, believed that Employees are motivated by their compensation, rewards, and bonuses; the threat of a bad performance rating, or of being fired. But is that really true ? What really does motivate all of us ? As it turns out, the truth is a little more complicated than that !
This Course will take you you into the depths of Motivation Theories, the research behind them, and what their findings and lessons are ! It also delves into evolution and history of Human Motivation, to provide a context to understand its complexities; and what works, and what does not, under different circumstances.
You will understand, from the research and theories, the complex set of factors that do motivate all of us, and get some practical lessons and applications from them.
Whether you are a Leader, or a follower, these lessons will provide valuable tips on Motivation.
Enroll into this Comprehensive, Unique and Valuable Course now !

Some Images and Videos courtesy Pixabay, Pexels, Pressfoto and FreePik. Some Music snippets courtesy Bensound.

Anyone and everyone who wants to learn about the science and research behind Human Motivation!

courses.description:
In questo corso imparerai come applicare in modo sicuro ed efficace la potente tecnica dell'ipnosi sui bambini. L'ipnosi è uno strumento prezioso per favorire il benessere emotivo e mentale dei più piccoli. Come coach, naturopata o professionista della salute, potrai ampliare le tue competenze e apprendere tecniche specializzate progettate appositamente per lavorare con i bambini.
Cosa Imparerai:
Fondamenti dell'Ipnosi per Bambini: Comprendi come l'ipnosi per i bambini differisce da quella per gli adulti e quali considerazioni specifiche sono necessarie.
Tecniche di Ipnosi: Apprendi diverse tecniche ipnotiche adatte alle varie età, inclusa l'uso di storie e metafore per supportare cambiamenti positivi.
Applicazione Pratica: Scopri come condurre una sessione di ipnosi con i bambini, dalla preparazione al follow-up, e approfondisci tramite l'analisi di casi reali.
Etica e Sicurezza: Acquisisci una comprensione approfondita degli aspetti etici e di sicurezza legati all'ipnosi sui bambini.
A Chi è Rivolto Questo Corso?
Coach e naturopati che desiderano espandere la loro pratica e apprendere tecniche specializzate per lavorare con i bambini.
Psicologi e terapeuti che vogliono integrare l'ipnosi come strumento aggiuntivo nel lavoro con i bambini.
Genitori interessati all'ipnosi, che vogliono imparare a lavorare in modo sicuro ed efficace con i propri figli.
Perché Scegliere Questo Corso?
Questo corso ti offre non solo conoscenze teoriche, ma anche abilità pratiche che potrai applicare direttamente nella tua attività professionale. Imparerai come supportare i bambini attraverso l'ipnosi, aiutandoli a superare sfide emotive e mentali e a promuovere il loro benessere. Con un forte focus su sicurezza ed etica, questo corso è indispensabile per chiunque lavori con i bambini e desideri aiutarli in modo innovativo e sensibile.
Certificazione e Supporto:
Al termine di questo corso, riceverai un certificato dell´HYPNOSIS INSTITUTE MARIANI di Berlino che attesterà le tue nuove competenze e ti aiuterà a posizionarti come specialista in ipnosi per bambini. Avrai inoltre accesso a una community di professionisti affini, con cui potrai condividere esperienze e ricevere supporto.
Approcci Efficaci per la Gestione di Ansie, Bullismo e ADHD:
Scopri in questo corso strategie efficaci per affrontare ansie, bullismo, ADHD e altre sfide emotive. Impara come aiutare bambini e adolescenti a trovare la loro forza interiore e a migliorare la loro qualità di vita.

Avviso legale: Questo corso non intende sostituire l'intervento di professionisti della salute mentale. Il lavoro su traumi e problematiche psicologiche profonde deve essere condotto esclusivamente da psicoterapeuti o figure autorizzate. Si raccomanda di operare sempre entro i limiti legali della propria professione.
target_audience: Il corso è rivolto a coach, naturopati, psicologi e professionisti della salute che desiderano specializzarsi nell'uso dell'ipnosi con bambini. È ideale per chi lavora con bambini e cerca strumenti pratici e sicuri per supportare lo sviluppo emotivo e mentale dei più piccoli. Anche genitori interessati all'ipnosi possono trarre beneficio dal corso, purché motivati ad apprendere tecniche professionali.

requirements: A passion for traditional Bushido ethics and martial arts
courses.description:
Vendettas, honor, loyalty, murder and betrayal, key components of a classic and yet little known Japanese literary genre known as jitsuroku. The word “jitsuroku” translates as “memoir” and was a genre of literature in feudal Japan that were generally exaggerated stories of political scandals and revenge. These stories were largely based on true events, however through oral transmission and embellishment, these stories would soon intertwine fact and fiction together to the point that trying to decipher between the two would become quite difficult. The result is that epic tales of revenge would soon become transmitted and popularized throughout Feudal Japan.
While many stories have remained unknown, others have managed to permeate pop-culture and survive through the ages by being transformed into Kabuki plays. These plays became so popular throughout Feudal Japan that many have survived into the modern day and continue to see new recreations in Japanese Television and movies. In an attempt to revive these classic stories and introduce them to the western reader I have combined out of print and old texts to compile various classic Japanese tales so that these stories may continue to live on for generations to come.
This course is a Guided Reading experience coupled with self-reflective questions ideal for martial artists and those seeking introspection framed around the ethos of the Bushido mindset.
target_audience: Martial Artists
Japanese History Enthusiasts

courses.description:
Discover the amazing success secrets that quadruple your productivity, eliminate your Inner Chump, supercharges your creativity and purges your vocabulary of excuses! And best of all, YOU will Discover EXACTLY what you need to do to be a Champion in life...

Dear Friend:
In all of my years as an athlete, a coach and a successful entrepreneur, I can honestly say that I’ve experienced the same problems over and over again when it comes to success.
To be completely honest with you, there are 5 Major Reasons why I have failed and failed miserably.  The truth is, I let my “Inner Chump” take over.
What Is The “Inner Chump” And Do I Have One?

We all have a chump inside of us - called the “Inner Chump“. This inner chump rears its ugly head when things get “tight”, when we get fatigued, or when we get frustrated. We must repress this inner chump until it no longer seems like it exists.  Basically you have to increase your inner chump resistance threshold.
Marathon runners are great at this.  When people start training for a marathon, their Inner Chump will come out around mile 5 or 6. As they train, their Inner Chump will show up around my 11 or 12. And as they get in shape, their Inner Chump will show up between miles 20-24.  Sometimes they can get rid of the Inner Chump at this stage and sometimes they show up on race day knowing that they will meet their Inner Chump face to face at mile 23 and they will have to decide whether or not they want to be a Chump or a Champ.

Because you DO UNDERSTAND that the difference between a CHAMP or a CHUMP is “U”.
Honestly, the reason why 97% of you are having problems achieving the major breakthroughs you are looking for professionally, financially and personally is due to your inability to control your Inner Chump and the manifestation of Chump Moments in your life.
Well, right now I’m going to offer you the ability to repress these Chump Moments and a solution to repel your inner chump. I’m going to offer you some Chump Repellent.
I know, I know. You’ve read everything, listened to everything. You’ve gone to the preacher, the pastor, the groups, the meetings….. Hell, you’ve done everything that they told you to do and it hasn’t worked.
Some of you have tried to lose weight. You bought the equipment, the tapes, you signed up at the gym, you registered for the weight loss meeting group, YOU DID everything that your friends did, BUT it didn’t work for you….
Some of you have been trying to switch jobs, change careers and make more money. You’ve revamped your resume, your CV, you’ve studied the how to interview books, you’ve looked at doing real estate as a side business, you’ve tried Amway, and every other start up company out there, only to get chewed up, spit out, dish-ragged and mishandled. It just didn’t work for you….
Some of you have been trying to make your relationships work. You’ve gone to church, to counseling, to your friends, your loved ones, but thing just ain’t working out.
Well, there are 5 Major Reasons Why 97% of People Fail And What You Need To Do In Order To Succeed.  I’m going to tell them to you right now and I’m going to also give you a solution of how you can fix it.
"Insider-Secrets Exposed: Why 97% of People FAIL At Damn-Near Everything They Try"
Here are 5 Major Reasons Why 97% of People Fail
Reason #1: Getting In Your Own Way
Reason #1 is YOU! Believe it or not, the best thing that you can do for yourself is to get out of your own way. Your lack of belief and faith in what you are capable of stops you from being able to succeed.
If you are too heavy, you think that, “I can never lose any weight.”  If you are slow, you say, “I’ll never run as fast as them,”  Or maybe you tell yourself, “I’ll never have any money to do anything.”
Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right. Henry Ford
We’ll you’ve defeated yourself before you started. So essentially YOU are the biggest part of your problem. This particular problem is the main thing that allows people to call you a Chump. You allow your Inner Chump to stop you from being a Champ.
If this is one of the problems that you have, you are in luck. The Chump Repellent Audio CD Set will allow you to overcome this problem and achieve some remarkable breakthroughs in many areas of your life

Reason #2: Excuses Have Become Acceptable
Reason #2 is that Excuses Have Become Acceptable.  That’s right. You have made excuses a reasonable and plausible explanation for not getting things done or accomplishing objectives.  You have essentially trained yourself to be a quitter and have allowed quitting by yourself and others to be acceptable.
Ninety-nine percent of the failures come from people who have the habit of making excuses. George Washington Carver
This point is one of the hardest to accept, because no one really and truly believes that they are a quitter, but if you look back at the last 10 years of your life and see the things which you’ve started, or have talked about starting, or have thought about starting and see those same things not finished, then you have and are very accomplished in the area of QUITTING!
This makes you a Chump. Now we all have moments when we would like to quit stuff and things. That moment when we have that feeling is the initial manifestation of our Inner Chump. In order for us to “kill” it or repel these feelings, we need some type of Chump Repellent to thwart the growth of these types of thoughts and behaviors.
I attribute my success to this:I never gave or took an excuse. - Florence Nightingale
Reason #3: Poor Choice of Friends and Acquaintances
Reason #3 is that you have a very Poor Choice of Friends and Acquaintances.  Quite frankly, your peer group SUCKS!! Here’s the cold hard facts, the people that you are around are enablers. They are either enablers towards good quality behaviors or enablers towards chump-type behaviors.  More often than not, if you take a good look at the people around you and the people with whom you are “hanging” you will find out why you are at the current achievement level which you are currently.
In the latin culure they have a phrase which sums up this section that goes, “Dime con quien andas y te dire que es.”  The translation is… “Tell me who you walk with and I’ll tell you who you are!”
The bottom line is if you hang with Chumps, you will be a chump. And if you hang with people who exhibit Chump behavior, you will too. You NEED a tool so that you can keep these people out of your life. Chump Repellent is it!!
“Tell me who you walk with and I’ll tell you who you are!”
Reason #4: Not Understanding “The Cost”
Reason #4 is that you don’t understand the Cost!  I know you’re saying, “What cost?”
Well, that’s just the problem. You don’t understand the cost of winning and the cost of losing. More often than not, you refuse to invest in terms of your time and money in order to do the things that Champs do. And thus because you want to cut corners, you inevitably turn yourself into a Chump. Stop cutting corners.  If you’re the kind of person who doesn’t go all the way through the line during sprints, or cheats on exams, or constantly plays the lottery or is always looking some way to “get over” then you are trying to circumvent the cost without knowing that you will pay more in the end.
Just think about it. People who shoplift try to get something without paying. And sometimes they succeed, but the one moment that they don’t – what happens?
I’ll tell you what happens. They end up paying more than what the initial item which they were stealing cost. They pay in time and embarrassment.
And the same thing happens when you try to short cut things in business, in sports and in life.  Your Inner Chump speaks to you and tells you that you are “saving”, when in actuality you are costing yourself and putting yourself in debt. The equivalent is when you’re running sprints in practice and you’re trying to “save” yourself instead of going “all out”. If you train like this, you will pay a hefty price later. You must learn how to repel these types of thoughts. Chump Repellent was developed to ensure that you  behave and govern yourself like a Champion.
Reason #5: Refusing To Act Now!

The fifth, but number one reason that many people fail is because they refuse to ACT!!  Dale Carnegie, who was famous for his ability to get the most out of people and show them how to climb the ladder of success said this, “ Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage."
An ounce of action is worth a ton of theory. Friedrich Engels
Right now you have the opportunity to obtain one of the most powerful products that you will ever own. You will undoubtedly receive a great deal of information from The Chump Repellent Package, but the question is this –Will You Act Now?

Mediocrity is not the way to go – you know it and I know it.  So don’t have a Chump Moment right here, right now. Be a Champion and press forward and get your hands on The Chump Repellent Package Today.
Right now I currently demand and get $450.00 per hour for my time in person or over the phone. And I know that it is more than worth it because I’m more than very busy and the people who I help and helped have achieved phenomenal results in their sporting careers, business careers, personal lives and finances.  Right now I want to provide you with some of the same advice that I provide to them at only a fraction of the price.
Look, I know what it is that you need to succeed. Because I’ve been where you are. I failed miserably to make an Olympic Team in 2000, I went from not having to having, I’ve been on the operating table and had the doctor tell me that I wasn’t going to make it back in time, but I did. I know what has to be done in order to be a Champ and Not Be a Chump. The question is – “Do You Want To Live Like A Champion Or Not?”
If your answer is yes, then you will have no problem investing a measly couple ah few bucks. (Heck, that’s drop in the bucket. You spend more than that on a dinner and a movie).
So, If you've come this far with me, one thing is for certain, you probably want to make some dramatic improvements in various areas of your life and you want to do all the things necessary to repel Chump Moments so that you can be a Champion. And 2. Order  Chump Repellent today and change your life for the better. An Irish proverb says, "Just nodding your head won't row the boat." Emblazon that message in your heart and get Chump Repellent Today

courses.title: The Popcorn Principles
courses.bio: A Cinematic Approach to Novel Writing

Introduction: Principle #6: Come In Late, Leave Early
The Wrap Up (Now It's Time For Action)

requirements: No prerequisites.

Whether you're penning your debut novel or polishing off your tenth literary work, the world of movie storytelling offers ideas that can enhance your writing abilities. Just as filmmakers use visuals, audio, and pacing to draw viewers into their stories, writers can apply cinematic techniques to craft engaging narratives that linger with readers.
courses.description:
In this unique online course, novelist and filmmaker John Gaspard shares his "Popcorn Principles" - practical storytelling techniques adapted from the world of filmmaking that can elevate your novel writing skills.
Through concise video modules, you'll learn how to recognize and apply cinematic storytelling principles from popular and acclaimed movies across all phases - pre-production, production, post-production, and distribution. Despite the different media, novels and films significantly overlap in how they engage audiences through compelling narratives.
The course covers 6 core principles that will help you create stronger stories with sharper dialogue and deeper emotional resonance:
1) Stop Getting Ready and Just Do It - Overcome procrastination by adopting a "just start writing" mindset, like iconic filmmakers.
2) Read, Write, Repeat - Understand the paramount importance of reading extensively in your genre while continually writing.
3) Exploit the Unique - Tap into your unique life experiences and perspectives as fertile creative material.
4) Stay in Your Lane - Adhere to the conventions of your chosen genre from beginning to end.
5) You Gotta Be Committed - Fully embrace your genre without apology for maximum audience engagement.
6) Come In Late, Leave Early - Improve scenes by finding the perfect time to enter, and the ideal time to exit.
Through examples from famous films and filmmakers, writing exercises, and Gaspard's own storytelling insights from his careers in both media, you'll gain a powerful "cinematic lens" for elevating your novel writing process. Unlock new methods for novel writing inspired by the movies you love in The Popcorn Principles.
This course is designed for writers at any stage on their journey.
No special hardware or software is needed for this course. You will incorporate the tips you learn into your existing writing process.
target_audience: Aspiring and established novelists/fiction writers
Creative writing students and instructors
Storytellers and narrative designers across various media (film, TV, games, etc.)
Filmmakers and screenwriters looking for fresh perspectives on storytelling

courses.description:
The Goal setting Mastery course is a step by step practical guide on not only setting goals that line up with your purpose in life but also a step by step process of achieving these goals.
Who needs this goal setting course?
This course is designed for anyone who is looking to get unstuck in life and for anyone who wants to achieve their goals and needs a practical step by step guide on how to.
Have you ever set goals but never seem to achieve them?
Do you ever get the feeling that you don’t get time to work on your goals? Or you feel overwhelmed and caught up in the daily routine of life that never accommodates for your goals? Ever wondered why successful people out there always seem to achieve whatever they put their mind to.
This course is designed to specifically to address all those concerns. It is a step by step practical guide that not only helps you identify what you want out of life, but teaches you a practical approach on how to do it through a comprehensive goal setting process.
What exactly is taught in this goal setting course?
I will be teaching you a specific technique known as the MAAP technique. This technique utilizes 4 key components that are needed for you to reach your dreams, desires and goals. The course takes you through each of these aspects in detail. It has been designed through years of studying successful people that have set goals and have achieved them.  This technique will begin to yield results in as little as 30 days whereby you will see good progression towards each of the goals that you have set.
MAAP is an abbreviated form which stands for Mindset, Awareness, Action & Planning. Not only will I cover each of these aspects in detail, but each section will be accompanied by a workbook which contains practical exercises that I will work through with you. Each aspect will be related to the goal setting process gearing you for success in life.
What will students gain after this goal setting course?
By the end of the course you will be able to not only get clear direction on what you want out of life but also set SMARTER goals accompanied by a specified action plan that will be incorporated into a planned daily routine.
The ideal student for this course is anyone who feels stuck in life and does not know how to achieve their dreams and goals. It’s for anyone that wants to escape the monotony of life and wants to take their life to the next level. In the course, I will take you through how I achieved my goals despite experiencing massive adversity and essentially being an economic refugee.
They are no requirements for this course, just an open mind and a will to win in life!
Feel free to go through the course description as well as some of the free videos that I have posted. If you feel that this course is for you then go ahead and enroll.  I look forward to seeing you inside!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to achieve their goals but doesn't know how
Anyone who feels stuck in life and needs a step by step path on the getting unstuck
Anyone wanting to take their life to the next level

courses.title: 40 Days of Focus to Improve Productivity and Goal Setting
courses.bio: Daily motivation and direction to reach any goal.
objectives: Learn how to create motivation instead of waiting for it to strike using the MOTIVation Matrix.
Discover the best way to gain and keep momentum for the long term.
Receive a daily dose of encouragement and direction.
requirements: There are no prerequisites to the course.
courses.description:
This course will help you become more productive and reach more goals. Can you stick with it for 40 days? I know you can!
Goal setting is easy taking the daily action is the hard part.
There are
two
obstacles that are likely preventing you from being a massive action-taker right now: A lack of clarity, and a lack of motivation.
That's it!
Here's why clarity and motivation matter:
A confused mind always says
no
! If what you need to do each day isn't clear and and understandable to you, your brain is going to create resistance to taking action (you experience a similar restrictive reaction when you're blindfolded and asked to move - it's a form of what is often called '
fear of the unknown
').
Without clear reasons WHY you need to take action, you often find yourself without the fuel and motivation for taking action!
Without clarity about what you need to do, and reasons for doing them, your mind easily wanders, and your heart lacks any kind of motivation for taking meaningful action. As a result, distractions and procrastination take over and your ability to produce significant results becomes a fraction of your potential.
FLIP THE ACTION SWITCH IN YOUR HEAD FROM 'NO' TO 'YES'
No longer will overwhelmingly big tasks paralyze you from taking little to no action. Use 40 Days of Focus to break these monsters into smaller, bite-sized pieces you WANT to eat!
LAUGH AT PROCRASTINATION
Take any task you've been putting off, give yourself 30 minutes to get it done, start your timer, and watch what happens. This simple process creates a 'virtual' space in your brain for that task that you feel unexplainably compelled to fill with its completion!
SHARPEN YOUR FOCUS
Using 40 Days of Focus daily helps you get into the habit of eliminating productivity-killing distractions so you focus your concentration and energy on the task-at-hand.
BUILD UNSTOPPABLE MOMENTUM
With each task you complete using 40 Days of Focus, you build up a momentum that propels you to not only get even more done, but get it done faster and more efficiently than ever!
CONTROL YOUR TIME INSTEAD OF IT CONTROLLING YOU
Using 40 Days of Focus helps to become more aware of how and where you spend your time each day. As you become more aware of your habits, you easily discover ways to use your time more productively, and eliminate previously hidden time-wasters.
MAKE TIME FOR YOUR DREAMS
Are you neglecting your dreams and letting everything else gobble up your limited time, energy, and resources? Use 40 Days of Focus to
make
time every day to take even a little action to move you closer to things you want in life!
SMASH THOSE NAGGING SMALL GOAL SETTING TASKS WITH A SLEDGEHAMMER
You know the kind; they're important, and they need to be done, but they're small and you never seem to find time get them done and cross them off your list. Use 40 Days of Focus, set aside a measly 30 minutes, and don't just whittle away at your list - smash it to pieces!
LIMIT YOUR INTAKE OF 'TIME-SNACKS'
Quit checking email, twittering, and updating your Facebook page mindlessly, with no regard for how it's eating-away at your time, then feeling guilty about it all later. Use 40 Days of Focus to 'allow' yourself a specific amount time to enjoy it as much as you want.
I look forward to you taking this course, getting focused, defeating procrastination, setting goals you can wait to reach, and increasing your productivity by getting more done in less time.
Success is NOT an Accident!
Paul
