The B.A.T.H. is an acronym that stand for seeing BEYOND, being AWARE, the TRAJECTORY, and HARNESSING the NUMBERS Around you.
This course is only the "tip of the iceberg" compared to the complete 8 hour Raw & Uncut course. The full course is fused with an old school way of teaching.
This course will demonstrate how to interpret numbers 1-9, 11, and 22 in a simple, wholistik, and inspirational way.
requirements: It's required to know a little about numerology and its basic application.
courses.description:
Numerovation is a hybrid form of motivational practices and tools with the ancient, occult science of numerology. In this course on numbers, you’ll be using the B.A.T.H. Method, which is an acronym that stands for Be & Beyond, Aware & Around, Track & Trajectory, Hearing & Harnessing. What makes this course different from any other numerology courses you may have taken is it's taught in a fusion of digital and analog: PowerPoint mixed with old-school, blackboard lessons. You'll learn how to interpret numbers 1-9, 11, and 22 in a simple, holistic, and inspirational way that allows you to Be Aware while Tracking and Harnessing your numerical vibrations and those around you.
Numerovation will use various methods of numerology from Chaldean, Pythagorean, Tarot, Synchronistic, and Cosmic to provide simple motivating interpretations that give you basic guidance. In this course, you’ll receive a holistic and inspirational way of using numbers to help you recognize the importance of thinking on a High Vibratory level, which can possibly help manage any Lower Vibratory thoughts that may arise.
This course is not to explain elaborate meanings of numbers and where they may be positioned in your Numerscope. Instead, it provides a basic understanding that even a child can follow, and learn, the meanings of numbers from a simple point of view.
target_audience: This course is for beginners who have an open mind and will like to learn how to apply the numbers connected to themselves (i.e., birthday and name) in a motivating way.

courses.description:
Only AZ-305 : Azure Architect Design course that you need. The AZ-305: Designing Microsoft Azure Infrastructure Solutions certification course is designed for professionals who aspire to become expert cloud architects, capable of creating secure, scalable, and reliable solutions on Microsoft Azure. This course goes beyond foundational knowledge and focuses on advanced architectural principles, enabling you to translate business requirements into technical designs. By mastering these skills, participants position themselves as strategic decision-makers who can design innovative cloud solutions tailored to the needs of modern enterprises.
The AZ-305 course emphasizes the role of an Azure Solutions Architect in aligning business objectives with cloud technologies. You will be guided through the process of analyzing business goals, assessing existing infrastructure, and identifying technical requirements. The course provides comprehensive knowledge in areas such as designing identity and governance strategies, creating data storage solutions, and planning infrastructure deployments. You will also gain insights into architecting solutions that are resilient, cost-optimized, and highly available, which are critical attributes in today’s digital-first landscape.

courses.title: Nie wieder Motivations-Probleme - Ziele easy erreichen
courses.bio: Mit dem richtigen Mindset und neuen Techniken grenzenlose Motivation erreichen
objectives: die perfekten Tools zu nutzen
mit Leichtigkeit Ihre Ziele zu erreichen
tägliche anwendbare Techniken beherschen
sich ganz neue Ziele zu setzen
Grenzen zu sprengen
requirements: Sie müssen wirklich wollen
Sie wollen spielerisch das nächste Level im Leben erreichen
Sie müssen Verantwortung für sich übernehmen
courses.description:
Viele Angebote im Bereich der Motivationsförderung versprechen schnelle Erfolge, doch oft stellt sich heraus, dass die anfängliche Begeisterung rasch nachlässt. Der Grund hierfür liegt tiefer als nur an der Oberfläche unserer bewussten Anstrengungen; er wurzelt in unserem Mindset, unserer inneren Einstellung und den Prägungen unseres Unterbewusstseins. Diese tief verankerten Muster lassen sich nicht über Nacht umwandeln, was erklärt, warum herkömmliche Methoden oft nur kurzfristige Impulse liefern.
Der hier vorgestellte Kurs unterscheidet sich grundlegend von herkömmlichen Ansätzen, indem er nicht nur auf oberflächliche Techniken setzt, sondern tiefgreifende mentale Prozesse anregt und nutzt. Durch die Anwendung bewährter Methoden aus dem Neurolinguistischen Programmieren (NLP) und der Hypnose zielt dieser Kurs darauf ab, Ihr Unterbewusstsein nachhaltig auf Erfolg zu programmieren. Es geht hierbei nicht um leere Versprechungen oder unkonkrete Motivationsphrasen, sondern um die Vermittlung und Anwendung echter, wissenschaftlich fundierter Techniken, die eine tiefgreifende und dauerhafte Veränderung bewirken können.
Ein besonderes Highlight dieses Kurses ist der 7-Stufen-Plan, der Ihnen nicht nur theoretisches Wissen vermittelt, sondern auch praktische Anwendungen in Form von Hypnose und dem Einsatz virtueller Maschinen bietet. Diese Elemente sind darauf ausgerichtet, Sie aus Ihrer Komfortzone herauszuführen und Ihnen zu ermöglichen, auf ein völlig neues Niveau des persönlichen Erfolgs und der Selbstverwirklichung zu gelangen. Die Möglichkeiten, die sich durch die Nutzung dieser Techniken eröffnen, sind beeindruckend und werden von vielen Menschen noch nicht vollständig ausgeschöpft.
Henning Glaser, ein erfahrener NLP Master und Hypnose-Coach, leitet diesen Kurs. Er richtet sich an all jene, die bereit sind, aktiv an sich zu arbeiten und ihre Ziele nicht nur zu erreichen, sondern diese mit einer bisher ungekannten Leichtigkeit zu übertreffen. Dieser Kurs stellt eine einzigartige Gelegenheit dar, persönliche Grenzen zu überwinden und ein neues Level an Erfolg und Zufriedenheit zu erreichen.
Es ist jedoch wichtig zu betonen, dass dieser Kurs nicht für Personen mit psychischen Erkrankungen geeignet ist und aus Sicherheitsgründen nicht während des Autofahrens gehört werden sollte.
Nach Abschluss dieses Kurses werden Sie nicht nur mit den effektivsten Werkzeugen für Ihren persönlichen und beruflichen Erfolg ausgestattet sein, sondern auch die Fähigkeit besitzen, diese Werkzeuge gezielt und erfolgreich einzusetzen. Sie werden zurückblicken und sich wünschen, diesen Schritt bereits viel früher gegangen zu sein.
target_audience: jeder der mit einfachen Mitteln sein Leben optimieren möchte
jeder der die neusten Erkenntnisse in der Unterbewusstseins-Forschung kennen lernen möchte
Bitte nicht belegen, wenn Sie psychische Probleme haben
Auf keinen Fall im Auto anhören

courses.title: التحرر من مشاعر الاكتئاب
courses.bio: كيف تساعد نفسك و الاخرين في التعامل مع مشاعر الإكتئاب :جلسات تدريبية تفاعلية عميقة غنية بالمعلومات و المهارات
objectives: ما هو "الاكتئاب" وكيف يتم تشخيصه
تعرف على ما يحدث لشخص مصاب بالاكتئاب (دماغ ، جسد ، إدراك)
فهم الأنواع المختلفة للإكتئاب
فهم كيفية التعامل عمل مع الأشخاص عند طلب المساعدة عن التخلص من الاكتئاب
اكتشاف الأدوات والإستراتيجيات التي تساعد على التعافي من مشاعر الاكتئاب
requirements: رغبة في التخلص من مشاعر الاكتئاب و مساعدة الاخرين
courses.description:
دورة تدريبية: كن لايف كوتش لإدارة الاكتئاب – كيف تساعد نفسك والآخرين
هل شعرت يومًا أن الاكتئاب قد سيطر على حياتك؟ أن لا شيء يمكن أن يحسن حالتك؟ غالبًا ما يشعر الشخص المكتئب بالعجز، ويفقد حماسه وثقته بنفسه، وأحيانًا لا يستطيع حتى طلب المساعدة بسبب فقدان الطاقة. هذا هو حال العديد من المصابين بالاكتئاب، وهو أحد أكبر التحديات التي يواجهها الأشخاص حول العالم.
هذه الدورة ليست محاضرة سطحية بل ورشة تدريبية تفاعلية عميقة، ستتعلم فيها كيفية إدارة الاكتئاب والتعامل معه بطريقة فعالة، سواء كنت تُعاني منه أو ترغب في مساعدة الآخرين في التغلب عليه.
ماذا ستتعلم في هذه الدورة؟
ما هو الاكتئاب وكيف يتم تشخيصه؟
تعلم الأسباب الرئيسية التي تؤدي إلى الاكتئاب وكيفية التعرف عليه في مراحله المختلفة.
ماذا يحدث للجسم والعقل أثناء الاكتئاب؟
فهم التأثيرات العميقة للاكتئاب على الدماغ والجسم والإدراك.
أنواع الاكتئاب
تعلم الأنواع المختلفة للاكتئاب وكيفية التعامل مع كل نوع بفعالية.
كيفية التعامل مع الأشخاص المصابين بالاكتئاب
فهم كيفية تقديم الدعم والمساعدة الفعالة للأشخاص الذين يعانون من الاكتئاب وتوجيههم نحو العلاج الصحيح.
أدوات واستراتيجيات للتعافي من الاكتئاب
استراتيجيات عملية تساعدك على التعافي من الاكتئاب بشكل طبيعي، ودون الحاجة إلى أدوية، مما يتيح لك استعادة الطاقة والإيجابية في حياتك.
التعافي بشكل طبيعي
تعلم طرق فعالة للتغلب على الاكتئاب بدون الحاجة للدواء، وتحقيق توازن أفضل في حياتك.
هذه الدورة ستمكنك من:
أن تكون قادرًا على التعامل مع الاكتئاب وفهم آثاره بشكل أعمق.
مساعدة نفسك والآخرين في التغلب على القيود التي يفرضها الاكتئاب.
تعلم استراتيجيات فعالة تساعد في إحياء الحافز الداخلي وتحقيق التوازن النفسي.
انضم إلى الدورة وابدأ في رحلة التحرر من الاكتئاب، لتعيش حياة أكثر سعادة ونجاح.

courses.title: Motivation ohne tschakka! 10 beste Tools, sich zu motivieren
courses.bio: Selbstmotivation mit dem innovativen Motivations-Code und Leitfäden und Tipps, langfristig motiviert zu bleiben
objectives: Was genau ist Motivation?
Unterschied zwischen Anfangsmotivation und Durchhaltemotivation
Was sind motivierende Gewohnheiten
Wie Selbstmotivation funktionieren kann mit 10 Methoden

Einführung: Extrinsische vs. intrinsische Motivation: Welche ist besser?
BONUS - Wlads TED-Talks: TEDx-Talk zum Thema "10 Stufen des Zuhörens"
TEDx-Talk zum Thema "Weiße Rhetorik" vs. "Schwarze Rhetorik"
TEDx Talk auf Englisch "How to find the right response within 3 seconds"

requirements: keine Voraussetzungen erforderlich.
courses.description:
Motivation ist das, was Dich zum Laufen bringt, Gewohnheiten sind das, was Dich am Laufen hält.
In diesem Motivationskurs gibt es deswegen kein Rumspringen und kein "tschakka du schaffst es"! Sondern 10 Schritte, wie Du Dich TÄGLICH selbst motivieren kannst. Damit Du mehr erreichst, mehr Energie dabei spürst und das Leben sowie die Arbeit mit Spaß und Vergnügen angehst.


In Abschnitt 1 des Kurses geht es um Folgendes:
Was ist Motivation?
Welche Arten von Motivation gibt es?
Welche Persönlichkeitstypen sind für welche Art von Motivation empfänglich?


In Abschnitt 2 verrate ich Dir die 10 „motivierenden Gewohnheiten“ für jeden Tag
Die Tipps sind anwendbar, wenn Du Arbeitnehmer(in), Selbstständige(r), Unternehmer(in) oder Studierende bist
Denn alle Menschen sind für die 10 motivierenden Gewohnheiten empfänglich!
Zu den motivierenden Gewohnheiten gibt es praktische Worksheets, mit denen Du die Tipps aus dem Kurs gleich umsetzen kannst!
Du bist neugierig, was die 10 motovierenden Gewohnheiten sind? Dann schau JETZT rein in den ausführlichen Kursplan!


Über den Trainer Wlad:
Wlad (Wladislaw Jachtchenko) ist mehrfach ausgezeichneter Experte, TOP10-Speaker in Europa und gefragter Business Coach. Auf Udemy hat er bereits knapp 30 Kurse mit über 40.000 zufriedenen Online-Studenten. In der Offline-Welt hält er Vorträge, trainiert und coacht seit 2007 Politiker, Führungskräfte und Mitarbeiter namhafter Unternehmen wie Allianz, BMW, Pro7, Westwing, 3M und viele andere. Er vermittelt seinen Kunden nicht nur Tools professioneller Rhetorik, sondern auch effektive Überzeugungstechniken, Methoden für erfolgreiches Verhandeln, professionelles Konfliktmanagement und natürlich Techniken für effektive Selbst-Motivation.
Melde Dich gleich an - und lerne, wie Du Dich effektiv und langfristig selbst motivieren kannst!
target_audience: Menschen, die lernen wollen, sich selbst zu motivieren
Menschen, die mehr über Methoden zur Selbstmotivation erfahren wollen
Menschen, die sich manchmal demotiviert fühlen
Zielgruppe: alle Menschen zwischen 5-125 Jahren, die motivierter durch's Leben gehen wollen!

courses.title: Motivation [Certificate], with Dr. Raymond Uy
courses.bio: Influences that Affect Work and Study
objectives: Motivation and Factors that Affect Work and Study
requirements: n/a
courses.description:
How would you like to understand how motivation works for you, your friends, students, family members, teammates, co-workers, etc.? And how would you like to identify what might be holding you or others back, and how to reframe the situation to get to the next level?

Before we can become motivated, or motivate others, we need to understand how to think about motivation. This course will provide a basic overview of several motivational psychology theories. The course provides various lenses through which we can look at and understand what can motivate us and what can hold us back.


Included in the overview are drive theory, conditioning theory, self-efficacy, self-determination theory, attribution theory of motivation, and flow theory. A particular emphasis is placed on expectancy-value theory, because of the wide scope of concepts that can help us identify what facilitates or inhibits our motivation.


Also included are practice scenarios, a case study, and a graphic organizer mindmap. At the conclusion of the course, you will receive a Udemy Certificate on “Motivation: Influences that Affect Work and Study.” You will also receive a special offer for four months of online individual motivation coachings, exclusive to Udemy certificate holders for this course.
target_audience: Anyone who is looking to develop a basic understanding of motivation, by learning about various psychological frameworks, to help themselves, friends, students, family members, teammates, or co-workers.

courses.title: Psychology Behind Reaching Your Fitness and Wellness Goals
courses.bio: Exercise, Nutrition, Mindset. Cognitive Traps. Tricks and tips on how to stay accountable and actually reach your goals.
objectives: Set goals in a way that will make sticking to your journey easier, using process goals rather than progress goals
Implement simple tricks to seamlessly incorporate physical activity into your life
Use psychology to make changes to your nutritional habits, changing them over time, leading to better health outcomes and reaching your fitness goals
Learn to incorporate tracking tools that will keep your motivation going, making you more likely to achieve your goals

Understanding Your REAL Fitness Goals: SMART goals and the problem with them
How to Set Goals in a Way that You’ll be Sure to Succeed
Tracking Your Progress: Tools and Apps for Monitoring Fitness Goals
Steal MY Strategy: Example of How I Track My Progress
Adjusting Your Plan Based on Progress
Nutrition: Making Your Diet Work for You: Willpower Again: Out of Sight, Out of Mind
Power of Habits when it Comes to Food
Prepare Your Meals and Snacks in Advance
Exercise: Exercise Smart not Hard: …but remember to measure your progress in many different ways. Regularly
Conclusion: Final Tips. Creating a Sustainable Healthy Lifestyle

requirements: No previous knowledge required. The only thing you need is the commitment to your health and well-being.
courses.description:
Reaching your fitness goals is not as simple as following a meal and exercise plan. Over 95% of people end up gaining the weight back after the initial weight loss. The typical problem faced by countless people is the waning of motivation.


The answer to reaching your fitness and wellness goals lies in cognitive and behavioural psychology. By understanding how your mind works and applying that knowledge specifically to exercise and nutrition, you can finally make changes that will last, leading to your fitness goals and a healthier, happier life.


In this course, I'll equip you with the knowledge you need. I'll also teach you some tricks and tips to implement physical activity and change your nutrition habits easily. I'll show you a convenient way of tracking your progress that will help you stay consistent on your journey.


My passion lies in helping people become the healthiest, happiest versions of themselves. I am certain that this course will set you up on your way there. Whether you are just getting started on your fitness journey or have been on it for a while, you'll learn something new here. My goal is to show you that it CAN be easy and pleasurable to change your lifestyle.
target_audience: Everyone who is passionate about fitness and wellness and wants to make healthy changes in their life. Whether you are a complete beginner to fitness or experienced in the fitness world.

courses.title: SUCCESS IN MALE-FEMALE RELATIONSHIPS: “11 GOLDEN RULES”
courses.bio: SUCCESS IN MALE-FEMALE RELATIONSHIPS
objectives: SUCCESS IN MALE-FEMALE RELATIONSHIPS
BETTER UNDERSTANDING BILATERAL RELATIONSHIPS
STEPS TO BE TAKEN TO IMPACT THE OTHER PEOPLE
BASIC WAYS TO HAVE A HAPPY AND PEACEFUL RELATIONSHIP
requirements: THERE ARE NO PREREQUISITES TO TAKE THE COURSE
courses.description:
Humans are innately social beings and need deep, meaningful relationships. This course provides invaluable insights into the evolution of human relationships and the emotional and logical aspects of relationships between men and women. It covers important topics such as the fact that first impressions can be misleading and that relationships need to be based on strong foundations. We also discuss the impact of cultural, religious, material or social status differences on relationships, the transformation of physical attraction over time, the importance of partnership and communication in modern relationships, the meaning of commitment and the ups and downs of the journey of love or affection.
“Know Yourself” (Nosce Te Ipsum) This is the first and most important rule of being successful and strong. Knowing one's own abilities is an indicator of what one can do better in the future. Your area of talent should be compatible with the profession you want. When individuals are aware of their potential, they reach the goals they want to achieve more easily. The process of self-knowledge has a complex structure that is interwoven with trial and error, observation, internal emotions and external feedback.
A person who knows himself/herself is much more likely to have a suitable spouse, a suitable job and a suitable life than others. Individuals with high self-awareness have a very high potential to make both themselves and the other party happy.
There are very few people who can accurately recognize themselves with their positive and negative aspects. As Irwin Yalom said: One must learn to look at oneself from the outside. Therefore, the key to success in male-female relationships is “knowing oneself...”
The gains you will make with this course will provide you with very important benefits in all areas of life. In addition to very important information in the course, 3 short films supported by artificial intelligence are waiting for you. The general titles of our topics are as follows:
1- Human Need for Connection
2- Chemistry and Compatibility
3- The REAL Meaning of Respect, Love, Trust and Sincerity
4- Embracing Social, Cultural and Ethnic Differences
5- The Power of Shared Experiences
6- Communication and Negotiation in Healthy Relationships
7- Commitment and Long Term Compliance
target_audience: EVERYONE

There’s no such thing as a life that involves just an unlimited number of rainbows, and smiles, and lollipops. We live in reality, and there is always room for improvement.
Most of people are living far below their potential. They know they are capable of so much more. They know that they have the raw ingredients for great success and accomplishment in this life.

The key is to use the hidden power of your subconscious mind and take control of your life.

Yet, the funny thing is, some people just seems to be able to achieve what they want in life, one after the other. And what's unfair is that they make it look so easy.

courses.title: Curso de Batismo
courses.bio: Seja muito bem vindo (a) ao curso de batismo da Igreja Ramo da Videira!

Introdução: O que impede alguém de ser batizado?

requirements: Não é necessário requisitos para este curso.
courses.description:
Apostila de Preparação para o Batismo
Igreja Ramo da Videira


Sumário
Introdução ao Curso de Batismo
Batismo no Corpo de Cristo
Batismo no Espírito Santo
Batismo nas Águas
Por que se batizar?
Para que serve o batismo nas águas?
O que impede alguém de ser batizado?
Conclusão e Oração Final


1. Introdução ao Curso de Batismo
Seja muito bem-vindo ao curso de batismo da Igreja Ramo da Videira. Este é um tempo precioso de preparação espiritual, onde você aprenderá sobre:
O batismo no Corpo de Cristo
O batismo no Espírito Santo
O batismo nas águas
Dica para os estudos: Tenha papel e caneta em mãos. Deus pode falar ao seu coração de formas únicas durante essas aulas. Anote tudo o que for importante!
Texto de reflexão:
“E conhecereis a verdade, e a verdade vos libertará.”
João 8:32


2. Batismo no Corpo de Cristo
O que é?
É o momento em que, ao crermos e confessarmos Jesus como Senhor e Salvador, somos espiritualmente integrados ao Corpo de Cristo.
Ensinamentos principais:
Esse batismo ocorre no novo nascimento.
Passamos a pertencer à família de Deus.
Tornamo-nos um com Cristo, recebendo uma nova identidade.


Textos bíblicos de apoio:
“Porque todos nós fomos batizados em um só Espírito, formando um só corpo.”
1 Coríntios 12:13
“Permanecei em mim, e eu permanecerei em vós. [...] Eu sou a videira, vós as varas.”
João 15:4-5
“Pois, quando vocês foram batizados, foram sepultados com Cristo...”
Colossenses 2:12
“Pois todos os que foram batizados em Cristo, de Cristo se revestiram.”
Gálatas 3:27


3. Batismo no Espírito Santo
O que é?

É o revestimento de poder concedido pelo Espírito Santo aos que creem, com o propósito de testemunhar com ousadia e viver uma vida cristã cheia de dons espirituais.
Características:
É uma experiência subsequente à salvação.
O falar em outras línguas é a primeira evidência.
O Espírito Santo atua como Auxiliador e nos capacita.
Textos bíblicos de apoio:
“Mas recebereis poder, ao descer sobre vós o Espírito Santo...”
Atos 1:8
“Todos ficaram cheios do Espírito Santo e começaram a falar em outras línguas...”
Atos 2:4
“Quem crer em mim, do seu interior fluirão rios de água viva...”
João 7:38-39
“Pedi, e dar-se-vos-á; buscai, e encontrareis...”
Mateus 7:7-11 (contexto de pedir o Espírito Santo)


4. Batismo nas Águas
Por que devemos nos batizar?
Porque Jesus foi batizado – e nos deixou o exemplo.
Porque é uma ordenança de Cristo – um mandamento claro do Senhor.
Porque simboliza a nossa nova vida em Cristo.
Textos bíblicos:
“Convém que assim façamos para cumprir toda a justiça.”
Mateus 3:15
“Portanto, vão e façam discípulos de todas as nações, batizando-os...”
Mateus 28:19


Para que serve o batismo nas águas?
Ato público de fé
Confirma publicamente a fé em Jesus.
Identificação com Cristo
Morte para o velho homem e ressurreição para uma nova vida.
Texto-chave:
“Fomos, pois, sepultados com ele na morte pelo batismo; para que, como Cristo foi ressuscitado dentre os mortos, assim andemos nós também em novidade de vida.”
Romanos 6:3-4


O que impede alguém de ser batizado?
Apenas uma coisa: a falta de fé.
Não é necessário “estar perfeito” ou ter uma vida 100% arrumada. O batismo é para aqueles que creram de todo o coração em Jesus.
História do eunuco – Atos 8:36-38:
“Eis aqui água; que impede que eu seja batizado? [...] Creio que Jesus Cristo é o Filho de Deus.”
Importante: Você não se limpa para tomar banho. Você entra no banho para ser limpo.
O batismo não exige perfeição — exige fé verdadeira.


5. Conclusão e Oração Final
Você agora compreende os três tipos de batismo:
Batismo no Corpo de Cristo (novo nascimento)
Batismo no Espírito Santo (revestimento de poder)
Batismo nas Águas (ato público e de obediência)


Oração:
“Senhor Jesus, eu creio em Ti. Eu creio no Teu sacrifício na cruz, creio na nova vida que tenho em Ti. Obrigado por me chamar para Te seguir. Eu quero viver em novidade de vida. Ajuda-me a obedecer Tua vontade e seguir Teu exemplo.
Em nome de Jesus, amém.”
Que o dia do seu batismo seja uma celebração — um verdadeiro divisor de águas na sua vida!
Texto final de inspiração:
“Se alguém está em Cristo, nova criatura é; as coisas velhas já passaram; eis que tudo se fez novo.”
2 Coríntios 5:17
target_audience: Pessoas que desejam compreender sobre batismo.

courses.description:
Bu kurs, psikoloji biliminin temel konularından olan ve üzerinde yüzyılı aşkın süredir onlarca deney yapılmış olan 1"motivasyon" konusunu ele almakta, günlük hayatta nasıl kullanacağımızı bize öğretmektedir. Psikoloji bilimine yakın ya da uzak olun, eğer toplum içinde yaşıyorsak, bir ailemiz varsa ve bazı sorumluluklar taşıyorsak, bu kursu almanın bize her an faydası olacaktır. Kursu takip ettiğinizde, bazen aklımıza gelmeyen bir çok hususa daha dikkatli bireyler olacağımız gerçek. Kurs, daha bilinçli, ne şekilde daha örnek olarak gösterilecek bir insan olduğumuzu öğreten ve öğrenen, daha pozitif bireyle olmamızı bize öğretiyor. Birçok psikolojik yaklaşım, deneyim ya da rahatsızlığın ön bilgilerini de içeren kurs, uzman öğretim üyeleri tarafından hazırlanıp sunulmuş, referans değerinde bir fırsattır.
Bu kurs ile ilgili olan ve bu kurstaki dersler dışında diğer bilgilerin nasıl kullanılacağına dair hususları da içeren bu kurs, zevkle izleyeceğiniz, anlaşılır ve kurs sonunda tekrar izlemek isteyeceğiniz ve not alacağınız detayları içermektedir. Bu kursa ek olarak, verilen derslerde, ayrıca, uzun yıllar boyunca uzun çalışmalarla gerçekleştirilen konuların bir özeti, anlaşılır bir dilde, anlatılmaktadır. Bu kurstaki derslerden, ilgili kurs bileşenlerinin temellerini ve bunların insan ayrıntılarıyla nasıl ilişkili olduğunu öğreneceksiniz.
Bu kurs size hayatınız boyunca bilmeniz ve ihtiyaç duymanız gereken temel bilgilerin yanı sıra hayata bakış açınızı değiştirecek bilgiler verir.
Teknolojinin sunduğu imkanlarla bu kursu istediğiniz yerde ve istediğiniz zaman bitirebilirsiniz. Bu kursun sonunda alacağınız sertifika size doğal olarak birçok kapı açacaktır. Ayrıca, bu kurstaki bilgileri uygulamanın hayatınızda birçok kapı açacağını da göz önünde bulundurmak gerekir.
Bu kurstaki derslerin etkileri elbette iş hayatınızda ve manevi konularda olumlu ve olumsuz yönleri etkileyen konuları içerir. Bu nedenle, hangi cinsiyetten, yaştan veya coğrafyadan olursanız olun, bu kurstaki bilgileri yılların bilgi birikimi ile öğrenmek artık esastır.
Bu kursta sunulan bilgiler sürekli güncellenmektedir. Alacağınız Udemy sertifikasının size hayatınızda ve kariyerinizde, kendinizi geliştirmesinin yanında çok fırsatlar sunacağını biliyoruz. Bu kurstaki bilgilerin öğretmenleriniz, akademisyenlerimiz ve uzman teknik ekibimizce sürekli olarak eklenerek derslerin arttırılması, sık aralıklarla kursunuzu kontrol etmenizi gerektirir. Ömür boyu ulaşımız olan bu kurs, bu sayede size daha güncel ve farklı yaklaşımdaki bilgileri sunmaya devam edecektir.
target_audience: Psikoloji ile ilgilenen, kişisel gelişim açısından mesafe kat etmek isteyen ve sorumluluk sahibi her birey bu kurtan istifade etmelidir.
Çevrimiçi ödev ve okumalar mevcuttur. Çevrimiçi kurslar internet erişimi gerektirir. Öğrenciler çevrimiçi çalışabilir, ancak derslere mümkün olduğunca devam etmenizi tavsiye ediyoruz.
Çevrimiçi derslere katılmak, zaman yönetimini geliştirir. Kurs, zaman yönetimini teşvik eder. Anında sınav, test ya da ödev sonuçları, çevrimiçi kursların değerlendirilmesinde faydalıdır.

Ev ödevi normal okullarda haftalar alabilir. Daha hızlı geri bildirim, öğrencilerin uyum sağlamasına yardımcı olur. Tekrarlanan Ders Materyalleri gibi olanaklar, normal örgün eğitimde yoktur. Bu kursta ise fazlasını bulacaksınız.

Normal okullardaki derslerin aksine videolar tekrarlanabilir. Video dersleri gözden geçirin. Ders videoları normal okulda ödevlere, işte perfoemansınıza ya da kişisel gelişiminizde olması gerekenin daha önce pratiğini yapmanıza gerek kalmadan gelişiminize yardımcı olur.

courses.description:
Reflexiones de Vida
Un viaje interior para comprender, sanar y evolucionar
En el ritmo acelerado de la vida moderna, muchas veces olvidamos detenernos, mirar hacia adentro y preguntarnos:
¿Estoy viviendo de forma consciente? ¿Estoy alineado con lo que realmente quiero y necesito?
"Reflexiones de Vida" es un curso creado para acompañarte en ese proceso. A través de preguntas profundas, lecturas inspiradoras, ejercicios de introspección y momentos de silencio, te invitamos a reconectar con tu esencia, sanar heridas emocionales y redescubrir tu propósito.
Este es más que un curso: es una experiencia personal de despertar y transformación.
Lo que aprenderá
Al finalizar este curso, usted será capaz de:
Practicar la autorreflexión profunda como herramienta de crecimiento personal
Aprenderás a observar tus pensamientos, emociones y decisiones con más claridad y compasión.
Identificar patrones emocionales y creencias que afectan tu bienestar
Tomarás conciencia de las historias que te cuentas y cómo estas influyen en tu presente.
Reconectar con tus valores, sueños y propósito de vida
A través de ejercicios guiados, volverás a conectar con lo que realmente te importa y te da sentido.
Aplicar hábitos de reflexión consciente en tu vida cotidiana
Integrarás prácticas simples pero poderosas para vivir con mayor equilibrio, presencia y gratitud.
Este curso es ideal para...
Personas que están atravesando un cambio o crisis y buscan orientación interior.
Quienes desean conocerse mejor, sanar emocionalmente y encontrar claridad en su camino.
Buscadores espirituales o personales que valoran la introspección y la conciencia plena.
Cualquier persona que quiera vivir con más propósito, autenticidad y paz interior.
¿Qué incluye el curso?
Módulos temáticos en video (con enfoque reflexivo y práctico)
Cuaderno de ejercicios descargable con preguntas de introspección
Audios de reflexión y meditación guiada
Acceso a una comunidad privada para compartir y acompañarse
Propuestas semanales de reflexión y escritura consciente
Tu vida merece ser comprendida, honrada y vivida con sentido.
Este es tu espacio para pausar, sentir y volver a ti.
Inscríbete ahora y comienza a transformar tu vida desde la reflexión y la conciencia.

courses.title: The Secrets of Self-Motivation: ignite your inner fuel
courses.bio: The Essential Guide that will help you go from Demotivated to Motivated
objectives: What it means to be Self-Motivated.
The Main Sources - or triggers - of motivation & how to use them deliberately.
A Specific Self-Motivation Strategy you can use, time and time again to get yourself to take action.
How to 'Value-Stack' - which allows you to amplify & raise the intensity of your motivation.
The Inner Mechanics of Motivation.
How to Become Disciplined.
Overcome Apathy.
Get yourself to take action even if you can't be bothered.
What to do when you're motivated to do all the wrong things.

The Fundamentals of Motivation: What does it mean to be Self-Motivated?
The Goal, Value, Action Self-Motivation: The GVA Self-Motivation Strategy - an Overview.
The Key Driver of Motivation: Value.
Advanced Version of the GVA Strategy.
The Finishing Line Technique - Becoming Disciplined

requirements: Students interested in Personal Development.
Students who have goals that they want to achieve.
Students who aren't as motivated as they would like to be.
Students who are motivated but want to increase their motivation & be more consistent.
Students with an interest in Psychology.
Students who want get more out of life.
Students who want overcome apathy and finally take solid, consistent action towards their goals.
courses.description:
In The Secrets to Self-Motivation, Steven Burns (Solutions in Mind) will teach you the strategies for becoming a highly self-motivated person.
If you're the kind of person who struggles to feel a sense of consistent motivation then you'll find the tools, techniques, and ideas contained within this course to be invaluable.
If you're the type of person who is already self-motivated but would like to take your levels of consistency to the next level then you'll also find great value in the training.
In this Essential Guide to Self-Motivation, you'll learn the following:


What it means to be Self-Motivated.
The Main Sources - or triggers - of motivation & how to use them, deliberately, to get yourself to take action.
A Specific Self-Motivation Strategy you can use, time and time again, to mobilise yourself.
How to become more focused.
How to 'Value-Stack' - which allows you to amplify and raise the intensity of your motivation.
The Inner Mechanics of Motivation.
How to be disciplined - motivate yourself to do things you have to do but can't be bothered with.
Self-motivation is one of the key ingredients when it comes to sustainable growth and success, so if you want to take your life to the next level, Join Steven today by enrolling and learn how to ignite your inner fuel.
target_audience: Students interested in Personal Development.
Students who have goals that they want to achieve.
Students who aren't as motivated as they would like to be.
Students who are motivated but want to increase their motivation & be more consistent.
Students with an interest in Psychology.
Students who want get more out of life.
Students who want overcome apathy and finally take solid, consistent action towards their goals.

objectives: Dla osób, które mają problem z konsekwentnym działaniem i utrzymaniem zaangażowania

Poznaj i zrozum mechanizm prokrastynacji: Co to jest prokrastynacja i kogo ona dotyczy?
Jak działa mechanizm prokrastynacji i dlaczego lenistwo to MIT
Linia działania – czy prokrastynacja może być bardziej bolesna niż działanie?
Psychologia motywacji: Prosty sposób na zaczęcie działania tu i teraz
Trening działania tu i teraz, czyli jak: Prokrastynacja to nawyk (lekcja wprowadzająca do modułu)
Stworzenie planu z użyciem metody odwróconego kalendarza i sera szwajcarskiego
Zasada 2 minut i 5 sekund w walce z odkładaniem na póź

Sekwencja 5 prostych kroków, które drastycznie podniosą Twoją efektywność w cią
Prawdopodobnie najbardziej skuteczna technika walki z prokrastynacją – symulacj
Rejestr odkładania działania – indywidualne czynniki dla których odkładasz dzia
Sposoby na wzmocnienie silnej woli do działania tu i teraz
Efektywna praca, bez odkładania na później – strategia bloków pracy, dzięki któ
Technika Pomodoro, czyli jak sprawnie realizować zadania

requirements: Pokonaj nawyk odkładania na później i zacznij działać
courses.description:
DLA KOGO JEST TEN KURS?
Dla osób, które mają problem z konsekwentnym działaniem i utrzymaniem zaangażowania
Dla osób, które chcą lepiej zaplanować swoje obowiązki zawodowe i prywatne
Dla osób, które chcą efektywniej organizować swój czas i zbudować pozytywne nawyki
CO ZYSKASZ DZIĘKI TEMU SZKOLENIU?
Dowiesz się, jak skuteczniej, krok po kroku realizować swoje cele i od czego zacząć
Nauczysz się podejmowania natychmiastowego działania, które przynosi rezultaty i wchodzi w nawyk
Poznasz sprawdzone sposoby, które pomogą Ci raz na zawsze pokonać odkładanie na później


Przykładowe tematy lekcji:


O TO JEST PROKRASTYNACJA I KOGO ONA DOTYCZY?
Dowiesz się, czym jest prokrastynacja oraz upewnisz się, czy treści w tym kursie są dla Ciebie.


JAK DZIAŁA MECHANIZM PROKRASTYNACJI I DLACZEGO LENISTWO TO MIT
Zrozumiesz jak to się dzieje, że prokrastynujemy. Opowiem o wewnętrznym konflikcie, który blokuje podjęcie działania natychmiast.


LINIA DZIAŁANIA - CZY PROKRASTYNACJA MOŻE BYĆ BARDZIEJ BOLESNA NIŻ DZIAŁANIE?
Przedstawię Ci koncepcję linii działania. Zrozumiesz kiedy najbardziej boli odkładanie na później i jak temu można zapobiec.


JAK NAPRAWDĘ DZIAŁA MOTYWACJA?
Największy MIT, który krąży w temacie motywacji jest taki, że trzeba się zmotywować, by zacząć działać


PROSTY SPOSÓB NA ZACZĘCIE DZIAŁANIA TU I TERAZ
Poznasz metodę kaizen w rozpoczynaniu działania, zrozumiesz jak dopasować działanie, które odkładasz do Twoich zasobów motywacyjnych w tej chwili.


MĄDRE PLANOWANIE NAGRODY
Jak dobrze zaplanować nagrodę, by zacząć budować nawyk działania, a nie odkładania.


STWORZENIE PLANU Z UŻYCIEM METODY ODWRÓCONEGO KALENDARZA I SERA SZWAJCARSKIEGO
Połączę pierwszą zasadę dynamiki Isaaca Newtona z metodą planowania według odwróconego harmonogramu


SIŁA NIEDOSKONAŁEGO POCZĄTKU
Wyjaśnię, dlaczego tak ważny jest niedoskonały początek.


SIŁY WSPIERAJĄCE I OSŁABIAJĄCE DZIAŁANIE
Czynniki wspierające i osłabiające działanie.


ORGANIZACJA PRZESTRZENI, CZYLI SPOSÓB NA POZBYCIE SIĘ ROZPRASZACZY
Praktyczne sposoby, dzięki którym możesz zaprojektować swoją przestrzeń wokół siebie, do efektywnych działań.


POTĘGA NATYCHMIASTOWYCH KONSEKWENCJI PRZY DZIAŁANIU TU I TERAZ
Projektowanie negatywnych konsekwencji braku działania.


STRATEGIA NA WYKORZYSTANIE POKUS NA SWOJĄ KORZYŚĆ BY DZIAŁAĆ
Istnieją pokusy, które odciągają Cię od działania? Social media, telewizor, Netflix i inne?


SEKWENCJA 5 PROSTYCH KROKÓW
Te 5 kroków sprawi, że będziesz realizować zdecydowanie więcej


PRAWDOPODOBNIE NAJBARDZIEJ SKUTECZNA TECHNIKA WALKI Z PROKRASTYNACJĄ
Symulacje mentalne to najmocniejsza strategia pracy z naszym umysłem.


REJESTR ODKŁADANIA DZIAŁANIA
Indywidualne czynniki, dla których odkładasz działanie i sposób na ich pokonanie.


KIM JESTEM?
MICHAŁ MICHALSKI
Mówca, trener biznesu, dyrektor w firmie PGB HR. Ekspert w temacie nawyków, jest autorem książki: “Jak zmienić nawyki i wzmocnić silną wolę”. Posiada wieloletnie doświadczenie w zarządzaniu organizacjami, w latach 2017-2018 pełnił funkcję prezesa SL Olimpii Poznań. Występuje jako prelegent na największych konferencjach biznesowych w Polsce.
target_audience: Dla wszystkich, którzy chcą mechanizm prokrastynacji, żeby wyeliminować ją ze swojego życia i zacząć konsekwentnie realizować cele.

courses.title: Motivation 120 % Comment développer l'auto-discipline
courses.bio: Deviens une personne disciplinée, réveille le champion qui est en TOI, augmente ta confiance et passe à l'action !
objectives: Comment développer ton autodiscipline et améliorer ta vie
Tu vas apprendre à résister à toute tentations et à mettre en place de nouvelles habitudes
Conseils pour lutter contre la procrastination
Comment renforcer la confiance en tes capacités
Savoir discipliner tes pensées et les rendre victorieuses

STOP à la procrastination: Ne plus remettre au lendemain mais agir maintenant
Affronter et surmonter ses peurs: N'aie pas peur, c'est la peur qui doit avoir peur de toi

requirements: Tu dois savoir qu'aucun cours ne changera ta vie tant que tu n'as pas mis en pratique les conseils
courses.description:
Tu souhaites enfin avoir PLUS :
de discipline dans ta vie
d'assurance
de confiance en toi
d'audace
d'impact
de motivation
de temps
de résultats
Lorsque tu as choisi au moins deux de ces phrases, alors cette formation est faite pour TOI !!
Cette formation t' aidera à passer à l'action, booster ton être intérieur, augmenter ta confiance en toi et pour atteindre tes objectifs.


Chez Max’IMUM :
Nous croyons que l’être humain a en lui un énorme potentiel.
Nous croyons que chaque individu a une mission de vie qu'il doit accomplir sur cette terre.
Nous croyons que toute personne est capable de réaliser des rêves qui lui semblent impossible.
IMPOSSIBLE ne fait pas partie de notre vocabulaire.
C’est pourquoi chez Max’IMUM les gens ordinaires deviennent des personnes extraordinaires !
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
99 % des gens ne sont pas prêts à faire ce qu’il faut.
Les Marines ont une Maxime "Tout le monde veut aller au paradis mais personne ne veut mourir."
Le cœur de toute réalisation d’un rêve est l’auto-discipline.
L'auto-discipline, c'est  reprendre le contrôle de son mental pour pouvoir choisir les actions qui sont dans notre meilleur intérêt.
L’auto-discipline est au cœur de tout succès dans nos vies.
Que tu sois riche ou pauvre …. c’est celui qui travaillera avec discipline et qui aura une mentalité de champion qui réussira.
J'aime dire, n'attends pas d'être motivé pour passer à l'action passe à l'action et tu seras motivé.
Si tu veux t'améliorer et te développer, tu vas donc devoir t'entraîner.
Si tu veux devenir un champion dans ton domaine, tu vas devoir payer le prix du sacrifice.
L’entrainement exige de la discipline. Il n’existe pas de méthode facile pour devenir une personne disciplinée.
Cela n’a rien à voir avec le talent ou l’habilité. Ce n’est pas une affaire de conditions, mais plutôt de choix.
Es-tu prêt(e) à passer à un niveau supérieur ?
Si oui, je te dis, à toute de suite.
target_audience: Le cours est adapté aux personnes qui souhaitent grandir de l'intérieur et veulent voir un changement dans leurs vies
Le cours n'est PAS destiné aux personnes qui cherchent une solution magique et qui ne sont pas prêtes à mettre en action les conseils

courses.title: Fast-Track Motivation Masterclass: Lead, Inspire & Achieve
courses.bio: Certified strategies to energize teams and elevate performance
objectives: Understand Employee Motivation – Identify key psychological theories (Maslow, Herzberg, Self-Determination Theory) and apply them to workplace settings.
Apply Practical Motivation Strategies – Design recognition programs, create purpose-driven initiatives, and personalize motivation techniques for diverse teams.
Lead with impact using storytelling, coaching, mentoring, and emotional intelligence to inspire teams and re-engage demotivated employees
Sustain Long-Term Engagement – Measure motivation using key metrics, prevent burnout, and implement a 30-60-90 day action plan to maintain high performance.

Module 4: Motivating Teams in the Modern Workplace
Module 5: Leadership and Communication Skills for Motivation

requirements: No prior knowledge of motivation theories required—just an interest in leadership and people management.
Basic understanding of workplace dynamics or team collaboration is helpful.
Willingness to learn, reflect, and apply motivation strategies in real scenarios.
Access to a computer or mobile device with internet to watch lessons and download resources.
courses.description:
Motivated employees are the backbone of every successful organization. When people feel engaged, valued, and inspired, they bring their best energy, creativity, and commitment to work. This Employee Motivation Masterclass is designed to give leaders, managers, and HR professionals practical tools and strategies to build, sustain, and elevate team motivation.
Across 7 comprehensive modules, you’ll explore both the science and practice of motivation. You’ll begin by understanding why motivation is critical for business success and debunking common myths. Then, you’ll dive into proven theories such as Maslow’s Hierarchy of Needs, Herzberg’s Two-Factor Theory, and Self-Determination Theory to discover what truly drives people.
From there, you’ll learn powerful strategies to boost motivation—recognition programs, purpose-driven leadership, personalization, and real-life case studies of highly motivated teams. You’ll also master the art of motivating in today’s modern workplace, whether remote, hybrid, or tech-driven. Leadership skills are emphasized, including storytelling, coaching, and emotional intelligence, helping you inspire through authentic communication.
To ensure lasting impact, the course covers ways to measure motivation, avoid burnout, and adapt strategies during organizational change. You’ll also gain practical, ready-to-use resources such as checklists, templates, and a 30-60-90 day action plan.
By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped to lead with confidence, foster long-term engagement, and create a culture where employees thrive and deliver exceptional results. Motivated employees are the backbone of every successful organization. When people feel engaged, valued, and inspired, they bring their best energy, creativity, and commitment to work. This Employee Motivation Masterclass is designed to give leaders, managers, and HR professionals practical tools and strategies to build, sustain, and elevate team motivation.
Across 7 comprehensive modules, you’ll explore both the science and practice of motivation. You’ll begin by understanding why motivation is critical for business success and debunking common myths. Then, you’ll dive into proven theories such as Maslow’s Hierarchy of Needs, Herzberg’s Two-Factor Theory, and Self-Determination Theory to discover what truly drives people.
From there, you’ll learn powerful strategies to boost motivation—recognition programs, purpose-driven leadership, personalization, and real-life case studies of highly motivated teams. You’ll also master the art of motivating in today’s modern workplace, whether remote, hybrid, or tech-driven. Leadership skills are emphasized, including storytelling, coaching, and emotional intelligence, helping you inspire through authentic communication.
To ensure lasting impact, the course covers ways to measure motivation, avoid burnout, and adapt strategies during organizational change. You’ll also gain practical, ready-to-use resources such as checklists, templates, and a 30-60-90 day action plan.
By the end of this course, you’ll be equipped to lead with confidence, foster long-term engagement, and create a culture where employees thrive and deliver exceptional results.
target_audience: Managers, team leaders, and supervisors who want to boost employee engagement and performance.
HR professionals and organizational development specialists seeking proven motivation strategies.
Entrepreneurs and business owners looking to build a purpose-driven, high-performing team.
Anyone aspiring to leadership roles and interested in understanding what drives people at work.

courses.title: Neuroplasticidade: Como Reconectar O Seu Cérebro
courses.bio: Como desenvolver a flexibilidade mental, mudar hábitos, e alterar memórias baseadas em pesquisas em neurociência
objectives: Entenda o conceito de neuroplasticidade e como usá-lo
Pratique uma gama completa de exercícios para estimular novas conexões neuronais
Crie novos hábitos e mude os existentes
Altere memórias para neutralizar sua carga emocional

Conclusão: BÔNUS: O que vem a seguir?

requirements: Um grande interesse em como o nosso cérebro funciona é o único pré-requisito real para este curso
Nenhum conhecimento prévio sobre o cérebro requerido
Nenhum material específico é necessário para este curso. Tomar notas é recomendado
courses.description:
A neuroplasticidade é a capacidade do cérebro se reorganizar, formando novas conexões neurais ao longo da vida.
No passado, os cientistas acreditavam que o cérebro apenas criava novas conexões na infância e na vida adulta ficaríamos apenas com essas mesmas conexões. Como dizem “não se ensina truque novo a cachorro velho”.
Mas na verdade é possível. Graças à Neuroplasticidade.
O cérebro continua criando novos neurônios e a sua capacidade de reorganizar as suas conexões se chama neuroplasticidade. Isso significa, que não importa quem sejamos, ou quem nos tornamos, nunca é tarde demais para mudar isso. Podemos aprender novas habilidades, mudar hábitos e criar novos. Podemos aprender, crescer e melhorar nossas vidas.
Apesar disso, muitas pessoas parecem presas num beco sem saída. É difícil quebrar hábitos. As mudanças requerem muito esforço. É doloroso. E nos contentamos com uma vida mediana. A vida que sonhámos não passa de isso mesmo, um sonho, porque nós desistimos.
Neste curso, quero mudar isso. Eu quero aproveitar o poder da neuroplasticidade e dar às pessoas a oportunidade de mudarem suas próprias vidas. Mais do que tudo, este curso é sobre empoderamento. Sobre como nos reconectarmos com a nossa vida de sonho e fazer essa mudança.


O que você encontrará no curso:
Esta pequena jóia trará pesquisas avançadas sobre o cérebro, desde ambientes enriquecidos até a implantação de memórias, sobre a anatomia dos hábitos. Está repleto de ferramentas concretas, para que você possa aplicar isso imediatamente em sua vida:
Mais de 30 exercícios para estimular a atividade cerebral,
Um plano detalhado para formar novos hábitos ou alterar os existentes
Uma abordagem passo a passo para neutralizar memórias dolorosas
target_audience: Qualquer pessoa interessada em Ciência do Cérebro
Quem quer desenvolver novos hábitos ou mudar os antigos
Indivíduos que procuram desenvolvimento pessoal
Pessoas que querem desenvolver sua flexibilidade mental

Comprueba lo aprendido: Lección 1 - El ciclo de la motivación

requirements: Escritura, lectura, comprensión básica, y capacidad analítica elemental.
courses.description: En este curso te ilustraré acerca de cómo funciona el ciclo de la motivación humana, y cómo sacarle el mayor partido a cada una de las etapas por las que todos pasamos. Te explicaré la importancia de ponerte metas poderosas a corto, mediano y largo plazo, así como los objetivos diarios y por sesión de estudio, y te mostraré la manera óptima de hacerlo. Te enseñaré a identificar las razones por las que estás desmotivado, y cómo convertirlas en motivadores, así como los métodos para maximizar la intensidad de tus razones para estar inspirado a avanzar. Y compartiré contigo los motivadores externos más poderosos que puedes utilizar, así como los trucos más efectivos para mantener los más altos niveles de motivación, a través de técnicas como la gamificación, que te enseña a aprender jugando, y el uso de la regla 80/20 para motivarte a través del alcance altamente acelerado de resultados.

objectives: Define Clear Goal

Know How to Stay Motivated and Inspired to Reach Your Goals

courses.description:
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
We are top Udemy instructors in the personal development category. Our courses have been taken by over 700,000+ happy students from 200 countries.
We have a thriving community in the course and we are actively involved and answer questions within 24h.
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
This course is part of a 4-part series called Quantum Leap Your Business! Search our course list for the other 3 courses: Write Epic Marketing and Sales Copy, Master Your Abundance Mindset, and Target Marketing: Find Your Tribe and Niche.
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++


Do you have a dream or a life goal that seems like it's out of your reach?
Banish your negativity and learn how to achieve your long-term goals by developing a strong foundation with this motivational course on how to reach your goals. Discover the four steps to success by knowing what you want, believing you can achieve it, creating a strong plan of action, and staying motivated along the way. Gain powerful tools that will help you complete each of these steps, and ultimately, your life goals!
4 Steps to Goal Success
1 DESIRE-Decide What You Want
When you ask most people what their goals are or what they want out of life, they often cannot answer. And when they do, the goals they say are often what others have influenced them to want. This course will help you determine what YOU really want out of life and how to make your goals achievable and inspirational.
2 BELIEVE-Know You CAN Achieve It
Many people hold themselves back from the goals they really want because they believe they cannot have their true desires. Often people don’t reach their goals, or even try, out of fear of change or failure. This course will help you find evidence from your own life that you can believe in yourself and give you the confidence to know that you have everything you need to be successful. Anything you want is possible for you.
3 PLAN-Make a Plan for Achievement
Even the most strongly desired goal cannot be achieved without a solid, actionable plan. Often, people get discouraged when goals are not reached or attempts lead to failure. This is most often because the goal wasn’t well thought through and an effective plan wasn’t made. This course offers detailed, yet simple, strategies for planning a route toward your goal, while keeping you motivated and on track.
4 MOTIVATION-Stay Motivated
Even the best plan is ineffective if the person following it isn’t motivated. And, unfortunately, most people leave motivation to chance—waiting until the moment that they need to feel motivated and finding it’s not there. This course helps you prepare your mind state in advance so that your true desire and big reason for reaching for your goals are strong enough to pull you through those times when doubt, discouragement or procrastination threaten to zap your motivation.


Course Benefits
Clearly identify goals worth striving for
Explore evidence that your dream is possible
Banish limited beliefs that hold you back
Create a solid, motivational plan
Stay accountable and committed to success
So, are you ready to transform your life and achieve your goals so that you can create the life you truly want? If so enroll now, we look forward to seeing you in the course!
Guarantee: We know you will love this course. However, we offer a no-questions-asked 30-day money-back guarantee if the course does not meet your needs for any reason.


So, who are we?
We are Joeel & Natalie Rivera, serial entrepreneurs, authors,  speakers, and educators. We have over a decade of experience in the  field of psychology and life coaching and our greatest passion is  empowering others to live life on their terms, fulfill their potential,  and embrace their greater purpose. All of our programs are designed  based on our experience in coaching, social services, psychology, and  education, as well Joeel’s Masters Degree in Counseling and research on  happiness for his dissertation for a PhD in psychology. We have over  300,000+ students from 195 countries.




Copyright ©️ Transformation Services, Inc. | All Rights Reserved

Para quem é esse treinamento?

courses.title: Motivasyon Sağlayan Hipnoz Telkinleri (Başarılı İnsan Ol)
courses.bio: Kişinin kendisini tanıma telkinleri ile başlayan süreç kişinin yeteneklerini ve içsel potansiyelini hareket telkinleri
objectives: Başarılı insanların motivasyon telkinlerini nasıl kullandığı
Başarılı insan olmak için takip edilmesi gereken yollar
Motivasyon serüveninde kendini tanıma telkinleri
Özgüven oluşturma telkinlerini öğrenme ve uygulayabilme
Hedefleri gerçekleştirmek için harekete geçiriciler telkinleri
requirements: Hipnoz Practitioner kursunu almanız bu kursu daha etkili anlamınıza olanak sağlayacaktır.
courses.description:
Kişinin kendini tanıması bu zaman diliminde yapılacak en doğru yatırımlardan biridir. Çünkü kişi kendisini tanımadıkça doğru kararlar alamaz doğru adımlar atamaz ve yeteneklerini keşfedemez. Ancak günümüzde motivasyon denilen şeyi bir çok insan ve hatta bir çok kişisel gelişim eğitmeni yanlış bilmektedir. Motivasyon süslü ve insanı harekete geçiren güzel sözlerden ibaret değildir. Motivasyon denilen bu ender harekete geçiricilerin gerçek etkisinin ortaya çıkarılması büyük çaba gerektirmektedir. Sadece çaba ile de sonuç alınmaz. Doğru yöne doğru hareket etmekte gerekmektedir.
Motivasyonun asıl etkisini görmek istiyorsanız kendinizi tanımalı, yeteneğinizi keşfetmeli ve ardından motivasyon telkinlerinizi mutlaka biliyor olmanız gerekmektedir. Peki kaç insan motivasyonu gerçek anlamda motivasyon olarak kullanmakta. Sadece başarılı insanlar kendilerini motive etme ve motivasyonun gücü ile hareket edebilmektedirler. Diğer bir çok insan ise motivasyonu küçük görüp gaz diye nitelendirmektedirler. Oysa motivasyon başarıya giden en büyük yardımcınızdır.
Peki bu motivasyondan asıl verimi nasıl alırsınız?
Motivasyonda verimi almak için öncelikle kendinizi çok iyi tanıyor olmanız gerekmektedir. Kendini tanıdıktan sonra yeteneklerinizi bilmeniz ve ardından hemen hedeflerinizi belirlemeniz gerekmektedir. İşte bu aşamadan sonra içsel özgüven ve harekete geçiricilere ihtiyacınız olacaktır. Bu aşamada motivasyon sağlayan hipnoz telkinleri sizler için en büyük destekçiniz olacaktır.
Başarılı insanlar sadece başarılı oldukları için başarılı sayılmazlar. Onlar her daim kendi motivasyonlarını oluşturacak bir mekanizmayı da çalıştırırlar. Çünkü onlar motivasyon telkinlerini kendi içsel süreçleri haline getirmiştir.
target_audience: Hipnoz

requirements: Yaşamına pozitif bir katkı sağlamak isteyen herkese açıktır.
courses.description:
Bu kursta Spiritüel birçok Meditasyonu, uygulamalı teknikler ile deneyimleyeceksiniz. Uzman Eğitmen eşliğinde yaşamınıza Pozitif bir katkı sağlayacaksınız. Kolaylaştırılmış bu teknikler ile meditasyonu yaşamınızda alışkanlık haline getireceksiniz. Spiritüel olarak adlandırılmış olması, mistik bazı konulara değinmesinden ve bu alanda farkındalık yaratılmak istenmesinden dolayıdır.


Meditasyon kişinin iç huzuru, sükûnet, değişik şuur halleri elde etmesine ve öz varlığına ulaşmasına olanak veren, zihnini denetleme teknikleri ve deneyimlerine verilen addır. Meditasyon, birçok kültürde ve dinde uygulanan manevi bir arınma tekniğidir. Meditasyon ister bir dua, ister derin, mistik bir düşünce ve bilinç durumu veya fiziksel ve psikolojik sağlık kazanma arayışı olarak yapılsın, bu başka düzeydeki gerçeklik farkındalığı kişisel olgunlaşma ve gelişim olarak tezahür eder.


Uygulamalı Spiritüel Meditasyon Eğitimi yaşamınızda şu değişiklikleri amaçlamaktadır;


- Yaşam akışını kolaylaştırmak
- Farklı meditasyon uygulamaları ile bakış açısı geliştirmek
- Pozitif bir bakış açısı elde etmek
- Yaşamda denge sağlamak
- Kişinin İç huzurunu arttırmak
- Üçüncü gözü aktifleştirmek
- Sevgi dolu bir yaşama erişmek
- Para ve Bolluk alanında blokajını ortadan kaldırmak
- İlişkideki negatif blokajları yok etmek
- Atalardan gelen bağları kesmek
- Nefes çalışması
- Taç çakrayı aktifleştirmek
- Öz değer, öz saygı konularını geliştirmek
- Evren ile iletişimi güçlendirmek, mucizelere kapı aralamak
- Fiziksel Beden sağlığına katkı sağlamak
- Hem maddi hem manevi dünyasında farkındalık yaratmak


Eğitim Meditasyona ilgili herkesin seviyesine uygun olarak hazırlanmıştır.

courses.bio: Potencializa tu inteligencia emocional.

Tristeza: La emoción reprimida: La tristeza en la era digital
Estrategia para gestionar la tristeza en niños

requirements: Deseos de aprender.
Mentalidad abierta y buena actitud.
Compromiso y deseo de mejorar en materia de educación emocional.
courses.description:
En este curso se abordarán de manera sencilla y conciencia las 6 emociones básicas tristeza, alegría, sorpresa, asco y miedo. Todos los días experimentamos diversas emociones sin embargo pocas veces nos detenemos a pensar en la función especifica de cada una de ellas, para poder desarrollar inteligencia emocional es preciso comenzar con cuestiones muy básicas como aprender a reconocer el lenguaje especifico de cada emoción para posteriormente entender nuestro pensamiento y nuestro actuar y poco a poco aprender a gestionar nuestras emociones de manera adecuada.
Este curso no solo te facilitará conocimientos básicos en materia de emociones sino que también te proporcionará una perspectiva del modo en que actualmente se gestionan las emociones a partir de la llegada y los cambios tecnológicos que han impactado directamente nuestras formas de vida.
target_audience: Para todo aquel que se interese por comprender mejor sus estados emocionales.
Aquellas personas que deseen ampliar sus conocimientos sobre Inteligencia Emocional.
Para padres de familia que deseen aprender herramientas para la gestión de emociones en niños.

courses.description:
Tembellik İle Mücadele Eğitimi: Hayatınızı Değiştirmek İçin İlk Adımı Atın!
Günlük yaşamda ertelemekten, motivasyon eksikliğinden ve verimsizlikten şikayetçi misiniz? Hedeflerinize ulaşmada zorlanıyor musunuz? İşte tam size göre bir çözüm: Tembellik ile Mücadele Eğitimi!
Bu eğitimde, tembellik alışkanlıklarınıza veda edecek ve daha üretken, enerjik ve motivasyon dolu bir hayata merhaba diyeceksiniz. Eğitim süresince uzman eğitmenlerimizin rehberliğinde, tembellik ile mücadele etme stratejilerini öğrenecek ve uygulamalı olarak pekiştireceksiniz.

Bu eğitim, hem iş hem de özel yaşamınızda daha verimli ve başarılı olmanızı sağlayacak beceriler kazandırmayı hedefliyor. Hemen kayıt olun ve tembellikten kurtulma yolculuğunuzda ilk adımı atın!
Katılımcılar, günlük, haftalık ve aylık planlama yapma yeteneklerini geliştirerek zamanlarını daha etkili kullanmayı öğrenecekler. Bu beceri, hem akademik hem de kişisel yaşamda başarıyı artıracaktır.
Eğitimimize katılmak için özel bir ön koşul veya gereksinim bulunmamaktadır. Bu, her seviyeden katılımcının kolaylıkla dahil olabileceği bir eğitimdir. İşte detaylar:
Gereksinimler ve Ön Koşullar
Hiçbir Ön Koşul Yok!
Yeni Başlayanlar İçin Uygundur: Eğitimimiz, tembellik ile mücadele etmek isteyen herkes için tasarlanmıştır. Daha önce benzer bir eğitim almış olmanıza gerek yoktur. Başlangıç seviyesinden ileri seviyeye kadar herkes katılabilir.
Özel Bir Araç veya Ekipman Gerekmez: Eğitim süresince ihtiyacınız olan tek şey, not almak için bir defter ve kalem veya dijital bir cihazdır. Bu eğitim, herkesin kolayca erişim sağlayabileceği ve katılım gösterebileceği şekilde düzenlenmiştir.
İnternet Bağlantısı: Eğitimin online yapılması durumunda, stabil bir internet bağlantısı gereklidir. Eğer eğitim yüz yüze gerçekleştirilecekse, sadece belirlenen eğitim yerinde bulunmanız yeterlidir.
Motivasyon ve Kararlılık: Tembellik ile mücadele etmek ve daha verimli bir hayata adım atmak için istekli olmanız, en önemli gereksinimdir. Bu eğitim, motivasyonunuzu artırarak hedeflerinize ulaşmanızda size rehberlik edecektir.
Bariyerleri Düşürme Fırsatı
Bu eğitim, herkesin tembellikten kurtulma ve daha verimli bir yaşama geçiş yapma fırsatına sahip olmasını hedefler. Herhangi bir ön koşul veya gereksinim olmadığı için, yeni başlayanlar için büyük bir avantaj sunuyoruz. İster öğrenci, ister profesyonel, ister ev hanımı olun; herkesin faydalanabileceği bir eğitimdir.
Hemen Başlayın! Hiçbir engel olmadan, tembellik ile mücadele etmek ve daha verimli bir hayat sürmek için ilk adımı atın. Kayıt olun ve değişimin kapılarını aralayın!

courses.description:
Positive Parenting: Child Psychology & How To Stay Positive and Be A Motivational Parent For Your Child
How To Stay Positive and Be A Motivational Parent For Your Child: Motivation 101


Welcome to our parental motivation course!
We are thrilled that you have decided to join us on this journey of growth and discovery. As parents, we all want the best for our children, but sometimes we can feel stuck or uncertain about how to support them in their growth and development. This course is designed to inspire and empower you to be the best possible parent you can be, by providing you with practical tools, strategies, and insights that can help you motivate and guide your child toward success.
Do you think is it easy to stay in a positive mood in this busy life? Let's examine some methods and find out solutions together. Boost your motivation
Do you think that you truly understand your child? Every child is an individual person. It needs some methods and effort for parents to understand children. We are going to have a look at some basic but important factors for children in getting successful lives.
Everything starts with communicating. When parents empathize with their children, they will understand their feelings very well.
We will have a look at some basic natural talents of young children that parent can support their future success in life and work. When we understand and realize these abilities, we can help our children better
Almost all children can learn if their parents provide them with the appropriate conditions for learning. In order to understand and discover which areas your child is talented in, let's experiment on different subjects and get support from professionals
Talent can come from birth, genetically, a child may be prone to sport, but it is necessary to discover which subject is suitable for our children and then we need to help them to develop
Children can easily become overwhelmed. When children get too much information, they do not understand this information easily. We need to be careful about the learning process.
After completing this course, you can start developing strong connections with your kids. You can understand the magic of supporting your children give them extreme opportunities to realize their talents.
Our goal is to help you build a strong and positive relationship with your child, based on mutual respect, trust, and support. By the end of this course, you will feel more confident, motivated, and equipped to handle the challenges of parenting and help your child reach their full potential.
Thank you
Best Regards
target_audience: This course is ideal for Parents, Early Years Teachers, Practitioners, Childminders, Home Educators and early childhood students

Ti senti demotivato o desideri una spinta costante per raggiungere i tuoi obiettivi? Life can get tough sometimes, and with all the crazy changes and challenges that are going on in the world right now, We need to prepare ourselves to not fall into the trap of survival mode. Acknowledging our feelings, taking care of ourselves, and understanding our powers are the top must-have assets we need to have in place so that we're always prepared, always thriving, and always inspiring everyone around us to thrive.

This course is for you if:

objectives: How to create an exceptional life using personal power

requirements: Open to all with a positive mindset

courses.description:
Life is similar to a train journey. Most people on the train are merely passengers; they are simply going where life is taking them. They are neither in charge of their speed, direction or final destination. If the heading of the train pleased and delighted its passengers then perhaps you could envy them.
However, the sad truth is that the vast majority of people are entirely unhappy with the direction and impetus of their life's journey. Of course, they could invest in themselves and learn to be a driver, but that would involve accepting responsibility and risk. People would rather accept mediocrity and consequently have someone else to blame.
Be the driver, not a passenger! The driver of the train is upfront occupying the best seat. They are in full control of the speed and destination of his or her life. These inspirational and rare people are responding to life, not just reacting to life. They are carving out a breathtaking journey. They are not only sitting back and waiting to see what life throws at them.
Don't think there is much difference between responding and reacting? When the doctor sees the medicine is working, he declares that the patient is responding to treatment. There is a huge difference between this and doctor reporting that you are reacting to the medicine.
‘Unstoppable University’ by renowned motivational speaker Craig Beck, is a robust route map for success, happiness, and abundance. In this life-changing book, the recipe for living an exceptional life is reverse engineered. So you can quickly and just copy the step-by-step process and make huge impacts in your own life.
Find a life your purpose
Sell your passion for cash
Live with a continuous abundance of money
Understanding the power of persistence
Why motivation & integrity go hand in hand
Experience beautiful and peaceful relationships
And much more.

requirements: No previous Experience needed, Everything you will need to know will be taught to you.
courses.description:
This course will teach you the never-before-discovered neuroscience behind why we have positive and negative emotions. Using studies on the basic neuroscience of how our conscious and subconscious processes work by professors like Dr. Bruce Lipton, I discovered the hidden neuroscience behind how it can be possible to have more unconditionally positive emotions.


Why has this not been discovered before by the millions of monks/researchers/scientists of the past? You may ask.
Because as I will mention in the course, our subconscious mind's ability to take in information and associate emotions is much faster than our ability to consciously take in information (this is obvious, but in my course I cite reliable sources/studies) this can make it extremely difficult to see what is actually happening versus what our subconscious is influencing us to feel. Also it takes a lot of will power and tolerance for suffering to continuously analyze and deconstruct your insecurities to understand them scientifically and to develop exercises based in neuroscience that will help you to feel more unconditional positive emotions.


You will learn the different types of positive and negative emotions and why they differ evolutionarily from one another, as well as, practical exercises based in neuroscience that will allow you to have much more unconditional positive emotions.


These exercises and this information has been refined to be easy to understand and use, for everyday people. I have also covered extensively the different possible troubleshooting issues people may have when trying to apply and understand these exercises and this information.


I will also disprove, in good faith, the best counter arguments to the research and science I have presented. This will leave you with with no doubts about whether this information is accurate, or if these exercises are effective.


You will walk away with a new found awareness and understanding of why you suffer and feel positive emotions, and you will have the tools to deal with the desperation, doubt and helplessness that can be caused by not understanding the neuroscience of your emotions.
target_audience: Anyone interested in the science of how to have positive emotions more unconditionally.
Anyone interested in mindfulness, meditation or other related activities.

Una formación imprescindible para descubrir cuáles son tus Valores y Objetivos para saber Qué es lo que esperas de tu vida y cómo alcanzarlo.

5 años. Retrocede cinco años atrás. ¿Crees estar allí dónde pensabas que estarías? ¿has conseguido TODO lo que ibas a lograr? ¿tienes la forma física que contabas con tener? ¿has dejado los malos hábitos atrás? ¿tienes toda la riqueza que creías conseguir?
Si no lo has logrado, a ¿qué se debe? La respuesta es más que sencilla.
Se debe a tus decisiones. A lo que has elegido para ti y para tu vida. No se trata de tu jefe, del mercado, del sector, de la crisis... eso no son más que excusas. ¿Para qué te justificas?
AHORA. Decide si tus próximos 5 años serán igual que los anteriores o si ha llegado tu momento.
Te quiero como alumno. Te quiero si te comprometes a dar el 100%. Si te responsabilizas al 100% de tu vida. Te quiero como alumno si entiendes que está es la película de tu vida. Es tu historia.
Mi valor principal es el de Compartir. Y eso es lo que estoy haciendo. Te comparto las estrategias para descubrir cuáles son tus valores, las estrategias para que sepas cuál son tus objetivos y mi perspectiva 360.
Te comparto que sepas Qué quieres y Cómo lograrlo. Un curso apasionante para que de una vez por todas te decidas por alcanzar tu mejor versión.
La decisión es tuya. Ahora si es tu momento. El momento en el que decides si te valoras a ti o si prefieres justificarte.

Başarılı bir kariyer edinmek isteyen herkes bu eğitimle birlikte hayallerini gerçekleştirebilir.
Eğitim sonrasında edinilecek farkındalıklar hayatınıza dokunacak.
Motivasyon itici bir güçtür. Her şeyi başarmak için bir itici güce ihtiyacınız vardır. Bu eğitim ile o itici gücü öğreneceğiz.
requirements: Motivasyona dair bilmeniz gereken her şeyi bu kurs ile öğreneceksiniz.
courses.description:
Motivasyon nedir ve neden ihtiyaç duyarız?
Motivasyon itici bir güçtür. Her şeyi başarmak için bir itici güce ihtiyacınız vardır, aksi takdirde hiçbir şeyi gerçekleştiremezsiniz. Bir dilek, sizi harekete geçirebilecek kadar güçlü değildir ve zayıf bir arzudur. Amaçları ve hedefleri gerçekleştirmek için yalnızca güçlü bir arzu sizleri ileriye götürebilir.
Motivasyonu sağlamak için, tam olarak ne istediğinizi bilmeniz gerekir. Hedefiniz net ve keskin olmalıdır ve getirilerini anlamalı ve farkında olmalısınız. Hedeflerinizin sıklıkla düşünülmesi ve bunun gerçekleşebileceği fikrine ikna olunması motivasyonunuzu artıracak ve bunu gerçekleştirme arzunuzu perçinleyecektir. Sık sık düşünmek ve gerçekleştirmek istediğiniz şeyin önemine ikna olmanız, motivasyonunuzu artıracak, arzunuzu güçlendirecek ve hedefinizi gerçekleştirmek için ne gerekiyorsa yapmaya istekli olacaksınız. Kısa vadeli hedeflerde motivasyonun sağlanması daha kolaydır. Uzun vadeli hedefler söz konusu olduğunda ise motivasyonu uzun süre sürdürmek her zaman mümkün olmayabiliyor.
Sizin için hazırladığımız bu eğitim modülü ile devamlılık arz eden ve sonuca ulaştıran motivasyon yetkinliği ve bilgeliği noktasında neler kazanacağınızı, motivasyonunuzu nasıl yöneteceğinizi, motivasyonunuzu kıran engellerinizi nasıl aşacağınızı teorik ve pratik bilgiler ile öğreneceksiniz. Eğitim modüllerimiz bireysel ve toplumsal olarak bilinç düzeyini yükseltmek amacıyla psikolojik ve sosyolojik boyutuyla ele alınmıştır. Tüm eğitim videolarımızı izlerken not alarak ve günlük tekrarlar ile takip etmenizi ısrarla öneririz.
Yaşam kalitenize katkıda bulunacağını düşündüğümüz diğer eğitim konularımızı da incelemenizi öneririz.  Hayattaki en büyük inşa insanın kendisidir.
target_audience: Kaliteli bir yaşam sürmek ve başarılı bir kariyer edinmek isteyen herkes bu eğitimle birlikte hayallerini gerçekleştirebilir.

objectives: ネガティブな感情と向き合い振り回されなくなる方法

ありがとうワーク イントロダクション: ありがとうワーク　はじめに
心を整えるのに苦労する3つの理由: 心を整えるのに苦労する3つの理由

requirements: 特別な知識やスキルは必要ありません。 ただ、「自分にありがとうを届けてみよう」という気持ちがあれば、それだけで準備は十分です
courses.description:
“ありがとう”で整えるセルフケアワークで
感情の揺れやストレスで疲れてしまった心を、
少しずつ、やさしく整えていきませんか？


この講座は、“ありがとうの視点”を通して、
自分の心と、やさしくつながり直す時間。

ほんとうの意味で、自分を受け入れるワーク。


今まで、私自身、心が折れそうになったことが何度もありました。
長年、自己啓発に取り組んでも、効果は一時的で──
「結局ダメだ…」と、自己否定のループに戻ってしまう。
どんなに前向きになろうとしても、
“ポジティブ”がつらく感じることもありました。


そんな中、あるとき出会ったのが【瞑想】でした。
続けていくうちに、少しずつ、物のとらえ方が変わっていったのです。
そして気づいたのは──
「自分に、ずっと厳しすぎたんだな」ということでした。
いちばん責めていたのは、自分自身だったのかもしれない。


だからこそ、無理にがんばるのではなく、
続けやすく、自分にやさしいワークを作りたいと思ったのです。


焦らず、比較せず、少しずつ。
自分を大切にする感覚を、静かに育てていく方法──
それが、「ありがとうワーク」です。


こんなふうに感じたことありませんか？
✓誰かに優しくするように、自分にも優しくしたいと思っている
✓ 感情に振り回されて、疲れてしまうことがある
✓気づけば、誰かを優先して、自分の気持ちは後回し
✓ネガティブな感情を押し込めて、我慢してしまう




もしひとつでも当てはまったなら、
この講座は、きっとあなたのお役に立てると思います。


この講座は、「ありがとう」というやさしい視点を通して、
自分にやさしくなれる感情ケアのレッスンです。
「ありがとう」の視点を、
呼吸にのせて
感じて
言葉にして
時には書いて
あなたの内側に、やさしさを少しずつ染み込ませていきます。
その結果…
ネガティブに振り回されにくくなる
自分にやさしい言葉をかけられるようになる
小さなことに幸せを感じられる
未来の不安が減り、「今ここ」に安心できる
そんな変化を感じられるようになります。


受講者様からの声
（※出典：受講者さまのレビュー・LINE・DMより／抜粋）


・「自分って思った以上によく頑張っているなあ」と素直に感じることができました」
・少し誇らしい気持ちになり、自分を認めてあげられる気がします
・気持ちが整理され、穏やかな心持ちになれたことが印象に残っています。
・初めての体験にも関わらず、とても取り組みやすい
・深い気付きや癒やしをくれた心温まる時間でした！


日常の中に、“安心”と“あたたかさ”が少しずつ戻ってくる
がんばりすぎなくても、ちゃんと進めている。
続けるたびに“自己肯定感”と“安心”が育っていきます。




５つのありがとうワークで自分を癒すレッスン
◆講座の内容
所要時間：約1時間（オンライン・動画）
内容：5つの「ありがとう」ワークを体感しながら進めるセルフケア実践
特徴：科学的根拠 × 体感 × 書くことで深める設計

【受講者限定・2大特典プレゼント】
書き込み式PDFワークブック（5ワーク収録）
感情のケアや、ありがとうの視点を深めていくための実践ワークを5種類収録。
毎回のワークが「あなた自身の気づきノート」になります。


ワークの書き方ガイド（5つの切り口と例文つき）
「どう書いたらいいかわからない…」という方も大丈夫。

この講座は、メンタルトレーナーとして数多くのクライアントの人生を好転させてきた浅川智仁によるのプログラム。
成功哲学・心理学・脳科学の知見に基づき、自分を苦しめる“思考のクセ”を見直し、前向きな行動を起こせる自分を育てるための土台づくりを行います。

courses.description:
Aggiornamento Ottobre 2025
Il corso: Il corso “Psicologia Positiva – Strategie Scientifiche per un Benessere – Come coltivare felicità, gratitudine e resilienza attraverso le ricerche della Psicologia Positiva” è stato ampliato con una nuova Sezione Pratica: Laboratorio di Psicologia Positiva, che include 7 lezioni esperienziali con esercizi guidati, allegati scaricabili e immagini dedicate.
Ora potrai trasformare i concetti appresi in pratiche quotidiane di gratitudine, gentilezza e resilienza, integrandole concretamente nella tua vita.
_____________________________________________________________________________________________________
Immagina di svegliarti ogni giorno con energia, gratitudine e un profondo senso di scopo. Di affrontare ogni sfida con resilienza e di godere di emozioni positive che arricchiscono ogni momento della tua vita. Questo corso è un viaggio alla scoperta di come trasformare queste aspirazioni in realtà attraverso le ricerche più avanzate della Psicologia Positiva.
La Psicologia Positiva non è solo un approccio teorico, ma una scienza basata su studi concreti che dimostrano come le emozioni positive, come la gioia, la gratitudine e la speranza, possano migliorare il benessere complessivo, rafforzare le relazioni e aumentare la resilienza emotiva. In questo corso, esplorerai strategie scientifiche che potrai applicare nella tua vita quotidiana per coltivare un senso profondo di felicità e soddisfazione. Scoprirai come pratiche come la gratitudine, la mindfulness e l’impostazione di obiettivi significativi possono influenzare positivamente la tua salute mentale, fisica ed emotiva.
Attraverso lezioni interattive e riflessioni guidate, apprenderai come utilizzare queste strategie per gestire lo stress, migliorare le tue relazioni e aumentare il tuo livello di felicità in modo duraturo. Ogni modulo ti offrirà strumenti pratici che potrai integrare immediatamente nella tua routine, con l’obiettivo di costruire abitudini positive e di sviluppare un mindset resiliente e orientato al benessere.
Che tu sia un professionista alla ricerca di un equilibrio tra vita privata e lavoro, una persona che desidera migliorare la propria qualità di vita o semplicemente qualcuno curioso di scoprire come vivere in modo più pieno e consapevole, questo corso è pensato per te. La Psicologia Positiva può diventare il tuo alleato per affrontare ogni sfida con forza e serenità, trasformando ogni esperienza in un’opportunità di crescita e felicità.
Inizia il tuo viaggio verso un benessere completo e scopri come le emozioni positive possono rivoluzionare la tua vita!
target_audience: Persone che desiderano migliorare il loro benessere emotivo e psicologico.

courses.description:
あなたに質問です。
あなたは、「お金」の事をどう思っていますか？
「お金」の事を、一言で表現してみましょう。


人間は、「お金」に、色んな感情をくっつけています。
主に罪悪感や無価値感などの、ネガティブな感情を
くっつけているんです。
日頃、あなたは「お金」と良い関係性を築けていますか？


「引き寄せの法則」は願望実現で有名な本ですが、
多くの人たちは無意識的に、「お金がない。お金が足りない。」
といった、自分が望まない願望を引き寄せています。
実生活で「潜在意識の書き換え」や「引き寄せの法則」を
落とし込むには、コツがあるんです！


この講座では、
初心者の方が失敗しやすいポイントを踏まえ、
潜在意識や脳のメカニズム、波動やエネルギーの正体、
自分の感情の捉え方。


更に、時間の概念、スピリチュアルな基礎知識、
人類が創られた宇宙の歴史。


潜在意識の具体的な書き換え方法や、
お金に好かれて運気を上げる方法など
大切な内容を多角的なアプローチで、
今すぐ現実を変える、実践ワークを盛り込んでいます。


＜プログラム内容＞
1.お金に対するイメージ
