courses.title: Motivation im Studium!
courses.bio: Schnell und stressfrei zum Abschluss.
objectives: Durch diesen Kurs wirst Du Deine Produktivität erhöhen und somit kürzer und stressfreier studieren.
Du wirst typische motivationsschädigende Gedanken identifizieren und wirkungsvolle Gegengedanken entwickeln.
Außerdem wirst Du verstehen, wie das schlechte Gewissen beim Aufschieben zustande kommt und dieses Wissen nutzen um moralische Konnotationen aus dem Lernprozess fern zu halten.
Darüber hinaus wirst Du Lernsituationen (z.B. Lerngruppe, Lernort, Umgang mit Medien) so formatieren, dass Deine effektive Lernzeit maximiert wird.

Einleitung: Wir kreisen gemeinsam das Thema ein.
Warum bin ich der richtige Course-Instructor für Dich?
Wie wird dieser Kurs Dein Leben verändern?
Zeitmanagement ist keine Lösung. Es ist ein Problem.
Was genau ist das Grundsymptom an dem Du leidest?
Motivationsschädigende Gedanken/Marotten: Das schlechte Gewissen ist manchmal unnötig: Aufschieben vs. Prokrastination
Wie Du mit einer miserablen Gefühlsvorhersage umgehst!
Ich bin die Kraft die alles schafft. Von wegen!
Moral Licensing - Deine Lizenz zum Sündigen.
Wie Tugendhaftigkeit zum Einfallstor für Unproduktivität wird.
Negative globale Selbstbewertungen. Verzichte auf Sie.
Ach was soll's! Warte..Irgendwas geht immer.
Kurze Reflektion: What The Hell Effect.

requirements: Offen sein für eine andere Sichtweise bezogen auf das Phänomen Prokrastination.
courses.description:
Im Gegensatz zu vielen akademischen Problemen ist das Thema dieses Kurses ganz einfach zu verstehen:
Es gibt tausende von Studierenden, die ihren Abschluss machen wollen, aber daran verzweifeln regelmäßig zu lernen.
Sie wissen was sie tun müssten und wollen unbedingt lernen. Sie schaffen es aber nicht sich regelmäßig selbst zu motivieren.
Dieses Phänomen ist mittlerweile unter dem Begriff 'Prokrastination' bekannt. Bildlich gesehen liegst Du vielleicht oft auf der Couch und verspürst den Wunsch das Studium zügig und stressfrei durchzuziehen. Aber aus unerklärlichen Gründen bist Du nicht so produktiv, wie Du es in Deiner Vorstellung gerne wärst. Deshalb plagt Dich manchmal ein schlechtes Gewissen und ein diffuses Gefühl unter Deinen Möglichkeiten zu studieren und zu leben. Hier setzt dieser Videokurs an.
Es geht darum außergewöhnliche Strategien anzuwenden, um die eigene effektive Lernzeit zu erhöhen und damit dem Phänomen 'Prokrastination' entgegenzuwirken.
Was ist die Besonderheit dieses Kurses?
Die meisten Ansätze für Verhaltensänderungen – ob es nun um eine neue Diät geht, mehr Sport zu treiben oder mehr zu lernen – leiten dazu an sich konkrete Ziele zu setzen, daraus Pläne abzuleiten und diese dann zu verfolgen.
Doch wenn es ausreichen würde zu erkennen was man erreichen möchte, dann wäre jeder Plan ein Erfolg und dieser Videokurs wäre überflüssig.  Ziel dieses Kurses ist es deshalb auch aufzuzeigen, warum solche konventionellen Strategien meist zum Scheitern verdammt sind und welche wirkungsvolleren Alternativen es gibt. Statt einen zehn-schritte Plan, werden viele psychologische Grundbegriffe und Werkzeuge thematisiert, damit Du eine faire Auseinandersetzung mit Deinen motivationsschädigenden Gedanken führen kannst.
Warum ist dieser Kurs der richtige für Dich?
Ich beschäftige mich in meiner Rolle als Dozent und Lehrer regelmäßig mit dem Phänomen "Prokrastination" und halte hierzu seit Jahren Seminare für Studierende. Mittlerweile kann ich auf dutzende Methoden zurückgreifen, die ich an mir selbst und an Studierenden erprobt habe. Hinzu kommt dass ich zahlreiche wissenschaftliche und nicht-wissenschaftliche Bücher, Ratgeber und Therapiemanuale gelesen habe. Du kannst somit sicher gehen, dass ich in diesem Kurs nicht nur auf eigene Erfahrungen zurückgreife sondern auf kollektive Erfahrungen von anderen Studierenden. Die im Videokurs beschriebenen Strategien wende ich persönlich regelmäßig an. Sie haben mein Leben im positiven Sinne dramatisch verändert.
target_audience: Dieser Kurs ist für alle Regel-Studierenden oder Fernstudierenden, die schnell und zügig studieren möchten. Ich wende mich explizit an Studierende, bei denen herkömmliche Zeitmanagement-Methoden (z.B. Wochenpläne) nicht gut funktionieren.

courses.title: Death Awareness Meditation
courses.bio: Prepare to die to live your life conscious
objectives: Students will learn how to work on decreasing the negative states of mind such as anger and attachment.
Students will learn how to cultivate positive qualities such as faith, loving-kindness, compassion, patience and wisdom.
Students will create awareness of death.
Students will connect to the power of the Nature.

The Inevitability of Death: The amount of time you have for spiritual practice is very small.
The uncertainty of the time of death: There are many causes of death
The human body is very fragile

requirements: no
courses.description: The nine guided meditations should help you to realize how important it is to work on reducing our attachments to the things of this life, such as family and friends, possessions, and our body. You will also realize how important it is to take care of our mind and inner self, as that is the only thing that will continue after death. Taking care of the mind means working on decreasing the negative state of mind such as anger and attachment, and cultivating positive qualities such as faith, loving kindness, compassion, patience, and wisdom. As more often you repeat these meditations as more closer you will come to accept death and deal with death in our daily lives. When you realize that the worst what can happen today is that you will die, and you are ready for it, then how much easier it is to deal with all the problems and obstacles which come up on this day ... it took me years to practice on a daily basis to reach a state of mind where i act very relaxed to "heavy circumstances" in daily life ... Start practicing ... A more mindful life comes from reflecting on Death. We don’t like acknowledging our own mortality, even though we are one of the few conscious beings capable of conceptualizing it. We are bestowed with foresight and intuition about our futures, yet too often we cannot bring ourselves to talk about those waning moments that await us all. Rather than ignoring the end of our journey, we should use it as a lens with which to look at life. The meaning within the journey can be heightened in realizing that our story comes to an end. We can live with greater urgency. Not urgency as in rushing, but urgency as in it can help us to be as present as possible in the NOW.
target_audience: Everybody who want to overcome the roots of all fears

courses.title: Conquering the Fear of Public Speaking
courses.bio: Get over the fear of public speaking by learning the techniques elaborated in this course.

Conquering the Fear of Public Speaking: Introduction and Tips to Overcome the Fear of Public Speaking
Two Practical Techniques to Overcome the Fear of Public Speaking
Conversation as a Technique to Overcome the Fear of Public Speaking
Audience Approval as a Technique to Overcome the Fear of Public Speaking
Feedback to Manage the Fear of Public Speaking
Four Practical tips to avoid the jitter before and during public speaking

requirements: A strong will to practice the techniques is all that you will need! If you are a speaker, I have no doubt that you already have that will!
courses.description:
Fellow Speaker,
This course is meant to teach one thing - and one thing alone. How to get over the fear of speaking in public! How to handle the anxiety that comes over when you approach the stage or stand in front of an audience. That's it.
This is a focused exposition on the various techniques one can adopt to deal with stage fear effectively. This course will not deal with, cover or elaborate on any other technique or aspect of public speaking.
The Fear of Public Speaking is real. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced speaker. Whether you have done it once or a hundred times. While the fear and anxiety never goes away, it is possible to manage the fear and reduce how long it impacts your speech.
The fear can manifest itself before getting onstage, while on stage and even during the speech. So what you need is a variety of different techniques to handle the fear at different points in the speaking experience. Techniques that will come in handy at the right times. Techniques that are simple and practical.
With conscious and constant practice, it is possible to overcome the fear of public speaking. It is possible to go from a mediocre speaker to an awesome speaker in a short amount of time. Like anything else, focused practice is at the heart of success.
I wish you good luck in your journey to become a great speaker!!!
All the very best!!!

Joseph
target_audience: Aspiring as well as experienced speakers who continue to experience anxiety before or during their speaking experience!

courses.description:
この講座では、「いかなる仕事において、やりがいを見出す」ためのジョブ・クラフティングの理論と実践技を紹介します。最初は面白かった仕事でも、マンネリ感を感じたり、時には将来に不安を感じたりもするもの。その解決の鍵は、「今より面白い仕事」を探すのではなく、「今の仕事を面白くするスキル」を習得することです。この講座を学ぶことで、今の仕事に「やりがい」を見出せることはもちろん、将来にわたって「あなたらしいキャリア」をデザインする人にもなるでしょう。また、部下や後輩の指導にも使えるメソッドですので、ぜひ活用ください。


この講座では、テキスト、ワークシートもご用意しました。
ぜひダウンロードして、ご利用ください！


＝本講座特色＝


特徴１  ジョブ・クラフティングの「理論知識」を学習した上で、
今の仕事で、より「やりがい」を創る実践方法を学習。


【学べること】

【Ⅰ】　同じ仕事でも、人によって捉え方は異なる
（１）３つの仕事観

【Ⅱ】　ジョブ・クラフティングとは
（１）ジョブ・クラフティングの定義
（２）ジョブ・クラフティングのポイント
（３）ジョブ・クラフティングが注目される理由

【Ⅲ】　ジョブ・クラフティング「３つの方法」

（１）ジョブ・クラフティング「３つの方法」
（２）「作業クラフティング」の例
（３）「人間関係クラフティング」の例
（４）「認知クラフティングの」例


【Ⅳ】「提供価値」を高めるジョブ・クラフティング

（１）人によって異なるのが、“ちゃんとする”の基準
（２）価値の４段階
〔基本価値→期待価値→願望価値→予想外価値〕
（３）相手の期待を「超える」行動とは
（４）具体的な事例紹介

【Ⅴ】「強み」を活かすジョブ・クラフティング

（１）強みの定義とは
（２）強みの簡単な見つけ方
（３）強みの活かし方
（４）具体的な事例紹介





特徴２　実践経験が豊富な講師が講義


５０冊以上のビジネス書をリリースするベストセラー著者で、
年間２００回登壇し、リピート率９割を超える人気企業講師。
講師の伊庭はリクルートでトップセールスとして数々の表彰を受け、
その後は営業部長、関連会社の代表を歴任したマネジメント経験が
豊富なたたき上げ。だからこそ、伝えられる本物のスキルを紹介。

courses.description: Vision boarding has become very popular over the years and is used by many different audiences that range from gurus, to celebrities to moms, to yogis, to students, to professionals.   It's used by a large spectrum of the population regardless of age, race, occupation etc.  It's such a simple concept and process, yet so powerful, profound and appealing! Once you've tried vision boarding, and experienced its effectiveness, you'll always want to have this practice in your life. This course will teach you how to create a powerful and effective Vision Board.  You will learn everything there is to know about Vision Boards; definition, background, history, why they work and how to create the most empowering, successful and creative one. This course is based on a profound exercise that will help you see the big picture of your life and determine what to include in your vision board.  The exercise will serve as the foundation for your vision board. courses.title: L’estime de soi
courses.bio: Confiance en soi
objectives: Définir l’estime de soi, découvrir les dimensions de l’estime de soi et faire le lien avec les besoins identitaires
Développer une bonne estime de soi, découvrir quelques clés pour une éducation favorisant une solide estime de soi
Répertorier différentes distorsions cognitives qui viennent altérer l’estime de soi, travailler en psychopédagogie avec les patients pour leur apprendre à les r
Aider le patient à s’affirmer, se connaître et agir.

L'estime de soi: Définition de l’estime de soi, trois dimensions de l’estime de soi
Facteurs renforçateurs de l’estime de soi et clés pour renforcer l'estime de soi
Les facteurs corrupteurs de l’estime de soi
Postures éducatives qui fragilisent l’estime de soi, place du thérapeute
Thérapie Restructuration Cognitive & Affirmation de soi

requirements: Aucun pré-requis.
courses.description:
Lorsque l’estime de soi est altérée, cela peut causer un manque de confiance en soi, des difficultés à s’imposer, à prendre des décisions par soi-même, à prendre du recul sur les critiques des autres.
À l’inverse une bonne estime de soi permet d’avoir une meilleure satisfaction de vie, une résistance à la manipulation, une capacité à prendre des décisions et à aller de l’avant.
Pour ces raisons, les psychologues et psychothérapeutes peuvent aider les patients à renforcer leur estime.
À travers cette formation plusieurs pistes de travail seront proposées. La formatrice vous propose une formation complète, claire et enrichissante pour votre pratique professionnelle.
Mots-clés de la formation :
-Estime de soi
-Confiance
-Sécurisation
-Regard
Le plan de cours de la formation :
-Vidéo 1 : Définition de l’estime de soi, trois dimensions de l’estime de soi
-Vidéo 2 : Identité et estime de soi
-Vidéo 3 : Caractéristiques de l’estime de soi
-Vidéo 4 : Facteurs renforçateurs de l’estime de soi et clés pour renforcer une bonne estime de soi
-Vidéo 5 : Les facteurs corrupteurs de l’estime de soi
-Vidéo 6 : Postures éducatives qui fragilisent l’estime de soi, place du thérapeute (conseils pour les psychothérapeutes)
-Vidéo 7 : Thérapie Restructuration Cognitive & Affirmation de soi
-Vidéo 8 : Restauration de l’estime de soi
La formatrice est psychologue clinicienne, formée à l'écoute rogérienne pour le suivi thérapeutique de couples en difficultés. Elle utilise l'analyse transactionnelle et systémique expérientielle ainsi que les TECC (Thérapies émotivo-cognitivo-comportementalistes) dans ses thérapies. Elle est détentrice d'un Master en Sciences psychologiques, décroché à l'UMONS (grade de grande distinction) et d'une base solide dans l'accompagnement de problématiques conjugales et de personnes souffrant de troubles du comportement alimentaire (anorexie, boulimie,...).
target_audience: Pour tous;
Pour professionnels de la santé (Psychologues, psychiatres, psychothérapeutes, psychanalystes, médecins, sexologues, infirmiers...) et autres;
Pour étudiants en santé mentale et autres domaines;

courses.title: Лень – твой лучший друг! (Часть 2)
courses.bio: Онлайн-курс Павла Кочкина о том, как побороть лень и прокрастинацию. И главное, вы поймёте, нужно ли это делать!
objectives: Поймёшь и увидишь, как работает лень, а значит, сможешь подружиться с ней!
Узнаешь, как применить в своей жизни ключевые составляющие долгосрочной мотивации!
Поработаешь над своими конкретными задачами и проектами прямо по ходу курса!
Получишь доступ к сообществу единомышленников, которые развиваются и учатся дружить с ленью, как и ты :)
requirements: Специальной подготовки/знаний не требуется.
Это вторая часть курса. Перед её просмотром рекомендуется пройти первую часть.
courses.description:
Лееень… Прокрастинация, апатия… «Завтра», «Потом», «Начну с понедельника!».
Как здорово, что среди тех, кто читает этот текст, таких людей нет! Не сомневаюсь, что ты всегда полон энергии и заряжен на работу. Ты не ждёшь выходных, чтобы отдохнуть – ведь ты полностью увлечён своим делом и кайфуешь от этого! А про лень слышал лишь от нытиков-неудачников...
НО если вдруг... Если вдруг ты понимаешь, что лень – это и про тебя тоже, то у меня есть отличная новость: ты в правильном месте и в правильное время!
Можно ли подружиться со своей ленью?
Как перестать откладывать дела на потом?
Что делать, если просто приуныл?
Как «включать» себя в моменте?
Как научиться не сливаться с долгосрочных задач?
Как понять причины своей лени и мотивации?
На все эти вопросы я подробно отвечу в ходе видеоуроков, которые содержат в себе массу примеров, историй из жизни и практик/заданий, которые тебе нередко придётся выполнять прямо в ходе уроков ;) Да-да, на курсе отдыхать не получится, однако я обещаю – будет весело, интересно и самое главное, полезно!
Кстати, этот курс состоит из 2х частей:
Часть 1. «Здесь и сейчас»  – посвящена краткосрочным задачам и как браться за них прямо сейчас, не откладывая на потом!
Часть 2. «Долгосрочная мотивация» – посвящена тому, как не сливаться с длительных проектов и задач. Как замотивировать себя вдолгую и удержаться на пути?
Запомни, лениться – это не плохо. Плохо – не знать, что с этим делать… Встретимся на курсе!
target_audience: Этот курс для тебя, если ты чувствуешь, что можешь больше и устал бороться со своей ленью.
Этот курс для тебя, если просто нет энергии или совсем приуныл...
Этот курс для тебя, если ты хочешь научиться браться за дела здесь и сейчас, не откладывая на потом!
Этот курс для тебя, если ты хочешь научиться не сливаться с длительных проектов и задач.

courses.description:
Entrepreneurship: Turn Fear into Success for Entrepreneurs
Change can happen in an instant—a moment, a week, a month, or a year. So here’s the question: Will you let fear stand between you and your success?
Fear is one of the biggest obstacles entrepreneurs face. It can freeze us, hold us back, and keep us from reaching our full potential. But what if you could harness fear, use it as fuel, and transform it into your greatest advantage?
Unlock the secret to turning fear into your greatest business advantage and start your entrepreneurial journey with confidence and clarity. This course gives you proven tools and mindset shifts to conquer fear, seize opportunities, and build the success you’ve always dreamed of—enroll now and transform your future!
If fear is stopping you from starting or growing your business, this course was designed specifically for you.
Why This Course?
Fear is natural—it’s essential for survival. But most people misunderstand it, letting it control their decisions instead of mastering it. When you learn how to face fear head-on, you open the door to new opportunities and success.
The world today is changing fast. The pandemic and economic shifts have left many people jobless or working remotely, making this a perfect time to start a side hustle or online business. E-commerce is booming, but to get started, you must first overcome fear.
Turn Fear into Opportunity
Turn Fear into Opportunity: Conquer Your Fears for Entrepreneurs is your guide to slaying the fear that holds you back, so you can embrace the exciting possibilities ahead. This course gives you practical tools and powerful mindset shifts to move forward with confidence and clarity.
Meet Your Instructors
In this course, I team up with clarity coach Rachel—a digital nomad who has faced fear around the world—while I bring years of entrepreneurial experience tackling business challenges. Together, we will guide you step-by-step on how to transform fear into your secret weapon for success.
What You’ll Learn:
How to understand and identify your fears
Tools and techniques to overcome fear
10 promising places to start an online business
How to feel empowered and limitless
How to take action and seize new opportunities
Strategies to conquer fear and build resilience
How to convert fear into success and growth
Who Is This Course For?
Are you scared to start your own business because you fear failure?
Do you hesitate to take the leap, worried you won’t succeed?
Are you ready to stop letting fear dictate your future?
If you answered “YES” to any of these, this course is your first step toward winning your entrepreneurial journey.
Ready to conquer fear and unlock your full potential?
Enroll now and join us on this transformational journey. The best opportunities—and your success—lie on the other side of fear.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn how to beat fear
Ambitious minded who want success

courses.title: Sports Psychology For Athletes and Coaches Certificate
courses.bio: Crash Course
objectives: Sports intelligence (IQ).
Recognize control and uncontrollable factors.
Types of motivation.
S.M.A.R.T goal setting.
“Laser focus”.
Mental rehearsal.
Sports psychology put into practice (demonstration).
Support systems.
And, much, much more!

Optimism: The Inner Game – Talking to the Self

requirements: No.
courses.description:
* Printable online certificate available upon completion of course*




*Instructor is a well rounded athlete who teaches both theory and demonstrates practical applications to sports psychology.




*UPDATE*: Includes lesson where I demonstrate to you in person sports psychology put into practice in "Application of sports psychology " section, full analysis and video dissection of my performance included.


Discover sports psychology like never before!


Every high profile professional athlete will tell you the mental game is just as important as the physical one.


There comes a point in every athlete's career where they reach their maximum physical capabilities and must leverage there psychology or "mental game" in order to take their craft to the next level.


Sports psychology cannot replace natural talent or practice, however, it can be used in conjunction with any training regiment to help athletes become the best possible at what they do according to their genetic potential.


Not everyone can afford to see a sport's psychologist, however, inside this course I provide the  materials, knowledge and lessons they would use in a regular session for clients who want to enhance their sport's performance.


It doesn't matter what sport you play whether football, soccer, basketball, hockey, tennis, golf, etc your craft can be developed even better with the appropriate knowledge and the right application.
The course content integrates both psychological and scientific content that will give deeper insights and help athletes become better at their craft and coaches become better trainers.


Here is scenario I want you to consider, if we had two athletes competing in the same sport who are evenly matched in talent in regards to physical capabilities, then the athlete who has developed better sports psychology would most likely come out on top and have a better advantage.


With such a considerable edge sport psychology brings to the table wouldn't it make sense to develop yours in order to become the best athlete you possibly can?


What You'll Learn


Philosophy of mastery
Sports intelligence (IQ)
Motivation
Optimism
Control and uncontrollable
Mental rehearsal
S.M.A.R.T goal setting
“Laser focus”
Importance of work ethic
Motor skills
Support systems
Mental toughness
Sports psychology demonstration put into practice ( performance analyzed)
And, much, much more!




When I was an athlete myself I can say from past personal experience the mental aspect of sports psychology is just as important as the physical conditioning one undergoes. There's an old proverbial saying " as a man thinketh, so is he". - This simply means we become what we think about. In psychology this is called a self-fulfilling prophecy.


Therefore, the importance of understanding how to appropriately leverage sport psychology and apply it to your individual circumstances in conjunction with the training you undergo in order to become the best you can possibly be at your craft, and must not be overlooked.


Whether you want to play sports in a house-league level, recreation, college, division 1, or even play professionally, sports psychology must not be neglected because it can be that extra edge you need over your competitors.


Hence, if you want that considerable edge over your competition, and learn how to appropriately apply these strategies and tactics taught inside this course to the craft of your choosing in order to leverage your sports psychology, I would recommend enrolling into this course in order to become the best athlete you can possibly be.


*UPDATE*: Includes lesson where I demonstrate to you in person sports psychology put into practice in "Application of sports psychology " section, full analysis and video dissection of my performance included.


Buy Now!
target_audience: Athletes, coaches, and personal trainers.

courses.title: Unstuck: The 3-Step Reset for When You’ve Lost Motivation
courses.bio: A simple 3-step system to regain clarity, rebuild momentum, and reset your energy when motivation disappears
objectives: Recognize the real reasons behind lost motivation and overcome guilt about feeling stuck.
Use a simple 3-step reset system to rebuild clarity, energy, and forward momentum.
Apply micro-wins and low-pressure actions to restart progress without burnout.
Create friction-free routines that support consistency even on low-energy days.

Why You’re Not Broken: You’re Not Lazy, You’re Just Stuck
How We Accidentally Burn Ourselves Out
Step 2 — Find a Micro-Win: Celebrate It Like It Matters (Because It Does)
Step 3 — Recommit to One Thing: Pick ONE Thing You Care About Right Now
The 24-Hour Rule: Just Show Up Once
Reset, Reinforced: What You Just Did (And Why It Works)
How to Stay Unstuck When Life Hits Again
Go Forward with Less Pressure, More Peace

requirements: No experience or tools needed — just a desire to feel clear, motivated, and back in motion.
courses.description:
Ever feel like your motivation just… vanished?
You’ve got goals. You care about them. But no matter how many to-do lists you make, you just can’t seem to start. The harder you try to push yourself, the more overwhelmed, frozen, or frustrated you feel. Sound familiar?
This course is built for exactly those moments — the low-energy, low-motivation, “what’s wrong with me?” kind of days.
Unstuck: The 3-Step Reset for When You’ve Lost Motivation is a short, actionable course that helps you gently reset your mindset and momentum — without pressure, guilt, or overcomplicated routines.
You don’t need willpower. You don’t need to feel inspired first. You just need a simple system that works with your energy, not against it.
Inside, you’ll learn:
Why feeling stuck isn’t a sign of laziness — and how to stop beating yourself up
How to declutter your space and your brain to create instant clarity
The power of micro-wins — and how stacking tiny actions builds serious momentum
A simple commitment method that helps you stay focused without burning out
How to repeat the reset whenever life throws you off track again
Whether you’re a freelancer, creative, student, or anyone who feels like their drive has disappeared — this course gives you the tools to get moving again, gently and sustainably.
You’ll leave with more clarity, more peace, and most importantly — the confidence to move forward, even when motivation feels miles away.
target_audience: Anyone feeling stuck, overwhelmed, or unmotivated — especially creatives, freelancers, or self-starters who want a simple reset without pressure.

courses.title: Sellado con ganache y bordes perfectos
courses.bio: La técnica que revolucionó el mundo de la decoración de pasteles
objectives: Sellar con ganache un pastel con bordes y laterales bien definidos.
Cortar, almibarar, rellenar, ganachear y forrar un pastel alto
Confeccionar un pastel prolijo rescatando la humedad de la torta y el sabor ante todo.
Alisar, pulir y otorgar un acabado muy prolijo al forrado
requirements: se necesita conocimiento básico de repostería y el material adecuado para desarrollar la técnica
courses.description:
Con este nuevo curso online, me gustaría compartir con ustedes el procedimiento que desarrollé, a través de los años, en la búsqueda de un método simple y sencillo para obtener una terminación prolija y limpia para nuestros pasteles. Con la práctica, este proceso te ayudará a conseguir bordes bien filosos y laterales extremadamente parejos.
cuando empece a ahondar en esta técnica probé muchísimos mecanismos de trabajo, fui atesorando lo que me servia y descartando aquello que no me resultaba hasta lograr así, un método propio de sellado enfocado primordialmente en rescatar el sabor sin resignar la estética.
En argentina, una gran parte del país tiene afán por los pasteles muy húmedos, de miga muy suave y con mucho relleno. Esta preferencia bien marcada por el cliente dificulta bastante la tarea de lograr acabados impecables en los trabajos ya que los pasteles se suelen abombar, pueden filtrar almíbar y perder por completo su forma cuando trabajamos bajo estas condiciones. El sellado en capas esta directamente orientado a este tipo de pasteles ya que propiciara una pared de contención que permitirá levantar pasteles doble altura sin escatimar en la humedad ni en la cantidad de relleno. A su vez optimiza muchísimo el tiempo ya que no se requiere de moldes, cinturas de contención ni demasiado tiempo de refrigeración y se puede realizar todo el procedimiento en 1. rellenar y revestir con ganache simultáneamente. cuando el objetivo es perfeccionarnos y mejorar la calidad de nuestro producto, muchas veces nos concentramos exclusivamente en técnicas decorativas y olvidamos el otro 50% del éxito, que recae sobre el sabor. es decir el pastel sera un éxito en la medida en la que apariencia y sabor estén en sintonia. por ello encontraras una cartilla de sabores para innovar y ofrecer nuevas variantes y un sinfín de posibilidades para rellenos aptos para tortas forradas que pueden permanecer hasta 72 hrs fuera de la heladera cuando las temperaturas no superen los 25°c
deseo que te sea de gran utilidad, que puedas adaptar la tecnica a tu propia comodidad y que con la practica logres obtener grandiosos resultados.
target_audience: Cualquier persona que desee expandir sus conocimientos en pasteleria.

courses.title: Mental Boost: Klar denken, besser leben
courses.bio: Erlebe positives Denken: Entfalte deine mentale Kraft und genieße mehr Lebensfreude.
objectives: sich selbst aus einem Motivationstief zu befreien
positiv zu denken
mit Optimismus ihre eigenen Ziele zu erreichen
Ziele nicht nur zu suchen, sondern auch zu setzen und zu erreichen
erfolgreich Projekte zu vollenden

Starten Sie hier: Negatives als Schlüssel für eine bessere Zukunft
Affirmationen: Wie geht das und was ist zu beachten?
Themenbereiche für Affirmationen und je 10 Beispielsätze
Andere so lassen, wie sie sind
Depression - wann wirklich Hilfe nötig ist
Wie kannst du positiv denken in Zeiten von Pandemien wie Corona?
Lektion 32: Wie kannst du positiv denken in Zeiten von Krisen, Pandemie und Co.?

requirements: Keine spezifischen Vorkenntnisse / Software erforderlich.
courses.description:
Entdecke die Kraft des positiven Denkens und verwandle dein Leben mit diesem einzigartigen Online-Video-Kurs! Negative Nachrichten sind allgegenwärtig – das ist nicht vermeidbar. Umso wichtiger ist es, deine eigene optimistische Denkweise zu entwickeln und in allen Lebensbereichen erfolgreich zu agieren.
Mein praxisnaher Kurs zeigt dir die 30 effektivsten Methoden, um trüben Gedanken und limitierenden Glaubenssätzen den Kampf anzusagen. Du lernst, wie du selbst in schwierigen Zeiten – sei es bei persönlichen Herausforderungen, in Krisensituationen oder im stressigen Alltag – echten Optimismus kultivierst und dich von oberflächlichen Versprechen abhebst.
In diesem Kurs erfährst du, wie du:
• dich selbst motivierst und deine innere Stärke aktivierst
• in jeder Situation das Positive entdeckst
• negative Gedanken in konstruktive Energie umwandelst
• den richtigen Moment erkennst, um auch negative Erfahrungen anzunehmen und daraus zu lernen
• dich durch effektives Selbstcoaching langfristig weiterentwickelst


Mein Online-Video-Kurs bieten dir persönliches, bezahlbares Coaching in sicherer und kontaktloser Form. Du entwickelst deinen eigenen mentalen Werkzeugkoffer, den du in allen Lebenslagen gezielt einsetzen kannst – und erlebst, wie sich dein Alltag nachhaltig verbessert.
Über die Autorin: Ich bin Julia Nastasi. Ich bin seit vielen Jahren als Mentalcoach tätig und habe unzähligen Menschen geholfen, das Gesetz der Anziehung und die Prinzipien des positiven Denkens erfolgreich in ihr Leben zu integrieren. Seit über 21 Jahren lebe ich in einer glücklichen Partnerschaft mit meinem Mann Alexander, mit dem ich viele Jahre ein Onlineportal für Seminare angeboten habe. Mit meiner einzigartigen Kombination aus klaren Ansagen und einfühlsamen Tipps begleite ich dich auf deinem Weg zu mehr Lebensfreude und Erfolg.
Melde dich noch heute an und übernimm die Kontrolle über dein Leben – werde die beste Version deiner selbst!
target_audience: Wer diesen Kurs belegt, sollte bereit sein, sich auf das Abenteuer des positiven Denkens einzulassen. Er sollte sich darauf einlassen, neue Techniken zu erlernen und mit Optimismus in sein Leben zu gehen.
Diesen Kurs sollte niemand belegen, der lieber jammert, als etwas zu verändern.

courses.description:
Are you tired of living a life that feels like you’re just going through the motions? Do you find yourself dreaming of more — more passion, more adventure, more meaning? You’re not alone. And you don’t need to settle.
In The Freedom Project, I’ll share the blueprint I personally used to transform my own life — from being overworked, stressed, and unfulfilled to living a life full of passion, travel, freedom, and happiness.
This isn’t just theory. These are the real-world tools, mindsets, and systems that allowed me to build businesses, travel the world, write bestselling books, and design a life I don’t need a vacation from.
You’ll learn how to:
Clarify what freedom and happiness mean to you personally — and set clear, actionable goals
Tap into the power of your subconscious mind and align it with your dreams and intentions
Apply key principles from The Secret, Law of Attraction, Jack Canfield, and other thought leaders — without the fluff
Turn inspiration into action and create real, lasting change in your career, relationships, and personal life
Bring passion, happiness, and balance into your daily life — no matter where you are starting from
This course is not about escaping your life — it’s about creating a life you truly love. You’ll discover how to break free from the routine, reduce stress, reignite your passion, and find fulfillment again.
What you'll learn
How to identify what truly matters to you and create a blueprint for your ideal life
How to use mindset shifts and practical tools to overcome obstacles and self-doubt
How to apply proven success principles drawn from personal development leaders and my own experience
How to balance work, travel, relationships, and personal happiness into one cohesive lifestyle
How to reduce stress, eliminate burnout, and design a life filled with passion, joy, and meaning
How to apply lessons from The Freedom Project book series into real-world action
Who this course is for
Anyone feeling stuck, overwhelmed, or unfulfilled and ready to make a meaningful change
Entrepreneurs, professionals, or creatives who want to integrate passion and purpose into their work and life
Readers of The Freedom Project book series who want to go deeper into the practical steps of freedom and happiness
Anyone curious about personal development, life design, and the real-world application of Law of Attraction principles

requirements: Hedefler ile yaşam başarısını bilinçli yönetmek isteyen kimseler
courses.description:
Hayat ve yaşan denilen şeyde en çok ihtiyaç duyulan şey başarılı adımlar atmaktır. Başarılı adımları atmak sanıldığı kadar kolay olmayıp doğru hedef stratejileri ve adımları ile mümkün olmaktadır. Yer yüzünde ki en büyük başarılar en iyi hedef stratejileri ile oluşturulmuştur.
Doğru hedef; zengin olanlar, iyi bir kariyer yapanlar, iyi yönetici olanlar, alanının en iyisi olanlar, başarılı öğrenci olanlar, en iyi iş adamı olanlar ve en çok kazanan kişiler hedef stratejilerine önem verirler. Bu hedef stratejileri birbirinden farklı olmakla birlikte her birinin tek bir dayanağı bulunmaktadır. Programlama çalışmalarıdır. Bu bazen bilinçli bazen bilinçsiz olarak yapılmaktadır.
NLP Destekli hedef oluşturma stratejileri sayesinde kendi hedeflerinizi oluşturmanın size ne gibi yararı olacak?
Yaşamınızda çok daha başarılı olabilecek hedefleri oluşturabileceksiniz.
Başarılarınıza daha kısa sürede ulaşabileceksiniz.
Hedeflerinizin başarısız olmasının nedenlerini anlayacaksınız.
Hedeflerinizin yaşama uyarlanmasını sağlarsınız.
Hedef oluşturma stratejileri ile hedeflerinizi gerçekleştirme adımlarını atarsınız.
İş yaşamınızda daha başarılı olursunuz.
Akademik başarınızı artırabilirsiniz.
Kurs içeriğinde:
NLP ile hedef oluşturma stratejileri
Hedef çalışmalarında insanı yaşam stratejileri
Bilinçaltı hedef sorularının kullanımı
Hedefler ve hedef oluşturma adımları
Hedefler için doğru cümle kurma
Başarılı hedeflerin mutlak özellikleri
Hedef çarkının kullanımı ve uygulamalar
Hedef çarkının gerçek yaşama uyarlanması
Hedeflerinin eksik yanlarını bulma
Hedeflerinizi daha doğru bir şekilde yönetebilir ve bu hedefler sayesinde başarınızı en kısa yoldan gerçekleştirebilirsiniz. Çünkü hedef denilen şey isteklerin zaman ile yarışmadır. Zamanı doğru yönetmek hedeflerinize daha hızlı ulaşmasını sağlayabilir. Ancak hedef stratejilerini bilmeden başarmak çok daha uzun sürecektir.

courses.bio: La danza del lenguaje: Hablar efectivo y Escucha comprometida.
objectives: Aprender a escuchar comprometidamente.

Comprender cuando la otra persona cerró su escucha.

LA BRECHA ENTRE EL HABLAR Y EL ESCUCHAR: La brecha entre el Hablar y el Escuchar
LA DIFERENCIA ENTRE OÍR Y ESCUCHAR: La diferencia entre oír y escuchar
¿CÓMO PUEDE SER QUE NO ME ENTIENDAS?: ¿Cómo puede ser que no me entiendas?
PREGUNTAS PARA CHEQUEAR LA ESCUCHA COMPR: Preguntas para chequear la escucha comprometida.

requirements: Deseo
Compromiso
courses.description:
En este curso: “¿Sabemos escuchar comprometidamente?", tendrán la posibilidad de comprender una serie de fundamentos sobre la importancia de la escucha, lo que les permitirá poder darle a la persona con la que están dialogando el valor que posee, estando ciento por ciento enfocados en ese mensaje y entablar así conversaciones significativas.
La escucha es una actitud, una aptitud y una habilidad fundamental en todos los ámbitos de nuestra vida.
Sin embargo, muchas veces, aunque sabemos de su magnitud no siempre lo hacemos bien y es porque necesitamos otorgarle predisposición, interés y tiempo a ese mensaje que nos está compartiendo la otra persona.
En muchas situaciones el otro sólo necesita que lo escuchemos, en cambio, nosotros/as acotamos, respondemos su pregunta antes de que la termine de formular, interrumpimos, prejuzgamos o directamente ni lo escuchamos porque nuestras mentes divagan por otros lugares.
Es necesario que sepamos que, según Humberto Maturana: la comunicación descansa, principalmente, no en el hablar sino en el escuchar: hablamos para ser escuchados.
El escuchar valida el hablar y le confiere sentido a lo que decimos, entonces, es el que dirige todo el proceso de la comunicación.
Si realmente le dedicamos interés y le confirmamos con indicadores verbales y no verbales a nuestro/a interlocutor/a que realmente lo/a estamos escuchando; nuestro mensaje será de apertura, respeto, de que nos importa lo que le está sucediendo, lo que piensa y lo que siente y por ende de que su persona nos importa, que lo valoramos y respetamos.
target_audience: Todas las personas que posean el deseo de establecer conversaciones profundas, en las cuales “el escuchar” ocupe el lugar activo de la conversación, validando el hablar de la misma.

courses.description:
This course is designed for teachers, educators, team leaders, managers, and human resources professionals at all levels who want to improve engagement, productivity, and overall satisfaction in classrooms and workplaces. Whether you’re guiding students or leading teams, this program provides practical strategies to enhance motivation, foster collaboration, and bring back the fun in learning and working.
In today’s fast-paced world, teachers, students, and professionals alike face increasing pressure to perform while maintaining high standards. Often, this focus on output comes at the expense of health, wellbeing, and engagement. One powerful way to restore balance and energy is through physical movement—designed not just for fitness, but as a tool to boost participation, collaboration, and overall capacity in any environment.
Course Objective:
The primary goal of this course is to integrate physical activities into classrooms and workplaces to strengthen teamwork, develop leadership skills, enhance social interaction, and cultivate a positive, productive, and motivating environment. Participants will leave equipped with practical strategies to increase engagement, improve motivation, and elevate overall performance—whether in education or professional settings.
If you like, I can also make an even punchier, marketing-friendly version that immediately grabs attention for HR and management professionals while still appealing to new teachers and educators. Do you want me to do that?


The Breakdown:
Team-Building Through Physical Activity:
Games and Challenges: Incorporate physical team-building games (e.g., relay races, obstacle courses, team sports) that promote collaboration, trust, and problem-solving.
Group Dynamics: Understanding how different personalities and skill sets can be leveraged for effective teamwork.
Leadership and Responsibility: Assigning leadership roles during activities to develop decision-making, delegation, and conflict resolution skills.
The "Glitz and Glam ":
Fun, Energetic Approach: Making physical activity enjoyable and engaging with elements like themed games or challenges, motivational music, and interactive activities.
Celebrating Achievements: Creating a "Glam" atmosphere by rewarding team achievements, fostering a sense of accomplishment, and boosting morale.
Social Interaction: Encourage participants to socialize and bond outside of their usual work environment, building relationships in a more relaxed and fun setting
Your Employees will Gain
Social Happiness and Well-Being:
Physical Health: Incorporating light exercise or wellness activities that contribute to overall physical and mental health
Mental Health: Addressing stress relief, work-life balance, and self-care through physical activities that stimulate endorphin release and promote happiness.
Stress Management: Using physical challenges to teach employees how to stay calm and focused under pressure, transferring these skills into the workplace.
The Benefits
Improving Work Environment and Engagement:
Increased Collaboration: By participating in physical activities together, employees build stronger bonds, which translates into better communication and teamwork in the office.
Motivation and Engagement: Offering hands-on learning experiences that employees can directly apply to their workday. This boosts motivation and helps them feel more connected to their company and colleagues.
Inclusive Leadership: Equip leaders with tools to inspire and engage their teams through inclusive, energizing, and supportive physical activities.
Better Group and Class Management:
Effective Communication: Strategies on how to communicate more clearly and confidently during team activities, fostering better understanding and reducing misunderstandings in the workplace.
Conflict Resolution: Learning through play and physical interaction can demonstrate new ways to resolve conflicts in the workplace by focusing on cooperation rather than competition.
Adaptability: By introducing different games and challenges, employees learn how to adapt to changing environments and expectations.
Results and Worker Satisfaction:
Stronger Team Bonds: A more connected and supportive workplace where employees feel valued and heard.
Higher Satisfaction: When employees enjoy their work environment and feel a sense of belonging, they are more likely to be productive, motivated, and satisfied with their jobs.
Retention and Performance: Greater engagement during the course leads to improved long-term results, both in terms of personal development and company performance.


Outcome of the Course:
Increased Employee Engagement: Physical activities that are fun, dynamic, and challenging improve employee engagement and morale.
Improved Leadership Skills: Leaders are more prepared to manage teams effectively and motivate individuals.
Stronger Workplace Culture: A more connected, positive, and supportive work environment is created, contributing to overall organizational success.
Greater Job Satisfaction: Employees experience a sense of well-being, achievement, and happiness, contributing to lower turnover rates and higher productivity.


By blending physical activity with leadership development and team-building, this course can elevate workplace culture and performance in a fun, engaging way!

courses.title: Inspirar 2
courses.bio: Literatura para motivar y reflexionar

Preguntas que nos responde la literatura: ¿Qué es la muerte? La respuesta de Whitman
¿Qué es la muerte? La respuesta de Lin Yutang
¿Qué pienso de mi cuerpo, de otros cuerpos?
¿Cuál es el sentido de los libros en mi vida?
Segunda tanda de preguntas que nos respo: ¿Puedo ser una luz para mí mismo y para los demás?

requirements: No se necesita ninguna experiencia previa de ninguna naturaleza, sólo se requiere desear mejorar como ser humano
courses.description: De nuevo la literatura nos ofrece sus respuestas a las grandes preguntas de la existencia, ayudándonos a reflexionar sobre asuntos que nos importan tanto como el sentido de la muerte, o porqué el sufrimiento y el dolor son parte esencial de ella, de la misma manera que la alegría o el placer. También otra vez pensaremos sobre nuestros cuerpos, esas materias a través de la cuales recibimos, apreciamos o padecemos al mundo, y claro, sobre los cuerpos de los demás, que nos acompañan a través de esta aventura que es la vida de cada uno.  Nos interrogamos sobre la posibilidad real que tenemos de ayudar a los demás y claro, también de que los demás nos puedan ayudar a nosotros y por último, y como no podía ser de otra manera, nos preguntamos sobre el sentido de los libros en nuestras vidas, y hacemos este viaje acompañados de algunos de mis escritores predilectos, como lo son Walt Whitman, Henry Miller, Lin Yutang y Oscar Wilde, al lado de ellos iremos leyendo juntos en sus obras las respuestas o las miradas que respecto a estos importantes asuntos nos ofrecen. La literatura es para mí, y confío en que pueda serlo para ti, una fuente inagotable de preguntas, inquietudes, dudas, que lejos de proporcionarnos una fórmula para entender lo que vivimos, nos entrega a cada uno el fuego vivo de su interrogación, de su indagación, y cada experiencia vertida en palabras llega hasta nosotros para darnos a cada uno lo que sólo a cada uno puede entregar. Y creo que eso es su magia, su milagro particular, poder ser algo diferente, único y personal para cada uno.
target_audience: Personas que necesitan motivación para la vida
Personas que se hacen preguntas sobre la vida
Personas que quieren mejorar como seres humanos

courses.title: Zone Mindset Training for Golf
courses.bio: Learning to Access The Zone on Demand
objectives: Understand what a Zone Mindset is in Golf and how to create it on demand. It's basically the ability to focus on a single thought, object, or point in space.
Learn what factors keep you from accessing this powerful attentional state and most importantly how to keep them from distracting your attention.
Learn what, how, and how much to practice to practice daily to develop a High-Performance Mind State in the comfort of your home or office.
Learn strategies to incorporate a Zone Mindset into your physical training at a driving range so you can play as well as you practice.
Understand the role that the fight-or-flight reflex exerts on your ability to perform under pressure or the outcome is uncertain.
Develop the ability to transform your nervous system from fight-or-flight to a High-Performance Mind State instantly

Introduction: Lesson 1: Learning to Focus on a Single Stimulus
The Power of Your Imagination: Lesson 4: The Power of Your Imagination
Lesson 6: Overcoming the Pressure to Excel

requirements: Any serious golf of any ability level, from novice to elite amateur or playing professional who wants to improve their performance or consistency
All golfers of any ability
Golfers
courses.description:
In this course, you will learn what The Zone is, what factors keep you from accessing this elevated mind state and most important, how to stop them from destroying your game.  You will learn in the comfort of your home or office, making it easy to practice daily.  This accelerates your learning process.  Once you learn how to direct your attention to a single though, object, or point in space while disregarding all other internal and external stimuli, you then take you newly developed attentional skills to the practice range where you incorporate your attentional skills into your physical practice.  The appropriate attentional skills help you develop your physical skills faster and easier.  Finally, you learn to take that long walk from the practice tee to the first tee without transforming from Dr. Jekyll into Mr. Hyde so you play as well as you practice.


While the prevailing wisdom tells us we cannot will ourselves into The Zone or force Zone-like experiences, let me let you in on a little secret.  Any golfer of any ability level, from novice to elite-level amateur or playing professional has the ability to access The Zone any time they want.  But you have to learn how to control your thoughts and your reactions to the events unfolding when you're playing.  To do that, you may have to learn how to create a single-mindedness in your attention.  Because we constantly attempt to multi-task throughout our daily lives, we rarely, if ever limit our attention to a single thought.  That is what you will learn to do in this course.
target_audience: Serious golfers who want to play their best without having to struggle or grind their way to good scores hole-after-hole and round-to-round

Accredited by the IPHM | Learn to Empower, Transform and Guide Others with Confidence
Are you ready to make a real difference in people’s lives?
Do you feel called to support others in overcoming challenges, shifting their mindset and stepping into their true potential?
Whether you're starting your journey as a coach or looking to deepen your existing skills, the Empowerment Coach Practitioner Certification offers everything you need to build a confident, ethical and transformational coaching practice.
This isn’t surface-level advice or generic life coaching. This is a comprehensive, trauma-aware, psychology-informed training that teaches you how to guide real, lasting change with clarity, compassion and confidence.
Internationally Accredited by the IPHM
This course is fully accredited by the International Practitioners of Holistic Medicine (IPHM), a globally recognised certification body.
Upon completion, you can request an IPHM-accredited certificate free of charge. This certificate adds professional credibility.
What Makes This Course Different
Many coaching courses skim the surface. This one goes deeper.
You’ll gain the tools and insight to support people through genuine transformation by helping them reconnect with themselves, move past limiting beliefs and take empowered action.
Through real-world coaching techniques, reflective practice and psychological frameworks, you will learn how to:
Hold safe and supportive coaching sessions
Help clients understand their patterns and shift their mindset
Coach with presence and confidence rather than advice or pressure
Support meaningful growth through intuitive, values-based goals
Who This Course Is For
This training is ideal for:
Aspiring coaches who want a solid, human-centred foundation
Therapists, mentors and wellness professionals looking to add coaching to their work
Space-holders, healers and personal development enthusiasts ready to turn their passion into a professional skillset
Whether your aim is to start your own business, work with clients or enhance your current role, this course equips you with everything you need to succeed.
What You’ll Learn
You’ll receive lifetime access to nine in-depth modules filled with practical knowledge, reflection tools and coaching techniques you can apply straight away.
Module 1: Foundations of Empowerment Coaching

courses.description:
When Life Knocks You Down, Do You Get Stuck—or Get Stronger?
Setbacks, obstacles, failures—they're not just possible. They're inevitable.
Unexpected problems, sabotage from others, costly mistakes, and unforeseen roadblocks will challenge you at every step. If you're not prepared, these moments can break you—shattering your confidence, slowing your progress, and making you question whether you should even keep going.
But here’s the truth: You can’t control life. You can only control how you respond.
And those who succeed—whether in business, relationships, sports, or personal growth—aren’t the ones who avoid failure. They’re the ones who know how to handle it.
This Course Will Teach You How To:
Build mental resilience so setbacks no longer shake your confidence
Develop an unshakable problem-solving mindset
Overcome unexpected obstacles without losing momentum
Handle sabotage, negativity, and external interference without getting derailed
Bounce back from failure stronger, smarter, and more determined than ever
Prevent problems where possible—and master your response when they happen
Who Is This Course For?
People who get frustrated when things don’t go as planned – If setbacks easily throw you off, this course will help you stay calm, focused, and in control.
Entrepreneurs, athletes, engineers, and problem-solvers – If your success depends on navigating challenges, these strategies will give you an edge.
Psychology and philosophy enthusiasts – If you love understanding human resilience and mental toughness, this course will take you deeper.
Leaders, parents, and role models – If others look to you for guidance, you’ll learn how to lead with strength, even in difficult moments.
Meet Your Instructor: Dan Munro
Dan Munro is a bestselling author, coach, and resilience expert. For nearly a decade, he has helped thousands of people-pleasers and self-doubters build unshakable confidence and develop the mindset needed to overcome life’s toughest challenges.
Before becoming a coach, Dan worked in rehabilitation for serious criminal offenders, guiding them through massive life changes—proving that even the most difficult circumstances can be overcome.
This course brings together everything he has learned and applied in his own life as a coach, father, husband, and mentor.
Your Resilience Journey Starts Today – At No Risk
Udemy offers a 30-day money-back guarantee, so there’s no risk in enrolling—only the risk of staying stuck.
Are you ready to face life’s challenges with confidence? Enroll now and start mastering setbacks, obstacles, and failures like a pro.

courses.description:
In a world where individuals are expected to be everything for everyone — the caregiver, the peacekeeper, the planner, the silent support system — it’s easy to lose your voice while fulfilling roles you never actively chose.
This course isn’t your typical self-help talk. It’s an honest and emotionally empowering journey through the unspoken realities of living within culturally rooted or collectivist family systems — from the “family fairytale” to redefining personal boundaries, from guilt-free self-care to building a support system that truly supports.
Told with humor, honesty, and lived wisdom, each module acts as a mirror and a gentle rebellion. A reminder that exhaustion doesn’t equal weakness — and that presence should never come at the cost of personal truth.
It’s time to stop adjusting and start showing up — fully, truthfully, and unapologetically. Because being present doesn’t mean being invisible.
So, whether you're a woman exhausted from silent endurance, a woman navigating family expectations, or a man who truly wants to understand what that endurance feels like, or a man seeking to understand the emotional and cultural burdens often placed on women, — this course invites you to unlearn, reflect, and rebuild empathy.
From newlyweds to midlife warriors, from overwhelmed parents to quiet allies — if you’ve ever thought, “I just wish someone understood…” — this space was made for you.
Not to fix us.
But to finally hear us.
And maybe, for once, to help us carry what we've carried alone for too long.

requirements: A keen interest in how our brain works is the only real prerequisite for this course
No previous knowledge about the brain required

courses.description:
This course is N°1 in its category, here on Udemy. It used to be unique. It was the first of its kind. It has been copied many times since, on this platform and elsewhere.
But this is the real deal. My expertise is in Brain Science. This is what I do for a living: sharing my passion for the brain with you. And with this course, you're in for a treat...
This course was selected as ‘one of the coolest online courses’ by 'mentalfloss' (a website with 15 million visitors in the USA)
What it will do, is let you experience neuroplasticity for yourself, from a whole set of exercises, over changing habits and even altering memories.


Neuroplasticity is the brain's ability to reorganize itself by forming new neural connections throughout life.
Not that long ago, scientists believed the brain could only create new connections during childhood and once we reached adulthood, we would basically be stuck with whatever got wired up there. You know, the good old ‘you can’t learn an old dog new tricks’.
Well, turns out you can. And it’s all about Neuroplasticity
Our brain continues to create new neurons throughout our life and the ability to reorganize our wiring is called neuroplasticity. And this has tremendous consequences. It means that, whoever we are, whatever we’ve become, it is never too late to change. We can learn new skills, we can change old habits and create new ones. We can learn, we can grow, we can improve our lives.
Still, even though we all have this capacity, most of us stay stuck in a seamless dead-end street. Habits are hard to break. Change requires too much effort. It’s too painful. And we end up settling for not even second best, but rather some average ranking down there. Our life as it could be remains a distant dream, because we gave up.
So with this course, I want to change that. I want to harness the power of neuroplasticity and give people the opportunity to take life back into their own hands. This course has a hands on approach. It's about how you can take action to use this Neuroplasticity to your advantage. How to concretely take action in your own life. More than anything else, this course is about empowerment. About how to reconnect with your dream life and start making that change.
What you'll find in the course:
This little gem will bring you cutting edge brain research, from enriched environments to implanting memories, over the anatomy of habits. It's packed with concrete tools, so you can apply this immediately in your own life:
Over 30 exercises to stimulate brain activity,
A detailed blueprint to form new habits or change existing ones
A full chapter on how to overcome procrastination
A step by step approach to neutralize painful memories
(Disclaimer: This course will not make you a superhuman, nor will it be helpful in treating brain injuries. I just wanted to make that clear)
target_audience: Anyone with an interest in Brain Science
Anyone who wants to develop new habits, or change old ones
Individuals looking for Personal Development
People who want to develop their mental flexibility

courses.title: 2025 PMP Exam Practice Mock Test Simulator (PMBOK7 & Agile)
courses.bio: Most realistic Mock test with the latest ECO! It's tailored to your style "Practice & Exam Mode" for guaranteed success!
courses.description:
Gear up for the upcoming 2025 PMP Exam Prep with our comprehensive mock simulator.
Featuring 700 meticulously crafted questions aligning with new exam format, our simulator mirrors real exam's situational focus (70-80%).
Here are two sample questions for you to consider:
An agile organization has two project teams, Team 1 and Team 2, working on different projects. Team-1 planned to complete 30 story points in an iteration, but only completed 25 story points. The value of completed features to date for Team 2 is $2.2M but the the actual costs to date for Team-2 is $2.8M
What is the SPI of Team-1 and CPI of Team-2?
A. SPI of Team-1 is 0.79 and CPI of Team-2 is 0.83
B. The team-2 is working at only 83% of the rate planned and team-1 result is only 79 cents on the dollar compared to plan
C. The team-1 is working at only 83% of the rate planned and team-2 result is only 79 cents on the dollar compared to plan
D. SPI and CPI only used in predictive project management and cannot be used in agile
Solution: C. The team-1 is working at only 83% of the rate planned and team-2 result is only 79 cents on the dollar compared to plan
Explanation: Traditional EVM metrics like schedule performance index (SPI) and cost performance index (CPI) can be easily translated into agile terms. For example, if the team planned to complete 30 story points in an iteration, but only completed 25 then the SPI is 25/30 or 0.83 (the team is working at only 83% of the rate planned). Likewise, CPI is the earned value (completed features value) to date divided by the actual costs to date or, as shown in Figure 5-6, $2.2M / $2.8M = 0.79. This means a result of only 79 cents on the dollar compared to plan (but of course this assumes that the prediction is still correct.)
Ref: Agile Practice Guide, T5.4.1 Agile Teams Measure Results - Page69
Your project team is struggling to overcome obstacles that are delaying progress. During a recent team meeting, several team members expressed frustration with unresolved issues that are outside their control. What is the most effective action you can take as a project manager to address this situation?
A. Encourage the team to independently resolve obstacles without escalating them.
[Hint: Team members has already tried and failed to resolve the challenge by their own. Hence this option not correct.]
B. Schedule additional team meetings to brainstorm solutions to the obstacles.
[Hint: Additional team meeting will not help to solve the challenge. Hence this option also not correct.]
C. Escalate unresolved issues to the appropriate stakeholders and support the team in removing barriers.
[Hint: Yes, it is the responsibility of the project manager to handle impediments for the team. This is the best option among all others.]
D. Implement a Kanban board to help the team track progress and identify obstacles.
[Hint: This option is not related to the question]
Solution: C. Escalate unresolved issues to the appropriate stakeholders and support the team in removing barriers.
Explanation: In agile projects when the Team struggles with obstacles, A servant leader can help clear these obstacles. If the team doesn’t know the options they have, consider a coach. Sometimes, the team needs to escalate obstacles (or roadblocks) the team or servant leader has not been able to remove.
Ref: Agile Practice Guide, Table 5-1. Agile Pain Points and Troubleshooting Possibilities- Page58


Simulator perks include mini tests in each domain and full-length practices test to prepare for PMP. Key to success? Analyze gaps, scrutinize wrong answers, reinforce weak spots by studying from the PMBOK and Agile practice guide. Score above 70%, but focus on learning, not just marks.
Success demands thorough study across PMBOK 7th Edition, Process Group Practice Guide (or PMBOK 6th Edition), and Agile Practice Guide. Our simulator covers these crucial areas, ensuring you're primed for PMP Certification Exam.
DISCLAIMER: The questions within this simulator are a product of my personal efforts, drawing on my own experience in preparing for and taking the PMP exam. These questions are intended to guide and augment your preparation, diverging from the notion of a compilation of past PMP exam queries. Only PMI holds the authority to officially publish any previous PMP exam questions.
target_audience: Professionals who are aims to ace the PMP Exam.
It caters to those eager to demonstrate their project management prowess, earn professional recognition, and open doors to new opportunities for growth and success in their field.

courses.title: Viktor Frankl's Logotherapy
courses.bio: The Discovery of Meaning
objectives: You will learn about the life of Viktor Frankl and his meaning-centered philosophy which he coined, Logotherapy.
Viktor Frankl Institute of America founders walk you through the history of Logotherapy and present exercises to help you find out what matters most to you.
The course contains video footage of Frankl speaking about topics such as self-transcendence, unconditional meaning, and the existential vacuum.
This course relates Frankl's philosophy to modern times. Frankl's Logotherapy helps people live a more purposeful life.

Introduction: Who Was Viktor Frankl?: Introduction: Welcome to our course on Logotherapy!
Video: Private Apartment Tour by Viktor Frankl
What is Meaning?: Video: Meaning from a Logotherapy Perspective (16:09)
Reading: Meaning from a Logotherapy Perspective
Audio: Viktor Frankl on Meaning and Ultimate Meaning (18:10)
Video: Viktor Frankl on Unconditional Meaning (07:30)
Video: Viktor Frankl on Existential Vacuum (07:04)
Reading: What is Meant by Meaning? By Viktor Frankl
What is Logotherapy: Video: Viktor Frankl on Coining Logotherapy (03:35)
Video: Viktor Frankl on the Human Reality (02:39)
Meaning Under All Circumstances: Video: Viktor Frankl on Collective Guilt (06:37)
Video: Viktor Frankl on the Privilege of Being Human (03:58)

requirements: No course requirements are necessary.
courses.description:
Do you wonder what your life's purpose is? Have you discovered your meaning?
In this 4-part course, you will learn about the life and work of Viktor Frankl, who was the founder of the psychology of meaning. His grandson, Alexander Vesely, a certified Logotherapist, provides commentary and explanations related to each week's topic. Additionally, there are audio and video clips from Frankl himself, along with other supporting videos and materials.

The course is meant to provide an overview of the meaning-centered theory, Logotherapy, which translates to "healing through meaning" in Greek. It is as much a life philosophy as it is psychotherapy. Anyone interested in learning more about Viktor Frankl, Logotherapy, and meaning is invited to take the course.
The course is organized by weeks, but you can take it at your own pace.
· Week 1: Who was Viktor Frankl?
· Week 2: What is Meaning?
· Week 3: What is Logotherapy
· Week 4: Meaning Under All Circumstances
You will have access to never-before-seen footage from the family archives and analysis by Viktor Frankl's grandson, Alex Vesely. His interviews with VFIA co-founder, Pam Roy, reveal much about Viktor Frankl's personal life and his theory of Logotherapy.
You will gain a deeper understanding of Frankl's philosophy and suggestions for applying the principles to your own life.
Please note that this is an informational course only, not a certification.
“Ever more people today have the means to live, but no meaning to live for.”
Viktor Frankl
target_audience: Anyone interested in psychology, discovering meaning, finding a purpose in life, and fans of Viktor Frankl's Man's Search for Meaning.

courses.description:
Take this course only if you're serious about unlocking your full potential and reaching extraordinary success in both personal and professional life.
"SmartOrFun: Motivation Minicourse," instructed by Dr. Lev Goldentouch, is not your typical motivational course. It goes beyond surface-level advice and delves into the psychology, science, and philosophy behind motivation and success. Unlike other courses that simply inspire, this course equips you with powerful, actionable techniques to transform your mindset, productivity, and decision-making.
This course, led by Lev Goldentouch, a creator of the highly praised KeyToStudy courses, offers insights derived from years of experience and practical application. Lev has successfully empowered students worldwide with courses like Key To Study: Double Your Memory, Reading, and Focus (Rating 4.5) and Become a SuperLearner (232,055 students), which have become top-sellers in their field.
Throughout the course, you will dive deep into understanding the critical connection between happiness, success, and emotional intelligence, learning how to manage your thoughts, perceptions, and emotions. The course emphasizes the importance of developing a clear personal vision and aligning your goals with your core values. You'll explore techniques for overcoming cognitive distortions, breaking through mental blocks, and turning setbacks into opportunities through reframing.
You will gain powerful tools to enhance your productivity and decision-making abilities, including techniques such as visualization, mindfulness, self-discipline, and gamification. Learn how to break free from the limitations of your comfort zone, build resilience, and cultivate a positive mindset that fosters growth. The course also introduces concepts like overlearning, task aggregation, and state chaining, helping you optimize both your time and mental energy for peak performance.
One of the most unique aspects of this course is its focus on psychological techniques such as anchoring, self-talk, rhetorical devices, and creative problem solving. These tools will help you influence your behavior, manage emotional responses, and refine your problem-solving strategies. By mastering these approaches, you will learn to make better decisions, build stronger relationships, and boost your motivation consistently.
This course introduces powerful productivity techniques like the Five Whys, a Toyota method for uncovering root causes, and NLP patterns such as the Swish pattern to replace negative behaviors. These tools help reprogram your mindset, solve problems effectively, and continuously improve, with a focus on identifying and leveraging your added value for maximum impact.
Why choose this course? Because it not only teaches you how to set goals and take action, but it also equips you with the tools and mindset to navigate challenges, minimize regrets, and maximize your potential. Whether you are seeking to improve your professional life, build emotional intelligence, or achieve your ultimate goals, SmartOrFun provides the knowledge and strategies to take your journey to the next level.
target_audience: Students seeking to enhance their focus, motivation, and study habits.
Teachers interested in boosting their emotional resilience and motivation to inspire students.
Professionals want to improve their productivity, decision-making, and emotional intelligence in the workplace.
Aspiring entrepreneurs are aiming to cultivate the mindset needed to achieve business success.

Life will always hit you with low blows and this can often feel very isolating. At times like this it is easy to feel that you can work this through on your own and not need/ask for help. This course is a guide into how your relationships, emotions, stress response, heart and mind all inter-relate to cause some people to thrive under pressure and others to get ill because of it. The only difference between these two extremes is the development of resilience.
This course can fill that gap for you.

courses.title: Motivation: Why, What, and How?
courses.bio: How to attain and maintain high level of motivation and be more successful in life?
requirements: Intention to succeed in life
courses.description:
For a successful and happy life, either personal or professional, we need high level of motivation. This course can help you attain and maintain high level of motivation.
First I will cover what is motivation and what are the components of motivation. Then we see what the two types of motivation and their sources are. Have you ever wondered what the reasons for low levels of motivation are? We will look at Goal setting, the most important aspect to succeeding in life. We always wish to have a magic box, a source to boost motivation levels. How to make one? And more importantly, how to draw energy out of it whenever we need it. We will look at some great tactics to increase motivation levels and a few tips that will give you a quick motivational boost, whenever needed. It may be easy to achieve short term goals. How to accomplish long term goals? What are the habits, highly motivated people have, that keep their motivation levels, high? Can we learn from them? Finally I will share a few techniques that I strongly recommend, to give your motivation a boost and how to maintain it as long as possible so that you can be more successful in your life.
target_audience: Anyone who wish to better their lives and want be more successful.

courses.description:
So, a person who is paranoid is regarded as someone who thinks the world is out there to do them harm; an extremely fearful person. An Inverse Paranoid is someone who thinks that the world is out there to do them good! An extremely hopeful person. Wow!
Becoming an Inverse Paranoid is Becoming the Opposite of Being Paranoid.
Inverse Paranoia is essentially a state of mind that perceives the world plotting to do one good and not harm. This is a mind frame that creates Optimism, an Incurable one at that. An Incurable Optimist is solution oriented and does not dwell on the problems, irrespective of life's outcomes. The belief is that something good exists, and that good can be found if sought after.
We also explore Setting Boundaries for yourself so that you don't lose sight of who you are and what you want from life and also not give room to anyone taking advantage of you for your unique mindset.
You have nothing to lose, but much to gain being right here for this Course. It is quite Life Changing and Perspective Broadening.
You love what makes you happy, yet it does not determine your joy.
In this course we will be interchanging becoming an Inverse Paranoid with being an Incurable Optimist .
It is essentially building the good kind of paranoia where you believe that people around you , that you interact with and even further than that, that the whole world even, is out Plotting Only Good For You.
Now, we are not living in ignorance or disconnecting from reality. This Course is not encouraging anyone to walk into any kind of trouble and drag out the good out there by any means possible. No. It is all about having the right mindset, a Great Mindset that attracts the Best Things in Life.
If you are familiar with the Law of Attraction, then you will find this Course appealing and the subject matters we explore are going to be very enlightening, thought provoking, as well as mildly liberating for you.
So essentially the energy of your thoughts manifest your experiences. Positive thoughts manifest positive experiences and vice versa.  Yet, we go further than that and still seek the good out of not so positive circumstances.
The Course is very laid back, detailed and does not explore anything extreme. Yet, it explores mind expanding concepts.
It majorly dwells on Tapping into Hope, Believing Only For The Best, even when the Results are not as expected, and getting the most out of life and daily human and circumstantial interactions by enforcing Healthy Mindsets, Healthy Boundaries and Much Needed Balance.

requirements: Basic understanding of English
courses.description:
Hi. I’m Bryan Bolt and I want to completely change the way you look at motivation.
Would you desperately like to exercise, but you just can't find the motivation to start? Have you tried exercising before but struggled to stay motivated and quit only a few weeks or even days later? Or do you feel you just don't have enough time to exercise? Does life feel just too busy right now?
In this course I’m going to teach you how you can motivate yourself to work out in just 5 minutes and how I used this very same technique to beat my 12 year old workout procrastination in a single evening.
I’ve now helped more than 970 people from more than 90 different countries all over the world to finally beat their workout procrastination and motivate themselves to exercise. And people have been absolutely thrilled by the results they have been getting.
This course is for anyone who feels exercising is too overwhelming to start, for people who feel they just don't have enough time to exercise and for anyone who has tried exercising before but struggled to stay motivated and quit only a few weeks or even days later.
If you want to lose weight, shred some belly fat, run a marathon, build your ideal beach body.. then this course is for you.
Most people don't know where motivation really comes from and we think hopefully, one day, we'll just have motivation. You know, we'll wake up and feel motivated.
But my favorite metaphor to teach people is this one: The power plant doesn't have energy, it generates energy. In the same way, we don't have motivation, we generate motivation.
Listen motivation is not something you have, motivation is something you create. And you can create it any moment you want.
My goal is to help you defeat your workout procrastination so you can reach your exercise goals.
Inside this course, I’m going to show you how you can literally manufacture your own motivation, how to stay motivated during the long run, and how to make working out and effortless part of your life.
I know that sounds like a lot, but this rule is a proven form of metacognition which means that it’s a way of tricking your brain in order to achieve your greater goals.
Learning this technique is a totally new way to approach motivation and it gives you a powerful, powerful new superpower. And I'm really excited to have it all in one awesome course for you to discover.
If you are ready to get started, and if you want to discover how you can motivate yourself to work out in just 5 minutes, beat your workout procrastination and make working out surprisingly easy, then I invite you to join me in this breath-taking new online course.
See you inside. Cheers!

courses.description:
Outsmarting And Overcoming Writers Block
Have you ever come to a blank sheet of paper or screen and thought I can’t do this?
Or been scared to share your writing?
Or demotivated and not able to write?
And come up with a million and one excuses why you can't?
So have thousands of writers, so you are not alone. However, when you understand what lies beneath writer's block and know why you stall, you will be able to outsmart it.
The purpose of this course is to help you get over these blocks and feel inspired and motivated to sit and write. We will introduce you to a number of simple strategies to inspire and motivate you. You will be removing blocks and taking effective actions towards being the writer you have always been.
We will look at the reasons and common excuses that people tend to have for not writing, and discuss the ways to overcome the perception of writer's block.
There are a variety of exercises and activities designed to get your writing flowing again.

Both Dale and Kay are published authors and bloggers, so we understand how frustrating it can be to not be able to get your thoughts down and fight with writer's block issues. And we have both used these techniques to ensure that we write and publish on time.
Come with us on a journey to unlock your blocks and let your writing and creativity flow
