courses.description:
What are the key benefits of this course?
This self-motivation course may be beneficial for individuals who want to improve their personal and professional lives, such as students, professionals, entrepreneurs, athletes, artists, and anyone who wants to achieve their full potential. The course can help individuals become more proactive, confident, focused, resilient, and productive, and to overcome self-limiting beliefs and behaviors that may be holding them back.
What will participants learn from this course?
The course typically begins with an introduction to the concept of self-motivation and its importance in achieving success. Participants will learn about the different types of motivation, including intrinsic and extrinsic motivation, and how they impact behavior and performance.
The course will then delve into the various skills and techniques that can be used to develop and enhance self-motivation. This may include goal-setting strategies, time management techniques, self-discipline, and mindset training.
The course may also incorporate content designed to help participants identify their values, strengths, and weaknesses, and develop a personal action plan for achieving their goals.
Throughout the course, listeners will have opportunities to  apply their newly acquired skills through real-life scenarios.
By the end of the course, participants should have a better understanding of their own motivations and how to use them to achieve their personal and professional goals. They should also have a toolbox of strategies and techniques to draw from when faced with challenges or setbacks in their journey towards success.
Self-Motivation & Professional development with 6 Quotients: Unlocking the Power Within
Self-motivation is the driving force behind our actions, decisions, and achievements. It's the inner voice that keeps us going even when we face obstacles, setbacks, and failures. Whether we want to pursue our dreams, achieve our goals, or overcome our fears, self-motivation is the key to success.
The following keywords describe the traits of self-motivated individuals:
A self-motivated person has a clear vision of what they want to achieve and how they plan to get there. They set realistic, measurable, and specific goals that are aligned with their values, interests, and strengths.
A self-motivated person is resilient and persistent. They have a strong desire to succeed, and they are willing to put in the effort, time, and energy required to achieve their goals. They don't give up easily, and they learn from their mistakes.
Self motivated people are able to prioritize their tasks, manage their time, and stay focused on their goals. They don't get distracted by distractions, procrastination, or temptations.
A self-motivated person has the ability to adapt to change, overcome adversity, and bounce back from setbacks. They have a positive attitude, a growth mindset, and a belief in their ability to learn, improve, and succeed. They have the determination, perseverance, and grit to stay the course and achieve their goals. They have a clear sense of purpose, direction, and priorities. They know what they want, and they stay focused on achieving it.
A self-motivated person is dedicated to their goals and values. They are willing to make sacrifices, overcome obstacles, and work hard to achieve what they want having a sense of responsibility, accountability, and integrity. A self-motivated person takes initiative and makes things happen. They don't wait for opportunities to come to them; they create their own opportunities. They are proactive, resourceful, and creative.
A self-motivated person has the ability to control impulses, emotions, and behaviors with a strong willpower, and able to delay gratification, resist temptation, and stay on track. Such a person doesn't need external motivation or supervision to get things done. They have an internal drive and passion that fuels their actions. They take responsibility for their own success and take action without being told.
This motivation course is going to enhance your personal abilities and professional traits, and you can prove your worth in your organization.
What is the meaning of Self motivation?
Self-motivation is the ability to motivate oneself to accomplish a specific task or goal. It is a crucial trait for success in every aspect of life, including personal, academic, and professional. Self-motivation allows individuals to set targets and persist in their efforts towards achieving them.
Self-motivation and personal development go hand in hand. Personal development refers to the process of improving oneself, including personal growth, skill development, and self-awareness. Self-motivation plays a critical role in personal development as it drives individuals to pursue their goals and enhance their skills, knowledge, and abilities.
Self-motivated individuals possess an internal drive and desire to improve themselves continuously. They set goals and work towards achieving them, even when faced with obstacles and setbacks. Personal development requires discipline, dedication, and perseverance, all of which are qualities that self-motivated individuals possess.
Self-motivation can be developed and enhanced through various means, including setting clear goals, maintaining a positive attitude, and finding inspiration and motivation from external sources. Setting specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-bound (SMART) goals helps individuals to remain focused and motivated, as they have a clear vision of what they want to achieve and how they will go about achieving it.
Maintaining a positive attitude is also essential in self-motivation and personal development. A positive mindset helps individuals to stay optimistic and focused on their goals, even in challenging situations. Positive self-talk, visualization, and affirmations are effective strategies for developing and maintaining a positive attitude.
Finding inspiration and motivation from external sources can also boost self-motivation and personal development. This can include seeking support from mentors or coaches, reading books and articles on personal development, attending seminars or workshops, and surrounding oneself with positive and motivated individuals.
Personal development requires continuous learning and growth, and self-motivation plays a crucial role in this process. Individuals who are self-motivated and committed to personal development are more likely to achieve success, fulfillment, and happiness in their lives. By developing self-motivation and engaging in personal development, individuals can unlock their full potential and create a life that is fulfilling, meaningful, and rewarding.

The AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner course is an essential entry-level program designed for individuals seeking to build a foundational understanding of cloud computing and Amazon Web Services (AWS). This course serves as a perfect starting point for beginners, business professionals, technical managers, and aspiring cloud practitioners who want to grasp the basic concepts of cloud technology and AWS services without requiring deep technical expertise. It provides a clear and structured overview of cloud fundamentals, AWS core services, security, pricing, and support options.
The course begins with an introduction to cloud computing concepts, explaining key terms such as Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS). Learners are guided through the core benefits of cloud adoption, including scalability, elasticity, high availability, and cost efficiency. The course emphasizes the shared responsibility model and explores the fundamental principles of cloud architecture, helping you understand how AWS delivers reliable and secure services across the globe.
You will gain a comprehensive overview of the AWS Global Infrastructure, including regions, availability zones, and edge locations. They explore key AWS services such as Amazon EC2 (Elastic Compute Cloud), S3 (Simple Storage Service), RDS (Relational Database Service), Lambda, and VPC (Virtual Private Cloud). Each service is explained with its core functionality, use cases, and practical demonstrations, ensuring that learners understand how these components integrate within cloud solutions. Security and compliance are critical aspects covered in detail, introducing participants to AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM), encryption methods, and AWS’s approach to securing cloud environments. The course also highlights AWS pricing models, billing concepts, and cost management tools, such as the AWS Pricing Calculator and AWS Budgets, giving learners insights into how to optimize cloud spending effectively.
You will have a solid understanding of AWS cloud concepts, services, and security measures. They will be confident in communicating cloud benefits to both technical and non-technical and will be well-prepared to pass the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner exam. This course is ideal for anyone looking to start a career in cloud computing, advance their business understanding of AWS, or lay the groundwork for more advanced AWS certifications.
target_audience: This AWS Cloud Practitioner course is for anyone wanting to obtain the knowledge to pass the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner Certification

courses.description:
Tú tienes la oportunidad para aprender a dejar de postergar tus objetivos y alcanzarlos de una vez por todas!
Con este curso aprenderás cómo gestionar tu motivación para que tomes acción en los momentos donde quieras dejar las cosas para después.
Te enseñaré la teoría de la motivación temporal desarrollada por el psicólogo Piers Steel, sus 4 elementos clave y más de 10 ejercicios prácticos para que pongas manos a la obra.
Seguramente alguna vez has sentido la necesidad de querer cumplir con un objetivo, hacer alguna tarea o simplemente realizar tu trabajo pero sientes ganas de dejarlo para después, lo que te trae estrés y sensaciones negativas. Todo esto tiene una razón y explicación, principalmente se debe a que te han enseñado de forma incorrecta conceptos como la productividad y que piensas que la motivación es solo sentirte con ganas de trabajar y ya.
Tu motivación puede manipularse si conoces los 4 elementos que influyen en ella. Entendiendo esos elementos y como interactúan entre ellos con los ejercicios que te propongo en las clases con sus PDF para poner en práctica, dejarás de dejar par mañana lo que puedes hacer hoy.
La inversión en el curso se verá reflejada en tus resultados personales y profesionales en el corto y largo plazo.

courses.title: Use the Ikigai Framework to Design and Live Your Best Life
courses.bio: Lessons from Ikigai and Other Japanese Philosophies
objectives: The significance of ikigai to Japanese culture and how it contributes to a life of purpose and joy
How to use the ikigai framework to explore your passions, potential, and purpose so you can do more of what you love, what you’re good at, what the world needs, and what you can be rewarded for
How to build better habits and routines so you can live every day with intention
How to develop a more positive, growth-oriented mindset to improve your confidence and overall approach to life
How to take immediate action towards your goals by setting and achieving S.M.A.L.L., but meaningful goals that will transform your life in a BIG way

Activate Your Ikigai: Aligning Your Habi: The S.M.A.L.L. Goals Framework and the Kaizen Cycle

requirements: English language proficiency
courses.description:
Do you want to find greater clarity about who you are where you want to go? Do you want to develop better habits and mindsets? Are you looking for more joy and fulfillment out of your days? Finding and living your ikigai can help you do all of the above, so you can be the best version of yourself - today and every day.

The word “ikigai” is Japanese for “your reason for being.” It has also been translated as your reason for getting out of bed in the morning, the thing that makes your life worthwhile, something to live for, your sense of purpose, and your springboard for tomorrow. Each person’s ikigai is personal and specific to their own lives, values, and beliefs... BUT EVERYONE HAS IT! It just needs to be discovered and awakened.

This action-oriented course will help you to find and live your ikigai. It's jam-packed with practical wisdom from Japanese philosophy that you can apply immediately to live a more rewarding, joyful, and authentic life.

My course teaches you that you are the designer of your life. It starts with your mindset and attitudes, and is followed by your actions, habits, rituals, and practices. There is no doubt that you can continue to live your life as it is, still finding joy, authenticity, and balance. But learning to discover and pursue your ikigai can help guide you to the next level of self-mastery.

And the best part? The course is only one hour long! So skip that TV show tonight or make the most of your lunch break and do something to invest in yourself instead. I promise you it’s worth it and it will set you up for a lifelong journey of growth and fulfillment. As part of the course, you’ll also get access to a number of helpful resources, including:
Ikigai Discovery Guide
Ikigai Wellness Guide
Mindset Exercises
S.M.A.L.L. Goals Worksheet
Hansei Journal

By the end, you’ll feel inspired to live life to your fullest potential, with the clarity to design the life you’ve always envisioned, and with the confidence to develop better habits, boost your positivity, and achieve your goals.
target_audience: Everyone! Especially those interested in self-development, growth, and lifelong learning

courses.description:
In today's fast-paced world, it can be challenging to stay focused and motivated, and even more challenging to turn your dreams into reality. That's why Dr Justin Cohen has distilled many decades of business experience into this easy-to-follow course that will guide you every step of the way.
The course is designed to help you turn your dreams into reality. Throughout the course, you will explore the power of goals, abundance, purpose, and the subconscious mind, and learn how to use these concepts to transform your life.
The course is divided into 22 lessons, each building upon the previous one. You'll start by exploring the power of goals and learning how to set SMART goals that are Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, and Time-Bound. Next, you'll learn about the gap between your real and ideal life, and discover the 7 reasons why goals are not achieved.
You'll also delve into the power of purpose and learn how to create your own personal mission statement. Along the way, you'll learn how to overcome obstacles, build your belief, and tap into the power of your subconscious mind. Finally, you'll learn how to bring your dreams to reality by using the Four Question Formula and the PPF Formula.
This course is different from others available on the market because it takes a holistic approach to personal development. Rather than focusing solely on goal-setting or the power of positive thinking, this course combines elements of both and teaches you how to use them together to transform your life. Whether you're looking to achieve your career goals, start a business, or simply live a happier and more fulfilling life, this course will provide you with the tools and knowledge you need to succeed.
So, if you're ready to turn your dreams into reality and achieve your full potential, then this course is for you!

requirements: Basic Understanding of Technology

courses.description:
In an era of rapid technological advancement, "How to Survive the Robot Revolution: A Beginner's Guide" is designed to prepare individuals for the transformative impact of automation and artificial intelligence (AI) on various aspects of life and work. This course provides an accessible introduction to the key concepts and implications of the robot revolution, offering practical insights and strategies to navigate this changing landscape. Participants will explore the technological trends driving automation and AI, the potential benefits and challenges they present, and the skills needed to thrive in an increasingly automated world.
Throughout the course, students will gain a comprehensive understanding of the different ways automation and AI are being integrated into industries, from manufacturing and healthcare to finance and customer service. Case studies and real-world examples will illustrate how these technologies are reshaping job markets, altering business models, and influencing everyday life. By examining both the opportunities and risks associated with the robot revolution, participants will be better equipped to anticipate and adapt to the evolving demands of the future workforce.
The course also emphasizes the importance of developing a proactive mindset and acquiring new skills to remain competitive and relevant. Students will learn about the critical skills needed in the age of automation, such as digital literacy, problem-solving, creativity, and emotional intelligence. Practical exercises and interactive sessions will help participants identify their strengths and areas for growth, providing them with actionable steps to enhance their employability and resilience in the face of technological change.
By the end of the course, participants will be empowered with the knowledge and tools to not only survive but thrive in the robot revolution. Whether you are a student, a professional looking to future-proof your career, or simply interested in understanding the impact of automation and AI, this course offers valuable insights and guidance. Embrace the future with confidence and learn how to leverage technology to your advantage in "How to Survive the Robot Revolution: A Beginner's Guide."
target_audience: Beginner-Friendly
Open to All

人間のモチベーションを2つに分けると、大きく外発的動機と内発的動機に分けられます。
外発的動機とは、外からの刺激によって動機付けされるモチベーションです。アメとムチで動く動機です。
内発的動機とは、内からのエネルギーによって動機付けされるモチベーションです。お金などの報酬がなくても、自分自身がやりたいから動く動機です。

courses.description:
知識ゼロからの英語やり直しを応援します。


「英語を勉強した記憶がない」
「中1レベルの文法すらわからない」
「英語をやり直したいが、何から勉強すればよいのかわからない」
「巷の『初級者向け』英文法も、ある程度の知識が前提となっているため、理解が難しい」
「英文法の全体像を明確にしたい」


このような方々に向け、中1の4月レベル（一番初めに習う内容）から高校初級程度の英文法を網羅した講座を作りました。


be動詞って何？　一般動詞とは？　三人称単数がわからない…TOEICが200~300点しか取れない…


そんな方でも、基礎から積み上げ、高校の初級レベルまでの英文法をおおまかに学びなおすことができます。


英文法の背景にあるイメージを大切にしているので、ひたすら丸暗記を強要されることもありません。


約17時間で、英文法の全体像を速習することが出来ます。


まずはこの講座により英文法の基礎固めをすることで、今後の英語学習がスムーズかつ確実に進められるようになります。


TOEIC等の資格試験でも、まずは最低限の英文法を理解していることが大切です。今後資格試験を検討している方にも、最初の第一歩としてお勧めできる講座です。


また、主要な例文 約500本に音声が付いているので、音声を使った復習にも効果を発揮します。通勤時に聞き流したり、音読をすることで、記憶の定着を図るとともに、リスニング力の向上にもつながります。

courses.description: Here are 36 of my favorite quotes by my philosophers, psychologists, writers and musicians that I use in my workshop presentations.  I hope you enjoy them as much as I do.  I have been teaching at Esalen, Kripalu and all over the United States for over ten years and I always say, "We are standing on the shoulders of giants."  I have graduate degrees in Philosophy, Psychology and Religious Studies and I have been privileged to sit with many extremely wise people over the past thirty-five years.  When I hear someone say something profound or read an transformational quote - something that shines a new light or gives a completely alternative perspective on a situation - I write it down.  So this course is comprised of 36 of my favorite quotes that I believe will help you cultivate meaning, happiness and satisfaction in your life. If you have the opportunity to study with any of the people who I quoted I highly recommend doing it. There is also much witting and unwitting genius in songs so I included the lyrics from a few of my favorite songs also. Thank you very much for watching!  I hope that you enjoy what I have curated!

objectives: Become skilled in self-coaching and get motivated fast

Getting your first taste of this techniq: Listen to an expert coach somebody in how to relax and handle pressure at work

Test your own ability to express yourself in metaphor

Developing all the symbols which emerge from the outcome statement
The change process: Change the metaphor to change the outcome

Recapping clean questions with mind maps: Summary of clean questions with mind maps

Which question would you ask next?
Thank you for completing the course and: Thank you and let's stay friends

requirements: Transformations in your motivation and thinking can happen almost immediately but this is not guaranteed however the evidence is that after six sessions of self enquiry new ideas will emerge so stick with it

Several books are referred to in the course, we recommend that you acquire them at some point as you gain more confidence in the technique. Marian Way's "Clean Approaches for Coaches" is a marvellous way to develop your learning
Working with a trusted friend might accelerate your progress but only you can know this
Start slowly and do a little but often - walk before you can run
Watch the free preview videos to get a full appreciation of the course first
Check out online if there are any Clean Practice Sessions in your area - they will be very helpful

It would be helpful but not necessary to have a mobile phone which can record your voice or a basic voice recorder simply so that you can replay your exact words but this is not critical but nice to have
courses.description:
Get Yourself Motivated is a method of self-coaching to help you explore your true and authentic motivations. With the insights gained, you will go on to transform your ability to make the things happen which you would like to have happen - whatever they may be.

If you ever ponder the question "What would you like to have happen?" about any aspect of your life then this course is for you.

The course is based on the pioneering work of David Grove who, whilst counselling people who had experienced trauma, realised that it's possible to gain access to our deepest, non-verbal feelings through interrogation of our metaphors and the symbols within them use in everyday language.

He developed a way of asking questions about the symbols we use which avoided any bias or assumptions being introduced into the process. This became known as Clean Language precisely because it does not permit any outside interference.

James Lawley and Penny Tompkins observed how David worked with symbols and codified his method into the technique we call Symbolic Modelling. In this course you will learn to ask yourself Clean Questions and to model the symbols which you uncover. In this way you will explore your own inner or what is often called, psychoactive landscape.

As you gain more insight, transformation will occur in your thinking and you will gain immense clarity into your ansers to the critically important opening question in Clean Language which is "What would you like to have happen?"

You will be introduced to examples of the process in action from the key texts on the subject. This will give you a good feel for the way you can ask yourself theses questions and model your own dynamic thought processes. Along the way there will be quizzes to test your progress.

At any point if you get stuck you are free to use the Send Message feature and we will get you back on track.

Simply listen to the examples given which will take about 2 hours and complete the quizzes. After that it's about practice and experimentation. For some people the breakthrough is immediate but as a general rule after 6 sessions of self-coaching something new and exciting will emerge.

We look forward to working with you when you take this course.
target_audience: If you ask yourself "What would I like to have happen?" and can imagine it and believe it then take this course to discover how you will achieve it
People who want to know what really makes them tick
People who are dissatisfied with some aspect of their lives and are ready to make new things happen
Life's dreamers, those who aspire, people with hope who are ready to take the next vital step on their journey
If you get fired up about something but then lose interest you will learn how to break that pattern
If you have trouble getting started and want to overcome your procrastination
Self sabotagers - people who get it all then lose the lot and can't understand why
People with addictive patterns who want and need to break them
If you are giving serious thought to making something happen then you and only you will intuitively know that learning more about motivation when you take this course is the right thing to do
There's no group who should not consider this course - it's for everybody who dreams
If you are giving serious thought to making something happen that you would like to have happen

En este curso, encontrarás una estructura organizada, fácil de aprender, aplicar y consultar tantas veces como lo necesites. Además, tendrás acceso ilimitado al contenido para repasar y profundizar en tu aprendizaje siempre que lo desees.
¿Qué te espera dentro del curso?
Técnicas avanzadas de numerología para comprender mejor tu vida y la de los demás.
Métodos prácticos para identificar vibraciones energéticas en momentos clave.
Herramientas para integrar la numerología en tu día a día y ayudar a otros.
Estoy aquí para responder todas tus dudas. Escríbeme si necesitas orientación o tienes alguna pregunta.
¡Te espero dentro!
Gracias, gracias, gracias por confiar en este camino.
Un fuerte abrazo,
Anna Arnal
target_audience: A todas aquellas personas que quieran conocerse más.

courses.title: Ultimate way to create right mindset to upgrade yourself
courses.bio: A little change in our mindset will definetely upgrade our life.

Introduction: How to get rid of negative thoughts
why we should get rid of negative thoughts

requirements: No requirements
courses.description:
A healthy mindset is a way of thinking that allows for positive thoughts and optimistic outlooks. It is a state of mind in which an individual believes that they can achieve their goals and maintain a high level of well-being. A healthy mindset also includes resiliency, flexibility, and a willingness to embrace change.
A healthy mindset involves finding ways to grow from your thoughts instead of letting them control your life. Rather than dwelling on a negative thought until it becomes overwhelming, the healthy mindset tries to a) move beyond that thought or b) simply accept it.
Instead of obsessing over a positive mindset, we should focus on cultivating a healthy mindset. I say that because you can have a healthy mindset even if you feel negative sometimes.
Mindfulness means maintaining a moment-by-moment awareness of our thoughts, feelings, bodily sensations, and surrounding environment, through a gentle, nurturing lens.


Mindfulness also involves acceptance, meaning that we pay attention to our thoughts and feelings without judging them—without believing, for instance, that there’s a “right” or “wrong” way to think or feel in a given moment. When we practice mindfulness, our thoughts tune into what we’re sensing in the present moment rather than rehashing the past or imagining the future.
target_audience: Everyone

requirements: İnternet dışında bir gereksinim yok
courses.description:
Merhaba can dostum. Hoş geldin. Öncelikle söyleyim ki burada bulunan hikayeleri daha önce hiç görmedin ve ya okumadın. Bunlar sadece sana ve bize özel hikayeler. Geçmişte sorunlarla boğuşan bir çok insanla karşılaştım. Kimi zaman onlara bir rehber oldum kimi zaman bir koç... Bazen bir dost bazen belki de o kahraman oldum. Lakin ben hep ordaydım.
Evet onlar başardılar. Bazen çok ümitsizliğe düştüler. Bazen vazgeçtiler. İçlerinde ölümle burun buruna gelen bile vardı. Ve tabi ki başardılar. Sen de başaracaksın. Çünkü sen de başarmayı hak ediyorsun. Ve her seçim bir kaybediştir derler ya sen KAZANMAYI SEÇİYORSUN. Kaybettiğin tek şey seni mutsuz eden o şey olsun.


Sen mutluluğu seçiyorsun. Sen hayalini yaşadıklarını gerçek hayatta tezahür etmeyi seçiyorsun. Çünkü bunu son derece hak ediyorsun.


Ve şuan seni engelleyen tüm duygu ve düşünceleri serbest bırak. Önyargılarını al ve çöpe at. O içinde seni durduran sesi sustur. Ve yüzünü bana dön. Yüzünü güneşe dön. Ve kaçma gel buraya. Kabul et seni durduran şeyi. Ve kabul et seni mutsuz edenleri. Ve geçmişi geçmişte bırak. Şimdi sadece şimdi var. A benim canım şimdim, güzel şimdim.
Hadi herkesi ve fakat öncelikle kendini affetmekle başla şimdiye. Şimdi derin bir nefes al. Tüm hücrelerinin şifalandığını hisset. Bu hikayeler senin için. O kadar şey içinde halen ve halen bu yazıyı okumayı seçtiysen. Şunu bil ki burada sana ait olan bir şey var. Ya da belki de bir emanetin var. Gel al emanetini de başla. Başla, başlaman gerekenlere... İçinde kalanlara...
İşte böyle..

courses.title: Motivation for Learning and Performance
courses.bio: Master research-based strategies that ensure optimal motivation in the self and others at home, work, and school.
objectives: Diagnose, analyze, and eliminate learning and performance issues caused by lack of motivation in the self and others.
Identify which aspects of human behavior are influenced by motivation using the latest scientific evidence from psychology, education, business, neuroscience and athletics
Determine which motivation clues are meaningful and which are misleading
Analyze self-beliefs that stall optimal task success
Implement and apply dozens of research-based strategies to enhance individual, group and organizational effectiveness
Design and conduct a successful motivational intervention that promotes lasting behavior changes in the self and others
Overcome defensiveness and resistance from others
Become a certified Motivational Detective (M.D.)
Laugh excessively at the bloopers lesson and see why making a course isn't as easy as you might think

Course Intro: Getting the Most out of Udemy
Gather Motivation Evidence: Cultural Influences on Motivation and Motivational Leader Bernard Madoff
Theory 1: Attributions - Is Success based on effort or ability?
Theory 2: Self-efficacy - Do you believe you can do it?
Theory 3: Expectancy-Value - how important is the outcome?
Theory 4: Goal Orientation - Why do you attempt a task?
Analyze Motivation Evidence: Early Formation of Beliefs and Motivational Leader Robert Knowling, Jr.
Positive and Negative Impact of Self-beliefs
Determine Srategies and Implement Change: Solving the Case: An Overview of Self-regulation
Five Key Factors for a Successful Motivational Intervention
Resistance to Change - Seven Ways to Evaluate Data
Course Certification and Wrap-up: A Few of the MANY Bloopers

requirements: The course is conducted by Dr. Bobby Hoffman an internationally-recognized authority in motivation and author of "Motivation for Learning and Performance." The textbook, while not required to take the course, is a useful resource and an excellent companion to the course
courses.description:
How do they do it? What is the secret behind the success of a Bill Gates, Angela Merkel, Elon Musk, or the lady down the street who runs a highly profitable family business and the classroom teacher that masterfully calms a group of rowdy students? You may be thinking why not ask them, but there is a catch...They Probably Don't Know...but I do and soon you will too.
How do I know? Because I have been researching and teaching about motivation for over 30 years, all over the globe, giving presentations and conducting workshops to help people like you become more successful. I am a university professor who specializes in motivational science, including writing the leading text "Motivation for Learning & Performance." As I reveal in the course, one of the most interesting aspects of motivation is that few people really understand their own motives and I can tell you why.
This course is about making you one of those few people that are highly self-aware about their own motives, as well as someone who can cultivate optimal motivation in others. When you take my course you will learn evidence-based strategies and techniques you can use to become what I call a "Motivation Detective," spotting the correct clues to solve motivational riddles. By the end of the course you will amass a wealth of practical and applied strategies to enhance motivation in the self and others. You will master how to use knowledge of motivation to achieve success. You will learn the important interaction among beliefs, motivations, and behaviors, the key pitfalls to avoid, and you will gain the power to develop and implement scientifically-based strategies to improve learning and performance.
In the course you will learn about motivational misconceptions and the theories that explain motivation. You will meet a number of motivational leaders that I have interviewed, from an international poker player that won millions, to a Hall of Fame football star, to the most famous white-collar criminal in the world, who is still behind bars. You will also learn about how to analyze motivational clues, and at the end of the course I provide you a 5-step plan you can use to create long lasting motivational change. Along the way there are a number of quizzes to help reinforce your knowledge along with a host of additional resources provided in downloadable materials to use after the course is completed.
When you sign up for my course you are actually receiving almost the same, high-quality information that I teach my students at the University of Central Florida. They spend a lot of money registering for my semester-long course in pursuit of a college degree, but here on Udemy you will get the same access to me just like my students, for just a fraction of the typical university cost.
Motivation for Learning and Performance is exactly as the title states. When you take my course you will walk away with a certificate as a Motivational Detective, ready to use what you have learned to enhance your own learning and performance, as well as the motivation of your peers, family, co-workers, classmates, or with whomever you choose to share your motivational expertise.
target_audience: Managers, Supervisors, Educators, Coaches, Administrators, Trainers, college or high school students who are interested in cultivating optimal motivation

This course is equivalent to a college level course that is best suited to individuals who wish to improve their own learning and performance (or the learning and performance of others) using evidence-based strategies to enhance their effectiveness
This course is not suitable for those individuals that do not wish to advance knowledge or career growth
This is course is not for those interested in non-evidence based approaches
This is course is not intended for those interested in psuedo-scientific approaches to behavioral change such as fortune-telling, palm reading, and communicating with the deceased

courses.description:
İyi Bir Konuşmacı Olmak: Sadece Konuşmak Değil, Etki Bırakmaktır.
İyi seçilmiş kelimeler, doğru bir ses tonu, yerinde bir duruş ve samimi bir ifade birleştiğinde; dinleyicinin kalbine ulaşır, zihninde yer eder.
Bazıları konuşur ve geçer… Ama bazıları konuşur, düşündürür, hissettirir ve unutulmaz olur.
İşte bu farkı yaratan şey; iletişim değil, etkileşimdir. Peki, fark nerede başlar?
Bu eğitimde sana sadece nasıl konuşacağını değil; nasıl anlaşılacağını, nasıl hatırlanacağını ve nasıl etki yaratacağını anlatıyorum. Çünkü iyi bir konuşmacı olmak; kelimeleri doğru seçmek kadar, zamanı doğru kullanmak, dinleyiciyi tanımak ve kendine dürüst olabilmektir.
Zamanı doğru kullanmak demek; neyi ne zaman söyleyeceğini, nerede duracağını, ne kadar konuşacağını bilmek demektir.
Kendine dürüst olmak, belki de en kritik noktadır. Yapmacık bir ifade, ezberlenmiş cümleler ya da sahte özgüven uzun sürmez.


Bu kurs sana şunları kazandıracak:
-Konuşma öncesi hazırlık ve plan yapmanın önemi
-Beden dilini doğru ve etkili kullanma yolları
-Heyecanı kontrol etme, nefes teknikleri
-Dinleyiciyi tanıma ve bağ kurma becerisi
-Gözlem gücüyle konuşmayı zenginleştirme
-Kendini değerlendirme ve özeleştiri yapma alışkanlığı


Bu bir hitabet dersi değil; bu, seni SENİN en iyi anlatım halinle tanıştıracak bir yolculuk. Radyo programcısı, sunucu ve eğitmen olarak yıllardır mikrofon başında biriken deneyimlerimi seninle paylaşıyorum. İster bir toplantıda konuş, ister sahnede… İster kameraya, ister kalabalığa…Sesin artık senin gücün olacak.


Hazırsan, önce tanışalım. Çünkü iyi bir konuşma, iyi bir tanışmayla başlar ve bu kurs, sadece konuşmayı değil, kendini duymayı da öğretecek. Hoş geldin!

“What can we say about Mr. Ross? An author, TV personality, consummate professional, and the utmost motivator! Over and over again, Darryl shows us how to remove the dirt and grime from our lenses, adjust our mindsets, and push ourselves to be better in the workplace and at home. Emotional health is as important a spoke in the overall employee health as any other. And his presentation at the Health Expo on fulfillment was the best one ever. Do you really know how to achieve fulfillment? Do you know the reasons we succeed or fail? These are just some of the things he touched on in Friday’s Expo. If you’ve ever had the chance to hear him speak you know he offers pinpoint information on ways to stay focused, set goals, and improve our lives.”
Catrina M. Jones, Esq. | Chief of Staff | Department of Consumer & Regulatory Affairs | Government of the District of Columbia 1100 4th Street SW, 5th Floor | Washington, DC 20024
target_audience: All individuals looking to have more success, happiness, and purpose their lives.

courses.title: Seja corajoso como um estoico! Filosofia para a vida!
courses.bio: Transforme sua vida praticando a coragem da filosofia estoica para fazer justiça e mudar o mundo para melhor!
objectives: Conhecer a parrhesia, a coragem da filosofia estoica.
Aprender com exemplos estoicos como praticar a parrhesia, a coragem de dizer a verdade aos poderosos.
Desenvolver a virtude da coragem praticando a justiça na sua vida e na de todos ao seu redor.
Praticar a coragem da filosofia estoica no seu dia a dia, levantar sua voz para defender a sua verdade e os seus valores, transformando sua vida para melhor.
Se tornar um exemplo da pratica da coragem, inspirar a todos a transformarem suas vidas e praticar a coragem para mudar o mundo para melhor.

Introdução: Aula 1 - O que é a parrhesia, a coragem dos estoicos
Aula 3 - Da parrhesia cínico-estoica ou do auge da vida da verdade
Aula 4 - Como ser corajoso como um estoico no seu dia a dia

requirements: Não há pré-requisitos, este é um curso completo e autoexplicativo.
courses.description:
Nesse curso você descobrirá que os filósofos estoicos, além de meramente resilientes e pacíficos, como se divulga, eram também muito corajosos e defendiam os direitos da comunidade na qual viviam, muitas vezes dando a sua própria liberdade e vida por isso;
Você vai entender qual era a coragem dos estoicos, a parrhesia, a coragem de dizer a verdade, toda a verdade aos poderosos, não importando as consequências que se poderá sofrer por fazer isto, e como ela funcionava;
E você aprenderá a , se inspirando nos exemplos estoicos, praticar a coragem no seu dia a dia.
O que será ensinado:
Breve introdução ao estoicismo
As 4 virtudes cardeais estoicas
Parrhesia: a coragem estoica
A aplicação da Parrhesia pelos estoicos, pelos cínicos e pelos cínico-estoicos
Exemplos de como você pode praticar a coragem estoica no seu dia a dia para vencer os desafios de sua vida na área dos relacionamentos, na área do trabalho e em todas as outras áreas da vida, transformar sua vida ao levantar a sua voz e falar a sua verdade aos poderosos que tentam te intimidar e limitar, defender os seus valores, se tornar um exemplo para todos e mudar o mundo para melhor!
Essa jornada será uma verdadeira transformação pessoal e mudará a sua vida por completo, levando você ao sucesso pessoal, profissional e social pela via da prática das virtudes cardeais da filosofia estoica!
Como acompanhar o curso:
O curso terá aulas gravadas em vídeo e apostilas em pdf às quais você terá acesso aqui nesta plataforma.
E o seu acesso ao curso será vitalício, sempre que quiser, você poderá ver e rever o curso.
target_audience: Esse curso é feito para você que é abusado, criticado e limitado pelos poderosos em sua vida e que quer e precisa desenvolver a coragem para levantar a sua voz e dizer não ao que os outros esperam de você, descobrir a sua autenticidade e sua força interior e usá-las para fazer justiça na sua vida e na de todos, se tornando um exemplo de transformação pessoal, social e política, mudando o mundo para melhor!

courses.title: Get Motivated in 2021 - Stop Procrastination Immediately
courses.bio: Real-time coaching to get you to take action when you need it the most
objectives: How to go from procrastination to meaningful action immediately.
Be able to create plans and apply this neuroscience-based strategy to ANY area of your life.
The PAIN-POINT words that will motivate your brain immediately just by reading them.
How the brain's wiring influences whether or not you will achieve your goals.

Let's Get Started: What You Already Have Going For You
A Basic Model Of The Strategy
Why It Is So Hard To Change Your Life
Hack The Tools Your Brain Already Uses: The Pain Points Of The Brain
Need To Follow The Plan Exactly
Strategy Breakdown: The Brain Needs To Know Where To Go
The Brain Needs To Know How To Get There
Plan Ahead For When You Will Procrastinate
Flip The Motivation For Immediate Action
Real-Time Coaching: Coaching 5: It's Your Life - You Choose
Turbo Charge & Autopilot Your Path: Rev Up Your Results With Emotion
Being Wrong Can Be A Benefit

requirements: No past knowledge of personal development or neuroscience is necessary.
The ability to follow directions and perform the tasks exactly as explained.
A printer would be useful, but not completely necessary.
If you don't have a printer a notebook and pen would be a must to achieve the desired results.
courses.description:
Make 2021 the year you actually do the hard work it takes to change your life!
**WARNING: THE CONCEPT IS SIMPLE, BUT SOME PEOPLE STILL WON'T DO IT. YOU NEED TO BE ABLE TO FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS TO MENTALLY "UNBLOCK" YOURSELF.
What if you could stop procrastinating just by saying the right words?
The brain will do almost anything to avoid being labeled by certain words it doesn't like.
You need to:
Learn what the words are.
Understand how they work.
Apply a strategy using those words.
I am always focused on what people have to do to move their lives forward. For many years I believed you just needed the motivation to go after your dreams - have a big enough "why." After studying neuroscience my beliefs have changed. Yes, a big "WHY" is important, but the brain is wired a specific way. The main organizing principle is to avoid pain and gain pleasure. Studies have shown that we will do much more to avoid pain.
With that knowledge, it only makes sense that having a big enough "WHY NOT" will produce a stronger motivation.  Therefore causing enough pain for NOT completing a task is far more motivating than the thought of pleasure for achieving it and this can be accomplished by using specific words.
This course will teach you the basics you need and a strategy that will enable you to change from procrastination to action immediately.
target_audience: Someone who is stuck, even though they know what they should be doing.
Anyone who wants to stop procrastinating by learning a new strategy.
People who are interested in how the brain holds them back and what they can do to overcome it.

courses.title: 【脳科学×モチベーション】無意識の力で人生を変えよう！やる気が続かない人のための目標達成メソッド｜科学的アプローチ講座
courses.bio: 意志力に頼らない新メソッド「ギャップモチベーション」を解説。脳科学等の研究に基づき、やる気が続かない、モチベーションが上がらない悩みを解決する無意識活用のアプローチを学べます。実践者の経験から導き出された具体的な行動改善法を提供します。

はじめに: はじめに
コースの目的と概要
やる気に関する誤解
ギャップモチベーションの導入
講師の実績
コースの流れ
得られる未来
第１章 モチベーションの科学: アクティブモチベーション
やる気が出るメカニズム
ギャップモチベーション
第２章 日常生活での取り組み方: ギャップモチベーションの復習
ギャップモチベーションの実践方法
第３章 引用元研究の紹介: ダニエル・カーネマン
デイビッド・イーグルマン
ジャック・パンクセップ
レオン・フェスティンガー
アルバート・バンデューラ
ガブリエル・エッティンゲン
最終章 おわりに: 受講者へのメッセージ

requirements: 特別な前提知識は必要ありません
日常生活の中で実践できる内容となっています
自己啓発や心理学の基礎知識は不要ですが、自己理解や成長に対する前向きな姿勢があること。
courses.description:
■このコースの概要説明
「やる気はあるのに続かない」
「目標を立てても達成できない」
「努力しているのに成果が出ない」


これらの課題解決に向けたコースです。


脳科学と心理学の研究に基づき、無意識の力を活用した新しいモチベーション術を45分のコンパクトな講座で学ぶことができます。


従来の意志力依存型のアプローチとは異なり、脳の仕組みに沿ったモチベーション向上のアプローチを提供します。


コース本編の内容：
・はじめに：やる気に関する一般的な認識とギャップモチベーションの導入
・第1章：やる気のメカニズム - 脳科学からの新しい視点
・第2章：ギャップモチベーションの仕組みと活用法
・第3章：理論的根拠となる研究者と文献の紹介
・第4章：実践への展開とまとめ


■コースで学べること
・無意識の力を活用したモチベーション向上の方法 ・科学的根拠に基づく「ギャップモチベーション」の実践方法
・意志力に頼らない目標達成へのアプローチ
・自己効力感を高めるための具体的な手法
・効果的な行動改善の実践方法


■対象となる方
・モチベーション維持に関心のある社会人
・新しいチャレンジを検討している方
・科学的根拠に基づいたモチベーション管理手法に興味がある方
・習慣改善に取り組みたい方 ・複数のタスクを抱える中で目標達成を目指す方


■必要なツールや要件
・特別な前提知識は不要です
・日常生活の中で実践できる内容です
・自己理解や成長への意欲


モチベーション向上に関する新しいアプローチを、ぜひ一緒に学んでいきましょう。


ギャップモチベーションの意識的活用によりあなたの人生が変わるきっかけになることを切に願います。
target_audience: 「やる気はあるのに続かない」「思い描いた目標になかなか到達できない」など、モチベーション維持に悩む社会人
資格取得や副業、キャリアチェンジなど、新しいチャレンジを目指しているものの、なかなか一歩を踏み出せない方
自己啓発や脳科学に興味があり、科学的根拠に基づいたモチベーション管理手法を学びたい方
日々の習慣改善（運動、読書、早起きなど）に取り組もうとしているが、継続できずに悩んでいる方
仕事や学習など、複数のタスクを抱える中で、効率的に目標を達成したい学生や働く社会人

courses.title: 김수영스쿨 1강 - 진짜 꿈을 찾고 이루는 법
courses.bio: 대한민국 대표 꿈쟁이의 전문 강의!
objectives: 꿈을 찾고 이루는 법
requirements: 없음
courses.description:
유데미 정책상 수강료가 높게 책정되었습니다. 소울클래스에서 동일한 수업을 절반 금액에 수강 가능합니다.


1강에서는 대한민국 대표 꿈쟁이인 제가 80개국에서 72개의 꿈에 도전하고, 지난 10년간 많은 사람들이 꿈을 찾고 이룰 수 있도록 돕는 과정에서 깨달은 것들을 나눕니다. 도대체 꿈이 무엇인지, 꿈이 왜 필요한지, 꿈을 어떻게 찾아야할지, 똑같은 상황에서도 누구는 꿈을 찾고 누구는 좌절하게 되는 차이는 무엇인지, 실패의 두려움을 어떻게 극복할지, 어떻게 꿈에 도전할지, 이 수업을 듣고 당장 무엇을 실천해야 할지 등을 단계적으로 접근합니다.
만약  기존에 지자체나 학교 등에서 제 특강을 들으신 적이 있다면 제가 살아온 이야기가 80%였을 겁니다. 반대로 이 수업은 여러분이 적용할 수 있는 방법론이 80%라고 생각하시면 됩니다. 하지만 다른 책이나 학문을 참고하기보다는 저와 제 주변사람들의 직접적인 경험을 토대로 깨달은 점등을 나눕니다.


--김수영스쿨 소개--
김수영스쿨이 뭔가요?
제가 지난 10년간 책과 강연을 통해 여러분과 소통하며 가장 많이 받은 질문들에 답을 주기 위해서 만든 인생내공 실전수업입니다. 주제는 1. 진짜 꿈을 찾고 이루는 법 2. 경제적 시간적 자유를 얻는 법 3. 나를 사랑하고 너를 사랑하는 법 4. 인간관계와 멘탈관리 이며 학문적인 내용이나 이론이 아닌 순전히 저나 제 주변사람들이 직접 겪었던 일들을 바탕으로 깨달은 것들 위주로 이야기 합니다. 온라인 강연은 오프라인 강연 중 각 강의 4번째 수업을 현장에서 촬영한 것으로 당시 사용되었던 PPT를 함께 볼수 있도록 편집되었습니다. 평소 유튜브 김수영TV를 즐겨 보셨던 분들이라면 각 주제별로 5분짜리 맛보기가 아닌 2시간 이상의 풀버전을 보신다고 생각하시면 됩니다.


진행중인 수업인가요?
오프라인 수업은 2018년 11월부터 2019년 4월까지 서울 강남-부산-대구-서울강북 이렇게 4번에 걸쳐 전국투어 형태로 진행되었고 1강 앵콜수업 2번, 2강 앵콜수업 1번까지 총 19번의 수업에 2,562명이 참여했습니다. 수강생 중에는 유명 연예인 및 정치인도 있었고 영국, 중국, 몽골 등 외국인들, 속기사를 대동한 청각장애인 분들, 해외에서 이 수업을 듣기 위해 일부러 귀국하신 분들, 전국 곳곳에서 비싼 교통비와 긴 이동시간을 감수하며 강연장에 찾아와주신 분 등 다양한 분들이 각자 귀한 시간을 내서 와주셨는데요. 해외에 사시는 교민 여러분, 독박육아로 외출이 힘든 어머님들, 그리고 간병 때문에 집밖으로 나갈 수 없다며 온라인 수업을 개설해달라는 요청이 많아서 이렇게 인강으로 제작하게 되었습니다.

어떤 수업부터 봐야 할까요? 추천하는 수업이 있다면?
4강 모두 보면 가장 좋습니다만 1,2,3,4강 순서대로 볼 필요는 없으며 내게 가장 필요한 주제를 선택해서 보시면 됩니다. 오프라인 수업을 듣고 설문조사에 참여하신 분들의 경우 1강 96.6%, 2강 92.1%, 3강 94.3% 4강 95.6%, 평균 94.6%를 추천하셨습니다. 1,2,3,4강을 모두 다 수강하신 분들을 대상으로 별도로 진행된 설문조사에서 설문참여자의 98%가 모든 수업을 추천하셨고 각 수업에 대한 선호도는 비슷비슷했습니다.


오프라인 수업과 온라인 수업의 차이가 무엇인가요?
온라인 수업의 경우 내가 원하는 시간과 장소에서 내 속도에 맞게 수업을 들을 수 있는 대신 사인회와 Q&A에 참여할 수 없습니다. 또 오프라인 수업 때는 시작 전 아이스브레이킹도 하고 중간중간 옆사람과 대화를 나누거나 혼자서 써보는 액티비티가 있었는데 온라인 수업에서는 해당 슬라이드에서 일시정지 버튼을 누르고 혼자 액티비티를 해야 합니다. 오프라인 수업 중 언급된 너무 개인적인 내용이나 Q&A 때 마이크를 갖다주느라 낭비되는 시간, 지나치게 신세한탄이 길어졌던 질문 등을 온라인 수업 영상 제작시 삭제하였습니다.

온라인 수업은 오프라인 수업보다 더 저렴한가요?
제 독자, 구독자님들중 경제적으로 힘든 학생, 취준생들이 많기 때문에 오프라인 수업도 정말 저렴하게 진행했는데요. (완강자 대상 설문조사 결과 절반 이상 수업의 퀄리티에 비해 수업료가 너무 싸다고 답하셨어요^^) 오프라인 수업과 온라인 수업의 차이를 감안해 추가로 5천원 더 저렴한 금액에 인강을 오픈하게 되었습니다. 단, 오프라인 수업은 1,2,3,4강 모두 들으신 분들께 할인혜택 및 수료증을 드렸지만 온라인은 이미 한번 할인이 되었기 때문에 그런 혜택은 없습니다.

오프라인 수업은 또 안하나요?
현재는 계획이 없습니다만 요청이 많은 경우 고민해보도록 하겠습니다. 저를 직접 만나고 싶다면 2019년 8월 이후 멈추지마 다시 꿈부터 써봐(개정판), 꿈을 요리하는 마법카페(개정판), 온 우주가 너를 사랑해 (신간-그림책) 출간기념 북콘서트를 전국에서 열 예정이니 그때 와주시면 됩니다. 이번에는 서울, 부산, 대구 뿐만 아니라 광주, 대전에서도 진행할수 있도록 노력해보겠습니다.


그밖의 사항
스튜디오가 아닌 실제 강연 현장에서 찍은 게 아니기 때문에 일부 장면에서 다소 어둡게 나올 수도 있습니다. 3강의 경우 약 4분 정도 음질이 안 좋은 구간이 있습니다만 들으시는데 지장은 없습니다. 또 촬영 당시 제가 출산한지 얼마 안되어 제 인생 최고 몸무게를 찍었던 점 감안해주시기 바랍니다.
target_audience: 남녀노소 누구나

courses.title: Motivate Yourself !
courses.bio: Be Your Own Life Coach
objectives: Student wil learn self motivation
requirements: Follow the course step by step
courses.description:
The Global Motivation Course is a dynamic, inclusive program designed to inspire and empower students from all backgrounds across the world. Rooted in universal principles of personal growth, resilience, and purpose, the course is crafted to meet the needs of a globally diverse student population—regardless of culture, language, age, or life circumstances.
Through engaging multimedia content, real-world case studies, and interactive exercises, students explore the foundations of self-motivation, goal-setting, and overcoming internal and external challenges. The course emphasizes self-awareness, emotional intelligence, and mental strength, while also encouraging students to embrace their cultural uniqueness as a source of power and identity.
Participants will connect with global peers, share their personal journeys, and learn from motivational leaders across continents. This inclusive space fosters respect, collaboration, and global citizenship, while promoting the idea that motivation is not a one-size-fits-all concept but a personal journey shaped by one’s values, environment, and aspirations.
By the end of the course, students will have developed personalized action plans, renewed confidence, and lifelong strategies to stay focused, energized, and optimistic—no matter where life takes them. Whether facing academic pressures, career decisions, or personal obstacles, this course offers practical tools and global perspectives to stay motivated and lead with purpose.
Do you like this personal
target_audience: Everyone with a dream or task that they want to achieve in life

courses.title: Unstoppable Motivation: Take Action Now
courses.bio: Master motivation, eliminate procrastination, and rewire your mind to take consistent action effortlessly every day.
objectives: Unlock unstoppable motivation and take action daily—without relying on outside motivational tapes or sheer willpower.
Eliminate procrastination for good using a simple technique that rewires your mind to stay focused and productive effortless
Tap into your subconscious power to boost confidence, break free from self-doubt, and make decisions with total clarity.
Master the science of motivation so you can create lasting habits, stay driven, and achieve your goals faster than ever before.

Module 2 - The Science of Motivation: How Our Mind Receive and Process Information

requirements: No prior knowledge or experience is needed—just a willingness to learn.
An open mind to apply new motivation techniques in daily life.
A notepad or journal to complete exercises and track progress.
A desire to break free from procrastination and take action!
courses.description:
Do you struggle with motivation, procrastination, or staying consistent with your goals? What if you could wake up every day feeling focused, driven, and ready to take action—without relying on outside motivational tapes or speeches?


This course will teach you how to rewire your brain for motivation, break free from procrastination, and develop powerful habits that make success automatic. You will learn how to create motivation from within, so you don’t have to depend on external factors to feel inspired.


Many people rely on willpower, but that’s why they fail. Willpower fades, but the right mindset lasts. This course gives you the exact NLP-based technique to reprogram your subconscious mind for motivation, helping you stay driven no matter what. You’ll also discover a separate step-by-step strategy to eliminate procrastination, so you can take action effortlessly—even when you don’t feel like it.


What You’ll Learn:


The science of motivation—understand what truly drives action and how to stay motivated long-term.
A proven NLP-based technique to create self-motivation and tap into your inner drive effortlessly.
How to reprogram your subconscious mind to eliminate self-doubt and boost confidence.
A step-by-step strategy to eliminate procrastination and take action without hesitation.
The pain and pleasure principle—use it to stay motivated without relying on willpower.


Practical exercises and workbook activities to apply what you learn immediately.


Who This Course Is For:


Managers, professionals, and team leaders who want to stay motivated and productive every day.
Anyone struggling with procrastination who wants a proven system to take action effortlessly.
Individuals looking to master self-motivation and take control of their mindset for long-term success.


This course is packed with practical exercises, NLP techniques for motivation, and proven mindset strategies to help you take action effortlessly.


By the end of this course, you’ll no longer feel stuck, unmotivated, or overwhelmed. Instead, you’ll have a powerful motivation system that helps you take action, make the right decisions, and move toward your goals with confidence.


Are you ready to eliminate procrastination and unlock unstoppable motivation? Click “Buy Now” and start your transformation today!
target_audience: Hospitality professionals, managers, and team leaders who want to stay motivated and lead with confidence.
Anyone struggling with procrastination who wants a proven system to take action effortlessly.
People looking to boost self-motivation and eliminate the need for outside motivation to stay productive.
Those who want to master their mindset using NLP techniques to build confidence and make better decisions.

courses.title: Get Motivated! Motivational course.
courses.bio: Learn to turn on motivation and conquer your life!
objectives: How to turn on motivation on demand. Motivation can assist in every area of self development. Learn how to build a strategy to turn motivation on.
How to systematically conquer goals.
How to change that which you don't want or need in your life.
How to find your purpose.
Become more motivated with our live motivational speeches.

Step1 Understanding Motivation: The what and why of motivation
Changing your Mindset: You can live your dream motivational speech!

requirements: Life experiences
courses.description: Motivation is crucial in conquering your life. As an award winning motivational speaker I have learned how to motivate people. Helping them find the motivation from with in to start to move forward in life. Research has shown that motivation can increase production by 50 percent. Can you imagine what you can accomplish with 50 percent more? Believe it or not you can use motivation like a tool.  You can call upon motivation strategically. This course will show what I have done that got me from being a homeless single father on the streets to an award winning speaker, coach, author, business owner, and Doctor of business. There is more! Motivation allowed me to take control of my health. There was also a time where my diabetes was killing me. I was on insulin, pills, and experimental shots. Nothing worked and my sugar was out of control. I knew I was the only one that could do something about it. I lost 150 pounds and now use no insulin.  It is not luck. These changes did not have anything to do with luck! It is the ability to get motivated when needed. As a motivational speaker I learned techniques that allow for an individual to use what they have to get to where they are going. These techniques are easy and can be implemented through out life, career and business. You have that ability and this course will show you how to call upon that ability.
target_audience: This course is for individuals who want to live a more motivated life. Using what they know to get excited about where they want to be!

courses.bio: Stop procrastinating. Build habits, boost focus & get things done — with zero burnout.
objectives: Understand the real psychology and neuroscience behind procrastination — and how to overcome it using science-based strategies.
Identify your personal procrastination triggers and build custom routines to make getting started easier and friction-free.
Create sustainable micro-goals, daily rituals, and habit systems to stay consistent without relying on motivation or willpower.
Design your ideal focus environment, reduce distractions, and build powerful planning and accountability systems that last.
Learn how to build momentum using the 2-minute rule and small wins that rewire your brain for daily progress.
Master energy and mindset with simple morning and evening rituals that boost clarity, calm, and emotional control.
Discover powerful tools to reset your focus and motivation in just 90 seconds — anytime, anywhere.
Replace guilt and shame with self-compassion and clarity to break the procrastination cycle for good.
Use proven accountability systems and environmental design to stay on track without stress or burnout.
Build a personalized anti-procrastination toolkit to handle setbacks and get back on track instantly.

Understand Procrastination & Reclaim You: Why You Procrastinate: The Real Science Behind Inaction

Staying on Track and Building Momentum

requirements: No prior knowledge or experience required. This course is designed for beginners and busy individuals who struggle with procrastination and want to improve focus, motivation, and daily productivity using simple, science-backed strategies.
courses.description:
Overcome Procrastination: Build Motivation & Get Things Done


Struggling to focus at work? Tired of delays, distractions, and unfinished tasks?


This science-based course is designed specifically for professionals, entrepreneurs, and teams who want to stop procrastinating and start performing at their best—without burnout.
You’ll learn a proven, psychology-backed system to overcome mental resistance, manage overwhelm, and turn motivation into momentum—even on low-energy days.


What You'll Learn:
The real root causes of procrastination (dopamine cycles, decision fatigue & stress patterns)
How to rewire your brain for focus using simple neuroscience-backed tactics
Sustainable routines to take action without relying on motivation
How to build a daily structure that eliminates distractions
The difference between working hard vs. working smart—and how to shift


Your Personal Anti-Procrastination Toolkit Includes:
2-Minute Activation Method – start any task with zero resistance
Clarity & Focus Rituals – reduce mental clutter and regain control
Digital Detox Templates – manage distractions and reclaim your time
Accountability Systems – stay on track without pressure
Easy Daily Planning Flow – create structure in under 5 minutes


Ideal For:
Busy professionals who want more focus and less stress at work
Remote workers struggling with structure and energy
Leaders & teams seeking better time management and consistency
Entrepreneurs & freelancers needing momentum and self-discipline
High-performers who want to optimize routines and productivity


Results You Can Expect:
Get more done in less time—without burnout
Build consistency with easy, repeatable habits
Turn daily overwhelm into focused execution
Create a realistic action plan that sticks


This is not a quick fix. It’s a mindset and system shift built on neuroscience, behavioral psychology, and habit design.
Perfect for individual learners and companies using Udemy Business to upskill teams in time management, motivation, and personal effectiveness.


Take back control of your time, energy, and results. Let’s get things done.

courses.title: Персональный Тренинг: Рождение Вашей Жизни
courses.bio: Создайте жизнь своей мечты и начните ею жить каждый день уже сейчас!
objectives: вы раскроете свою внутреннюю силу, повысите свой уровень энергетики
вы будете концентрироваться на главном, не отвлекаясь на второстепенные вещи
вы обретете глубинный смысл в ежедневных действиях, который будет вас мотивировать и вдохновлять
у вас уйдут сомнения в том, что вы делаете - появится полное понимание смысла жизни
вы избавитесь от навязчивых страхов, разных барьеров и ограничений мешающих жить
у вас откроется видение своей жизни на месяц, год, 5, 10, 20 лет вперед
у вас будет четкая "карта жизни" и вы будете точно знать куда идти
у вас появится упорство в достижении поставленных целей
все ваши поступки будут осознаны, появится внутренняя радость от осознания, что “все делаешь правильно”
вы правильно расставите приоритеты своих жизненных целей и будете точно знать последовательность очередных действий, все будет просто, как “раз-два-три…”
у вас появится баланс в жизни, вы начнете быть собой, жить своей жизнью!

Принципы Жизни: 08. Принцип. Сначала помоги себе, потом помогай другим
09. Принцип. Тотальная честность с самим собой
11. Принцип. Нельзя сравнивать себя с другими
13. Принцип. Зная ЗАЧЕМ, преодолеешь любое КАК
14. Принцип. Правильный вопрос дает правильный ответ
17. Принцип. Единство тела, разума и души
21. Принцип. Приятно, не приятно, полезно мне, другим, служит всеобщему благу
Материализация Жизни: 42. Принцип. Самый простой и легкий способ
46. Принцип. Не ходи там, где скользко - не упадешь
47. Принцип. Матч состоится при любой погоде
Бонусы: Бонус 1. Визуализация и вход в образ

requirements: Самые базовые навыки работы с компьютером
Распечатать "Рабочую Тетрадь" для выполнения домашних заданий
courses.description:
Как часто вы обманывались в своей жизни? А заблуждались? Сколько раз достигали целей, которые не доставляли счастья? Что такое подлинное счастье, и как его достичь? Как перестать мучить себя от бесконечной заботы о завтрашнем дне и начать получать удовольствие от каждого прожитого дня?  И, пожалуй, самое главное: как перестать копировать чью-то жизнь и начать жить своей жизнью?

Ответ – в этом тренинге: "Персональный Тренинг: Рождение Вашей Жизни".
Автор предлагает рассмотреть жизнь с позиции нерушимых жизненных принципов, благодаря которым каждый сможет решить проблемы во всех сферах человеческой жизни, основными их которых являются: здоровье, благосостояние и личные отношения. Наряду с принципами, эффективные методики позволят вам в кратчайшее время обрести уверенность в завтрашнем дне и начать жить полной жизнью уже сейчас.
Пройдя его вы уже не будете сомневаться в своем жизненном пути, вы будете точно ЗНАТЬ!

-Для кого этот тренинг-
Для тех, кто устал жить не своей жизнью, кто остро нуждается в возвращении к истинному Я и восстановлении баланса и гармонии. Если вы давно не ощущали себя полным сил и желания наслаждаться жизнью - самое время это исправить, пройдя этот тренинг.
target_audience: Данный курс предназначен для тех, кто желает выявить свои истинные цели и начать достигать их легко и естественно.
Кому надоело: Мучить Себя и Хочется Начать Жить Своей Жизнью Уже Сейчас!

requirements: Bu eğitime katılmak için herhangi bir ön koşul bulunmamaktadır. Eğitim motivasyonunu geliştirmek isteyen herkese açıktır.
courses.description:
Motivasyon, hedeflerinize ulaşmak için gerekli olan itici güçtür. Motivasyonunuz güçlüyse, zorlukların üstesinden gelebilir ve hedeflerinize ulaşabilirsiniz. Ancak, motivasyonunuz düşükse, hedeflerinize ulaşmak için gereken çabayı göstermek zor olabilir. Bu eğitim, kariyerinize yön vermenize, motivasyonunuzu geliştirmenize ve hedeflerinize ulaşmanıza yardımcı olacak bilgiler ve beceriler kazandırmayı amaçlamaktadır
"148 Adımda Kariyerini Planla" adlı kariyer planlama eğitimi ile hayatınıza olumlu bir etki bırakarak, kişisel ve profesyonel hedeflere ulaşmanıza yardımcı olmayı amaçlayan kapsamlı bir programdır. Bu eğitim, sizlere motivasyonunuzu güçlendirmek ve içsel potansiyelinizi ortaya çıkarmak için benzersiz bir yol haritası sunar.
Katılımcılar, bu eğitim sayesinde engellerle başa çıkma becerilerini geliştirirken, kendi içsel potansiyellerini keşfetme ve bu potansiyelleri en üst düzeye çıkarma konusunda bilinçlenirler. "148 Adımda Kariyerini Planla" eğitimi, bireylere hayallerine daha yakın adımlar atma ve daha tatmin edici bir yaşam sürme konusunda güçlü bir destek sağlar.
Programın temelinde, güçlü bir motivasyonun nasıl oluşturulacağına dair 148 adım bulunmaktadır. Her adım, katılımcıları kendi hedeflerine odaklanmaya, engellerle başa çıkmaya ve başarıya ulaşma konusunda yönlendirir. Eğitim, pozitif düşünce, hedef belirleme, zaman yönetimi ve stresle başa çıkma gibi konularda pratik stratejiler sunar.
Katılımcılar, interaktif oturumlar, grup çalışmaları ve kişisel refleksiyonlar aracılığıyla kendi motivasyonlarını anlama ve geliştirme fırsatı bulacaklardır. Ayrıca, gerçek hayat hikayeleri ve başarı öyküleriyle desteklenen eğitim, katılımcılara ilham verici bir atmosfer sunarak motivasyonlarını artırmalarına yardımcı olur.
"148 Adımda Kariyerini Planla" eğitimi, katılımcılara sadece kısa vadeli değil, aynı zamanda uzun vadeli başarılar elde etmeleri için güçlü bir temel oluşturmayı hedefler. Bu program, bireylerin potansiyellerini keşfetmelerine, zorlukların üstesinden gelmelerine ve hayallerine daha yakından ulaşmalarına yardımcı olacak bir rehberlik sunar.
target_audience: Motivasyonlarını geliştirmek isteyen herkes

requirements: A willingness to learn new habits

courses.description:
The Complete Daily Positive Habits Building Course
You can build strong, new, healthy habits quickly and get rid of old, bad habits just as fast. TJ Walker has created an innovative SelfieSpeak Programming (SSP) method to help you take charge of your own brain and habits.
Currently, most people have their habits directed by their cell phones. If the first thing you look at in the morning is your email and the last thing you look at before sleeping is your text messages, then you are having your habits dictated by your mobile phone. But we can't throw away our phones. TJ Walker has created a system for programming your brain to adopt and then stick to a set of new habits of your choosing.
You can choose your habits!
The key is that you must use a simple, easy, quick way to reinforce these habits, daily, in order for them to take permanent root.
Do you have tons of willpower and self-discipline? Then this course is not for you. This course is for average people and lazy people - those who start New Year's resolutions and diets, but don't stick with them for very long.
If you are looking for a new system of building positive habits, one that is completely different than existing programs, then you have come to the right place.
If you've tried NLP, self-hypnosis, affirmations and reading a ton of self-help books but nothing really stuck for the long term, then you need to give The Complete Daily Positive Habits Building Course a try.


Here is what Udemy students say about this course:
"Nice to learn how to improve and create our daily positive habits building up." Michael Lin
"reinforce daily habits and sticking to the process, just do it." Ray Causly
"I was feeling a bit stuck, bad habits, carb loading, not walking, low energy. It helped me to jump start to get back on a healthier track, it provided me with many tools I have already started to incorporate into my daily routine" Marianne Shaw


Enroll now, to begin a lifetime of positive habits and fulfilled living. Sign up today to take advantage of this limited offer.
This course also teaches students more about the following topics: Best Practices for Reducing Stress, Boost Resilience with Mindfulness, and Achieve Better Work/Life Balance,
This Habits course is ideal for anyone searching for more info on the following: habits - good habits - procrastination - positive psychology - positive habits. Plus, this course will be a great addition to anyone trying to build out their knowledge in the following areas: daily habits - neuroplasticity - procrastination - brain training - positive psychology.

The well-disciplined AND the lazy

courses.description:
In this course you will learn what is needed to become a great mentor and help others grow and succeed. We will cover the skills and attitudes, as well as a methodology that will give you the tools to become a great mentor.


Students from around the globe rate this course with 4.5-5 stars:
"It's an exemplary course, the explanations are amazing and the tonation of the tutor is encouraging, it gives me the urge to listen to more and more of his tutorials." Fidel Martin
"Well structured course, with excellent advice, quick, clear and easy to apply into practice." Raimondo Molinario


So, can you mentor others without a PHD? Well, you can become a mentor independently of your, credentials, knowledge, or professional experience. Mentoring skills can be used by everyone in many situations.
Mentoring essentially, is guiding someone on a specific skill or subject. It’s about personal development and growth, it’s about dealing with situations, be it at work, or in any other type of organization. However, more than anything, mentoring is about communicating in an inspiring way.
This course is built for everyone, individuals who are part of a larger organization that offers a mentoring program, and as well individuals who are not part of any organization, but want to deepen their mentoring skills.
By the end of this course you will be able to properly prepare and handle mentoring sessions and you will also significantly improve your communication skills.

courses.bio: 科学×心理学×時間術で生産性を3倍に
objectives: 先延ばしの理解（定義、心理学的背景、自己診断など）
マインドセットの変革（固定VS成長マインドセット、自己効力感など）

先延ばしの理解: コース概要と自己紹介
先延ばしとは何か: 定義と一般的な誤解

目標設定と計画: 大きな目標を小さなタスクに分解する技術

タイムブロッキング：集中力を最大化する
2分ルール：小さなタスクを即座に処理する
デジタルツールを活用した時間管理
モチベーション維持戦略: 内発的動機付けVS外発的動機付け
報酬システムの構築：小さな成功を祝う
アカウンタビリティパートナーの活用

継続的な学習と成長のための戦略
コース総括: 行動計画の作成

requirements: 難しいスキルは不要。先延ばしを克服し、自己実現をしたい全ての方のためのコースです。
courses.description:
■ こんな悩みはありませんか？
- 「やるべきタスク」が頭を占領しているのに手が動かない
- 締切が近づくほど焦るのに、つい SNS や動画を見てしまう
- To-Do リストは作るけれど消化できず自己嫌悪のループ
- 忙しくて時間が足りないのに生産性が上がらない


本講座は、脳科学・行動心理学・時間管理術を組み合わせて
「先延ばし癖」を短期集中でリセットし、誰でも自然に動ける仕組みを
インストールする実践型プログラムです。


────────────────────────
■ 受講後に得られる 5 つの成果
1. タスク着手までの迷いゼロ ─ 5秒ルール×環境設計で即行動
2. 生産性 200〜300％ 向上 ─ ポモドーロ改×集中トリガーで深い集中を量産
3. 自己肯定感アップ ─ 小さな成功ループで「やればできる」を脳に刷り込む
4. 目標マネジメント力 ─ SMARTシートで進捗を可視化
5. 再発しない仕組み化 ─ 習慣維持フレーム＋AIツール活用で自動化モードへ


────────────────────────
■ コース構成（合計約 5時間）
Week1: 先延ばしの科学と自己診断／モチベーション神話を壊す
Week2: タスク細分化＆環境デザイン／5秒ルール×If-Thenプランニング
Week3: 集中力ブースト術／ポモドーロ改×ドーパミンマネジメント
Week4: 習慣維持システム／AI・自動化ツール活用／振り返り＆次月設計


＋ボーナストラック
・受講生がぶつかりやすい壁を乗り越えるためのQ&Aセッション動画


────────────────────────
■ 受講スタイル
- 動画：約 5 時間
- 毎回ワークシート＆実践課題 → 翌週レビュー
- スマホ視聴 OK／倍速再生対応


────────────────────────
■ 対象者
- 仕事・勉強・副業が「頭ではわかるのに進まない」20〜40 代
- タスク管理本を読んでも実践が続かなかった方
- 行動量＝成果のビジネスパーソン・クリエイター・学生


────────────────────────
■ 今すぐ行動を始めよう
“いつかやる”を“今やる”に変え、人生のレバレッジを最大化しませんか？
「先延ばしが癖だったのが嘘みたい」と感じる未来を想像してみてください。
受講ボタンをクリックして、今日から行動習慣を手に入れましょう！
target_audience: 仕事で毎日のタスクに追われている方
語学学習、旅行、筋トレなどいつかやりたいな、と思っているがなかなか始められない方
やらなければいけないことがあるのになかなか取り組めず、いつもギリギリになってしまう方
自分の夢があるが、やりたいと思っていることをずっと先延ばしにしている方

courses.description:
Alışkanlık, otomatikleşecek kadar çok tekrarlanmış davranıştır. Davranışlar duygulara, duygular ise kimliğinize bağlıdır. Altıncı his diye de ifade edebileceğimiz otomatik alışkanlıkları yaparken farketmeyiz bile. İçgüdülerimiz tarafından yönetildiğini düşündüğümüz bu alışkanlıklar aslında beynimizin ve vücudumuzun hiç düşünmediği alışkanlıklardır. Bir eylemin veya eylemsizliğin bedeli ne kadar ağırsa; onu hatırlamak da o kadar ağır olacaktır.
İyi alışkanlıkları güçlendirerek, bunun duygu ve düşüncelerinize katkısını görebilirsiniz. Küçük değişimler ile büyük farklar yaratılabilir.
Alışkanlıkların nasıl oluştuğunu öğrenmek değiştirmek ve geliştirmek için önemlidir. 21 günde yapılan alışkanlık olur dense de konu bu kadar basite indirgenemez. Çünkü bu 21 günde motivasyonu nasıl sağlayacağınız, alışkanlığı nasıl cazip kılacağınız ve zaman yönetimini nasıl yapacağınız önemlidir. Alışkanlıkları basit adımlar ile kolaydan zora doğru inşa etmek sizi başarıya ulaştırmakta yardımcı olur.
Bir alışkanlık edinmek için onun pratiğini yapmalısınız. Pratik her zaman planlamadan daha etkilidir. Profesyoneller programa bağlı kalır, amatörler hayatın araya girmesine izin verirler. Siz de bu eğitimde öğrenecekleriniz ile profesyonel bir bakışa kavuşacak, hayatın hedeflerinizle araya girmesine izin vermeyeceksiniz.
Sadece iyi alışkanlıklar edinmekle kalmayacak, onları korumayı da öğreneceksiniz.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________
Bu eğitimde;


Hedeflerini planlayamayanlar,
Alışkanlıklarını yönetemeyenler,
Kötü alışkanlıklardan kurtulmak isteyenler,
Hayatını düzenli hale getiremeyenler,
Hedeflerine ulaşmakta zorlananlar,

Yapacakları küçük değişiklikler ile büyük sonuçlar alabileceklerini ve çağımızın hastalığı olan "erteleme"ye nasıl son vereceklerini öğrenebilirler.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________


İş ve Özel Yaşamda Alışkanlıkları Yönetmenin Sırrı Eğitimi Size Neler Kazandıracak?


Alışkanlıklarınızın çevreyle ve sizle olan ilişkisini keşfedeceksiniz.
İş ve Özel yaşamda ilişkileriniz olumlu yönde geliştirebileceksiniz.
Aile içi iletişimde alışkanlıkların önemini farkedeceksiniz.
Motivasyonu nasıl artırabileceğinizi uygulamalarla göreceksiniz.
İyi alışkanlıkları koruma farkındalığını edineceksiniz.
Öğrendiklerinizi gerçek hayata uygulayabileceksiniz.
Eğitimi bir Bütünsel Gelişim Koçu'ndan alacaksınız.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________________


İş ve Özel Yaşamda Alışkanlıkları Yönetmenin Sırrı Eğitiminde Öğrenecekleriniz?


Kötü alışkanlıklarınızdan kurtulmak için uygulayabileceğiniz teknikleri,
Alışkanlık olarak nitelendirdiğimiz davranışların aslında nasıl oluştuğunu,

requirements: Être ouvert d’esprit et prêt à passer à l’action
courses.description:
Cours complet sur la motivation, confiance en soi et productivité
Cette formation contient tout ce que vous devez savoir pour booster votre motivation, améliorer votre confiance et atteindre vos objectifs. Ce contenu sera mis à jour régulièrement pour rajouter mes dernières trouvailles dans le domaine de la motivation, productivité, la gestion du temps, la définition des objectifs, la réussite personnelle et les habitudes des personnes qui réussissent.
Voici quelques témoignages venant de participants à mes cours :
« Je suis content de pouvoir écouter des personnes comme Jamal. C’est concret, il va à l'essentiel, il y a du véritable partage, c'est précis et surtout on sent qu'il sait de quoi il parle avec une belle préparation en amont. Je ne peux que recommander c'est clairement un investissement à faire!l ». Salahddine
«Agréablement surpris par ce cours, j'ai appris plein de choses. Du coup, grosse remise en question qui tombe au meilleur moment dans ma vie. Très motivant ! » Nicolas
« Merci pour le concret, la clarté et la synthèse! »  Lyne
_________________________________________
Pourquoi rejoindre cette formation sur la productivité et la gestion du temps?

Si vous voulez booster votre motivation ?
Si vous avez plein de choses à faire mais vous manquez toujours de temps pour les réaliser ?
Si vous n’êtes pas clair sur ce qui vous bloque aujourd’hui dans l’atteinte de vos objectifs ?
Si vous pensez avoir un grand potentiel mais vous n’arrivez pas à vous motiver pour passer à l’action ?
Cette formation est pour vous.
Malheureusement la plupart des gens n’ont pas un problème d’idées mais un problème d’exécution. Ils n’ont la force et l’énergie pour se lever tous les matins et partir à la réalisation de leurs rêves.
Aujourd’hui plus que jamais, les choses changent à une vitesse incroyable. Il y a tellement d’informations à retenir, tellement d’opportunités à saisir, qu’on a l’impression de ne plus savoir où donner de la tête. Beaucoup de personnes dispersent leurs énergies, manquent de concentration et finissent en burnout.
Si vous aussi, vous vous demandez, comment se fait-il que certaines personnes arrivent à accomplir en un mois ce que d’autres accomplissent en un an ? Quelle est la différence entre les personnes qui ont réalisé de grand succès dans leur vie et la majorité de gens ?
Cette formation vous apportera des réponses à toutes ces questions.
Vous n’avez pas besoin de deviner ou passer des mois ou des années à réinventer la roue. Cette formation vous guidera étape par étape dans l’accomplissement de vos objectifs aussi ambitieux soient-ils.
Avec des objectifs clairs et des stratégies pour les atteindre, vous serez inarrêtable. Vous n’aurez plus besoin de vous motiver pour passer à l’action. Vous n’aurez plus peur d’oser plus de choses.
Les personnes qui ont réalisé de grand succès dans leur vie font des choses au quotidien qui leur ont permis d’arriver là où elles sont. Mais la plupart des gens ignorent ces pratiques et rituels. Cette formation vous aidera à mettre en place les mêmes rituels pour avoir les mêmes résultats. Que ce soit pour vos finances, votre carrière, vos relations ou votre santé.
Je crois profondément que le contenu de cette formation peut transformer votre vie si vous étudiez tout le contenu et que vous mettez en place toutes les stratégies.
Le contenu de la formation est conçu pour aller directement à l’essentiel.
Apprenez des stratégies efficaces pour une motivation durable et les erreurs à éviter
Définissez des objectifs clairs et ambitieux et ayez des stratégies pour les réaliser
Clarifiez votre vision et découvrez votre passion à l’aide de 5 questions puissantes
Augmentez votre niveau d’énergie pour réaliser plus de choses dans votre journée
Evitez le burnout avec ces techniques d’organisation
Découvrez comment les personnes qui réussissent structurent leurs journées
Réalisez plus de choses tout en restant détendu
Apprenez des techniques scientifiquement prouvées pour éliminer la peur de l’action
Mettez en place des rituels pour être atteindre vos objectifs plus rapidement
Apprenez des techniques pour rester concentré et ne travailler que sur l’essentiel
Apprenez à gérer votre temps afin de maximiser vos résultats
Entrainez-vous à l’aide d’exercices pratiques pour appliquer les concepts de la formation
Maintenant, si vous êtes prêt pour faire passer votre vie au niveau supérieur, je vous dis a tout de suite à l’intérieur.
target_audience: Cette formation s’adresse particulièrement à tous ceux qui ont de grands rêves et qui ont besoin de motivation, de confiance et de stratégies efficaces pour les réaliser.
La formation s’adresse aussi aux personnes qui ont de l’ambition mais qui ne sont pas clairs sur leur passion ou ce qu’ils veulent faire dans la vie.
Etudiants, employés ou entrepreneurs qui veulent booster leur niveau de motivation.

objectives: This course covers every concepts to Pass PL-900: Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals Exam
Latest Updated course PL-900: Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals Certification
Learn and Clear PL-900: Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals Certification exam confidently
