requirements: No IT prerequisites required
courses.description:
Only PL-900: Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals course that you need. The PL-900: Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals certification course is designed to introduce you to the essential capabilities of Microsoft Power Platform, a low-code technology suite that empowers individuals and organizations to analyze data, automate processes, and create business solutions with ease. This course provides a solid foundation for understanding how the Power Platform enhances productivity and supports digital transformation in today’s business landscape.
The course emphasizes the four main components of the Power Platform: Power BI, Power Apps, Power Automate, and Power Virtual Agents. You will gain insights into how these applications integrate seamlessly to provide end-to-end solutions. Power BI focuses on data visualization and analysis, enabling users to turn raw data into meaningful insights through interactive dashboards and reports. Power Apps empowers you to build custom applications without extensive coding knowledge, allowing businesses to address specific needs quickly. Power Automate introduces you to workflow automation, where repetitive tasks can be streamlined to improve efficiency. Lastly, Power Virtual Agents equips you with the ability to create intelligent chatbots that can interact with users and resolve queries without requiring advanced technical expertise.
The PL-900 course equips you with the confidence to explore, experiment, and embrace low-code solutions, ensuring you are well-prepared to contribute to the digital innovation strategies of modern organizations.
target_audience: This PL-900: Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals course is for anyone wanting to obtain the knowledge to pass the PL-900 Certification

courses.title: The Confident Mind - Change your beliefs, change your life!
courses.bio: Learn simple, practical and exact techniques to eliminate negative thoughts, negative beliefs and install confidence !!
objectives: Get over fears, negative self-sabotaging thoughts that ruin their personal and professional lives
Learn simple ways to banish fears coming from self doubts
Take bolder decisions, take actions on your goals and live a fuller life.
Apply belief busting techniques on others (your clients, boss or team members)

Welcome note: Introduction: What does this course cover and what will you get from it
The Theory and Structure of Beliefs: The Structure of Human experience. How we process information
How beliefs are formed. The Beliefs - Emotions - Behavior connection
A simple belief Formula: First tip to break a belief
BONUS case study: How Core beliefs influence every aspect of our life !!
How to bust negative thoughts and belief: Master Formula to neutralise any negative thought and unwanted belief
Belief busting STRATEGY 1: The Woooosh Technique
Belief busting STRATEGY 2: 7 Questions To Break Any Belief
Belief busting STRATEGY 3: Part 1- From Behavior to Intention
Belief busting STRATEGY 3: Part 2 - Changing Key Words
Belief busting STRATEGY 3: Part 3 - Changing Context

requirements: List of limiting beliefs and negative thoughts that prevent you from achieving your goals
A desire to break free from negative beliefs
Willingness to try new techniques that shatter your fears and doubts
courses.description:
You are, what you are, because of the beliefs that you hold in your mind today. Change beliefs…change life.
But what is a belief actually? Well…beliefs are those unconscious (and sometimes even conscious) thoughts that mechanically drive you to take decisions and actions in response to situations in life. Almost uncontrollably…like a robot.
Are you going through repeated patterns of procrastination – avoiding certain decisions and activities because you are surrounded by fears and negative thoughts?
Do you find it difficult to open up easily with people? Is this affecting your work or relationships?
Are you scared of taking important decisions or even take actions, because in the past they have always gone wrong?
Are you feeling hopeless or helpless in solving certain problems?
Are you finding it difficult to close deals because you feel customers don’t like your products/ price/ capabilities or perhaps that you are not getting the right support?
Do you worry that you are a failure…or a victim of failed relationship that is preventing you from getting into another one?
Do you get angry all the time on yourself?
The fact is, since we are 3 years old, our mind is constantly ‘programmed’ by family, parents, teachers, books, friends, TV and events about what we can and can’t achieve in life. And these beliefs unconsciously soak into our psyche and make sure that we achieve exactly that…and nothing else.
Interestingly, beliefs are not the event itself, but mere interpretation and meanings from that event. That is why, an event that can scare a person forever can spur another person into limitless motivation and determination to win. Since our beliefs and fears are our own creation, it is equally possible to alter or squash them.
As we go through the course, we will explore various methods to identify and change undesired beliefs. And once you understand these methods, you can even help others in changing their beliefs and hence, unlock their hidden potential.
In this course you will learn:
How beliefs are formed and what is their structure
How negative beliefs build unproductive behavioral patterns that steal away crucial opportunities from our life.
The intricate layers of beliefs that safely hide away the core-belief. How to unpeel the layers and trace your core belief, in easy steps.
Step by step precise practical methods to eliminate negative thoughts and beliefs blocking your success and help you unleash your full potential. I will teach you three different methods, each very unique and simple to blow away any unproductive belief that is causing repeated patterns of negative behaviour in your life.
The techniques you will learn are based on proven psychological concepts that have come through years of research. I have personally used them on hundreds of people over past 15 years and led them to incredible freedom from self-sabotaging thoughts and patterns.
target_audience: Business people, Corporate employees, Home makers, Students who are trapped in a web of negative thoughts and self doubts.
Entrepreneurs who are scared of taking important decisions and procrastinate, because in the past they have always gone wrong
Women and men who are worried about getting into relationships because of bad past experiences
Professional Coaches and psychologists looking for new techniques to break negative beliefs of their Clients

requirements: Keine Programmierkenntnisse nötig. Du lernst alles, was du wissen musst
courses.description:
Hallo zusammen, ich bin Chen Xiaoyun, ein Schülerin des chinesischen Finanzintelligenz-Mentors Meister Zhou Wenqiang. Ich freue mich sehr, euch zu diesem Finanzintelligenz Training Camp begrüßen zu dürfen. Dieses Trainingscamp ist ein sehr praktischer Kurs, der auf die Schüler von Meister Zhou zugeschnitten ist. Hier werde ich die Kursinhalte von Meister Zhou originalgetreu wiedergeben und alle dazu anleiten, gemeinsam Finanzintelligenz zu erlernen.  Meister Zhou nennt dieses Trainingscamp „Die erstaunlichsten 24 Lektionen der finanziellen Intelligenz in der Welt“. Das liegt daran, dass es einmal ein Buch gab, das Meister Zhou's Schicksal veränderte, es hieß „The Meister Key System“. Meister Zhou verkaufte Hunderttausende von Exemplaren dieses Buches durch Live-Streaming auf Douyin. „The Master Key System“ ist auch als das im Silicon Valley verbotene Buch bekannt. Als dieses Buch veröffentlicht wurde, wurde es direkt von vielen Silicon-Valley-Milliardären aufgekauft, die alle Exemplare kauften und vernichteten. Mehr als 100 Jahre lang konnte niemand dieses Buch sehen, weil es die Geheimnisse des Reichtums enthüllte.

Warum will Meister Zhou das Trainingscamp eröffnen? Lassen uns zunächst kurz über den Ursprung dieses Trainingskurses sprechen. Aufgrund der zeitweiligen Auswirkungen der Pandemie konnten die Offline-Kurse von Meister Zhou nicht offiziell gestartet werden. Meister Zhou hat es sich jedoch zur Aufgabe gemacht, hundert Millionen Familien zu finanzieller Freiheit sowie körperlichem und geistigem Wohlbefinden zu verhelfen. Vor Jahren war Meister Zhou ein armer Junge, der in einer einfachen ländlichen Gegend von Xinxiang, Henan, geboren wurde. Als er 15 Jahre alt war, ging sein Vater in Konkurs, und er musste die Mittelschule abbrechen und in Fabriken, auf Baustellen und sogar als Verkäufer auf der Straße arbeiten. Zu dieser Zeit fühlte er sich wie ein heimatloser Hund. Doch ein Buch änderte sein Schicksal auf magische Weise-"Rich Dad, Poor Dad" from Robert Kiyosaki.

Stell dir einen 17-jährigen Jungen voller Träume vor, der in schäbigen Mietwohnungen in Luoyang, Zhengzhou, Shenzhen, Guangzhou und Beijing lebte. Immer wenn er bei der Arbeit auf Schwierigkeiten und Rückschläge stieß, griff er zu diesem Buch. Dieses Buch war Herr Zhous Überzeugung, sein Glaube und sein Leitfaden. Wahrlich, Meister Zhous Schicksal wurde durch dieses Buch verändert.

Als Lehrer Zhou das Buch mit 17 zum ersten Mal las, träumte er davon, Unternehmer und Investor zu werden, um finanzielle Freiheit zu erreichen. Obwohl er geplant hatte, dieses Ziel in 28 Jahren zu erreichen, schaffte er es tatsächlich in nur 8 Jahren.

Nach seinem Erfolg entschied er sich nicht dafür, die Welt zu bereisen und das Leben zu genießen. Stattdessen erinnerte er sich an das Gelübde, das er mit 17 abgelegt hatte: "Wenn 'Rich Dad Poor Dad' mir helfen kann, mein Leben zu verändern und finanzielle Freiheit zu erreichen, werde ich mein Leben der finanziellen Bildung widmen, um anderen zu helfen, die wie ich ganz von vorne anfangen mussten."

Deshalb haben wir heute die Gelegenheit, diese 24 erstaunlichen Finanzbildungskurse zu lernen.
target_audience: Jeder, der nicht mehr Sklave von Geld sein möchtet

courses.description:
忙しすぎるリーダーが、ストレスと不機嫌から抜け出すための“行動変容ハック”講座！


あなたが不機嫌だと、その空気は部下に、組織に、家族にまで伝わってしまいます。
でも…忙しすぎる今、そんなこと、わかってても難しいですよね？


VUCAの時代。
上からは責められ、下からは突き上げられ、プライベートの時間もなく、健康診断の結果も不安。
疲れがたまり、イライラしがちで、つい周りに当たってしまう…。

――そんな毎日、送っていませんか？


実は私も、かつては「まったくご機嫌ではない」日々を送っていました。
そんな私が10年以上かけて学び、実践し、クライアントにも試してきた“ご機嫌ハック”を、この講座でお届けします。




この講座では、以下のような課題を感じている方におすすめです。


自分の感情をマネジメントできず、自己嫌悪になることがある
忙しすぎて、セルフケアや振り返りの時間が取れない
ストレスの処理方法が分からず、つい周囲に影響を与えてしまう
「モチベーション管理」がうまくいかず、疲弊している


学べるのは、時間・感情・人間関係・モチベーションを整えるためのご機嫌ルーティンの設計方法と、
行動変容のプロコーチである中島克也が実践してきたセルフコーチングの技術です。


どれも簡単に始められて、コツコツ継続することで、
「10年後のあなた」から「今のあなた」への感謝の言葉が聞こえるようになるはずです。


人生100年時代。今日が一番若い日。
「ご機嫌で生きる」を、今から始めてみませんか？
target_audience: 多くの人に影響を与える経営者やリーダー

courses.description:
If I ask you "Who are you"?


Can you really answer that question?


In the current educational system, we have rarely been taught how to truly live our own lives. So we'd easily get lost in our life journey, especially when we're grown up.


In this Self-Discovery 3 months course, I'd like to let you discover yourself step by step through each week's practice. In the past year, I've got over 100 student's feedbacks globally, and found most of our problems are from self-mistake, we can also call it 'Unhealthy Cognition'. Because those people around us impact us dramatically, from our thoughts, characters, behaviours to appearances.


So everyone needs to learn how to know deeply and thoroughly about self.


* In order to achieve personal growth effectively, completing the course weekly (watch 1 video and do 1 practice) is highly recommended.
* Trying to make yourself focused but relaxed during this learning period of time.
* If you have any question, feel free to contact me via Udemy or Facebook.


Let's begin your life-transforming journey right now!

「認識自己」可以說是我們每個人一生中最重要的事情，只是我們從小到大，受到傳統的教育體制及主流社會意識的影響，使我們沒能夠擁有好的機會能夠真正的了解自己，自己經過十年的學習以及在亞洲（包含台灣、香港、馬來西亞、菲律賓等等）近百人心理指導的經驗，發現一個有系統的探索自己學習的計劃是非常重要的，於是將這些「心理學」、「靈性智慧」與「實作」結合在一起，濃縮成三個月重新認識自己的一個練習課程，無論你目前處於人生中的哪一個階段，每週只要花30分鐘的時間，經過這三個月共12週的學習與練習，能夠讓你更貼近真實的自己一點，讓你的內心更穩定與活得更加的踏實！


適合的對象包含：
1. 想要自我成長的人
2. 想要找尋人生目標或意義的人
3. 想要學習情緒管理的人
4. 想要釐清生活中碰到問題的人
5. 想要學習如何更明智的做出決定的人


* 目前課程皆為免費，為推廣讓更多人能夠學習受惠，將之運用在日常生活之中。
* 由於認識自我需要緩慢與漸進的方式，於是建議每週觀看一個影片學習與實際作課後的練習。
* 在學習或練習期間有任何的問題，也都可以在粉絲團上留言給我。

courses.title: Motivasyon Teorileri ve Uygulamaları
courses.bio: Yönetim, Motivasyon
requirements: Eğitim için ön koşul bulunmamaktadır. Tüm çalışanlar için yönelik hazırlandı.
courses.description:
Motivasyon karmaşık ve anlaşılması zordur. Yöneticiler için en zor alanların başında çalışanlarını motive etmek gelir.
Literatürdeki bir tanıma göre motivasyon üç işleve hizmet eden bir güçtür. Canlandırır ya da insanların harekete geçmesine neden olur, özel hedeflere ulaşılması yönünde davranışları yönlendirir ve bu hedeflere ulaşmak için harcanan çabayı devam ettirir (Steers & Porter, 1991). Bir cümle ile, Motivasyon harekete geçiren, yönlendiren ve devam ettirin kuvvettir. Motivasyon ve moral birbiriyle yakından ilişkili kavramlardır, ancak farklılık gösterirler.
Tarihsel süreç içinde farklı motivasyon teorileri geliştirilmiştir. Bazı teoriler motivasyonun tanımlanmasında özel ihtiyaçların önemini vurgulamıştır. Bazı teoriler çalışma davranışları ve çıktıları arasındaki bağlantının üzerinde durmuştur. Bazı teoriler motivasyona etkisi açısından iş tasarımının rolüne odaklanmıştır. Yine başka türde teoriler motivasyonun bilişsel bir süreç olduğunu belirtmekte ve çalışanların rasyonel olarak harcadığı çalışma enerjisinin avantaj ve dezavantajlarını ölçmektedir.
Bu eğitimde, motivasyonun tanımını ve önemimi aktaracağız. Motivasyon ve moral ilişkisini ve farklılıklarını belirteceğiz. İş motivasyonuyla ilgili teorileri kısaca tanıtacağız. Motivasyon teorilerin çalışan motivasyonunu arttırmak için nasıl kullanılabileceğini her bir teori için örneklerle yoğun olarak aktaracağız. Ayrıca, iş motivasyonu ile çalışan performansı arsındaki ilişkiye değineceğiz.
Eğitimimiz için ön koşul bulunmuyor ve bütün sektörler ve tüm seviyeler için uygundur. Eğitimimiz, özellikle yöneticiler ve yönetici olarak kariyer yapmayı hedefleyen çalışanlar için planlandı. Motivasyon hakkında bilgi sahibi olmak isteyen bireyler için de uygundur.
target_audience: Eğitim, tüm çalışanlar ve özellikler yöneticilere yönelik olarak hazırlandı.

courses.bio: Importance of Goal Setting, SMART Goals, creating Vision Board and process of achieving Goals

Introduction: Interview - Coffee Chats Interview with Devesh Mohan about Goal setting journey

Case Study Interview of "How to set SMART Goals"
Process of Achieving Goals By Creating A Vision Board
Next steps and how to continue the journ: How to continue investing in your personal growth

requirements: Not Applicable
courses.description:
Goal setting is the process of identifying objectives, targets, and desired outcomes that one hopes to achieve within a specific timeframe. It is a critical step towards success in personal, academic, and professional development. Setting goals allows individuals to focus their efforts, establish a sense of direction, and ultimately achieve their desired outcomes.


Goal setting helps individuals to achieve their desired outcomes by providing a roadmap to success. Without clearly defined goals, it is difficult to know where to focus one's energy and resources. Goals help individuals to prioritize their activities and allocate their time and resources efficiently. For instance, if an individual wants to save money for a down payment on a house, they may set a goal of saving a certain amount of money each month. This goal will help them to stay focused on their objective and avoid spending their money on non-essential items.


In addition to providing a roadmap to success, goal setting helps individuals to establish a sense of direction. When individuals set goals, they are essentially creating a vision of what they want to achieve in the future. This vision can serve as a source of motivation and inspiration, helping individuals to stay focused on their objectives. For example, if an individual has a goal of becoming a doctor, they may visualize themselves in a white coat, working in a hospital, and helping patients. This vision can provide the motivation and inspiration needed to overcome the challenges and obstacles that come with pursuing a career in medicine.


Furthermore, goal setting helps individuals to develop a plan of action. Once an individual has set a goal, they can begin to develop a plan to achieve it. This plan may include specific actions, milestones, and deadlines. Having a plan in place helps individuals to stay organized and focused, and ensures that they are making progress towards their desired outcomes. For instance, if an individual wants to lose weight, they may set a goal of losing a certain amount of weight each month, and develop a plan that includes exercise, healthy eating habits, and tracking their progress.


Goal setting also provides a framework for measuring progress and success. When individuals set goals, they are essentially establishing criteria for success. By tracking their progress towards their goals, individuals can assess their performance and make adjustments as needed. For example, if an individual has a goal of running a marathon, they may track their progress by measuring their distance and time. If they are not making the progress they had hoped for, they can adjust their training regimen and work harder to achieve their goal.


In addition to these benefits, goal setting has several other advantages. First, it helps individuals to stay motivated and focused. By setting goals, individuals create a sense of purpose and direction, which can provide the motivation needed to overcome obstacles and persevere through challenges. Second, goal setting helps individuals to build self-confidence and self-esteem. When individuals achieve their goals, they feel a sense of accomplishment and pride, which can boost their self-confidence and self-esteem. Finally, goal setting helps individuals to develop skills and knowledge. Pursuing a goal often requires individuals to learn new skills and acquire new knowledge, which can be valuable in personal, academic, and professional contexts.
So lets embark on this goal setting journey to become a best version of yourself.
target_audience: Emerging Leaders
Working Professionals

Are you tired of failing to achieving your goals? Ever have those New Year Resolutions that never seem to get done?

I SHARE MY TIME TESTED METHOD FOR SETTING GOALS
I share the method that has worked for every goal I have set and the reminders that have kept me motivated. You deserve to achieve your goals!


WHY AM I DOING THIS?
I have wasted so much time in my life. I have been unproductive and unable to achieve anything. I have wasted YEARS doing absolutely nothing and getting lazy. But I woke up and started to change that. I read books. I honed in my ability to achieve my goals. As I start to achieve my goals, I realise that there are so many CAPABLE PEOPLE (Such as yourself!) who can achieve their goals.
And I want to see you do just that.
I created this course to see you achieve your goals. There's something fulfilling knowing you contributed to someone's success. I believe anyone is capable of doing what they want given the structure and direction. This course is just that - the structure and direction I wish I was given.
With our 30-day 100% money-back guarantee, there's no reason to hesitate.
LET ME GIVE YOU ANOTHER REASON!
Goal setting is not just about setting goals, but staying motivated is another component. Without motivation you won't achieve it. I will be blunt and to the point, because time is ticking and you need to be working on your goals NOW. So within this course I share some golden nuggets that will keep you motivated.

courses.description:
Goal setting is usually something that's done wrong.  It's one thing to set goals, it's another thing entirely, to actually achieve them.
How many times have you used goal setting techniques only to lose motivation or never even get started?
Because, at the end of the day, we don't care about goal setting techniques, we care about actually accomplishing our goals.
So, in this program you will learn a simple system, that will allow you to effectively plan and achieve your goals.
"This course is all about action. I like it very much. It's straight the point and you immediately start taking action, with just the right amount of detail. Efficient, lean courses are generally what I prefer. This course delivered as promised."
-Richard Moritz
"I've used SMART goals for years - but Ken adds some bits and pieces to the concept that are interesting and useful. I plan to apply his style during my next goal review."
-Sean Shaughnessey
"Awesome course!!!"
-Sachitra Liyanage
_____________________________________________________________
Are you truly ready to take charge of your life and achieve your real goals faster than you ever thought was possible?
If so, you may have heard of setting S.M.A.R.T. Goals…
It's essentially a proven system for goal setting that really helps you to correctly plan, clarify and build motivation for your goals, making them much more real to you.
The thing is, even though it’s a great method that really works, there are some gaping holes in that system…
It leaves out a few key areas that, if missed, can lead to self-sabotage, loss of motivation and also to "winning the battle but losing the war".
Simply put, it can lead to excelling in one area...but failing miserably in many others.
So, in this class, you will learn how to create S.M.A.R.T.E.R. Goals that not only make full use of the benefits of the original, proven system but also fill those gaping holes.
The end result being a much more complete, motivating and realistic vision of your goals and how to achieve them, without setting yourself up for failure down the road.
You will also receive a A Powerful Guided Meditation for Achieving Your Goals, that will allow you to Tap into the Power of Your Subconscious Mind, to Help You get and Stay Motivated and Enjoy the process of achieving Your Goals More.
It's a great addition to your morning routine or daily success regimen.
What else will I learn?
How to Avoid Sabotaging All Your Hard Work
How to Find Your "Why" and Create Momentum to Reach Your Goals
How to "Reverse Engineer" Your Way to Success
How to Beat Procrastination and Build Motivation to Achieve Your Goals

The Key to On-Going Goal Achievement
So, go ahead and enroll now, so you can stop settling and start living the life you know you deserve today!

requirements: No experience needed. You will will learn everything in the course.
courses.description:
Routine can be a powerful tool once you recognize its importance.
Having routines that you already follow every day is great, but that is just the tip of the iceberg. When you tap into the true power of routine, and create specific repeatable actions that propel you towards your goals – that’s when things get real.
Healthy, wealthy, and happy – that is pretty much success in anyone’s eyes, right?
Consciously creating routines actually makes repeating these needed actions easier as well.
Once you have created a routine and committed to it, quite often the actions you are repeating will become second nature.
You won’t have to think about taking action, you will just do it!
On top of that, the more you do something, the better you get at it. By its very nature, routine promotes practice.
In summary…
· Routine helps you work towards your goals
· It keeps you working towards those goals regularly
· It makes you better at the work you need to do to reach your goals
You want to change your life. You’re fed up with being who you are and can’t even see clearly who you want to be. You’ve crashed and burned too many times before.
Now here you are at a crossroads: do you try one last time, or give up before you even start?
Thankfully, giving up doesn’t have to be an option. You can be a better, stronger, more confident version of yourself, and this time you’re guaranteed not to fail.
That’s because this time you’re going to build micro-habits. These tiny changes are about to give you some pretty huge results.
Micro-habits are what they sound like – they’re small actions that you do on a regular basis until they become a habit. Incremental change has been proven to work, over and over, in a variety of ways. What makes micro-habits so exciting is that they really are tiny. By embracing them, you’re not indulging in those grand sweeping gestures that caused you to crash and burn before.
target_audience: People who are motivated to reach success by developing daily micro habits and routines.

courses.title: MOTİVASYON BENİM : Kişisel Değişimin Üç Yasası
courses.bio: Motivasyon, Kendini Tanıma ve Gerçekleştirme
objectives: Kaybetmenin kolay fakat kazanmanın zor olduğu bugünün sürekli değişen yeni normal iş dünyasında başarılı olmanın anahtarlarını öğreneceksiniz.
Atalete düşmeden hareket etmek için konfor bölgesinden çıkmanız gerektiğini anlayacaksınız.
Hayatın kontrolünün insanın kendi elinde olduğunu anlayarak potansiyeli performansa dönüştürmenin insanı geliştiren ve motive eden gücüyle tanışacaksınız.
Geleceği yaratma formülünde en büyük çarpanın insanın kendisi olduğunu anlayarak, insanlara, olaylara ve durumlara olan bakış açınızı değiştireceksiniz.
Çok üst düzey motive olacaksınız.

Giriş: Atalete Düşme Hareket Et. Konfor Bölgenden Çık ve Fark Yarat.
Hayatının Kontrolü Senin Elinde. Gücünü Bil ve Kontrol Et.
Geleceğini Yaratma Formülünde En Büyük Çarpan Sensin.Cesaret et, Sonucu Değiştir
Kapanış : “Ben Motivasyonum” Diyen Bir İnsanın Hikayesi

requirements: Odaklanmış bir beyin, bir kalem ve bir not defteri
courses.description:
“Motivasyon Benim : Kişisel Değişimin Üç Yasası” eğitimini satın alan değerli insan, bu eğitim videosunda size kişisel değişimin yasalarını anlatmak istedim. Sizi kişisel değişime davet ederek harekete geçirmek, sizde heyecan uyandırmak, etkilemek ve ilham vererek sizi motive etmek istedim.


Değerli insan, sana sesleniyorum.


Değişim karşısında gösterilen her davranış bir tavırdır ve sonucu vardır. İnsanların, değişmemelerinden dolayı çektikleri acının, değişmelerinden dolayı çekecekleri acıdan fazla oluncaya kadar değişmeden beklemeleri de bir tavırdır. Bu sebepledir ki zaten, sonucu belirleyen her zaman olaya bakış açısıdır.


Eğer hayatınızın kontrolünü elinize alarak değişmez ve her geçen gün kendinizi yenilemez, zihin haritanızın son kullanma tarihini uzatacak gelişim içinde olmaz ve garanti süresini uzatmazsanız, bu durumda sizi bugüne getiren şey geleceğe götürmeyecektir. İşte bu sebeple; sizi geleceğe götürecek şeyin, bugüne getiren şeyden farklı olması gerektiğini anlamalı ve farklı bir zihin haritasına sahip olup gücünüzü kontrol ederek sizi geleceğe götürecek bakış açısına sahip olmalısınız. Sizi buraya getiren şey ile sizi geleceğe götürecek şeyin farklılığını görerek, bu farklılık üzerine geleceğinizi inşa etmeye çalışmalısınız.


Hayatınızın Mimarı siz`siniz. Hayatınızı yapan da bozan da sizin iç dünyanızın şekillendirdiği tavırlarınız, olaylara bakış açınız ve gelecekten ne istediğinizle birlikte o geleceğe nasıl hazırlandığınızdır. Siz, kendi içinizde değişmedikçe dış dünyanızı yapan Mimar`da değişmez. İç dünyanız değişmeden dış dünyanız da değişim olmasını beklemek ise hayalden öteye gitmez. Çünkü; içiniz değişmeden dışınız değişmez.


Hayatınızın kontrolünü elinize almalı, gücünüzü tanıyarak sınırlarınızı keşfetmeli ve yönetmelisiniz.


Başarı yolunda korku büyür fakat azalmaz, tehlike büyür fakat küçülmez, cesaret gereksinimi artar fakat azalmaz olunca içinizde yankılanan sesten birine kulak vermek zorunda kalırsınız. Seslerden biri “Buraya kadar” derken, diğeri “Biraz daha cesaret” der. İşte o an ya birinci sese uyar pes edersiniz, ya da ikinci sese uyar her şeye rağmen başarı yolunda yürümeye devam edersiniz. İşte bu sebeple, yapmanız gereken şey; başarı yolunda böylesi bir seçim anı gelmeden önce ikinci tür sesin etkisi altında kalmaya kendinizi hazırlamanızdır. Unutmayınız ve biliniz ki başarı; esarete düşecek korku içinde olmadan, her şeye rağmen korkuyu yenecek cesarette olan kişilerin hakkıdır.


”Şimdi ki zamandaki siz” ile bir fark yaratmazsanız, “gelecekteki siz” de “bugünkü siz”den farklı olmayacaktır. Çünkü; geleceğinizi yaratma formülünün en büyük çarpanı sizsiniz. En büyük çarpanı olduğunuz formülün sonucunu büyütmekte küçültmekte şimdi ki size ve ne yaptığınıza bağlıdır.


Zihinsel olgunluğunuz, bugünden hareketle “gelecek sizi” yaratan o muazzam sihirli gücü kendi içinde taşır. İşte bu sebeple; büyük olması gereken şey fiziksel varlığınız değil, zihinsel olgunluğunuzdur. Birincisi sizi kaslı, ikincisi ise zeki yapar. Birincisiyle elde edeceğiniz iş sonuçlarını zamanla ve çalışarak, ikincisi ile elde edeceğiniz iş sonuçlarını ise çok hızlı bir şekilde sadece düşünerek elde edersiniz.


Başarının en değişmez tek şartı; durmadan öğrenmek ve durmadan çalışmaktır. Bu sebeple; her gün bilmediğin yeni bir şey öğren ve her zaman yaptığından daha çok yap. Başarının kapısının anahtarı bu cümlenin içinde gizlidir. Çünkü; bilmediklerinizden ne kadar çok öğrenir ve yaptıklarınızdan ne kadar çok yaparsanız, bilmediklerinizi azaltır fakat her zaman kazandığınızdan daha çok kazanırsınız. İşte bu sebeple; cesaret göstererek mevcudu terk etmeli ve pes etmeyerek her şeye rağmen yola devam etmelisiniz.


“Motivasyon Benim : Kişisel Değişimin Üç Yasası” eğitim videosu, hiçbir şey yapmamanın bedelinin, hata yapmanın bedelinden daha ağır olduğu ve yoğun rekabetin yaşandığı bugünün iş dünyasında, size değişim odaklı olmanız ve ayakta kalarak başarıyı yakalamanız için gerekli olan “en iyi yolu” gösterecek ve rekabette bir adım öne çıkmanız için motivasyon odaklı farklılığınızı ortaya koyabileceğiniz güçlü bir “öngörü” kazandıracaktır.
target_audience: Beynini zihne, donanımını yazılıma ve potansiyelini performansa dönüştürmek için motivasyona ihtiyaç duyan her insan

courses.title: Mastering Personal Strategy Plan
courses.bio: احترف عمل خطة إستراتيجية شخصية وحقق أهدافك المالية خلال السنة الأولى أو أقل
objectives: وضع خطة استراتيجية شخصية صلبة ووضع أهداف شخصية ذكية
تبني عقلية العمل الصحيحة وكسر جميع الحواجز
إدارة وقتك بكفاءة وتحديد أولويات جميع مهامك اليومية
قم ببناء عملك الخاص الذي يمكنه تحقيق هدفك المالي في 12 شهرًا أو أقل
لوحة تحكم مجانية لإدارة وتتبع مهامك اليومية وتتبع المبيعات كل ساعة وكل يوم
هديتين مجانية كتاب الكتروني للكورس باللغة العربية + كتاب الكتروني باللغة الإنجليزية
requirements: إذا كنت طموحًا ولديك الإرادة والتصميم وتريد أن تحقق الملايين في عام واحد فقط أو أقل، فكل ما عليك فعله هو اتخاذ القرار الصحيح والبدء فورًا
courses.description:
تتميز هذه الدورة بمنهجية جديدة ومنظمة ، تم بناؤها على مبادئ علمية مستمدة من عشرات البرامج المشهود لها دوليًا ، ومنشورات رفيعة المستوى من قِبَل نخبة من أنجح رواد الأعمال والأثرياء في العالم ، بالإضافة إلى عمل أكثر من 50 مقابلة شخصية.


بناءً على هذه المعرفة الغنية والمنهجية المتكاملة ، صُممت الدورة بعناية فائقة لتحقيق أقصى استفادة وذلك لإتقان ما يلي:
- وضع خطة استراتيجية شخصية صلبة ، وتحديد أهداف ذكية مع مؤشرات أداء رئيسية قابلة للقياس
- تبني العقلية التجارية الصحيحة ، وتجاوز جميع العوائق
- إدارة الوقت بكفاءة عالية ، وتحديد أولويات جميع المهام اليومية
- نموذج عمل ثاقب لبناء مشروعك الخاص الذي يُمكنك من تحقيق هدفك المالي خلال ١٢ شهرًا أو أقل
- رؤية تفصيلية على "المفاهيم الثمانية الرئيسية" لتوسيع نطاق أعمالك ، وزيادة المبيعات ، وتعزيزها
- إدارة مبيعاتك ومتابعتها يوميًا من خلال أداة متابعة أداء المبيعات المجانية
- إدارة مهامك اليومية ومتابعتها كل ساعة .. كل يوم ..  كل أسبوع .. كل شهر
- جميع الشرائح والقوالب مُقدمة باللغة الإنجليزية، والشرح باللغة العربية
- هدية مجانية كتاب الكتروني لكامل الدورة باللغة العربية + كتاب الكتروني باللغة الانجليزية


القوالب المجانية المتوفرة في هذه الدورة هي:
- بطاقة الأداء المتوازن (من جداول بيانات جوجل)
- أداة باريتو (من جداول بيانات جوجل)
- سجل المهام مع لوحة تحكم شاملة (من جداول بيانات جوجل)
- لوحة تحكم أداء المبيعات مع قاعدة بيانات رئيسية (من جداول بيانات جوجل)
- بطاقات الأداء المتوازن (من نموذج BSC ضمن الدورة)
- نموذج الأعمال (من نموذج BMC ضمن الدورة)
- هدية مجانية كتاب الكتروني للدورة باللغة العربية + كتاب الكتروني باللغة الانجليزية


في ختام الدورة يلزم من جميع المتدربين التدرب على جميع القوالب المذكورة أعلاه وتقديمها (5 منها) للتخرج والحصول على الشهادة الرسمية.


حظاأ موفقاً للجميع
target_audience: كل شخص طموح، لديه قوة الإرادة والتصميم وصانع القرار

courses.title: M.V.P 10 Day Challenge.
courses.bio: How to use mediation, visualization and prayer to align your thoughts and intentions to attain your goals.
requirements: Access to a computer, or mobile device, and headphones
courses.description:
Unified, concise, and focused goal-setting techniques can shave years off you getting to your ideal future. But busy creatives and entrepreneurs rarely have time to wade through complex meditation programs or sift through hundreds of hours on youtube, blogs, and ebooks hoping something will stick.
If only there was a simple, modern take on goal setting that offered both metaphysical principles and modern research-based techniques.
Enter the M.V.P Method.
This simple 3 part process combines Meditation, Visualization, and Prayer as the backbone of this simple goal achievement program.
The method is easily learned in 45 minutes and takes just 10 days to achieve your goal.
You’ll learn about the three stages, how to use them, and when to use them. The first two phases are designed to build up a strong foundation of mental, emotional, and spiritual power. The third phase brings all of that together and helps you create a plan to achieve your goals. I’ve been using this method for years now and I can’t recommend it enough. It’s helped me become more organized, more effective, and more focused. And if you are open to trying something new and exciting to connect with your true self then this is for you.
In this course, we’ll go through:
How to identify your goals.
Why visualization and prayer are so important in actually achieving your goals.
What each phase of the M.V.P Method does.
How to combine all three phases to form a goal-setting system that just works.
How to use modern-day technology to focus your attention instead of stealing it.
And much more!
If you want a fresh new way to get what you want out of life, and you're tired of everything else, then sign up for our free 10-day future-forward challenge so that you can live in your ideal future today.
target_audience: People interested in personal development, mindset, and manifestation .

courses.title: Google Cloud Professional Architect in a Weekend

Latest Updated course Google Cloud Professional Architect Certification
Learn and Clear Google Cloud Professional Architect exam confidently
Have some labs and Real world Examples

Only Google Cloud Professional Architect course that you need. The Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect course is designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge necessary to design, develop, and manage secure, scalable, and reliable cloud solutions on the Google Cloud Platform (GCP). As organizations continue to accelerate digital transformation, the role of a cloud architect has become essential in bridging the gap between business objectives and technical solutions. This course provides an in-depth understanding of how to leverage GCP services to build architectures that drive efficiency, innovation, and long-term success.
The course begins with foundational concepts of cloud computing and introduces the core services offered by GCP, including compute, storage, networking, and databases. You will gain hands-on experience in designing solutions that utilize virtual machines, Kubernetes clusters, serverless platforms, and managed databases. Emphasis is placed on selecting the right combination of services based on business and technical requirements, ensuring cost optimization, performance, and reliability.
Overall, this course is ideal for cloud professionals, solution architects, IT managers, and engineers seeking to advance their careers and contribute to their organization’s digital journey. With a blend of theoretical knowledge, hands-on labs, and exam preparation, the Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect course empowers you to master GCP architecture and play a pivotal role in driving innovation in the cloud era. By the end of the course, You will not only be ready to succeed in the certification exam but will also have the practical skills needed to design and implement solutions that align with industry best practices.

courses.title: McClelland's Theory of Needs
courses.bio: Useful concept that needs to be understood and applied by managers for motivating their subordinates.
objectives: Explain What is Motivation

Explain McClelland’s Theory of Needs
List the Characteristics of Each Dominant Motivator Types

List the Characteristics of Each Dominant Motivator Types
List the Benefits of McClelland’s Theory of Needs
Compare McClelland's Theory and Other Behavioral Models
Describe McClelland’s Experiment of Achievement Motivation
Explain the Basis of Achievement Motivation
List the Characteristics and Attitudes of Achievement-motivated People
Explain What is Thematic Apperception Test (TAT)
Explain the Steps for Applying McClelland's Needs Theory
Describe How to Manage Team Members using McClelland's Motivators
List the Limitations of McClelland’s Theory

requirements: No prior knowledge is required
courses.description:
McCLELLAND'S THEORY OF NEEDS -  NEED BASED MOTIVATION.
ARE YOU STRULLING TO MOTIVATE YOUR SUBORDINATES BASED ON THEIR NEEDS?  ARE YOU WILLING TO IDENTIFY WHAT YOUR EMPLOYEES NEED INORDER TO BE MOTIVATED?  DON'T PANIC OR GET CONFUSED.  HERE IS AN APT COURSE WHERE YOU LEARN HOW TO MOTIVATE YOUR EMPLOYEES AND KEEP THEM PRODUCTIVE.
Who Should Enrol in this course?
This course is very relevant for Managers, Supervisors, Project Leaders/Team Leaders and Management Personnel.
Why Should You Enrol in this course?
This course is very useful in identifying the needs of the employees and motivating accordingly. You will gain in-depth knowledge about the three needs namely - Need for Achievement or Achievement Motivation, Need for Power or Authority/Power Motivation, Need for Affiliation or Affiliation Motivation.
What you will learn from this course?
You will learn the following from this course:-
•Explain What is Motivation
•List the Various ‘Needs-Based’ Theories of Motivation
•Explain McClelland’s Theory of Needs
•List the Characteristics of Each Dominant Motivator Types
•List the Benefits of McClelland’s Theory of Needs
•Explain What Motivates People
•Compare McClelland's Theory and Other Behavioral Models
•Describe McClelland’s Experiment of Achievement Motivation
•Explain the Basis of Achievement Motivation
•List the Characteristics and Attitudes of Achievement-motivated People
•Explain What is Thematic Apperception Test (TAT)
•Explain What are ‘n-ach’ Scores
•Explain the Steps for Applying McClelland's Needs Theory
•Describe How to Manage Team Members using McClelland's Motivators
•List the Limitations of McClelland’s Theory
How is this course structured?
This is a comprehensive course which teaches you all the basic and advanced concepts of McClelland's Theory of Needs.
The entire course is divided into 15+ modules all in video formats. The course begins with an interesting introduction part which emphasizes the need to learn this skill and covers all the basic points. As the course progress various important and advanced concepts are also covered.
Real life examples and case studies are used to explain the advanced concepts and to make the course interesting.  The entire course is explained using simple English. Images/Icons and infographics are used to add value to the content and make the course interesting.
What are the prerequisites for joining this course?
No prior experience or qualification is required for enrolling in this course. You need uninterrupted internet connection to watch the videos and basic understanding of English.
How you will get benefitted from this course?
After learning this course, you will become a Master in this Motivation based on the needs. You will get to learn what are the dominant motivators among your team members.
DON'T WASTE YOUT TIME AND MONEY IN MOTIVATING YOUR EMPLOYEES IN THE WRONG WAY!
JUST CLICK ON THE ENROL BUTTON AND LEARN HOW TO PROPERLY MOTIVATE YOUR STAFF AND GET BENEFITTED!
target_audience: Students
Human Resource Department
Working professionals
Teachers/Faculties
Supervisors and Managers
Trainers

courses.title: Curso de Resiliência Cristã - Como desenvolver e treinar
courses.bio: Você é uma pessoa resiliente? Como você reage as adversidades? Esse curso poderá ajudá-lo a se tornar resiliente
objectives: Os alunos aprenderão a desenvolver Resiliência para momentos de adversidade aprender a não só superar, como também se tornar a melhor versão de si mesmo...
Não são poucas as pessoas que hoje não conseguem lidar com suas dores e dificuldades, acabam por se render a dor e vivem uma vida distante da realidade de Deus
Com esse curso os alunos não só desenvolverão habilidades emocionais para serem resilientes, como tambem receberão ferramentas poderosas que os ajudarão a vence
Imagine que o individuo passou por uma perda muito grande na familia e não consegue superar o luto. A resiliencia o ajudará a superar e se tornar mais fortes
requirements: Foco em aprender assuntos que irão revolucionar a mente
Apenas a decisão de seguir em frente pois quando aprendemos sobre um assunto é comum passar por provas para ser aprovado
courses.description:
Este é um curso organizado por vídeoaulas e e-books com exercícios voltados para o desenvolvimento da Resiliencia, são 11 vídeos, desenvolvidos com muito dinamismo para facilitar o aprendizado.
Neste curso, você aprenderá os componentes da resiliência pessoal e, também as definições apartir  da palavra, sua evolução e aplicação nas ciências humanas. Como o termo resiliência uma matéria da física foi se adaptando ao tema do desenvolvimento pessoal, falaremos também da resiliência na perspectiva Bíblica, como a fé e a resiliência se completam e como podem juntas colaborar para o sucesso nas adversidades.
Com este curso, os alunos certamente receberão habilidades emocionais para avançar diante das dificuldades, alem de ferramentas poderosa que os auxilião no processo de aprendizado sobre essa tão importante inteligencia emocional. As aulas são em videos, bastante dinamicas e objetivas. O aluno tambem recebem tarefaz para que possam treinar essa tão importante habilidade que é a resiliencia. Por isso se você adquiriu o curso vá até o fim, não pare no meio pois cada aula complementa a outra. Muitas pessoas hoje não conseguem superar a suas dores, por isso, resiliencia é uma questão de sobrevivencia, sem ela você não atingira o seu potencial maximo na sua vida. ok

courses.title: How to Communicate Effectively As a New Manager?
courses.bio: Master The Tips and Speech to Succeed as a Leader. Learn Communication, Management, and Leadership Skills!

Example Two: Comparing And Contrasting T: Example Two: Comparing And Contrasting Things.
Comparing and Contrasting Things Continu: Comparing and Contrasting Things Continued and More!
Voice and Speech Coaching for Meetings!: 1. Structure and Affirmation for Team Meetings.
2. Phrases for Discussing Agendas During Team Meetings.

requirements: No prerequisite. Basic English language skills, and a desire to manage well.
courses.description:
Have you always wanted to be a better communicator in your workplace and didn't know where to start? Are you a manager or leader who wants to coach, motivate, inspire, and empower their teams, but don't know where to start? If you answered yes to these questions, then this course is for you!




Communication is an indispensable skill to succeed as a  manager and leader. I learned that from my own experience. I started working as an associate at a successful American company and was promoted to a leadership and management role. And I'm pretty confident that that came about through my recently enhanced communication skills. (As an avid reader, learner and practitioner of all things "personal development and leadership", I had been working on my communication skills on the side).




But a question remains: How do we communicate effectively as a new manager? What are the actual wording and speech? So, in this course I have compared speech or our "voice of communication" to music, and the way we speak in different circumstances to "the way actors perform". Yes, I have also compared our speech and pitch to music and the way we communicate to how actors perform in theaters. We'll learn the importance of pace and tone and most important of all, intentions (just as keys in a piano denote the music's intention). By comparing speech to musical and theatrical process, we can learn how to infuse power, clarity, dynamism, and charisma to our sound, pitch, and voice.


In this course you'll learn how to :


1. Develop confidence as a speaker
2. Master the basics of American Accent in a Business or Corporate Setting
3. As a new leader, learn the actual Wording, Tools, Techniques, Wording and Speech to Inspire employees
4. How to say no
5. Be able to use transitions in our sentence
6. Handle difficult conversations in relation to "resistant employees" and tackle "lack of employee engagement".


The Class Project:


1) How do you motivate individuals and teams? What are the wording and language that you employ?
2) Why, in your opinion, is it important to use the right intention and tone in speech?
Please come up with tips and suggestions. And write them down. And most importantly, follow-up or implement an action plan.
target_audience: 1. New supervisors (who are non-native English speakers) who want to learn standard American Accent in a Business or Corporate Setting
2. New Managers and Leaders
3. Students of Leadership and Communication
4. Voice and Speech Coaches
5. Managers and Leaders who are interested in Corporate Coaching
6. Executives who want to build better relationships.
7. Create resolutions and handle workplace conflicts and confrontations better.

courses.title: Борюсь с ленью. Лень – твой лучший друг! (Часть 1)
courses.bio: Борюсь с ленью. Онлайн-курс Павла Кочкина. Как побороть лень и прокрастинацию?
objectives: Поймёшь и увидишь, как работает лень, а значит, сможешь подружиться с ней!
На курсе ты узнаешь, как «включать» себя в моменте и наполняться энергией ;)
Поработаешь над своими конкретными задачами и проектами прямо по ходу курса!
Получишь доступ к сообществу единомышленников, которые развиваются и учатся дружить с ленью, как и ты :)

Введение: Борешься с ленью? Твой выбор? (1 мин)
Цель на курс. Над чем ленишься?
Здесь и сейчас!: Какие задачи отнести к этому типу?
Страх. Как он связан с ленью?

requirements: Специальной подготовки/знаний не требуется.
courses.description:
Лееень… Прокрастинация, апатия… Борюсь с ленью... «Завтра», «Потом», «Начну с понедельника!».
Как здорово, что среди тех, кто читает этот текст, таких людей нет! Не сомневаюсь, что ты всегда полон энергии и заряжен на работу. Ты не ждёшь выходных, чтобы отдохнуть – ведь ты полностью увлечён своим делом и кайфуешь от этого! А про лень слышал лишь от нытиков-неудачников...
НО если вдруг...
Если вдруг ты понимаешь, что лень – это и про тебя тоже, то у меня есть отличная новость: ты в правильном месте и в правильное время!

Можно ли подружиться со своей ленью?
Как перестать откладывать дела на потом?
Что делать, если просто приуныл?
Как «включать» себя в моменте?
Как научиться не сливаться с долгосрочных задач?
Как понять причины своей лени и мотивации?
На все эти вопросы я подробно отвечу в ходе видеоуроков, которые содержат в себе массу примеров, историй из жизни и практик/заданий, которые тебе нередко придётся выполнять прямо в ходе уроков ;) Да-да, на курсе отдыхать не получится, однако я обещаю – будет весело, интересно и самое главное, полезно!
Кстати, этот курс состоит из 2х частей:
Борюсь с ленью. Часть 1. «Здесь и сейчас»  – посвящена краткосрочным задачам и как браться за них прямо сейчас, не откладывая на потом!
Борюсь с ленью. Часть 2. «Долгосрочная мотивация» – посвящена тому, как не сливаться с длительных проектов и задач. Как замотивировать себя вдолгую и удержаться на пути?
Запомни, лениться – это не плохо. Плохо – не знать, что с этим делать…
Встретимся на курсе!
target_audience: Этот курс для тебя, если ты чувствуешь, что можешь больше и устал бороться со своей ленью.
Этот курс для тебя, если просто нет энергии или совсем приуныл...
Этот курс для тебя, если ты хочешь научиться браться за дела здесь и сейчас, не откладывая на потом!

requirements: Be excited to tap into real sources of self motivation that will inspire you to do great work!
courses.description:
Get amazing short-term and long-term self motivation that will transform and inspire you to do great work.


If you have projects to work on, and responsibilities on which you always seem to be procrastinating because you just can't seem to find the self motivation, this is the ideal course for you. This course will help you discover sources of long-term, intrinsic self-motivation.


WHY MANY PEOPLE LACK MOTIVATION


In my coaching practice, after having helped thousands of entrepreneurs, I noticed a common reason for their failure: they simply lacked self motivation to do the work to succeed.
Why weren't they self motivated? It was often because they were simply working on the wrong kinds of businesses, or maybe starting a business wasn't even for them.
Many people make the mistake of pursuing some random goals in life that they think are their strong goals, but those goals turn out to be false goals that are often given to them by others or by society's pressures.
Of course, if you work on the wrong things, you won't find the right intrinsic motivation to stay excited about your work long term. This is why people often lack motivation.
So in this self motivation course, I give you strategies to get short-term self motivation to start working today, and strategies to get long-term motivation to work passionately for years to come.
Sign up for the course, and let's get you more motivated. Give yourself the gift of increased self motivation!


LEARN TO FIND INTRINSIC MOTIVATION THAT NEVER STOPS


Intrinsic motivation is a type of motivation that comes from inside you. Intrinsic motivation drives you from the moment you wake up until you go to sleep. You don't have to manufacture it. It's naturally there.
You get intrinsic motivation by identifying the type of work that will be meaningful to you. And when you do meaningful work, you unlock natural and intrinsic motivation.


HAVING INTRINSIC MOTIVATION WILL MAKE YOU HAPPIER


When you have intrinsic self motivation helps you pursue different projects and your ambitions. That means you'll truly be working on what you love. And when you work on what you love for the rest of your life, it won't feel like work. It will be enjoyable. And your quality of life will be greatly improved.


TEAM MOTIVATION AND EMPLOYEE MOTIVATION


After you motivate yourself by mastering your own goal setting and Dopamine management, you'll learn how to motivate others. So if you want to grow into a leadership position at work, and need to learn about employee motivation, this course will give you the tools for that as well. You'll be able to motivate employees wherever you go in your career.


RECENTLY ADDED: TEAM MOTIVATION AND EMPLOYEE MOTIVATION


Most of this course is about motivating yourself. But to have a more holistic course, it's good to explore the topic of how to motivate others. In this new video, I'll show you team motivation strategies, and good ways to motivate other people by tapping into what's important for them.


INSTRUCTOR BACKGROUND


I've been an entrepreneur for 20 years, have coached 1,000+ entrepreneurs in person, taught 850,000+ students, impacted millions of entrepreneurs worldwide creating 6 and 7-figure businesses in the process, and I would love to help you.
One of the areas in which I specialize is personal development, time management, productivity, and motivation is a big part of that.


RESPONSIVE AND CARING INSTRUCTOR: WORLD-CLASS STUDENT SUPPORT


If you have questions, know that I am here to help! I answer 99% of student questions within 24 hours. Many students tell me that other instructors don't respond. Well, I do because
1) I care about my students.
2) I feel a responsibility to make sure that students get their money's worth from the course.


MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE

Din ve Ibadet
requirements: Bu eğitim için herhangi bir ön koşul gerekmiyor.
courses.description:
Oruç, birçok dinde önemli bir ibadet şeklidir ve sadece fizyolojik bir eylemden öte, manevi bir boyut da taşır. Orucun maneviyat psikolojisi, bu ibadetin insan ruhuna ve psikolojisine olan etkilerini inceler. Orucun maneviyat psikolojisi üzerinde birçok olumlu etkisi olduğu bilimsel araştırmalarla da kanıtlanmıştır. Oruç tutmanın stres ve kaygıyı azalttığı, depresyon belirtilerini hafiflettiği, bilişsel işlevleri ve hafızayı geliştirdiği ve genel ruh halini iyileştirdiği gösterilmiştir.
Orucun maneviyat psikolojisi ile ilgili bazı önemli noktalar şunlardır:
1. Nefsi Terbiye: Oruç, nefsin istek ve arzularını kontrol etmeyi ve disiplini geliştirmeyi sağlar. Bu sayede kişi, maneviyata daha fazla odaklanabilir ve kendini geliştirmeye yönelik adımlar atabilir.
2. Şükretme Duygusu: Oruç tutmak, sahip olunan nimetlerin değerini daha iyi anlamaya ve şükretme duygusunu geliştirmeye yardımcı olur. Maddi varlıklara olan bağımlılık azalır ve manevi değerlere daha fazla önem verilir.
3. Empati ve Merhamet: Oruç tutmak, açlık çeken insanların durumunu daha iyi anlamaya ve onlara karşı empati duymaya yardımcı olur. Merhamet duygusu gelişir ve yardımlaşma arzusu artar.
4. Arınma ve Temizlenme: Oruç sadece bedeni değil, ruhu da arındırır ve temizler. Olumsuz düşüncelerden ve duygulardan uzaklaşmaya yardımcı olur ve manevi bir huzur duygusu verir.
5. Manevi Konsantrasyon: Oruç tutmak, dikkati dağıtacak unsurları azaltarak manevi konsantrasyona ve tefekküre yardımcı olur. Kişi, kendini daha iyi tanır ve Allah'a daha yakın hisseder.
Oruç, sadece bir ibadet değil, aynı zamanda ruhsal ve bedensel bir şifa yöntemidir. Doğru şekilde uygulandığında, insanın genel sağlık ve refahı üzerinde birçok olumlu etkisi olabilir.
Orucun maneviyat psikolojisi hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinmek için:
Dini metinler ve kaynaklar
İslami psikoloji kitapları ve makaleleri
Oruç ve maneviyat ile ilgili konferanslar ve seminerler
Din alimleri ve psikologların görüşleri
target_audience: Oruç ve maneviyat psikolojisi hakkında öğrenmek isteyenler

♦ Set goals that work for you
♦ Build and maintain confidence
♦ Improve focus
♦ Increase motivation
There are four sections within this course and two lectures for each section. Some of the areas you’ll learn about include creating SMART goals, applying a “mental filter”, and managing stress and fatigue. You’ll leave this training with a mental skills “toolbox” that can have a positive impact on various areas, including work, school, sports, exercise, and the overall challenges of life.
This course is not meant to be rigorous. It’s a short mini-course providing you with practical knowledge and tips to begin working on enhancing your mental performance. You can also use the information in this course to help others improve their mental performance.
All you’ll need for this training is a pencil and paper to take notes. You’ll be provided a worksheet at the end of each section to put what you’ve learned into practice. I hope the mental skills you’ll gain from this course help you more consistently perform your best and learn new ways to cope with the everyday struggles of life.

How Elderly people lose hope struggling to fight their illnesses and they have  start believing that they are no more capable to do the things they used to do.
The Post-Retirement Syndrome that most of the elderlies face because of the fact that they do not have to are supposed to follow any routine, they start procrastinating things and do not really care about themselves. All they do is lock themselves inside a box where they keep thinking about how their life is not worthy to live anymore.
Elderly people are more subject to loneliness these days and face a lot of issues with the younger generations , because of this they are more focused on the problems that they are facing in both the sickness and personal terms. It becomes difficult to deal with such situations not only to the elderly but even to the people that they are surrounded and then rises the possibility of conflicts. They even start having a conflict with themselves about their inability to do things that they did before.


It just needs a few things to be followed on a daily basis regularly to get rid of this thinking process, the lack of motivation that they face post-retirement.
How someone thinks about their sickness?
•I have a sickness that I cannot stop thinking about all the time and it really makes me step back out of everything that I ever wanted to do.
•My sickness has taken over my body and ultimately my soul and I cannot help myself or anyone around anymore.


A Sick Body is not a Sick Soul
A sick body should never really make a sick soul.
Your sickness should never be allowed to take over your soul, your mind and your overall moral strength.


You are your soul first
•Train your mind to stop thinking all the time about your sickness.
Train your mind to stop telling itself that your body is not well.

courses.description:
Are you living the life you always dreamed about? If not, does this make you feel down? Maybe even making you miserable.
This powerful guide will provide you with everything you need to finally get rid of negative or destructive beliefs and start living the life you want.

Knowledge is power and once we understand the root causes of our belief system and how it operates in our life we are well on our way to being able to transform it. Or at the very least mitigate it's effects.
Within this 8-part video course you will discover everything you need to know to create happiness everyday of your life and also what not to do leading to stress and anxiety. Anyone can follow this plan and see results.


- Living the life you want introduction


Are you finding it hard to live the life you want? If so, then why? It’s your life, and you are the one in control, but why can’t you still drive it the way you want? Maybe you are under certain circumstances that are preventing you from doing so.
You might be thinking to live the life you want, but only once all these problems come to an end? But you know what? You are making a big mistake if you think so; life won’t let you settle without problems till you die.
Every day comes with a new set of challenges, no matter what your age is, or what your business is! You will face problems at every point.
However, If you sincerely want to live your life, you need to make an effort today itself (Right Now) even if you are burdened with worries and problems.
What you do today will reflect your future and will help you to live a happy and positive life.

courses.description:
Only AI-900: Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals course that you need. The AI-900: Microsoft Azure AI Fundamentals course is an introductory program designed to provide learners with a foundational understanding of artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and how they are implemented using Microsoft Azure services. It is ideal for students, technology enthusiasts, and professionals who are new to AI and want to explore its capabilities without requiring deep technical expertise. The course emphasizes both conceptual knowledge and practical application, making it suitable for anyone from diverse backgrounds, including business, technical, and academic fields.
The course begins with an overview of AI, explaining its core principles, real-world applications, and how AI differs from traditional programming. You will be introduced to the different types of AI, such as narrow AI, general AI, and responsible AI, with a focus on ethical considerations and fairness in AI solutions. The curriculum highlights the importance of transparency, accountability, and privacy in AI systems, aligning with Microsoft’s responsible AI framework.
The course also covers computer vision, where you learn how Azure can analyze images, detect objects, and recognize faces. In natural language processing, You will explore language understanding, sentiment analysis, and speech recognition, while in conversational AI, you discover how chatbots can be created using Azure Bot Service and integrated with multiple channels.
By the end of AI-900, You will have the skills to identify AI workloads, select the appropriate Azure services, and understand the benefits and limitations of AI solutions. This course prepares participants for the Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Fundamentals certification exam, serving as a stepping stone to more advanced AI and data science certifications.

Otro año más que se ha pasado. Haces recuento de lo que ha sucedido y.... sí, han pasado cosas, buenas y malas. Pero, en resumen, más de lo mismo. Aprende nuevas perspectivas, principios y estrategias que te permitan crear y sostener la motivación correcta en cada una de las actividades de tu vida.
Todos hemos tenido esos días en los cuales sentimos que no podemos continuar, en los que nos falta la energía para hacer las cosas que debemos, dejando que la procrastinación se apodere de nosotros y nos invada una sensación de derrota y frustración. Con el fin de no dejarnos vencer por la procrastinación y poder mejorar nuestra eficiencia y efectividad, hemos creado este curso, el cual te permitirá crear una motivación y enfoque indestructible, ya que será forjada en la verdad de las cosas que tú en verdad deseas obtener en la vida y creando por primera vez una motivación de adentro y hacia afuera de ti mismo.
A través de este curso tu:
Descubrirás la diferencia entre motivación y emoción.
Reforzarás tu sentido de propósito en tu trabajo y relaciones.
Crecerás y entenderás tus verdaderas motivaciones en la vida.
Entenderás como superar y manejar pensamientos y acciones contra productivas.
Aprenderás como manejar situaciones difíciles, con el fin de encontrar soluciones “win – win”.
Aprenderás a encontrar un balance en tu vida con el fin de aumentar la productividad en cada una de tus áreas.
Reconocerás patrones de comportamiento negativos y sus efectos en tus actividades diarias.
Identificarás actitudes de auto sabotaje.
Reconocerás el impacto que tus acciones presentes tendrán en tu futuro.
Nuestra mentalidad esta específicamente diseñada para construir las metas y resultados que creemos que queremos y debemos obtener en nuestra vida. Es por eso que es necesario tomarnos suficiente tiempo para identificar nuestras habilidades personales, pasiones y habilidades innatas, con el fin de sacar el mayor provecho de este curso.
Este curso también lo hemos diseñado con el de reducir las presiones de nuestro mundo actual, el cual está enfocado únicamente en el desempeño extremo, llevando a las personas a menospreciar su trabajo y desarrollo.
Al final del curso, tu podrás comenzar a hacer uso de una estrategia de 7 pasos que te permitirá comenzar a generar grandes cambios en la manera en como ves tu vida, tu desempeño y desarrollo personal, lo cual se verá reflejado en los resultados que comenzarás a obtener y la motivación que tendrás contigo en todo momento.
target_audience: Este curso es para todos aquellos que estén buscando aumentar su enfoque y motivación en las actividades diarias de su vida.
Coaches, asesores, terapeutas y todo tipo de profesional en el campo del desarrollo personal.
Aquellos que deseen aumentar su confianza en sí mismos y su autoestima.
Emprendedores, estudiantes y maestros.

objectives: Aligning you with Your Purpose: what you will do with your time that is important to you.

courses.description:
The Project Ideation Course is a course designed to find the ideal project for you. Your ideal project is aligned with your strengths, skills, passion, personality and values. Besides, it will match the supply and demand of the market.


By looking at your past, desired future and current situation you will find out about what you want to do with the rest of your life.


Using the Myers Briggs Test you will find out your personality type. You will find out about your strengths and weaknesses. Understand how to use your strenghts and get knowledge about how to overcome your weaknesses. Also typical careers for our type are provided what helps you to find the ideal projects for you.


We also look at your Values and define them. Values are basic and fundamental beliefs that guide or motivate attitudes or actions. They help us to determine what is important to us. Values describe the personal qualities we choose to embody to guide our actions; the sort of person we want to be; the manner in which we treat ourselves and others, and our interaction with the world around us. They provide the general guidelines for conduct.


With the help of the Ikigai and the previous sessions in mind, you will come up with a lot of project ideas. you will prioritize them and finally choose a project.
At last we look at the Sustainability of your Project. We have several aspects and areas to look at. Here you verify if your Project is sustainable or not.

courses.title: Motivación - Fundamentos de Liderazgo 6
courses.bio: Descubriendo lo que realmente nos motiva para nuestro bienestar y el de los demás.
objectives: La importancia de la motivación para el compromiso de las personas.
¿Qué es la motivación?
La distorsión entre lo que creemos que nos motiva y lo que realmente nos motiva.
La diferencia entre motivadores extrínsecos e intrínsecos.
La visión y la motivación.
El propósito y la motivación.
Empezar a descubrir nuestra propia visión y propósito.

Sobre el Compromiso y la Motivación

Aumentando la Motivación desde las Emociones

courses.description:
La motivación es de las cosas más importantes para los seres humanos, y aquellas personas capaces de motivarse a sí mismas y a los demás, tienen un gran camino avanzado hacia convertirse en grandes líderes.

En este curso levantaremos el velo de la motivación, y descubriremos sus realidades, muchas de ellas altamente sorprendentes, y aprenderemos cómo podemos ponerlas en práctica, tanto para motivarnos nosotros mismos, como para motivar a los demás.

En este curso aprenderemos:
La importancia de la motivación.
Las motivaciones intrínsecas y extrínsecas.
La visión y el propósito en la motivación.
Cómo motivarnos a nosotros mismos y a los demás.
La Motivación desde la Inteligencia Emocional
Principios de Inteligencia Emocional
Las 4 Sub-Dimensiones Emocionales de la Motivación: Felicidad, Ambición, Optimismo y Asertividad.
Como Desarrollar la Motivación Individual.
Desarrollo de la Motivación en Equipos.
Seguridad Psicológica.
El Programa Diplomado en Liderazgo, responde a la necesidad de desarrollar las habilidades necesarias para liderar en un mundo de continuo cambio y disrupción. En este diplomado aprenderás de manera práctica, cuáles son los fundamentos para ser un gran líder.
Al terminar este programa tendrás todas las habilidades necesarias para enfrentar los retos con conocimiento, estrategias y, sobre todo, con humanidad, la característica más importante de cualquier líder.
¡Inicia tú camino al liderazgo hoy!
*Al finalizar los (6) seis cursos, los estudiantes pueden solicitar el certificado completo del Diplomado, el cual acredita 120 horas de estudio y práctica. Otorgando a los participantes el grado de Diplomado en Liderazgo. Sigue las instrucciones dentro del curso para hacer esta solicitud.

courses.title: Escribir con Estrategia: Mejora tu mentalidad de autor
courses.bio: Mentalidad, Liderazgo, Productividad y Planificación para escritores de ficción y no ficción
requirements: Cero requisitos complicados. Si sabes escribir y tienes ganas de tomarte en serio tu carrera, ya tienes todo lo necesario. Pero si quieres ir un paso más allá, esto te ayudará:  Mente abierta para aprender estrategias que quizás no te enseñaron en los típicos cursos de escritura. Un proyecto en mente o en marcha. Puede ser un libro, un blog o una idea que aún está en pañales, pero que quieres llevar a otro nivel. Ganas de dejar atrás la improvisación. Si sigues creyendo que la inspiración lo es todo y que “lo importante es escribir”, este curso quizás te haga replantearte algunas cosas. Algo para tomar notas. Ya sea un cuaderno, Notion, Word o lo que te funcione, porque vas a querer aplicar lo que aprendas. No necesitas experiencia previa en negocios ni en marketing. Aquí te lo explico todo sin tecnicismos aburridos, directo a lo que importa para un escritor.
Puedes ser escritor de Ficción y de No Ficción
courses.description:
Este curso no es sobre "escribir mejor" (eso ya lo haces, ¿verdad?), ni sobre técnicas de escritura, ni sobre escritura creativa. Aquí te enseño a convertirte en un escritor estratégico y a avanzar de verdad en tu carrera literaria. El contenido está basado en estrategias de negocios y emprendimiento, adaptadas específicamente al mundo de la escritura. Tomaré como referencia los libros más populares sobre estos temas, pero aplicados tanto a escritores de ficción como de no ficción. Si estás listo para dejar de esperar que la “inspiración” te salve, este curso es para ti.


Transformar tu mentalidad: Dejarás de soñar despierto y empezarás a ver la escritura como un negocio. Nada de esperar milagros; aquí aprenderás a actuar con estrategia y cabeza fría.
Estrategias de liderazgo y emprendimiento: Te voy a mostrar cómo aplicar los mismos principios que usan los grandes líderes empresariales para que puedas tomar decisiones clave en tu carrera como escritor.
Gestión del tiempo y productividad: Olvida las excusas de “no tengo tiempo”. Descubrirás métodos prácticos, sacados de libros de negocios y autoayuda, adaptados a la vida del escritor para que organices tu trabajo de forma realista y eficiente.
Planificación y visión a largo plazo: Te enseñaré a trazar un camino claro, definir metas sostenibles y convertir tus proyectos literarios en pasos firmes hacia una carrera que realmente puedas vivir.
Cada video es directo, sin adornos innecesarios, y está diseñado para que empieces a tomar las riendas de tu escritura desde ya. ¿Listo para dejar de improvisar y pasar a la acción?
target_audience: Escritores de Ficción y No ficción en todos los niveles. Desde escritores novatos hasta publicados.

Nothing.

courses.description:
"This audio course includes Paul's book "Success I.A.O" as well as the NEVER RELEASED audio dictations for creating the book while Paul was fighting cancer. Nothing is more inspiring and nothing like this has ever bee released before"


Do You know why most people fail to succeed in life and business? They don't know how. Success is a strategy, a mindset and a system. Learn how to attract success today, take action, And turn your life around!


Success isn't easy. The dreams modern media sell you should come with a warning: You need to know how to think to succeed. You also need money to make money and wishing the universe gives it to you without taking action is... a little far fetched! Success IAO is the only course to include a book with action plans so you start making money in any situation your in, even with zero capital.


While there's no such thing as guaranteed success, there are established principles, and breadcrumbs you can follow. Paul Democritou is an entrepreneur, sales expert, and speaker. He's also a cancer survivor. Using his own experience, and sharing the teachings of his real-life and mentors, he lays out a path that anyone can follow to become successful - no matter what life has thrown at you so far. By learning to Improvise, Adapt, and Overcome, and following his 11-step action plan, you can change your mindset, and upgrade your life, however hopeless it might seem.


You Will Discover:
The two things you'll need to succeed that no amount of bad luck can take away
The only difference between the successful and you, and how you can close the gap
How to stop sabotaging yourself and allow yourself to become successful
How to overcome fear and step into your authentic self
How to develop a success mindset and attract success
How success thinks and how it works
How easy it is to make money right now
What are your 5 secret strengths
What is holding you back and not letting you succeed
Understand how people think and influence them
Understand how you think and influence yourself
Why visioning attracts success and how it really works
And much, much more!


Success I.A.O. lays out the roadmap you need to finally take charge of your own destiny, happiness, and success. With Democritou's rules, you'll learn to Improvise you way out of anything, Adapt your mindset and your surroundings, and Overcome all obstacles, internal and external. This course is packed with straight-talking, honest, and practical advice, interwoven with humour and candour that takes the sting out of the tail. If you need a no-bull pep talk from a guy you know is on your side, you'll love having Paul as your coach.


One third of profits from the book and course will be given by Paul to cancer patients and charities.


Take action and start your success transformation today!

Aspiring entrepreneurs

courses.title: MS-900: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals in a Weekend
courses.bio: Learn and Pass MS-900: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals in a WEEKEND. Earn MS-900: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals
objectives: This course covers every concepts to Pass MS-900: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals Exam
Latest Updated course MS-900: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals
Learn and Clear MS-900: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals exam confidently
Have some labs and Real world Examples
requirements: No IT prerequisites required
courses.description:
Only MS-900: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals course that you need. The MS-900: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals course is designed to introduce you to the essential concepts of Microsoft 365 and its role in enabling modern workplace productivity. This certification course provides a broad overview of Microsoft’s cloud-based solutions, making it an ideal starting point for individuals who want to understand how Microsoft 365 supports collaboration, communication, security, and compliance within organizations. It is particularly well-suited for business users, entry-level IT professionals, and decision-makers who are looking to align digital tools with organizational goals.
The course begins by exploring the core principles of cloud computing, highlighting the benefits of cloud adoption such as scalability, flexibility, cost management, and reliability. Learners gain insight into Microsoft’s Software as a Service (SaaS) model and understand how Microsoft 365 leverages the cloud to provide a unified suite of productivity tools. By studying services like Microsoft Teams, SharePoint, Outlook, OneDrive, and Office apps, participants discover how integrated solutions foster collaboration and improve efficiency across distributed teams.
The MS-900 course empowers professionals to confidently discuss the benefits and capabilities of Microsoft 365. It serves as a strong foundation for advanced Microsoft certifications and equips you with the knowledge to support digital transformation initiatives. Whether aiming to enhance business strategy, improve workplace collaboration, or pursue a career in cloud technologies, this course provides a vital first step toward mastering Microsoft’s modern productivity platform.
target_audience: This MS-900: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals course is for anyone wanting to obtain the knowledge to pass the MS-900: Microsoft 365 Fundamentals Certification

courses.title: 그레이스 인사이트 - 대체불가능한 인재들의 특징 5가지
courses.bio: VUCA 뷰카시대 프로 일잘러의 공통된 특징 - 그들의 경쟁력
objectives: 대체불가능한 인재 특징을 알 수 있다.
산업군에 상관없이 프로패셔널한 자세에 대해 알 수 있다.
자기 개발을 위한 지침을 줄 수 있다.
일과 삶에서의 성찰의 시간을 가질 수 있다.

소개: 강사 소개 및 대체불가능한 인재들의 5가지 특징

requirements: 누구나 수강할 수 있다.
courses.description:
어느조직이나 고성과자라고 하는 하이퍼포머들이 있기마련이죠! 하지만 이제 하이퍼포머는 누구나 될 수 있습니다. 그러나 하이퍼포머 중에서 조직에서 진짜 찐 플레이어는 대체가 불가능한 탤런트 즉 대체불가능한 인재라고 할 수 있습니다.
조직에서 대체불가능한 사람이라는 건 두가지 의미를 내포하고 있습니다.
첫째로 그 업무가 특정 자격을 요하거나 즉, 라이선스 및 특정 교육을 이수한 사람만이 다룰 수 있는 경우 대체 불가능하다고 말할 수 있습니다.
다른 하나는, 누구나 지식과 스킬을 연마하면 잘 할 수 있지만 빠른 실행력과 창의력 그리고 혁신적인 결과를 이끌어내는 유일한 사람. 이런 사람을 조직에서는 대체 불가능한 인재라고 말합니다.


즉, 하이퍼포머는 조직과 리더가 전략적으로 만들 수 있지만 대체불가능한 인재는 조직, 리더 그리고 개인의 자발적인 성찰과 성장이 (이를 내적동기라고 하는데요) 없이는 불가능하다고 보는게 저의 지난 25년이 넘는 일터와 조직에서 경험한 사실이라고 말씀 드릴 수 있습니다.
그렇다면 대체불가능한 인재들은 어떤 특징을 가지고 있을까요? 이를 통해 우리 스스로가 경쟁력 있고 일과 삶을 주체적으로 이끌어 가는 대체불가능한 인재가 될 수 있을까요? 대체불가능한 인재들과 함께 하려면 리더들은 어떤 점에 귀 기울여야 할까요? 다양한 인사이트가 있는 대체불가능한 인재들의 특징을 지금부터 알아보겠습니다.
target_audience: 직장인들을 위한 강의 내용으로 채웠습니다.

courses.title: How to Get Motivated in 30 Days & Live Your Best Life Now !

courses.description:
Are you motivated? Would you like to be more motivated? In this unique program, motivational speaker and book author Shawn Doyle will show you exactly how to get and stay motivated. The innovative idea behind this program is that you take one module each day on a different motivational topic for 30 days. Why? We believe that motivation is not an event but a process.
This content packed program includes videos, audios, tips, tools and checklists to help you take an introspective look at every area of your life, including some information and ideas that you will learn about that you never knew or heard of before. In one short month you will look at each area that has an impact on your motivation and on your life. Get ready to build the life of your dreams and maximize your true potential!
This program includes many topics including:
- The importance of passion
- How to set goals effectively
- Managing life stress
- Having a healthy social life
- How habits are the foundation of success
- Creating your own environment
- Resources to help you get and stay motivated

- Understanding the law of attraction
- How to flatten fear
- Knowing how a mentor can change your life
- Dealing with distractions

So are you ready to be motivated, inspired, fired up and ready to live the best life possible? To really finally and totally live life to the fullest? Want to make all your dreams come true? Want to get the tools and techniques and resources you need to be motivated? This program is the one you must take!

Also they learn how to help individuals in different areas of their lives, because every person is different from the other and so are their goals and needs. We mentor the client to identify their goals to help them to grow in life. The life coach provides helpful perspectives on each person and makes them aware of their abilities and talents. Also life coaches help clients to build up their future and set a plan into action and direction. Life coaches learn how to help clients accelerate their careers as a professional life coach.
