courses.description: Este curso busca ofrecerte la inspiración que necesitas para afrontar los retos de la vida con valor y alegría, escuchando las palabras profundas y hermosas de grandes escritores universales como Walt Whitman, Henry Miller, César Vallejo, Octavio Paz, Jorge Luis Borges y otros. Podrás constatar durante el curso, por tí mismo que posees todo lo que necesitas para vivir una vida plena, asomándote sin temor al misterio que eres, recibiendo y aceptando con agradecimiento todo lo que el universo tiene para darte sólo a ti, en este instante en que vives, que es el único en el que tienes la oportunidad de intentar realizarte y ser feliz. Estos escritores que te presento me infunden, cuando los leo, todo su optimismo, su vitalidad y su fuerza, y sé que también te lo pueden transmitir a ti. Con este curso quiero animarte a reflexionar y a asumir el control sobre tu persona y sobre tu vida, por medio de unos textos seleccionados de escritores relevantes y valiosos, que nos han dejado un legado de sabiduría extraordinaria. He extraído de sus escritos, pensamientos y vidas, el saber necesario para que puedas crecer desde tu propia experiencia vital. La de este curso es la literatura más genuina, esa nacida de mentes privilegiadas, profundamente humana,  y que sentirás que te habla directa y personalmente a ti.

courses.description: Il corso "COME POTENZIARE MOTIVAZIONE E RESILIENZA" si basa sulle ultimissime conoscenze specialistiche in merito allo studio della motivazione umana, facendo riferimento a teorie e tecniche di psicologi ed esperti di fama mondiale e di nota e dimostrata competenza. Pur presentando tematiche e processi in modo scientifico e dettagliato, intende avvicinarsi allo studente in modo amichevole, utilizzando un linguaggio preciso e adeguato, ma sempre chiaro ed accogliente. Nella sua interezza, il corso pone la persona in primo piano, con l'intento di aiutarla a dare il meglio del proprio potenziale nei contesti lavorativo, sportivo e sociale, e nella sfera personale (rafforzamento di autostima, resilienza, volontà di apprendere); pone specifico accento sulla consapevolezza e padronanza di emozioni, pensieri ed obiettivi. Valuta inizialmente i motivi che spingono a cimentarsi in un'attività, dando modo alla persona di riflettere sulle spinte che orientano le proprie decisioni, in modo più o meno consapevole. Si distinguono le tipologie di motivazione, loro implicazioni e punti di forza. Si dà molta rilevanza all'analisi della natura di vissuti e interpretazioni del reale, dando importanza a comuni e diffuse credenze che tendono ad arrecare sfiducia e insicurezza. Fornisce strumenti concreti e suggerimenti pratici che consentano di potenziare o ritrovare la motivazione e stimolare la resilienza.

courses.description:
Wealth Psychology: The Money Mindset & Financial Freedom System
Do you work hard, yet feel like financial freedom is always just out of reach?
The problem isn’t your skills, your network, or even the economy — it’s your brain’s outdated money programming. Most people never achieve financial freedom because they were never taught the science of wealth creation.
Wealth Psychology: The Money Mindset & Financial Freedom System is a science‑backed, step‑by‑step wealth creation system designed to reprogram your mind for prosperity. Combining neuroscience, behavioral psychology, and millionaire “mental codes,” you’ll discover exactly why your brain may unconsciously block wealth — and how to change that starting today. This is not just a money mindset course — it’s a complete financial freedom training that gives you the mental, emotional, and practical tools to build wealth for life.
In This Wealth‑Building Course, You’ll Learn How To:
Use your Reticular Activating System (RAS) as a “wealth filter” to identify profitable opportunities in your daily life.
Apply 7‑, 21‑, and 90‑day money mindset exercises to erase deep‑rooted money fears and replace them with an unshakable abundance mentality.
Master the Secret Mental Codes used by top 5% income earners to turn ideas into income, create scalable value, and manage risks with confidence.
Implement strategic networking to access high‑value opportunities without awkward self‑promotion.
Build multiple income streams using proven wealth creation and passive income strategies.
By the End of This Financial Freedom Training, You Will:
Replace scarcity thinking with a proven wealth‑abundance model backed by neuroscience.
Spot and monetize solutions where others only see problems.
Build lasting confidence to earn, grow, and manage wealth at any stage of your career.
Have your personal, step‑by‑step wealth‑building plan ready to execute.
Think like a millionaire and make financial decisions from a place of clarity and strategy.
Why Students Love This Money Mindset & Wealth Creation Course
100% actionable steps — no fluff, no wasted time.
Based on real millionaire case studies, success psychology, and neuroscience research.
Structured for entrepreneurs, professionals, freelancers, and ambitious individuals.
Studio‑level clarity with AI‑enhanced audio so every lesson is crystal clear and engaging.
Flexible learning — just 15–20 minutes a day to start building real financial freedom.

courses.description:
Manevi danışmanlık, bireylerin manevi ihtiyaçlarını anlama ve bu ihtiyaçlar doğrultusunda rehberlik sağlama sürecidir. Bu alan, kişinin ruhsal ve duygusal yönleriyle olan ilişkisini güçlendirmeyi amaçlayan çeşitli teknikler ve yaklaşımlar içermektedir. Manevi danışmanlık, bireylerin hayatlarında anlam ve amaç arayışlarını destekleyici bir çerçeve sunar.

Kapsamı oldukça geniş olan manevi danışmanlık, yalnızca dinî veya inanç temelli süreçlerle sınırlı kalmaz. Aksine, bireylerin manevi deneyimlerini, değerlerini ve inanç sistemlerini ele alır. Danışman, danışanın içsel yolculuğunda bir rehber işlevi görürken, bireyin kendi varoluşunu ve kimliğini yeniden değerlendirmesine yardımcı olur. Bu süreç, özellikle stres, kayıplar veya yaşam geçişleri gibi zorlu dönemlerde oldukça önem kazanır.

Manevi danışmanlığın önemi, ruhsal sağlığın bütüncül bir bakış açısıyla ele alınmasında yatmaktadır. Ruh sağlığı ile manevi boyut arasındaki ilişki, bireylerin genel iyilik halleri üzerinde belirleyici bir etkiye sahiptir. Manevi danışmanlık, bireylerin içsel barış bulmalarına, yaşamda karşılaştıkları zorluklarla başa çıkmalarına ve kendi kimliklerini keşfetmelerine yardımcı olur.

Dünyanın birçok yerinde manevi danışmanlık uygulamaları, toplumsal dönüşümler, bireylerin artan belirsizlikleri ve psikolojik sorunlarına yönelik çözümler arayışında önemli bir yer edinmiştir. Bu bağlamda, manevi danışmanlık, modern yaşamın getirdiği zorluklarla başa çıkmada etkili bir araç olarak ön plana çıkmaktadır.

Sonuç olarak, manevi danışmanlık, bireylerin yaşamlarını daha anlamlı hale getirmek ve ruhsal sağlıklarını artırmak için önemli bir destek mekanizması sunmaktadır. Bu kursun sonraki bölümlerinde, manevi danışmanlığın tarihsel gelişiminden uygulama alanlarına kadar çeşitli boyutları ele alınacaktır.


Bu kursta çok daha fazlasını bulacaksınız.

requirements: No prior knowledge in psychology required!

courses.description:
*** Welcome to the High IQ Course -The Science of Being Smart ! ***
You may be asking yourself: why you should take a course about IQ when you can just Google it and you will find a lot of information about this common notion?
The truth is that there is always some mystery involved when it comes to IQ, and especially your own IQ. There is always a secret hope that the IQ test will show you that you are a genius, accompanied by a fear that you will score lower than anyone in history .
And, to be honest, very few people actually know their accurate IQ or how a real standardized IQ test looks like.
The aim of this course is to present a commonsense approach to what IQ is and what it is not - and to the nature of IQ tests.
Even more important, psychologists have demonstrated that IQ scores can change over time. So, if IQ score can be increased, how can you increase yours? In the next lessons, you will find actionable, easy-to-apply concepts and activities that can be used immediately to increase your brain power and improve your IQ score.
How about the High IQ and Ultra High IQ societies? Have you ever heard of Mensa, Triple Nine or Mega Society? In this course you will find a lot of interesting information and how you can qualify for these exclusive organizations.
Finally, you will learn about the mind-boosting effects of Nootropics and you will find a lot of answers to all your questions you might have regarding the smart drugs.


This course will take you on a journey of self-discovery, showing how your intelligence works, how to develop its full potential, and how to use it effectively in daily life.
I'm sure you will enjoy it and I can't wait to be your guide on this exciting new journey!
Your Instructor,
Chris M Nemo
target_audience: Anyone looking to understand how IQ is measured and to develop their IQ score. This course is suitable for complete beginners,too.
People who think they have an average or below average IQ and want to do something about it.

courses.description:
¿Cuál es la razón por la que no alcanzas tu éxito?
Aún a pesar de trabajar y trabajar y trabajar cada vez más duro, por más y más horas...Ah ¡pero un momento!, ¿Será que sabes con exactitud lo significa éxito para tí?
Para saber cómo llegar de un punto "A" a un punto "B", primero tienes que saber dónde se encuentra el punto "B" y solo entonces, localizar donde estas tú mismo, esto es, el punto "A".
Es curioso que todo el mundo quiere alcanzar su éxito, pero en algunas ocasiones, algunas personas no saben con exactitud que es el éxito para ellos y por ende no saben que tan cerca o que tan lejos están de esa vida perfecta que desean, pero de la cual no tienen aun una claridad de lo que significa.
En este curso descubriremos una herramienta que te va a llevar a alcanzar tu Vida Perfecta, ademas que vas a auto evaluarte y definir con total claridad que acciones tienes que tomar para llegar a tu tan anhelado éxito.
¿Estas listo o lista para iniciar este camino de aventura que te llevará a descubrir que tus metas, tus objetivos y finalmente tu éxito están más cerca de lo que creías?
¡Si estas listo, entonces vamos juntos a por ello!
target_audience: Personas en busca de desarrollo, superación, éxito de forma concisa y directa.

Complete Positive Thinking Course  -  Happiness Psychology
The Positive Thinking Habit - Harness the Power of Positive Psychology to Manifest More Happiness In Your Life!

Positive thinking is not something you’re born with. It is a habit you can develop. And once you have the positive thinking daily habit, your life will explode with growth and improvement.
People who go through life with a “glass is half full“ mindset are more successful, happier, and more productive than those who go through life with a “glass is half empty“ mindset.
Whether you were born naturally optimistic or not does not matter. If you decide you want to embrace positive thinking on a daily basis in your own life, then this course will show you exactly how to do it.
Personal development expert TJ Walker will teach you his unique SelfieSpeak Programming (SSP) method for building a positive thinking mindset into your brain. This system isn’t just theory or another collection of useful tips, it is a systematic way of reprogramming the negativity out of your brain.
We live in a 24/7 online media and social media world that screams out “negative, destruction, despair, unrest, failure“ all day long. If you consume media the way most people do, and interact with your own cell phone the way most people do, then a negative thinking mentality is the most likely outcome. If you want to embrace life with a positive thinking mentality, you must change your relationship to traditional media, social media, and your cell phone.
This course will teach you how to embrace the positive in life. If you are ready to wake up in the morning with a smile on your face and feel good about your day to come, then you should sign up for this positive thinking course right now.

requirements: No IT prerequisites required
courses.description:
Only Kubernetes and Cloud Native Associate (KCNA) course that you need. The Kubernetes and Cloud Native Associate (KCNA) course is an entry-level certification program that introduces you to the fundamental concepts of Kubernetes and the cloud-native ecosystem. Designed for beginners and aspiring cloud professionals, this course provides a strong foundation in container orchestration, microservices, and modern application deployment strategies. It emphasizes both conceptual understanding and practical knowledge, making it an ideal starting point for those looking to build a career in cloud technologies and DevOps practices.
The course delves into the broader cloud-native landscape. You will gain insights into the role of containers, registries, and continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) pipelines. It also covers essential topics such as observability, security, and networking within the cloud-native ecosystem. By understanding these concepts, You will be better equipped to appreciate how cloud-native tools work together to accelerate innovation and improve application lifecycle management.
You will explore its architecture, key components, and functionality, including pods, services, deployments, and namespaces. The course highlights how Kubernetes simplifies the deployment, scaling, and management of applications in distributed environments, offering resilience and flexibility to organizations of all sizes. In addition, You will be introduced to the principles of cloud-native development, where applications are designed to be scalable, portable, and fault-tolerant by leveraging containerization and orchestration technologies.
The Kubernetes and Cloud Native Associate course equips you with essential skills and insights into one of the fastest-growing technology domains, empowering them to confidently contribute to cloud-native projects and the future of modern IT infrastructure.
target_audience: This Kubernetes and Cloud Native Associate (KCNA) course is for anyone wanting to obtain the knowledge to pass the KCNA Certification

courses.description:
How many times have you started learning a new language and given up? How often have you found yourself in despair and total frustration with yourself despite your strong ambition to speak that language?
If you want to learn how to prepare for your language learning journey, stay motivated, create your personal timeframes, set specific goals and achieve them, this course is right for you. You are going to benefit massively by completing tasks related to your interests and self-actualisation in order to prepare your own language programme with personal deadlines.
You will discover how important it is to personalise your learning whether it relates to languages or to education in general. By acquiring these skills you can focus on languages and other soft skills development that will help you to unfold your potential. After all a language is just a piece of a huge puzzle.
Apart from the boost of motivation you will acquire new skills that will empower you in a struggle with phonetics and vocabulary memorisation. Little grammar hacks will help to start building sensible sentences from the first day. You will also break stereotypes about difficulties in early reading and writing.
Moreover, you will discover why cultural intelligence is so important and how you can use it in your personal and business life.
And remember to believe in yourself!
target_audience: language learners
people who want to learn a few languages

¡Bienvenidos al fascinante mundo del Reiki Horus!
Vamos a sumergirnos en un viaje transformador hacia el bienestar físico, mental y espiritual a través de nuestro curso de Reiki Horus.
Reiki Horus es una modalidad única que integra las enseñanzas tradicionales del Reiki con la energía simbólica del antiguo dios egipcio Horus, simbolizando la protección, la claridad y la conexión con lo divino. Este curso está diseñado para aquellos que buscan no solo aprender las técnicas de sanación del Reiki, sino también explorar una dimensión más profunda de la espiritualidad y el equilibrio energético.
Estas energías nos ayudarán a abordar los aspectos negativos a nivel emocional, físico y mental, proporcionándonos una eficaz protección y cortando definitivamente la influencia de la energía negativa procedente de diversas fuentes que reduce nuestro nivel vibratorio.
Experimentarán una conexión más profunda con su propia energía vital y aprenderán a canalizarla para equilibrar y armonizar los diferentes aspectos de su ser. El Reiki Horus no solo busca aliviar el estrés y promover la relajación, sino que también trabaja en niveles más profundos, fomentando la autoconciencia y la autotransformación.
La sanación de Reiki Horus opera directamente sobre los chakras, los centros de energía del cuerpo. Al modificar el campo electromagnético de los chakras, la energía de Reiki Horus nos ayuda a conectarnos con el amor, una fuerza que impulsa nuestro progreso en todos los niveles.
Sin más que añadir los espero esta hermosa experiencia. ¡Nos vemos dentro!

The scientifically proven health benefits of regularly experiencing positive emotions

requirements: No prerequisites for taking the course. The detailed presentation of Positive Emotional Intelligence will be a great starting point for individuals interested in developing their emotion regulation skills.
courses.description:
Experiencing positive emotions regularly can improve your mental health, physical health, and relationships.
The Positive Emotional Intelligence course by Kidest OM will equip you with the understanding and techniques you need to harness the power of positive emotions to feel better in your life and relationships.
Positive emotions have been scientifically proven to: buffer stress, build your resilience (ability to bounce back from setbacks), reduce anxiety, increase your mindfulness, enhance your social connections, improve your immune function, provide you with cardiovascular benefits, reduce pain, enhance your sleep quality, increase your cognitive flexibility, and so much more.


Emotional Intelligence (EQ or EI) is one of the most important and valuable life skills you can develop!
Developing your emotional intelligence (EQ) improves your self-awareness, self-regulation capacity, communication skills, and helps you effectively establish trusting relationships in your personal and professional life. Recognizing and constructively managing emotions in yourself and others will enhance your overall well-being.
In this course, you'll learn how to build on the scientifically proven benefits of EQ to develop, stabilize, and increase your ability to intentionally evoke positive emotions.  This valuable, unique, science-driven course teaches you how to achieve personal and professional well-being by leveraging the proven power of positive emotions.
Enroll and learn how to use your emotional intelligence to harness the proven power of positive emotions for your health, personal and professional well-being, and your relationships.


Once you complete this course, you'll be able to:
Understand how to use your self-awareness and self-regulation skills to improve, elevate, and enhance your mood.
Use your emotional intelligence to increase your self-confidence and self-esteem and develop positive self-regard.
Manage and skillfully regulate your level of motivation in your personal and professional life.
Build practices and strategies that help you stay motivated and empowered personally and professionally.
Improve your personal and professional resilience.
Leverage neuroplasticity to create permanent positive changes in your moods and behaviors.
This is a course you'll love, packed with information that can enhance and improve your personal and professional well-being.


What's in the Positive Emotional Intelligence Course?
Over 2 hours of science-driven insights and expert guidance
Quizzes to anchor your learning
Exercises in an accompanying course booklet to help you integrate what you learn
Take this empowering personal development journey. Make this comprehensive video training on Positive Emotional Intelligence your go-to resource for lasting personal, professional, and relational well-being.


You can manage, regulate, and transform your emotional states. The Positive Emotional Intelligence course will empower and educate you on developing these skills.
You can develop your self-awareness and self-regulation skills to increase the frequency of positive emotions in your life. You can leverage the proven power of positive emotions to transform your health, relationships, and life.


Here's a Little More Detail on The Positive Emotional Intelligence Course:
The Neuroscience of Positive Emotions: Learn the basic neuroscience of positive emotions and your “feel good” hormones.
The Proven Benefits of Positive Emotions: Understand the research findings that demonstrate how positive emotions enhance your well-being.
Positive Self-Awareness: Learn how to enhance your self-awareness skills (one of the first emotional intelligence competencies) to develop more positive forms of self-knowledge, self-understanding, and self-appraisal. You can learn to permanently see yourself in a more positive light.
Positive Self-Regulation: Learn how to enhance your self-regulation skills (the second emotional intelligence competency) to increase the frequency of positive emotions in your daily life. You can intentionally practice feeling good and understand the science behind your practice.
Actionable Steps: Complete the quizzes in the course sections and the exercises in the Positive Emotional Intelligence course booklet designed to help you develop positive self-awareness and self-regulation skills.
Practical Tips: Find practical tips and techniques to implement in your personal development practice throughout the course.
Enroll now to learn one of the most valuable internal resources you can develop. This course is suitable for individuals of any age.




Please note that Udemy will provide auto-generated subtitles for this course in English. Additional languages will be added gradually by auto-translating the English subtitles (auto-translation into other languages is done via neural machine translation).
target_audience: Individuals interested in personal development, personal growth, emotional intelligence, growth mindset, positive psychology.

courses.title: Bhagavad Gita Slokas
courses.bio: Guidance to Humanity
objectives: Philosophical and Spiritual Wisdom
Guidance for decision making
Stress relief and Mental well being

requirements: None
courses.description:
This course on Bhagavad Gita is divided into 10 lectures with 80 slokas. Each sloka encapsulates timeless wisdom.
It addresses fundamental questions about life, duty, self discipline. Each lecture gives us a step-by-step guidance towards renunciation.
You are going to learn about Self Control, Bhakti, Knowledge and Karma. You can memorize the slokas and apply the principles in day-to-day life.
No specific prerequisites are required, though a curiosity about philosophy, spirituality, or Indian culture would be beneficial.
In essence, the Bhagavad Gita's teachings are universal and can benefit anyone seeking deeper insights into life, morality, and spirituality, regardless of their background or profession. The text's practical guidance a make it relevant to a wide audience seeking personal growth and understanding.
By the end of the course, students will:
Gain a deep understanding of the philosophical and ethical teachings of the Bhagavad Gita.
Develop critical thinking skills through analysis and reflection on its verses.
Apply the Gita's teachings to their personal and professional lives, fostering spiritual growth and ethical awareness.
The teachings of Gita promotes inner peace.
Reciting verses can calm the mind, reduce stress and bring serenity and clarity.
The benefits of learning Bhagavad Gita extend beyond religious and cultural boundaries
Learning slokas enhances learning proficiency
Appreciate linguistic beauty of Sanskrit language
target_audience: Spiritual seekers, Students, Scholars, General readers, Devotees

requirements: You do not need to have any knowledge of the topics in this course
I explain these topics in detail and with real-life examples
courses.description:
1. A New Vision – A New Business Plan
In November 2020 and after the great challenge of blocking the virus, my business plan that I had kept focused for the last years became obsolete and I felt the need to rewrite it. They say we should review our business plan every few years as we and our circumstances change. If you are in the same place as me, I invite you to review the following points together so that you too can build your business plan that allows you to define, organize and focus your thoughts.
And another thing: I do not consider that my work or occupation should be separated from the rest of my life; I am determined to weave both aspects as one and create time and space for each one so that they have a link to each other so that my work becomes part of my life and my life is embedded in my work ... Especially today that we have the perfect opportunity if we mix our free time with our option to work from home.


2. An (Un)Fortunate Incident
In this lecture, we talk about the numerology of some important dates in 2020. We may think that numbers are not relevant in our daily lives, or maybe that they are just anecdotally interesting, but the Universe works like a perfect mathematical equation and nothing happens by chance. So, when numbers speak loudly, pay attention ... This is a time of change, with potential and possibility. I would like to think that this story can help you focus your energies on what is important in life: what makes us firm, strong inside, and with a clear direction of where we are going. But in any case, and if you have doubts, any energy work you do at the level of the Heart Chakra will take you in the same direction. And in my opinion, it's really worth it.


3. The Heart: A Door to Your Potential
Unlike my past, these days I go through life with little agitation. Having done years of developing energy and awareness, I am always focused on the positive possibilities. All negative circumstances in our lives are a message from the Universe that brings us a gift in the form of perhaps "shocking experiences", but a great "present" or gift nonetheless: a creative change. We need to put aside the way we used to do things and allow for a simplified and more efficient way of opening ourselves to possibilities. That is, a new version of our old dream and a new version of ourselves. Simply put, if it's time to specialize and redefine ourselves, allowing a new vision to form for the future, how do we do it? ... Read on.


4. December 2020 – Make it Real
In December 2020 we were forced to stop and regroup our resources. I could describe it as small confinement within the confinement - the universe putting on the handbrake, just for a moment.
We were being asked to go beyond where we had come and reconfigure, refocus, and redefine our options. Basically, we first have to decide who we are, and second, express ourselves in everything we do. Finally, we need to find the most resonant area of expertise, the one that makes us the happiest.
There are no rights or guarantees. If 2021 has shown us anything, it is that the only security and guarantee we have is the power of our inner being, centered and clear of all the noise that surrounds us. We have to learn to simplify our lives because control is no longer useful and flow is a new way.


5. Leveraging Our Skills
In this lecture, I talk about how the beginning of 2021, we felt the need to stop for a moment and catch our breath from what was the energy marathon of 2020. At the same time, there was a new with vaccines beginning to roll: a lighter feeling, a new approach.
We are almost there... but not yet. Wo we need to save our personal energy for what really matters to us, with a base of calibration or rebalancing - because part of the change that we should all try to achieve this year is to calm down and trust with absolute certainty that we are actually moving in the right direction towards a better future for all.


6. An Astrological Profile
In preparation for this important new year 2021, I made a complete Astrological Profile online. In 2020 we have all been severely confined by the pandemic and I used this time to fully focus on gathering all the information that I had produced for 20 years, in order to recreate myself using the modern technology available today. I spent a whole week reading, gathering information, summarizing it, and writing it down on my spiritual diary.
Are you ready or ready to integrate and utilize the natural and limitless universal or cosmic energy currents freely offered to you, in order to take your life to the next level? Or will you deny yourself and the world the spark of your amazing and brilliant spirit?
You, like me, then may think that it is an impossible task, but if you look around you, you will surely find all the answers to all your questions, right where you are.


7. Shamanic Journey (Part 1): Purge of Emotions
Emotions are gateways to the unconscious. They are portals of healing. Many of us grew up having to please others. This means that the reward for our actions is acceptance, or lack thereof, depending on whether we react in ways considered "acceptable" within the Status Quo or the social structure that surrounds us.
Emotions guide us through the illusion of reality. Once this hidden truth becomes conscious, once we can see it face to face, we can handle the released energy that we used to utilize to repress that truth: our lie, our prison. And this is how we create a path through the purging of emotions.


8. Shamanic Journey (Part 2): A Healing Shift
Many of us do not even realize that we live in self-imposed prisons created from a misunderstanding of a life that was presented to us. We locked ourselves in an emotionally oppressive environment that we couldn’t overcome… until we grow up in awareness.
The confinement forced us to take a new rhythm. Somehow, we had to learn to organically integrate all the new circumstances and changes that began in early 2020, and that offered us healing and emotional freedom.
In my case, the trigger was my health, but it could also be anything equally toxic in our lives, be it a relationship, a job, an addiction, a stifled mentality, an inflexible attitude... Anything that slows us down, that prevents us from expanding to reach our bright future.


9. Shamanic Journey (Part 3): Shamanic Test
The eclipse and full moon of December 30th 2020, were quite significant. In fact, astrologer Kari Samuels says that this portal opens a "new frontier, a karmic awakening in which we recover parts of ourselves: we recover our intuition.
This total eclipse was supposed to bring to light great discoveries of energies that were hidden. The time had come to resolve this matter once and for all so I was happy for the pain, the discovery, and the reminder that I have the power to heal my own mind, body and my own life.
Because for me a disease is a crystallized vibration. It is a marker that tells us where we have stopped on our way, and forces us to take stock in order to be able to make a new decision.


10. Shamanic Journey (Part 4): A Study of Grief
We force our cells to lock or shrink when we ignore the first signs of imbalance. Cells do what the main consciousness of the body tells them, but we pay a very high price: as our energy is blocked, the body will wait for the moment to charge us the accrued interest. And this interest is always in the negative column of the balance of our lives. We can also call it Karma.
As the imbalance progresses, the body registers all the violations to our integrity by releasing stress hormones. But we do not act on them because this is a perceived reality and we are neither fighting nor fleeing. These hormones accumulate in the body and are directed inward, linked to painful emotions. When we are ready to free ourselves from the disease, we must touch the emotion that locked the physical.
All this happens in the subconscious, so we don’t really realize that this is going on. But the body is building up stress. As we deny ourselves emotionally, as that we lie to ourselves and to the world in reference to our personal power… is it any wonder that this situation becomes a psychosomatic reality?


11. Shamanic Journey (Part 5): Achieving Balance
Nicholas Sieben LAC talks about the "alchemy of physiological metabolism" or the way we interact with the outside world through digestion. The "Luo Vessels" are blood vessels under the skin, which retain toxins and bacteria that could harm the body, by preventing them from circulating through the meridians to the organs.
It is incredible how all traumas are confined in the body in the lymphatic and cardiovascular systems, kidneys, spleen, liver, lungs... Each organ with its corresponding emotion and each meridian serving as an energy highway, transporting all frequencies of awareness around the body. But the organs cannot function well living in the past; and even when we have seen and solved a problem spiritually and cognitively, the body clings to them as if it were the moment the episode occurred… because the body really has a mind of its own!


12. Wolf Moon of the 28-01-2021
Many of us do not even realize that we live in self-imposed prisons, created from a misunderstanding of a life that was presented to us, but we lock ourselves in an emotional environment that we perceive as oppressive and that we cannot overcome until we grow in consciousness. When life gives us lemons, we should understand that the way forward is by making lemonade. It is then that a two-way communication channel can be opened - we share our gifts, and the universe responds with the same vibrational frequency as per the Law of Attraction. This connection with the universal flow of communication of giving and receiving takes place when you give of your gifts without holding back. It is then that we can receive the answer of the universe in return saying: "You have found the alignment you were looking for"


13. New Moon, New Seed
In this lecture, I talk about how in the second half of 2020, we were asked to re-establish and reposition our activity platform. This required a great simplification in our approach to work, resources (also waste), relationships... That is, deep cleaning of our lives. And the reason we needed to do this was because, in energy terms, we were at a new threshold. We were asked to clarify where we come from, who we are, and most importantly, who we want to become.
If you have not sown your own seed, activate your creative juices and ignite your soul, take advantage of this freely given moment... because there is no moment like the present.


14. A Bizarre Dream – Whales Bubble-Net Feeding
Being held back means resisting our higher destiny, which is the opposite of what I have been working on for 24 years: that is, releasing the blocks to my fullest potential. Whale totem talks about how we need to "find our personal song” - so I had to keep looking for what made me happy, the work that effortlessly expressed my authenticity and personality.
If you are reading these lines and you do not know what your vision of your destiny is, I would say: first, take notes of this story; second, visit my Instagram account: I am sure that with these insights, you will succeed in awakening the light in your soul and project it outwards into the world.


15. Success Kit for the New Consciousness: Part 1 - Innovation
(Based in the Astrologer José Millán’s Video: “The New Human” (El Nuevo Humano)
We are used to asserting control, manipulating, forcing things to happen using excessive force or personal will... when we realize that we need to let go of that control, bow down to the universal will and let it be, trusting that things they will come together in due time, we will need to find the point of equilibrium underlined by natural cycles. Attributes such as patience, tenacity, the release of results, the natural maturity of projects ... releasing our tendency to crystallize goals or immovable objectives, the fears of not having enough, of missing something, of not being on top of the pyramid of power, of not having control... can emerge. In this sense, innovation must be based on a strong level of awareness so that we can create and let go at the same time.


16. Success Kit for the New Consciousness: Part 2 – Shared Responsibility
(Based in the Astrologer José Millán’s Video: “The New Human” (El Nuevo Humano)
As the past is dismantled, a new way of looking at the world is born. We may not all see it, but we can all feel it. And within the new limitations, there is new hope. I am sure that you can identify with that feeling of secretly waiting for the moment, for a crack in this timeline, to seize your opportunity; to put your foot in the door of your dream life and with luck, to make that change you always wanted to make, but for which you had neither the energy, nor the resources, nor the knowledge, nor the drive to do so.
And I am sure that if you are honest with yourself you will admit, at least to yourself in the silence of your thoughts, that the change imposed on the world was somehow good - something "cracked" in this impossible and suffocating reality and we could take a respite from the roller coaster that modern life has become, allowing us to pause for a moment and glimpse a new possibility, one that required less money, less "production" and more happiness.


17. Success Kit for the New Consciousness: Part 3 – Living in Uncertainty
(Based in the Astrologer José Millán’s Video: “The New Human” (El Nuevo Humano)
According to José Millán (and I agree), we are currently experiencing "a systemic global collapse and a chaotic and destabilizing situation". The way to cope with this type of transition is to release old patterns of behavior and incorporate new ones into our "survival kit". In this case, José Millán says that "we will solve problems by accessing a higher level of consciousness instead of fighting with them and exhausting ourselves in the process".
For a long time, I (and many others on the path of awareness or personal development) have spoken of the Tao as a balance between being and doing, in order to learn to deal with the faster and new energies, to learn how to let go instead of resisting and fighting.
We want to learn to allow instead of blocking, to flow instead of controlling ... More Yin and less Yang or rather, find a new balance. And I believe that all of us, as global humanity and a world community, feel and understand that this is true.


18. Success Kit for the New Consciousness. Part 4: An Evolutionary Advantage
(Based in the Astrologer José Millán’s Video: “The New Human” (El Nuevo Humano)
When Sir Francis Bacon wrote his famous saying, "knowledge itself is power", I think he was referring to what is generally believed in our modern world: that one can achieve anything with skill or understanding. This in turn brings influence, status, and leadership. Or at least that's what we think.
This is the real or physical meaning of this phrase. But the non-physical meaning, some would say unreal and I would say that energetic or spiritual of this saying, is that we have a subconscious with a mostly untapped knowledge... and this is for me the real power.
Indeed, we are entering an age of higher consciousness. The global pandemic clearly showed us that we are all in the same boat. More and more people are realizing that we are all one and the same, and that if we want to achieve a sustainable solution for the future, we have to put together our knowledge and skills to create a new way of thinking, a new way of doing business.
The past is where we come from. Now we look at the present, we decide what works or does not work, and we must collectively take responsibility to change it, in order to create a better future.


Note:
* I have included the Book "Shamanic Journey - Crossing the Portal of 2020-2021" in your last lecture.


* BONUS VIDEO 1: Short Reiki Healing Session
* BONUS VIDEO 2: Who is Dr Ana? Brief Bio
* BONUS VIDEO 3: Spiritual Fun Quiz Time!
Challenge yourself and learn more about spirituality in a lighthearted way, deepen your knowledge and understanding of spirituality and stimulate your thinking and creativity with the following Spiritual Riddles!

People who need strategies for success organically and according to universal natural laws

courses.description:
Are you tired of struggling to maintain your motivation? In this transformative course, you will learn effective strategies for boosting your motivation and sustaining it over the long term. It’s common to feel an initial surge of excitement when pursuing your goals, but maintaining that inspiration often proves challenging. This course offers practical tips and insightful advice to help you overcome common pitfalls and keep your motivation alive.
Through engaging lectures and interactive discussions, you'll uncover six essential skills that will empower you to become a relentless achiever. First, you will learn how to make a public commitment, harnessing the support of others to hold yourself accountable. Second, you will embrace the power of purpose, clarifying your “why” to fuel your drive. Third, breaking goals down into manageable steps will be a game changer, allowing you to celebrate small victories as you progress. Fourth, you'll identify the mistakes that may be hindering your motivation, such as setting unrealistic goals and neglecting to celebrate your achievements. Fifth, you will explore the impact of diet on motivation, learning to optimize your nutrition for mental clarity and energy. Lastly, this course will equip you with proven techniques for effectively maintaining your motivation amidst distractions and challenges.
This course is perfect for anyone feeling stuck in their pursuit of personal or professional goals—whether you're a student, professional, or anyone seeking to improve their life. Change starts with motivation, and it’s time to unlock your potential and thrive!

requirements: Não há requisito de escolaridade ou técnico para o curso
O requisito mais importante é o desejo de vencer e ser motivador, seja na vida pessoal quanto na vida profissional
courses.description:
Talvez a melhor maneira para começar a falarmos de motivação seja dizer para você o que não é a motivação. Muitas pessoas pensam, incorretamente, a motivação é um traço pessoal, isto é, alguns têm e outros não. Na prática, por exemplo, muitos gerentes ou líderes em geral rotulam os funcionários que parecem não ter motivação como preguiçosos. Tal rótulo pressupõe que um indivíduo é sempre preguiçoso ou carente de motivação.
O conhecimento histórico e científico de motivação, no entanto, diz que isso simplesmente não é verdade. O que se sabe muito bem é que a motivação é o resultado da interação do indivíduo e a situação. Certamente, os indivíduos diferem em suas características motivacionais básicas. Isso é algo normal do ponto de vista da existência humana. Somos diferentes.
A motivação é um impulso que faz com que as pessoas ajam para atingir seus objetivos. Envolve fenômenos emocionais, biológicos e sociais e é um processo responsável por iniciar, direcionar e manter comportamentos relacionados com o cumprimento de objetivos. Motivação é o que faz com que os indivíduos deem o melhor de si, façam o possível para conquistar o que almejam, e muitas vezes, alguns acabam até mesmo “passando por cima” de outras pessoas.
Dale Carnegie nos ensinou que “O mais profundo princípio da natureza humana é a ânsia de ser valorizado. O desejo de sentir-se importante é uma das principais diferenças entre as pessoas e os animais.”
Neste curso você aprenderá diversas técnicas e tudo que pode ser feito para motivar o ambiente de trabalho, a família, a igreja, enfim, onde quer que você esteja.
Além disso, este é um curso totalmente prático, voltado para ensinamentos que ajudam a motivar, tanto individualmente quanto o grupo. Veja cada assunto que iremos tratar no curso:
- O conceito de Motivação
- Motivação pessoal: por que eu devo me motivar?
- Motivação como eixo motriz
- Os 3 (três) tipos de Motivação
- Teorias de Conteúdo e de Processo
- Teoria das Necessidades Humanas
- Teoria do Reforço de Burrhus F Skinner 1948
- Teoria da Maturidade-Imaturidade de Crhis Argyris 1957
- Teoria dos Recursos Humanos de Douglas McGregor – 1960
- Teoria dos Três Tipos de Necessidades, de David McClelland - 1960
- Teoria da Expectativa de Victor Vroom 1964.
- Teoria da Eqüidade de J. Stacey Adams - 1965.
- Teoria da Higiene e Motivação de Frederick Herzberg 1969
- Teoria das Necessidades Existenciais, de Relacionamento e Crescimento, de Clayton Alderfer 1969
- Teoria das Metas de Edwin Locke 1970
- Teoria das Características da Função de J. Richard Hackman e Greg Oldham – 1975
- Teoria da Profecia Auto-Realizável de Dov Eden 1985
- Teoria Inteligência Emocional de Daniel Goleman 1995
- Teoria da Liderança Servidora de James Hunter 2006
- Motivação, Inteligência, Vontade, Dinheiro, Religião e Liderança
- Ações gerenciais motivacionais (prática)
- Conclusões e Encerramento do Curso.

courses.description:
Fire is one of the most dangerous enemies in this world. Fire has destroyed valuable lives of people, millions of Dollars worth property and caused serious impact on the environment. Whether it is on dry land, at sea or up in the air the situation is disastrous. Most fires take place due to carelessness of people, bad house keeping and bad maintenance. Fire is a good slave but a bad enemy. Fire is required for food preparation, operating boilers in production of steam for domestic heating during winter.
Therefore it is of utmost importance to study and have some basic knowledge about what is Fire, how does a fire start, Fire triangle, Fire Detection, Fire alarms, Fire Prevention measures and Fire fighting which could be easily adopted in your living spaces, homes, work stations etc, to control this deadly enemy.
E.g. Most recent fire destruction in Hawai, on the island of Maui, widespread damage, killing at least 115 people and leaving over 1,100 others missing.
Oil tank fire in Sri Lanka on a town called Kollonnawa where the terrorists fired RPGS to the countrys oil tank farm, thus causing a severe fire and explosion which burnt the entire oil tank farm resulting millions of Dollars loss of revenue and a serious environmental damage.
In the USA, various apartment fires almost every day seen on TV.
With a little bit of carfull actions from your side, learning the above topics, help develop a safe society and prevent your loving ones, valuable property and of course the environment. Please take a moment to go through this course carefully made  for you.

courses.description:
Che cos'è la motivazione? Come è possibile aumentarla? Ne esistono più tipi? Se si, quali? Quali sono i fattori che compongono l'autostima?
Questo corso di Psicologia risponderà a queste e molte altre domande, fornendoti una descrizione psicologica incentrata sulle affascinanti tematiche della motivazione e dell'autostima.
Imparerai infatti anche gli aspetti psicologici e le tecniche per volerti bene, perchè se vuoi essere in grado di amare qualcuno in modo autentico devi partire da te stesso!
Amor proprio non significa egoismo, significa apprezzare il buono che c'è in noi e accettarci e di conseguenza essere in grado di vedere il buono negli altri.
Aumentare l’autostima e la fiducia in sé stessi non ci rende automaticamente dei supereroi, ma rappresenta il primo passo per affrontare al meglio le sfide di tutti i giorni e i nostri obiettivi più ambiziosi.
Una scarsa autostima può rappresentare un enorme ostacolo nel percorso verso i nostri sogni ed obiettivi. Quando smettiamo di credere in noi stessi, nelle nostre potenzialità e nelle nostre capacità, il mondo esterno e chi ci circonda inizia a prendere decisioni che spetterebbero soltanto a noi.
La buona notizia è che il nostro livello di autostima non è scritto nei nostri geni. Non puoi scegliere di che colore sono i tuoi occhi o i tuoi capelli, ma puoi sempre imparare a rispettarti maggiormente, a riconoscere i tuoi limiti e ad apprezzare i tuoi pregi. Proprio così, si può imparare ad accrescere l’ autostima.
Mettiti comodo e...
ci vediamo dall' altra parte!

Naval Ravikant says: "I don't believe I have the ability to say what is going to work. Rather, I try to eliminate what's not going to work. I think being successful is just about not making mistakes. It's not about having correct judgment. It is about avoiding incorrect judgments." Avoid risky behaviors that are contrary to your goals.
Nassim Taleb, the author of Antifragile, says the first step is to decrease your risk is by removing people, habits, situations, and systems that leave you open to risk and make your work or team vulnerable.


Charlie Munger, Warren Buffets' investment partner put it this way:

・自己承認から始まる“セルフモチベーションマネジメント”の技術
・小さなチャレンジを続ける「行動設計」と「問い直す習慣」


◆なぜ「30代から始める」と差がつくのか？
・この講座は40代・50代の今からでも効果的です。
でも──30代のうちに気づき、整えておくことで、10年後のキャリアと人生に圧倒的な違いが生まれます。「早く始めた人ほど、“自分を信じられる土台”ができる」。それが、この講座を受講した多くの方の実感です。


◆受講者のリアルな声（一部抜粋）


・「IPOモデルで“老害化の兆し”に気づけたのが衝撃的でした」
・「セルフモチベーションって、“気合”じゃなくて“技術”だったんですね」
・「定年前に“心の再設計”ができて、自分に希望が湧きました」
・「30代の今、自分の10年後がちょっと楽しみになりました」
・「ワークが多くて、思考が整理できました。頭の棚卸しに最適です」


◆かっこいい大人であり続ける。そのために必要なのは「問い直す力」


・自分に向き合い、自分を更新し、自分の物語を、もう一度つくりなおす。
・それは、他人からの評価ではなく、あなたの“内側”から始まります。


◆この講座はこんな人におすすめです


・定年・再雇用・役職定年に向けて準備を始めたい方
・40代・50代で、これからのキャリアが不安な方
・「老害」と呼ばれたくない、でもどう変わればいいか分からない方
・自己承認・内発的モチベーションの整え方を知りたい方
・30代で未来への備えを始めたい方


今こそ、“変わりたいけど変われない”自分を卒業するタイミングです。
「まだ自分には可能性がある」と信じられる力を、この講座で育ててみませんか？
コースでお待ちしております。
target_audience: コースは、ミドルやミドルシニア世代（主に40代～50代）に向けた自己アップデートの初級ガイドであり、 「老害化しないために」「再び歩き出すために」「定年を通過点にするために」学び直す講座です。

courses.title: Massive Motivation
courses.bio: Control your destination by understanding how to manipulate your motivation

Chapter 1- Introduction to Motivation: What is motivation is made of
CHAPTER -2 - What Causes Low Levels of M: What Causes Low Levels of Motivation?
Chapter 4: Tactics to Increase Your Moti: Introduction to the tactics to Increase Your Motivation
Chapter 5: How to Channel Your Motivatio: Know how to Channel Your Motivation and massive success
Chapter 6: Sustaining your Motivation fo: Know how to sustain your Motivation for Long Periods of Time

requirements: Keen in achieving results and live better with a sustainable motivation
courses.description:
ATTENTION: All those lacking motivation and self-belief....
"Discover Your Own TRUE Motivation Step-by-Step, Learn How To Manipulate It, Then Finally You'll Be Able To Control Your Own Destiny!"


This training Will Take You Through The Process Of Finding Your Motivation And Then Keeping It


We all face challenges, day in and day out. But when you have serious goals and expectations from yourself you may face more challenges than others.


If you're struggling to lose that extra weight, or finding it hard to put in the extra effort needed to earn more money, you NEED more motivation.


In fact, you need better motivation and more of it. We all have some motivation, but it might not be enough for the goal we want to complete.




Your current motivation might not be enough.
Control Your Own Destiny
We all like to think that we have control of our own destiny, right?

But if we can't even complete our goals, then how do we?

If you really and truly want something then you should be able to do whatever it takes to get it. But you can't?

We all lack motivation at some point or other. The thing is, the more successful of us have simply learned to go beyond basic motivation and access a deeper motivation.

Something that REALLY drives us.

A fuel source that is infinite.
Not everyone can get to that level, or find their fuel source. But at the very least you will be able to find a sustainable and STRONG source of motivation. Something that will push you to your goals.
Sure, it's not THAT easy. You still need to work hard towards your goals, but having that little voice in your head telling you to go on helps.... a LOT!
We All Face Challenges!
The problem with life is that even if we do have larger and more ambitious goals, we find that our everyday life shuts us off from these.

Why?

Because we are forced to use the motivation we do have to do things we don't want to be doing. Like doing the dishes, and cleaning the house.

Unless you enjoy those things... Then you are using some of your motivation towards them. Which is why you find you have so little left for your real goals.

That's exactly why you need more motivation, or a better source of motivation that is sustainable and strong. But finding it on yourself isn't easy. I couldn't even find mine on my own.

But there are specific and actionable steps that YOU can take to unlock your true drive. To find your motivation. To find your fuel source.
....which is why I put together a guide to share my step-by-step process for finding and manipulating your motivation, in order to achieve your goals

Introducing... Massive Motivation
Don't let yourself idle in place any longer. Find your motivation, set a roadmap and start on your journey towards not only reaching but surpassing your goals.

Here's what you'll discover in The Productive Entrepreneur guide:


What causes motivation at its core


How low motivation comes about and how we can overcome it


Finding YOUR source of motivation


Effective tactics that WILL increase your motivation


How to direct your motivation efficiently


Sustaining your motivation and drive over long periods of time


How to use the "accountability effect" to help you get more done


How to generate more motivation without excessive effort!


...and much, much more!
target_audience: Students
Employees
Entrepreneurs
Aspirants to achieve their goals

courses.title: Allow The God In You Direct Your Life!
courses.bio: Live Your Life In 8K
objectives: Understanding the importance of setting clear and specific goals: This will help with having a clear direction.
Developing effective goal-planning strategies. Break down long term goals into small manageable steps.
Enhancing self motivation and perseverance: Embracing the God in you.
Improving time- management and productive skills.

About This Course: Who Is The God In You?

requirements: No experience needed.
courses.description:
Allow The God In You Direct Your Life is an innovative online course that combines the art of filmmaking with the science of goal achievement. This unique program teaches participants how to effectively set and achieve their goals using the same step-by-step process employed in making a movie. Get ready to embark on a transformative journey that will unleash your creativity and propel you towards success. While also embracing the God in you!


Led by renowned filmmaker and experienced life coach, Larrina Jefferson, this quick simple course takes you on an exciting exploration of goal achievement through the lens of filmmaking. Larrina Jefferson's expertise in both fields ensures a comprehensive and engaging learning experience that seamlessly integrates theory and practice.


Participants will discover how to:
1. Craft a captivating "goal script" - Learn the art of goal-setting by creating a clear and inspiring vision for your life.

2. Develop a strategic action plan - Transform your goals into actionable steps, just as a filmmaker creates a production plan for shooting a movie.

3. Assemble your dream cast and crew - Surround yourself with a supportive network of like-minded individuals who will help you achieve your goals.

4. Overcome obstacles and rewrite the script - Learn effective problem-solving techniques to navigate challenges and adapt your goals when necessary.


5. Film your success story - Celebrate milestones and document your progress, just as a filmmaker captures scenes that contribute to the overall narrative.
target_audience: Beginner goals getter ready to take control of their goals!

courses.title: Jogo - É sobre você - Game para gamificação de treinamentos
courses.bio: Um jogo para utilizar gamificar seus treinamentos com empatia e construção de relacionamentos
requirements: Muita animação
courses.description:
É sobre você é um jogo construído com o objeto de gerar escuta ativa, valorizar a empatia e a construção de relacionamentos. Você pode usar em treinamentos e dinâmicas, o importante é que seja algo que faça sentido e dê um objetivo positivo. Está sendo disponibilizado as versões em PowerPoint e em PDF.
A versão em pdf foi a primeira criada, você pode projetar ou até mesmo imprimir, como achar melhor.
A versão em PowerPoint foi feita para atualizar e aperfeiçoar o jogo, dando mais mobilidade e interação, além de possibilitar que seja usada em treinamentos online.

A construção de relacionamentos é fundamental para a vida de diversas maneiras, pois os laços que estabelecemos com outras pessoas desempenham um papel crucial no bem-estar emocional, mental e social de cada indivíduo. Os relacionamentos são um componente intrínseco da experiência humana e impactam todas as áreas de nossa vida, desde o âmbito pessoal até o profissional. Aqui estão algumas das principais razões pelas quais a construção de relacionamentos é tão importante:
Suporte emocional: Relacionamentos saudáveis e significativos fornecem suporte emocional durante os altos e baixos da vida. Ter alguém com quem contar em momentos de alegria, tristeza ou desafios oferece uma rede de apoio vital para lidar com as adversidades.
Bem-estar mental: Relacionamentos positivos contribuem para o bem-estar mental e a saúde emocional. A conexão com outras pessoas pode reduzir a solidão, a ansiedade e a depressão, além de aumentar a autoestima e a sensação de pertencimento.
Desenvolvimento pessoal: Os relacionamentos nos desafiam a crescer e aprender. Ao interagir com diferentes pessoas, somos expostos a perspectivas variadas, o que nos permite desenvolver habilidades de comunicação, empatia e compreensão emocional.
Aumento da resiliência: Relações fortes podem aumentar a resiliência individual. Quando enfrentamos adversidades, o apoio dos outros pode nos ajudar a superar as dificuldades e nos tornar mais resistentes perante os desafios.
Oportunidades profissionais: A construção de redes de relacionamentos no ambiente de trabalho pode abrir portas para oportunidades de carreira e crescimento profissional. O networking é essencial para se manter informado sobre novas oportunidades e para obter apoio em sua jornada profissional.
Felicidade e satisfação geral: Estudos têm demonstrado que pessoas com relacionamentos mais satisfatórios têm maior nível de felicidade e satisfação com a vida em geral. O compartilhamento de momentos de alegria com pessoas queridas torna as experiências mais gratificantes.
Saúde física: Relações sociais positivas estão associadas a melhorias na saúde física. Ter amigos e familiares com quem podemos compartilhar atividades físicas, como caminhar ou praticar esportes, pode incentivar um estilo de vida mais ativo e saudável.
Senso de propósito: Relacionamentos significativos ajudam a dar sentido e propósito à vida. O apoio mútuo e a conexão com outras pessoas podem fazer com que nos sintamos parte de algo maior do que nós mesmos.
Aprendizado e crescimento contínuo: Interagir com pessoas diferentes e expostas a novas ideias nos desafia a repensar nossas próprias crenças e valores. Essa diversidade de perspectivas nos ajuda a crescer intelectualmente e emocionalmente.
Em suma, a construção de relacionamentos é um pilar essencial para uma vida saudável e bem-sucedida. Ao nutrir conexões significativas com outros, podemos enriquecer nossas experiências, enfrentar desafios com maior resiliência e encontrar felicidade e satisfação em nossas jornadas pessoais e profissionais.
target_audience: Profissionais de RH, Líderes, Profissionais que querem espalhar a positividade pelo mundo

MINDSET: Compreenda os fundamentos e estratégias utilizadas pelas pessoas mais bem sucedidas do mundo
HÁBITOS DO SUCESSO: Compreenda como Performar na vida como um verdadeiro Campeão

THE CHAMPION: THE CHAMPION - Aula 1 - O que Significa o Sucesso na Mentalidade dos Campeões
THE CHAMPION - Aula 2 - Propósito de Vida
THE CHAMPION - Aula 3 - CRENÇAS: 80% do Sucesso é Mental
THE CHAMPION - Aula 4 - Visão e Metas
THE CHAMPION - Aula 5 - Assuma o Controle da Sua Vida
THE CHAMPION - Aula 7 - Transformam Informação em Ação Rapidamente
THE CHAMPION - Aula 8 - Discípulas de Si Mesmas
THE CHAMPION - Aula 9 - Trabalham Consistentemente Pelos Detalhes

Eleve o seu nível de Desenvolvimento Pessoal

requirements: Comprometimento e Humildade para o Aprendizado
courses.description:
Se você quer mesmo ser um campeão, precisa saber aonde você quer chegar.
Isso vai requerer um grande esforço de sua parte, mas é preciso que você tenha uma “mapa”, um plano, mostrando os caminhos que você vai percorrer pra chegar aonde deseja.
Napoleon Hill diz o seguinte sobre nossa atitude mental:
“Se tiver sua atitude mental sob controle você pode controlar quase todas as outras circunstâncias que afetam a sua vida, inclusive seus medos e preocupações de qualquer ordem ou natureza”
Um campeão, aquela pessoa que conquista grandes coisas, certamente sabe que tem de fazer sacrifícios, mas sabe também que esses sacrifícios são necessários para serem pessoas extraordinárias.
E quanto maior seu objetivo, maiores serão os obstáculos. Se não tiver a plena confiança de que você é capaz de dar conta do recado, muito provavelmente você vai fracassar.
Os campeões, têm confiança neles mesmos, independente do tamanho do problema que devem enfrentar. Uma pessoa confiante não desvia o olhar dos seus objetivos e jamais desiste.
O THE CHAMPION foi elaborado exclusivamente para as pessoas que estão comprometidas com seu desenvolvimento pessoal, mas que já estão cansadas de absorverem tanta informação e continuarem tendo pouquíssimos resultados significativos em suas vidas.
Existe um padrão comum entre as pessoas mais bem sucedidas do planeta. E esta série de aulas com exercícios extremamente práticos, irão compilar de uma maneira muito simples, eficaz e vivencial, o padrão de mentalidade dos campeões.
target_audience: Pessoas comprometidas com o seu desenvolvimento pessoal

courses.description:
Do you want to learn how to boost and sustain your motivation levels in any situation? Do you want to achieve your goals and dreams with ease and confidence? Do you want to inspire and motivate others to do the same?
If you answered yes to any of these questions, then this course is for you!
In this course, you will learn everything you need to know about motivation, from the science behind it, to the practical tools and techniques that you can use to enhance it. You will also learn how to find your motivation style and what motivates you the most, how to deal with motivation killers and boosters, how to measure and track your progress and performance, and how to apply your motivation skills and knowledge to your personal and professional life.
This course is designed for anyone who wants to improve their motivation levels, whether for themselves or for others. Whether you are a student, a professional, an entrepreneur, a leader, a teacher, a parent, or anyone else who wants to achieve more in life, this course will help you to unlock your full potential and performance.
By the end of this course, you will be able to:
Understand what motivation is, how it works, and why it is important
Learn the key concepts and theories in the science of motivation
Use practical tools and techniques to boost your motivation levels in different situations
Find your motivation style and what motivates you the most
Deal with motivation killers and boosters
Motivate others and create a motivational environment
Measure and track your motivation levels and progress
Maintain and sustain your motivation levels in the long run
Deal with motivation myths and misconceptions
Apply your motivation skills and knowledge to your personal and professional life
So what are you waiting for? Enroll now and start your journey towards motivation mastery!
target_audience: This course is for anyone who:
Wants to learn how to boost and sustain their motivation levels in any situation
Wants to achieve their goals and dreams with ease and confidence
Wants to inspire and motivate others to do the same
This course is not for anyone who:

courses.title: Motywacja. Co robimy nie tak?
courses.bio: Narzędzia i technii skutecznej motywacji i automotywacji
objectives: W jaki sposób działa nasz system motywacyjny?
Które z teorii motywacyjnych są również dzisiaj aktualne, a które nie?
Jakie narzędzia motywacyjne są nadala skuteczne, a które starciły swoją efektywność?
W jaki sposób skutecznie motywować innych oraz nas samych?
Jak wykorzystać w kontekście motywacji wiedzę z psychologii transpersonalnej?
Co oznacza i jakie efekty przynosi równowaga systemu pasywnego i aktywnego?

Cz. 1. Teorie, które się nie zestarzały: Lata 50. Od jakich czynników uzależniamy nasze strategie motywacyjne?
Lata 60. Kiedy motywują nas potrzeby, a kiedy oczekiwania?
Lata 70. A może jednak sprawiedliwość i satysfakcja?
Bliżej współczesności: regulacyjne dopasowanie oraz środowisko jak witaminy
Cz. 2. Co nas demotywuje?: Efekt kobry, czyli strzał w motywacyjne kolano
Cz. 4. Motywacja jako równowaga systemu: Dwa rodzaje osobowości - aktywna i pasywna

requirements: Brak
courses.description:
Praca nad podniesieniem motywacji lub poradzeniem sobie z jej brakiem często przynosi mizerne i raczej krótkotrwałe efekty. Przyczyną tego stanu rzeczy jest wciąż pokutująca wiara w to, że problemy z motywacją można rozwiązać za pomocą jej podsycania, podkręcania czy podgrzewania. To klasyczne podejście, w którym myli się skutek z przyczyną. Ponieważ - na co wskazują najnowsze i potwierdzone szeregiem eksperymentów i badań ustalenia naukowców - źródła problemów z motywacją nie znajdują się w samych procesach motywacyjnych, ich jakości czy mechanice, ale zupełnie gdzie indziej. Żeby zilustrować to podejście, posłużmy się banalnym przykładem osoby, którą boli brzuch, bo objadła się czereśniami. Kiedy uznamy, że problemem jest reakcja organizmu na bodziec a nie sam bodziec, czyli czereśnie, to będziemy próbowali stosować przeróżne sztuczki, by zmienić tę reakcję. Będziemy przekonywali delikwenta, żeby jadł czereśnie powoli, albo żeby sobie przy tym wyobrażał jakieś fajne rzeczy, albo żeby rozważył skosztowanie innej odmiany czereśni. Tymczasem prawda jest brutalnie prosta - jeśli po czereśniowym obżarstwie boli cię brzuch, to najskuteczniejszym sposobem pozbycia się problemu jest przestać obżerać się czereśniami. Bo kiedy nie ustaje przyczyna braku motywacji, kiedy nie dotykamy źródeł jej spadku czy braku, to nie dziwmy się, że nasze motywacyjne zaklęcia nie będą działać. Oczywiście - jak wykazały prace Herzberga - samo usunięcie przyczyn niezadowolenia jeszcze nie powoduje, że od razu pojawia się zadowolenie. Trzeba do tego jeszcze przeprogramować dwa środowiska - zewnętrzne oraz wewnętrzne. Aby tak się stało, po pierwsze muszą zmienić się warunki, w których oczekujemy motywacji od innych czy też od samych siebie. Po drugie zaś musi zmienić się wewnętrzny układ balansu dotąd wzajemnie sabotujących się sił. Gdy ta operacja zostanie prawidłowo wykonana, motywacja do działania pojawi się jako naturalny komponent ludzkiej aktywności. Motywacja będzie niejako efektem ubocznym zmiany, która dokonała się dookoła nas oraz w nas samych. Żeby jednak taka reorganizacja zewnętrznego i wewnętrznego systemu była możliwa, musimy posiłkować się wiedzą o czynnikach, które wzmacniają oraz blokują ludzką aktywność w określonych kontekstach sytuacyjnych. I w tym celu należy prześledzić dotychczasowe teorie motywacyjne, by sprawdzić, co jest tak naprawdę mało skutecznym motywacyjnym mitem, a co rzeczywistą mechaniką imperatywów naszej aktywności. I temu właśnie służy niniejszy kurs. Zapraszam zatem do wzięcia udziału w tej dekonstrukcyjno - konstrukcyjnej motywacyjnej podróży. W jej efekcie nasze podejście do motywacji może się dość znacznie zmienić. Z korzyścią dla motywowania innych oraz automotywowania siebie samych.
Zapraszam na kurs.
target_audience: Osoby pragnące zdobyć najnowszą wiedzę z obszaru motywacji
Liderzy zarządzający zespołami osób
Osoby doświadczające problemów z automotywacją

Sevgili Kursiyerlerim,
Öncelikle hepinize en içten sevgilerimi ve saygılarımı sunuyorum. Bu kursu incelediğinize göre beyninizin muhteşem potansiyelini keşfetmeyi ve daha başarılı olmayı arzuluyorsunuz.
Birçoğunuz  kurslara gidiyorsunuz ya da özel dersler alıyorsunuz yine de istediğiniz sonuçlara ulaşamıyor musunuz? 私自身もともと飽きっぽい性格で、自分でもそれをコンプレックスに感じていました。
でも、ヨガの練習を通して、「物事を継続する力」が身につきました。
日々の努力は、他人からは見えない部分ですが、その見えない時間があなたの圧倒的な礎を作り、夢を叶えるために必要な力を培ってくれます。


このコースでは、継続することが生み出す力や、めんどくさがりな人でも続けられるコツなどをお話ししながら、10〜20分程度の14種類のヨガのプログラムをご紹介。
ヨガ自体が「コツコツ続ける」練習になりますし、継続できる心と体に整えることに役立ちます。

courses.title: Kurs Podrywu Dla Mężczyzn W Pigułce
courses.bio: Jak podrywać w klubie i pubie okiem kobiety
objectives: 30 dni stopniowego wdrażania przydatnych wskazówek by poznać na żywo więcej kobiet niż na aplikacjach randkowych
Czym jest Magnetyzm Energii Męskości i co pociąga kobiety
Sekrety, które wpływają na postrzeganie atrakcyjności i męskości z punktu widzenia kobiet
Tajniki podrywu w stylu Wanilia vs. Tabasco
Właściwe pytania, wciągające tematy i czego unikać podczas pierwszego spotkania
Proste przykłady jak stosować “negi” by wyróżnić się wśród konkurentów
Przełamywanie oporu przed zagadywaniem i prowadzeniem konwersacji
requirements: Nie musisz być ani milionerem ani przystojnym modelem, żeby zwiększyć swoją atrakcyjność
Komunikacja z kobietami to umiejętność, której można się nauczyć
Twoje kiepskie przeszłe relacje nie determinują Twojej przyszłości - wystarczy chęć spróbowania nowych strategii
courses.description:
Chcesz wiedzieć jak skutecznie podrywać?
Masz dość bycia singlem?
Poszukiwanie miłości stało się irytujące i nie przynosi pożądanych efektów?
Czujesz, że tylko tracisz czas i nie wiesz dlaczego Twoje taktyki nie działają?
Pora to zmienić i poza poszukiwaniami online… powrócić do tradycyjnych sposobów, czyli sprytnego poznawania kobiet na żywo.


Podejmując się tego wyzwania:
W ciągu 30 dni stopniowego wcielania w życie moich wskazówek, stworzysz okazje do poznania więcej wartościowych kobiet, nowych koleżanek (i być może tej jedynej), niż w przeciągu całego ostatniego roku zmarnowanego na powierzchowne "matche" na aplikacjach randkowych.
Odkryjesz tajniki podrywu w stylu Wanilia vs. Tabasco,
Dowiesz się czym jest Magnetyzm Energii Męskości i co pociąga kobiety,
Na prostych przykładasz nauczysz się jak stosować “negi” i jak wyróżnić się wśród konkurentów,
Zobaczysz jak najprościej przełamać opór przed zagadywaniem i prowadzeniem konwersacji, bez strachu przed byciem ocenianym lub ignorowanym,
Uzyskasz wskazówki odnośnie właściwych pytań i wciągających tematów, które interesują kobiety,
Będziesz mógł rozpocząć nowy, ekscytujący rozdział swojego życia.


Zawartość kursu:
Wprowadzenie – 8 przykazań
Moduł 1. Zamknięcie przeszłości i leczenie ran
Moduł 2. Najlepsza wersja ciebie
Moduł 3. Magnetyzm energii męskości
Moduł 4. Obraz męskości w postaci ojca
Moduł 5. Mindset
Moduł 6. Ubiór
Moduł 7. Mowa ciała
Moduł 8. Wkraczamy do akcji
Moduł 9. Podejście Wanilia vs. Tabasco
Moduł 10. Poczucie humoru
Moduł 11. Rozmowa
Moduł 12. Ruchowy przerywnik
Moduł 13. Przyczyny prokrastynacji


EFEKTY PODJĘCIA TEGO WYZWANIA?
Uzyskasz przydatne wskazówki, które pomogą Ci pożegnać swoją wcześniejszą wersję samotnego mężczyzny, unikającego towarzystwa kobiet.
Odkryjesz dlaczego nie warto tracić czasu, wątpić w siebie i czekać, aż właściwa dziewczyna sama zapuka do Twoich drzwi.
Przez 30 dni, krok po kroku wdrażając moje zalecenia, zyskasz szanse na poznanie wielu wartościowych kobiet i zawarcie nowych znajomości (a może nawet spotkasz tę jedyną), zamiast polegać na szukaniu kobiet online.


Będziesz mógł skorzystać z sekretów i wiedzy zebranej na przestrzeni lat, by odważyć się na dokonanie w swoim życiu prywatnym diametralnych zmian na lepsze ;)


Ten kurs jest stworzony przez kobietę, by szczerze podzielić się z Tobą kobiecym punktem widzenia i dlaczego uważam, że w dzisiejszych czasach powrót do podrywu na żywo jest tak bardzo ważny i jednocześnie skuteczny.


Wszyscy uczestnicy kursu otrzymują ebooka, poradnik dla mężczyzn pt. "Pożądany mężczyzna" o wartości 67 zł za darmo.


Użyj kodu PODRYW2024 by w czerwcu zdobyć kurs z poradnikiem w niższej cenie.


Do usłyszenia :)
Daria
target_audience: Single, którzy chcą przestać tracić czas na aplikacjach randkowych i poznać nowe osoby na żywo.
Mężczyźni, którzy mają trudności z otwarciem się na nowy związek i kobiety.

courses.description:
Learn the gentle practice of mindful massage in this soothing workshop so you can bring this valuable stress relief into your daily routine.
Flowers have the capacity to open and reveal their full beauty irrespective of the environment around it. As long as it’s the season, the flower will bloom.
The process of a flower blooming, maturing into its full beauty as its petals open to reveal its bright colours can be compared to the process we go through when we mature into the achievement of our potential.
It can be very hard to connect to our future self independently as there are so many other priorities that can occupy our thoughts.
This course provides students with a soothing workshop that teaches valuable stress relief and skills to encourage the student to realise their full potential and go for it.
This course will guide the student to visualise what it looks like to bloom into the achievement of ones potential.
Practice and learn massage techniques that encourage openness, awaken the mind, and energise the body.
The student will also learn intentional controlled breathing techniques, mindful massage approaches, holistic techniques, reflective, self motivation, resilience, self development, and how to guide your thoughts into positive thinking skills.
A mindful moment of bliss that instils peace and calm, and encourages the student to switch off from everything else that’s going on in the world - and connect to oneself
Students will also receive a link to access the course workbook.
Programme:
1) Introduction
2) Emptying activity and exercise
3) Flower blooming explained
a. Stage 1
b. Stage 2
c. Stage 3
4) Mindful Massage Tutorial
5) Workbook - being reflective

I created this course because after struggling with procrastination, self-sabotage and many self-limiting beliefs, I stumbled upon methods and tools that really work and I was able to make massive changes in my life, using what I cover in this course.
